<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_147"><span id="lf0610_label_031">1</span> <span class="sc">The</span> book of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt005" id="lf0610_footnote_nt005_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_148"><span id="lf0610_label_033">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt006" id="lf0610_footnote_nt006_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Abraham begat Isaac; and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt007" id="lf0610_footnote_nt007_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Isaac begat Jacob; and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt008" id="lf0610_footnote_nt008_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_149"><span id="lf0610_label_037">3</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt009" id="lf0610_footnote_nt009_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt010" id="lf0610_footnote_nt010_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_150"><span id="lf0610_label_040">4</span> And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_151"><span id="lf0610_label_041">5</span> And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_152"><span id="lf0610_label_042">6</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt011" id="lf0610_footnote_nt011_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jesse begat David the king; and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt012" id="lf0610_footnote_nt012_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>David the king begat Solomon of her <span class="ital">that had been the wife</span> of Urias;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_153"><span id="lf0610_label_045">7</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt013" id="lf0610_footnote_nt013_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_154"><span id="lf0610_label_047">8</span> And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_155"><span id="lf0610_label_048">9</span> And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_156"><span id="lf0610_label_049">10</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt014" id="lf0610_footnote_nt014_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_157"><span id="lf0610_label_051">11</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt015" id="lf0610_footnote_nt015_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_158"><span id="lf0610_label_053">12</span> And after they were brought to Babylon, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt016" id="lf0610_footnote_nt016_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_159"><span id="lf0610_label_055">13</span> And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_160"><span id="lf0610_label_056">14</span> And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_161"><span id="lf0610_label_057">15</span> And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_162"><span id="lf0610_label_058">16</span> And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_163"><span id="lf0610_label_059">17</span> So all the generations from Abraham to David <span class="ital">are</span> fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon <span class="ital">are</span> fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ <span class="ital">are</span> fourteen generations.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_164"><span id="lf0610_label_060">18</span> &#xB6; Now the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt017" id="lf0610_footnote_nt017_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_165"><span id="lf0610_label_062">19</span> Then Joseph her husband, being a just <span class="ital">man,</span> and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_166"><span id="lf0610_label_063">20</span> But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_167"><span id="lf0610_label_064">21</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt018" id="lf0610_footnote_nt018_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_168"><span id="lf0610_label_066">22</span> Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_169"><span id="lf0610_label_067">23</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt019" id="lf0610_footnote_nt019_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt020" id="lf0610_footnote_nt020_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_170"><span id="lf0610_label_070">24</span> Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_171"><span id="lf0610_label_071">25</span> And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_017" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_072">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_172"><span id="lf0610_label_073">1</span> Now when <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt021" id="lf0610_footnote_nt021_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Jud&#xE6;a in the days of Herod the king, behold, there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_173"><span id="lf0610_label_075">2</span> Saying, Where is he that is born King of the Jews? for we have seen his star in the east, and are come to worship him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_174"><span id="lf0610_label_076">3</span> When Herod the king had heard <span class="ital">these things,</span> he was troubled, and all Jerusalem with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_175"><span id="lf0610_label_077">4</span> And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together, he demanded of them where Christ should be born.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_176"><span id="lf0610_label_078">5</span> And they said unto him, In Bethlehem of Jud&#xE6;a: for thus it is written by the prophet,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_177"><span id="lf0610_label_079">6</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt022" id="lf0610_footnote_nt022_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And thou Bethlehem, <span class="ital">in</span> the land of Juda, art not the least among the princes of Juda: for out of thee shall come a Governor, that shall <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt023" id="lf0610_footnote_nt023_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>rule my people Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_178"><span id="lf0610_label_082">7</span> Then Herod, when he had privily called the wise men, enquired of them diligently what time the star appeared.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_179"><span id="lf0610_label_083">8</span> And he sent them to Bethlehem, and said, Go and search diligently for the young child; and when ye have found <span class="ital">him,</span> bring me word again, that I may come and worship him also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_180"><span id="lf0610_label_084">9</span> When they had heard the king, they departed; and, lo, the star, which they saw in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_181"><span id="lf0610_label_085">10</span> When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceeding great joy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_182"><span id="lf0610_label_086">11</span> &#xB6; And when they were come into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt024" id="lf0610_footnote_nt024_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense, and myrrh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_183"><span id="lf0610_label_088">12</span> And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod, they departed into their own country another way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_184"><span id="lf0610_label_089">13</span> And when they were departed, behold, the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream, saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and flee into Egypt, and be thou there until I bring thee word: for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_185"><span id="lf0610_label_090">14</span> When he arose, he took the young child and his mother by night, and departed into Egypt:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_186"><span id="lf0610_label_091">15</span> And was there until the death of Herod: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt025" id="lf0610_footnote_nt025_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Out of Egypt have I called my son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_187"><span id="lf0610_label_093">16</span> &#xB6; Then Herod, when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men, was exceeding wroth, and sent forth, and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem, and in all the coasts thereof, from two years old and under, according to the time which he had diligently enquired of the wise men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_188"><span id="lf0610_label_094">17</span> Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt026" id="lf0610_footnote_nt026_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jeremy the prophet, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_189"><span id="lf0610_label_096">18</span> In Rama was there a voice heard, lamentation, and weeping, and great mourning, Rachel weeping <span class="ital">for</span> her children, and would not be comforted, because they are not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_190"><span id="lf0610_label_097">19</span> &#xB6; But when Herod was dead, behold, an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_191"><span id="lf0610_label_098">20</span> Saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and go into the land of Israel: for they are dead which sought the young child&#x2019;s life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_192"><span id="lf0610_label_099">21</span> And he arose, and took the young child and his mother, and came into the land of Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_193"><span id="lf0610_label_100">22</span> But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Jud&#xE6;a in the room of his father Herod, he was afraid to go thither: notwithstanding, being warned of God in a dream, he turned aside into the parts of Galilee:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_194"><span id="lf0610_label_101">23</span> And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets, He shall be called a Nazarene.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_018" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_102">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_195"><span id="lf0610_label_103">1</span> In those days came <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt027" id="lf0610_footnote_nt027_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>John the Baptist, preaching in the wilderness of Jud&#xE6;a,</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>3<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_196"><span id="lf0610_label_105">2</span> And saying, Repent ye: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_197"><span id="lf0610_label_106">3</span> For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt028" id="lf0610_footnote_nt028_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_198"><span id="lf0610_label_108">4</span> And the same John had his raiment of camel&#x2019;s hair, and a leathern girdle about his loins; and his meat was locusts and wild honey.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_199"><span id="lf0610_label_109">5</span> Then went out to him Jerusalem, and all Jud&#xE6;a, and all the region round about Jordan,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_200"><span id="lf0610_label_110">6</span> And were baptized of him in Jordan, confessing their sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_201"><span id="lf0610_label_111">7</span> &#xB6; But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism, he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt029" id="lf0610_footnote_nt029_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_202"><span id="lf0610_label_113">8</span> Bring forth therefore fruits <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt030" id="lf0610_footnote_nt030_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>meet for repentance:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_203"><span id="lf0610_label_115">9</span> And think not to say within yourselves, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt031" id="lf0610_footnote_nt031_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>We have Abraham to <span class="ital">our</span> father: for I say unto you, that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_204"><span id="lf0610_label_117">10</span> And now also the ax is laid unto the root of the trees: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt032" id="lf0610_footnote_nt032_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_205"><span id="lf0610_label_119">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt033" id="lf0610_footnote_nt033_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance: but he that cometh after me is mightier than I, whose shoes I am not worthy to bear: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost, and <span class="ital">with</span> fire:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_206"><span id="lf0610_label_121">12</span> Whose fan <span class="ital">is</span> in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and gather his wheat into the garner; but <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt034" id="lf0610_footnote_nt034_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_207"><span id="lf0610_label_123">13</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt035" id="lf0610_footnote_nt035_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_208"><span id="lf0610_label_125">14</span> But John forbad him, saying, I have need to be baptized of thee, and comest thou to me?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_209"><span id="lf0610_label_126">15</span> And Jesus answering said unto him, Suffer <span class="ital">it to be so</span> now: for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness. Then he suffered him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_210"><span id="lf0610_label_127">16</span> And Jesus, when he was baptized, went up straightway out of the water: and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and lighting upon him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_211"><span id="lf0610_label_128">17</span> And lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_019" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_129">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_212"><span id="lf0610_label_130">1</span> Then was <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt036" id="lf0610_footnote_nt036_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jesus led up of the spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_213"><span id="lf0610_label_132">2</span> And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights, he was afterward an hungred.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_214"><span id="lf0610_label_133">3</span> And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_215"><span id="lf0610_label_134">4</span> But he answered and said, It is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt037" id="lf0610_footnote_nt037_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_216"><span id="lf0610_label_136">5</span> Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city, and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_217"><span id="lf0610_label_137">6</span> And saith unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down: for it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt038" id="lf0610_footnote_nt038_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He shall give his angels charge concerning thee: and in <span class="ital">their</span> hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_218"><span id="lf0610_label_139">7</span> Jesus said unto him, It is written again, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt039" id="lf0610_footnote_nt039_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_219"><span id="lf0610_label_141">8</span> Again, the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain, and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_220"><span id="lf0610_label_142">9</span> And saith unto him, All these things will I give thee, if thou wilt fall down and worship me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_221"><span id="lf0610_label_143">10</span> Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt040" id="lf0610_footnote_nt040_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_222"><span id="lf0610_label_145">11</span> Then the devil leaveth him, and, behold, angels came and ministered unto him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_223"><span id="lf0610_label_146">12</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt041" id="lf0610_footnote_nt041_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Now when Jesus had heard that John was <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt042" id="lf0610_footnote_nt042_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>cast into prison, he departed into Galilee;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>4<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_224"><span id="lf0610_label_149">13</span> And leaving Nazareth, he came and dwelt in Capernaum, which is upon the sea coast, in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_225"><span id="lf0610_label_150">14</span> That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_226"><span id="lf0610_label_151">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt043" id="lf0610_footnote_nt043_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The land of Zabulon, and the land of Nephthalim, <span class="ital">by</span> the way of the sea, beyond Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_227"><span id="lf0610_label_153">16</span> The people which sat in darkness saw great light; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_228"><span id="lf0610_label_154">17</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt044" id="lf0610_footnote_nt044_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>From that time Jesus began to preach, and to say, Repent: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_229"><span id="lf0610_label_156">18</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt045" id="lf0610_footnote_nt045_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Jesus, walking by the sea of Galilee, saw two brethren, Simon called Peter, and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_230"><span id="lf0610_label_158">19</span> And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_231"><span id="lf0610_label_159">20</span> And they straightway left <span class="ital">their</span> nets, and followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_232"><span id="lf0610_label_160">21</span> And going on from thence, he saw other two brethren, James <span class="ital">the son</span> of Zebedee, and John his brother, in a ship with Zebedee their father, mending their nets; and he called them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_233"><span id="lf0610_label_161">22</span> And they immediately left the ship and their father, and followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_234"><span id="lf0610_label_162">23</span> &#xB6; And Jesus went about all Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_235"><span id="lf0610_label_163">24</span> And his fame went throughout all Syria: and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments, and those which were possessed with devils, and those which were lunatick, and those that had the palsy; and he healed them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_236"><span id="lf0610_label_164">25</span> And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee, and <span class="ital">from</span> Decapolis, and <span class="ital">from</span> Jerusalem, and <span class="ital">from</span> Jud&#xE6;a, and <span class="ital">from</span> beyond Jordan.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_020" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_165">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_237"><span id="lf0610_label_166">1</span> And seeing the multitudes, he went up into a mountain: and when he was set, his disciples came unto him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_238"><span id="lf0610_label_167">2</span> And he opened his mouth, and taught them, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_239"><span id="lf0610_label_168">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt046" id="lf0610_footnote_nt046_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_240"><span id="lf0610_label_170">4</span> Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_241"><span id="lf0610_label_171">5</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt047" id="lf0610_footnote_nt047_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_242"><span id="lf0610_label_173">6</span> Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt048" id="lf0610_footnote_nt048_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for they shall be filled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_243"><span id="lf0610_label_175">7</span> Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_244"><span id="lf0610_label_176">8</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt049" id="lf0610_footnote_nt049_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the pure in heart: for they shall see God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_245"><span id="lf0610_label_178">9</span> Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_246"><span id="lf0610_label_179">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt050" id="lf0610_footnote_nt050_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> they which are persecuted for righteousness&#x2019; sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_247"><span id="lf0610_label_181">11</span> Blessed are ye, when <span class="ital">men</span> shall revile you, and persecute <span class="ital">you,</span> and shall say all manner of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt051" id="lf0610_footnote_nt051_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>evil against you <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt052" id="lf0610_footnote_nt052_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>falsely, for my sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_248"><span id="lf0610_label_184">12</span> Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great <span class="ital">is</span> your reward in heaven: for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_249"><span id="lf0610_label_185">13</span> &#xB6; Ye are the salt of the earth: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt053" id="lf0610_footnote_nt053_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be salted? it is thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out, and to be trodden under foot of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_250"><span id="lf0610_label_187">14</span> Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_251"><span id="lf0610_label_188">15</span> Neither do men <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt054" id="lf0610_footnote_nt054_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>light a candle, and put it under <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt055" id="lf0610_footnote_nt055_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>a bushel, but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_252"><span id="lf0610_label_191">16</span> Let your light so shine before men, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt056" id="lf0610_footnote_nt056_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>5<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_253"><span id="lf0610_label_193">17</span> &#xB6; Think not that I am come to destroy the law, or the prophets: I am not come to destroy, but to fulfil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_254"><span id="lf0610_label_194">18</span> For verily I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt057" id="lf0610_footnote_nt057_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_255"><span id="lf0610_label_196">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt058" id="lf0610_footnote_nt058_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments, and shall teach men so, he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven: but whosoever shall do and teach <span class="ital">them,</span> the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_256"><span id="lf0610_label_198">20</span> For I say unto you, That except your righteousness shall exceed <span class="ital">the righteousness</span> of the scribes and Pharisees, ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_257"><span id="lf0610_label_199">21</span> &#xB6; Ye have heard that it was said <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt059" id="lf0610_footnote_nt059_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>by them of old time, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt060" id="lf0610_footnote_nt060_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt not kill; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_258"><span id="lf0610_label_202">22</span> But I say unto you, That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment: and whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council: but whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_259"><span id="lf0610_label_203">23</span> Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar, and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_260"><span id="lf0610_label_204">24</span> Leave there thy gift before the altar, and go thy way; first be reconciled to thy brother, and then come and offer thy gift.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_261"><span id="lf0610_label_205">25</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt061" id="lf0610_footnote_nt061_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Agree with thine adversary quickly, whiles thou art in the way with him; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and thou be cast into prison.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_262"><span id="lf0610_label_207">26</span> Verily I say unto thee, Thou shalt by no means come out thence, till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_263"><span id="lf0610_label_208">27</span> &#xB6; Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt062" id="lf0610_footnote_nt062_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt not commit adultery:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_264"><span id="lf0610_label_210">28</span> But I say unto you, That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_265"><span id="lf0610_label_211">29</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt063" id="lf0610_footnote_nt063_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And if thy right eye <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt064" id="lf0610_footnote_nt064_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>offend thee, pluck it out, and cast <span class="ital">it</span> from thee: for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish, and not <span class="ital">that</span> thy whole body should be cast into hell.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_266"><span id="lf0610_label_214">30</span> And if thy right hand offend thee, cut it off, and cast <span class="ital">it</span> from thee: for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish, and not <span class="ital">that</span> thy whole body should be cast into hell.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_267"><span id="lf0610_label_215">31</span> It hath been said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt065" id="lf0610_footnote_nt065_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Whosoever shall put away his wife, let him give her a writing of divorcement:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_268"><span id="lf0610_label_217">32</span> But I say unto you, That whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery: and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_269"><span id="lf0610_label_218">33</span> &#xB6; Again, ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt066" id="lf0610_footnote_nt066_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt not forswear thyself, but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_270"><span id="lf0610_label_220">34</span> But I say unto you, Swear not at all; neither by heaven; for it is God&#x2019;s throne:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_271"><span id="lf0610_label_221">35</span> Nor by the earth; for it is his footstool: neither by Jerusalem; for it is the city of the great King.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_272"><span id="lf0610_label_222">36</span> Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair white or black.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_273"><span id="lf0610_label_223">37</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt067" id="lf0610_footnote_nt067_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But let your communication be, Yea, yea; Nay, nay: for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_274"><span id="lf0610_label_225">38</span> &#xB6; Ye have heard that it hath been said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt068" id="lf0610_footnote_nt068_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_275"><span id="lf0610_label_227">39</span> But I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt069" id="lf0610_footnote_nt069_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>That ye resist not evil: but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_276"><span id="lf0610_label_229">40</span> And if any man will sue thee at the law, and take away thy coat, let him have <span class="ital">thy</span> cloke also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_277"><span id="lf0610_label_230">41</span> And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile, go with him twain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_278"><span id="lf0610_label_231">42</span> Give to him that asketh thee, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt070" id="lf0610_footnote_nt070_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>6<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_279"><span id="lf0610_label_233">43</span> &#xB6; Ye have heard that it hath been said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt071" id="lf0610_footnote_nt071_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt love thy neighbour, and hate thine enemy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_280"><span id="lf0610_label_235">44</span> But I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt072" id="lf0610_footnote_nt072_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt073" id="lf0610_footnote_nt073_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_281"><span id="lf0610_label_238">45</span> That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_282"><span id="lf0610_label_239">46</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt074" id="lf0610_footnote_nt074_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For if ye love them which love you, what reward have ye? do not even the publicans the same?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_283"><span id="lf0610_label_241">47</span> And if ye salute your brethren only, what do ye more <span class="ital">than others?</span> do not even the publicans so?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_284"><span id="lf0610_label_242">48</span> Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_021" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_243">6</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_285"><span id="lf0610_label_244">1</span> Take heed that ye do not your alms before men, to be seen of them: otherwise ye have no reward <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt075" id="lf0610_footnote_nt075_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of your Father which is in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_286"><span id="lf0610_label_246">2</span> Therefore <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt076" id="lf0610_footnote_nt076_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>when thou doest <span class="ital">thine</span> alms, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt077" id="lf0610_footnote_nt077_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>do not sound a trumpet before thee, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_287"><span id="lf0610_label_249">3</span> But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt078" id="lf0610_footnote_nt078_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>hand doeth:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_288"><span id="lf0610_label_251">4</span> That thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_289"><span id="lf0610_label_252">5</span> &#xB6; And when thou prayest, thou shalt not be as the hypocrites <span class="ital">are:</span> for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_290"><span id="lf0610_label_253">6</span> But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_291"><span id="lf0610_label_254">7</span> But when ye pray, use not vain <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt079" id="lf0610_footnote_nt079_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>repetitions, as the heathen <span class="ital">do:</span> for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_292"><span id="lf0610_label_256">8</span> Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of, before ye ask him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_293"><span id="lf0610_label_257">9</span> After this manner therefore pray ye: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt080" id="lf0610_footnote_nt080_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_294"><span id="lf0610_label_259">10</span> Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as <span class="ital">it is</span> in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_295"><span id="lf0610_label_260">11</span> Give us this day our daily bread.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_296"><span id="lf0610_label_261">12</span> And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_297"><span id="lf0610_label_262">13</span> And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_298"><span id="lf0610_label_263">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt081" id="lf0610_footnote_nt081_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_299"><span id="lf0610_label_265">15</span> But if ye forgive not men their trespasses, neither will your Father forgive your trespasses.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_300"><span id="lf0610_label_266">16</span> &#xB6; Moreover when ye fast, be not, as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance: for they disfigure their faces, that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_301"><span id="lf0610_label_267">17</span> But thou, when thou fastest, anoint thine head, and wash thy face;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_302"><span id="lf0610_label_268">18</span> That thou appear not unto men to fast, but unto thy Father which is in secret: and thy Father, which seeth in secret, shall reward thee openly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_303"><span id="lf0610_label_269">19</span> &#xB6; Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_304"><span id="lf0610_label_270">20</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt082" id="lf0610_footnote_nt082_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_305"><span id="lf0610_label_272">21</span> For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_306"><span id="lf0610_label_273">22</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt083" id="lf0610_footnote_nt083_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_307"><span id="lf0610_label_275">23</span> But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>7<span class="bracket">]</span></span> be full of darkness. If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness, how great <span class="ital">is</span> that darkness!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_308"><span id="lf0610_label_276">24</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt084" id="lf0610_footnote_nt084_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_309"><span id="lf0610_label_278">25</span> Therefore I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt085" id="lf0610_footnote_nt085_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_310"><span id="lf0610_label_280">26</span> Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_311"><span id="lf0610_label_281">27</span> Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_312"><span id="lf0610_label_282">28</span> And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_313"><span id="lf0610_label_283">29</span> And yet I say unto you, That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_314"><span id="lf0610_label_284">30</span> Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, <span class="ital">shall he</span> not much more <span class="ital">clothe</span> you, O ye of little faith?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_315"><span id="lf0610_label_285">31</span> Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_316"><span id="lf0610_label_286">32</span> (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_317"><span id="lf0610_label_287">33</span> But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_318"><span id="lf0610_label_288">34</span> Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day <span class="ital">is</span> the evil thereof.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_022" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_289">7</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_319"><span id="lf0610_label_290">1</span> Judge <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt086" id="lf0610_footnote_nt086_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>not, that ye be not judged.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_320"><span id="lf0610_label_292">2</span> For with what judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt087" id="lf0610_footnote_nt087_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you again.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_321"><span id="lf0610_label_294">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt088" id="lf0610_footnote_nt088_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother&#x2019;s eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_322"><span id="lf0610_label_296">4</span> Or how wilt thou say to thy brother, Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye; and, behold, a beam <span class="ital">is</span> in thine own eye?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_323"><span id="lf0610_label_297">5</span> Thou hypocrite, first cast out the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother&#x2019;s eye.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_324"><span id="lf0610_label_298">6</span> &#xB6; Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_325"><span id="lf0610_label_299">7</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt089" id="lf0610_footnote_nt089_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_326"><span id="lf0610_label_301">8</span> For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_327"><span id="lf0610_label_302">9</span> Or what man is there of you, whom if his son ask bread, will he give him a stone?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_328"><span id="lf0610_label_303">10</span> Or if he ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_329"><span id="lf0610_label_304">11</span> If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_330"><span id="lf0610_label_305">12</span> Therefore all things <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt090" id="lf0610_footnote_nt090_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them: for this is the law and the prophets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_331"><span id="lf0610_label_307">13</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt091" id="lf0610_footnote_nt091_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide <span class="ital">is</span> the gate, and broad <span class="ital">is</span> the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_332"><span id="lf0610_label_309">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt092" id="lf0610_footnote_nt092_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Because strait <span class="ital">is</span> the gate, and narrow <span class="ital">is</span> the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>8<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_333"><span id="lf0610_label_311">15</span> &#xB6; Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep&#x2019;s clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_334"><span id="lf0610_label_312">16</span> Ye shall know them by their fruits. <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt093" id="lf0610_footnote_nt093_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_335"><span id="lf0610_label_314">17</span> Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_336"><span id="lf0610_label_315">18</span> A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither <span class="ital">can</span> a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_337"><span id="lf0610_label_316">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt094" id="lf0610_footnote_nt094_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_338"><span id="lf0610_label_318">20</span> Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_339"><span id="lf0610_label_319">21</span> &#xB6; Not every one that saith unto me, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt095" id="lf0610_footnote_nt095_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_340"><span id="lf0610_label_321">22</span> Many will say to me in that day, Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name? and in thy name have cast out devils? and in thy name done many wonderful works?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_341"><span id="lf0610_label_322">23</span> And then will I profess unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt096" id="lf0610_footnote_nt096_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I never knew you: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt097" id="lf0610_footnote_nt097_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>depart from me, ye that work iniquity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_342"><span id="lf0610_label_325">24</span> &#xB6; Therefore <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt098" id="lf0610_footnote_nt098_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_343"><span id="lf0610_label_327">25</span> And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not: for it was founded upon a rock.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_344"><span id="lf0610_label_328">26</span> And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_345"><span id="lf0610_label_329">27</span> And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell: and great was the fall of it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_346"><span id="lf0610_label_330">28</span> And it came to pass, when Jesus had ended these sayings, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt099" id="lf0610_footnote_nt099_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the people were astonished at his doctrine:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_347"><span id="lf0610_label_332">29</span> For he taught them as <span class="ital">one</span> having authority, and not as the scribes.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_023" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_333">8</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_348"><span id="lf0610_label_334">1</span> When he was come down from the mountain, great multitudes followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_349"><span id="lf0610_label_335">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt100" id="lf0610_footnote_nt100_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, there came a leper and worshipped him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_350"><span id="lf0610_label_337">3</span> And Jesus put forth <span class="ital">his</span> hand, and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_351"><span id="lf0610_label_338">4</span> And Jesus saith unto him, See thou tell no man; but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer the gift that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt101" id="lf0610_footnote_nt101_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_352"><span id="lf0610_label_340">5</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt102" id="lf0610_footnote_nt102_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum, there came unto him a centurion, beseeching him,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_353"><span id="lf0610_label_342">6</span> And saying, Lord, my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy, grievously tormented.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_354"><span id="lf0610_label_343">7</span> And Jesus saith unto him, I will come and heal him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_355"><span id="lf0610_label_344">8</span> The centurion answered and said, Lord, I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof: but speak the word only, and my servant shall be healed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_356"><span id="lf0610_label_345">9</span> For I am a man under authority, having soldiers under me: and I say to this <span class="ital">man,</span> Go, and he goeth; and to another, Come, and he cometh; and to my servant, Do this, and he doeth <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_357"><span id="lf0610_label_346">10</span> When Jesus heard <span class="ital">it,</span> he marvelled, and said to them that followed, Verily I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_358"><span id="lf0610_label_347">11</span> And I say unto you, That many shall come from the east and west, and shall sit down with Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, in the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_359"><span id="lf0610_label_348">12</span> But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_360"><span id="lf0610_label_349">13</span> And Jesus said unto the centurion, Go thy way; and as thou hast believed, <span class="ital">so</span> be it done unto thee. And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>9<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_361"><span id="lf0610_label_350">14</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt103" id="lf0610_footnote_nt103_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when Jesus was come into Peter&#x2019;s house, he saw his wife&#x2019;s mother laid, and sick of a fever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_362"><span id="lf0610_label_352">15</span> And he touched her hand, and the fever left her: and she arose, and ministered unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_363"><span id="lf0610_label_353">16</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt104" id="lf0610_footnote_nt104_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>When the even was come, they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils: and he cast out the spirits with <span class="ital">his</span> word, and healed all that were sick:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_364"><span id="lf0610_label_355">17</span> That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt105" id="lf0610_footnote_nt105_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Himself took our infirmities, and bare <span class="ital">our</span> sicknesses.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_365"><span id="lf0610_label_357">18</span> &#xB6; Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him, he gave commandment to depart unto the other side.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_366"><span id="lf0610_label_358">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt106" id="lf0610_footnote_nt106_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And a certain scribe came, and said unto him, Master, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_367"><span id="lf0610_label_360">20</span> And Jesus saith unto him, The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air <span class="ital">have</span> nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay <span class="ital">his</span> head.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_368"><span id="lf0610_label_361">21</span> And another of his disciples said unto him, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_369"><span id="lf0610_label_362">22</span> But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_370"><span id="lf0610_label_363">23</span> &#xB6; And when he was entered into a ship, his disciples followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_371"><span id="lf0610_label_364">24</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt107" id="lf0610_footnote_nt107_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, there arose a great tempest in the sea, insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves: but he was asleep.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_372"><span id="lf0610_label_366">25</span> And his disciples came to <span class="ital">him,</span> and awoke him, saying, Lord, save us: we perish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_373"><span id="lf0610_label_367">26</span> And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_374"><span id="lf0610_label_368">27</span> But the men marvelled, saying, What manner of man is this, that even the winds and the sea obey him!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_375"><span id="lf0610_label_369">28</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt108" id="lf0610_footnote_nt108_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes, there met him two possessed with devils, coming out of the tombs, exceeding fierce, so that no man might pass by that way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_376"><span id="lf0610_label_371">29</span> And, behold, they cried out, saying, What have we to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of God? art thou come hither to torment us before the time?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_377"><span id="lf0610_label_372">30</span> And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_378"><span id="lf0610_label_373">31</span> So the devils besought him, saying, If thou cast us out, suffer us to go away into the herd of swine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_379"><span id="lf0610_label_374">32</span> And he said unto them, Go. And when they were come out, they went into the herd of swine: and, behold, the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea, and perished in the waters.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_380"><span id="lf0610_label_375">33</span> And they that kept them fled, and went their ways into the city, and told every thing, and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_381"><span id="lf0610_label_376">34</span> And, behold, the whole city came out to meet Jesus: and when they saw him, they besought <span class="ital">him</span> that he would depart out of their coasts.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_024" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_377">9</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_382"><span id="lf0610_label_378">1</span> And he entered into a ship, and passed over, and came into his own city.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_383"><span id="lf0610_label_379">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt109" id="lf0610_footnote_nt109_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_384"><span id="lf0610_label_381">3</span> And, behold, certain of the scribes said within themselves, This <span class="ital">man</span> blasphemeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_385"><span id="lf0610_label_382">4</span> And Jesus knowing their thoughts said, Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_386"><span id="lf0610_label_383">5</span> For whether is easier, to say, <span class="ital">Thy</span> sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and walk?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_387"><span id="lf0610_label_384">6</span> But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins, (then saith he to the sick of the palsy,) Arise, take up thy bed, and go unto thine house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_388"><span id="lf0610_label_385">7</span> And he arose, and departed to his house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_389"><span id="lf0610_label_386">8</span> But when the multitudes saw <span class="ital">it,</span> they marvelled, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>10<span class="bracket">]</span></span> and glorified God, which had given such power unto men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_390"><span id="lf0610_label_387">9</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt110" id="lf0610_footnote_nt110_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as Jesus passed forth from thence, he saw a man, named Matthew, sitting at the receipt of custom: and he saith unto him, Follow me. And he arose, and followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_391"><span id="lf0610_label_389">10</span> &#xB6; And it came to pass, as Jesus sat at meat in the house, behold, many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_392"><span id="lf0610_label_390">11</span> And when the Pharisees saw <span class="ital">it,</span> they said unto his disciples, Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_393"><span id="lf0610_label_391">12</span> But when Jesus heard <span class="ital">that,</span> he said unto them, They that be whole need not a physician, but they that are sick.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_394"><span id="lf0610_label_392">13</span> But go ye and learn what <span class="ital">that</span> meaneth, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt111" id="lf0610_footnote_nt111_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will have mercy, and not sacrifice: for I am not come to call the righteous, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt112" id="lf0610_footnote_nt112_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>but sinners to repentance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_395"><span id="lf0610_label_395">14</span> &#xB6; Then came to him the disciples of John, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt113" id="lf0610_footnote_nt113_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft, but thy disciples fast not?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_396"><span id="lf0610_label_397">15</span> And Jesus said unto them, Can the children of the bridechamber mourn, as long as the bridegroom is with them? but the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken from them, and then shall they fast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_397"><span id="lf0610_label_398">16</span> No man putteth a piece of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt114" id="lf0610_footnote_nt114_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>new cloth unto an old garment, for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment, and the rent is made worse.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_398"><span id="lf0610_label_400">17</span> Neither do men put new wine into old bottles: else the bottles break, and the wine runneth out, and the bottles perish: but they put new wine into new bottles, and both are preserved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_399"><span id="lf0610_label_401">18</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt115" id="lf0610_footnote_nt115_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>While he spake these things unto them, behold, there came a certain ruler, and worshipped him, saying, My daughter is even now dead: but come and lay thy hand upon her, and she shall live.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_400"><span id="lf0610_label_403">19</span> And Jesus arose, and followed him, and <span class="ital">so did</span> his disciples.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_401"><span id="lf0610_label_404">20</span> &#xB6; And, behold, a woman, which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years, came behind <span class="ital">him,</span> and touched the hem of his garment:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_402"><span id="lf0610_label_405">21</span> For she said within herself, If I may but touch his garment, I shall be whole.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_403"><span id="lf0610_label_406">22</span> But Jesus turned him about, and when he saw her, he said, Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole. And the woman was made whole from that hour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_404"><span id="lf0610_label_407">23</span> And when Jesus came into the ruler&#x2019;s house, and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_405"><span id="lf0610_label_408">24</span> He said unto them, Give place: for the maid is not dead, but sleepeth. And they laughed him to scorn.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_406"><span id="lf0610_label_409">25</span> But when the people were put forth, he went in, and took her by the hand, and the maid arose.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_407"><span id="lf0610_label_410">26</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt116" id="lf0610_footnote_nt116_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the fame hereof went abroad into all that land.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_408"><span id="lf0610_label_412">27</span> &#xB6; And when Jesus departed thence, two blind men followed him, crying, and saying, <span class="ital">Thou</span> son of David, have mercy on us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_409"><span id="lf0610_label_413">28</span> And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_410"><span id="lf0610_label_414">29</span> Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_411"><span id="lf0610_label_415">30</span> And their eyes were opened; and Jesus straitly charged them, saying, See <span class="ital">that</span> no man know <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_412"><span id="lf0610_label_416">31</span> But they, when they were departed, spread abroad his fame in all that country.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_413"><span id="lf0610_label_417">32</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt117" id="lf0610_footnote_nt117_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>As they went out, behold, they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_414"><span id="lf0610_label_419">33</span> And when the devil was cast out, the dumb spake: and the multitudes marvelled, saying, It was never so seen in Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_415"><span id="lf0610_label_420">34</span> But the Pharisees said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt118" id="lf0610_footnote_nt118_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He casteth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt119" id="lf0610_footnote_nt119_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>out devils through the prince of the devils.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>11<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_416"><span id="lf0610_label_423">35</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt120" id="lf0610_footnote_nt120_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Jesus went about all the cities and villages, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing every sickness and every disease among the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_417"><span id="lf0610_label_425">36</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt121" id="lf0610_footnote_nt121_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But when he saw the multitudes, he was moved with compassion on them, because they <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt122" id="lf0610_footnote_nt122_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>fainted, and were scattered abroad, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt123" id="lf0610_footnote_nt123_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>as sheep having no shepherd.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_418"><span id="lf0610_label_429">37</span> Then saith he unto his disciples, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt124" id="lf0610_footnote_nt124_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The harvest truly <span class="ital">is</span> plenteous, but the labourers <span class="ital">are</span> few;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_419"><span id="lf0610_label_431">38</span> Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest, that he will send forth labourers into his harvest.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_025" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_432">10</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_420"><span id="lf0610_label_433">1</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt125" id="lf0610_footnote_nt125_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>when he had called unto <span class="ital">him</span> his twelve disciples, he gave them power <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt126" id="lf0610_footnote_nt126_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a><span class="ital">against</span> unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_421"><span id="lf0610_label_436">2</span> Now the names of the twelve apostles are these; The first, Simon, who is called Peter, and Andrew his brother; James <span class="ital">the son</span> of Zebedee, and John his brother;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_422"><span id="lf0610_label_437">3</span> Philip, and Bartholomew; Thomas, and Matthew the publican; James <span class="ital">the son</span> of Alph&#xE6;us, and Lebb&#xE6;us, whose surname was Thadd&#xE6;us;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_423"><span id="lf0610_label_438">4</span> Simon the Canaanite, and Judas Iscariot, who also betrayed him</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_424"><span id="lf0610_label_439">5</span> These twelve Jesus sent forth, and commanded them, saying, Go not into the way of the Gentiles, and into <span class="ital">any</span> city of the Samaritans enter ye not:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_425"><span id="lf0610_label_440">6</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt127" id="lf0610_footnote_nt127_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_426"><span id="lf0610_label_442">7</span> And as ye go, preach, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt128" id="lf0610_footnote_nt128_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The kingdom of heaven is at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_427"><span id="lf0610_label_444">8</span> Heal the sick, cleanse the lepers, raise the dead, cast out devils: freely ye have received, freely give.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_428"><span id="lf0610_label_445">9</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt129" id="lf0610_footnote_nt129_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a><a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt130" id="lf0610_footnote_nt130_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Provide neither gold, nor silver, nor brass in your purses,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_429"><span id="lf0610_label_448">10</span> Nor scrip for <span class="ital">your</span> journey, neither two coats, neither shoes, nor yet staves: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt131" id="lf0610_footnote_nt131_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for the workman is worthy of his meat.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_430"><span id="lf0610_label_450">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt132" id="lf0610_footnote_nt132_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_431"><span id="lf0610_label_452">12</span> And when ye come into an house, salute it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_432"><span id="lf0610_label_453">13</span> And if the house be worthy, let your peace come upon it: but if it be not worthy, let your peace return to you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_433"><span id="lf0610_label_454">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt133" id="lf0610_footnote_nt133_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear your words, when ye depart out of that house or city, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt134" id="lf0610_footnote_nt134_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>shake off the dust of your feet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_434"><span id="lf0610_label_457">15</span> Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_435"><span id="lf0610_label_458">16</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt135" id="lf0610_footnote_nt135_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves: be ye therefore wise as serpents, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt136" id="lf0610_footnote_nt136_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>harmless as doves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_436"><span id="lf0610_label_461">17</span> But beware of men: for they will deliver you up to the councils, and they will scourge you in their synagogues;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_437"><span id="lf0610_label_462">18</span> And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them and the Gentiles.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_438"><span id="lf0610_label_463">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt137" id="lf0610_footnote_nt137_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But when they deliver you up, take no thought how or what ye shall speak: for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_439"><span id="lf0610_label_465">20</span> For it is not ye that speak, but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_440"><span id="lf0610_label_466">21</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt138" id="lf0610_footnote_nt138_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against <span class="ital">their</span> parents, and cause them to be put to death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_441"><span id="lf0610_label_468">22</span> And ye shall be hated of all <span class="ital">men</span> for my name&#x2019;s sake: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt139" id="lf0610_footnote_nt139_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>but he that endureth to the end shall be saved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_442"><span id="lf0610_label_470">23</span> But when they persecute you in this city, flee ye into another: for verily I say unto you, Ye shall not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt140" id="lf0610_footnote_nt140_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>have gone over the cities of Israel, till the Son of man be come.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>12<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_443"><span id="lf0610_label_472">24</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt141" id="lf0610_footnote_nt141_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The disciple is not above <span class="ital">his</span> master, nor the servant above his lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_444"><span id="lf0610_label_474">25</span> It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more <span class="ital">shall they call</span> them of his household?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_445"><span id="lf0610_label_475">26</span> Fear them not therefore: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt142" id="lf0610_footnote_nt142_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; and hid, that shall not be known.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_446"><span id="lf0610_label_477">27</span> What I tell you in darkness, <span class="ital">that</span> speak ye in light: and what ye hear in the ear, <span class="ital">that</span> preach ye upon the housetops.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_447"><span id="lf0610_label_478">28</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt143" id="lf0610_footnote_nt143_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_448"><span id="lf0610_label_480">29</span> Are not two sparrows sold for a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt144" id="lf0610_footnote_nt144_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_449"><span id="lf0610_label_482">30</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt145" id="lf0610_footnote_nt145_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But the very hairs of your head are all numbered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_450"><span id="lf0610_label_484">31</span> Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_451"><span id="lf0610_label_485">32</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt146" id="lf0610_footnote_nt146_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_452"><span id="lf0610_label_487">33</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt147" id="lf0610_footnote_nt147_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But whosoever shall deny me before men, him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_453"><span id="lf0610_label_489">34</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt148" id="lf0610_footnote_nt148_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_454"><span id="lf0610_label_491">35</span> For I am come to set a man at variance <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt149" id="lf0610_footnote_nt149_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_455"><span id="lf0610_label_493">36</span> And a man&#x2019;s foes <span class="ital">shall be</span> they of his own household.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_456"><span id="lf0610_label_494">37</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt150" id="lf0610_footnote_nt150_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_457"><span id="lf0610_label_496">38</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt151" id="lf0610_footnote_nt151_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me.</p>
