<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_777"><span id="lf0610_label_947">13</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt273" id="lf0610_footnote_nt273_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then were there brought unto him little children, that he should put <span class="ital">his</span> hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_778"><span id="lf0610_label_949">14</span> But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto me: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_779"><span id="lf0610_label_950">15</span> And he laid <span class="ital">his</span> hands on them, and departed thence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_780"><span id="lf0610_label_951">16</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt274" id="lf0610_footnote_nt274_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_781"><span id="lf0610_label_953">17</span> And he said unto him, Why callest thou me good? <span class="ital">there is</span> none good but one, <span class="ital">that is,</span> God: but if thou wilt enter into life, keep the commandments.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_782"><span id="lf0610_label_954">18</span> He saith unto him, Which? Jesus said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt275" id="lf0610_footnote_nt275_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt do no murder, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_783"><span id="lf0610_label_956">19</span> Honour thy father and <span class="ital">thy</span> mother: and, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_784"><span id="lf0610_label_957">20</span> The young man saith unto him, All these things have I kept from my youth up: what lack I yet?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_785"><span id="lf0610_label_958">21</span> Jesus said unto him, If thou wilt be perfect, go <span class="ital">and</span> sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come <span class="ital">and</span> follow me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_786"><span id="lf0610_label_959">22</span> But when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_787"><span id="lf0610_label_960">23</span> &#xB6; Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_788"><span id="lf0610_label_961">24</span> And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_789"><span id="lf0610_label_962">25</span> When his disciples heard <span class="ital">it,</span> they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_790"><span id="lf0610_label_963">26</span> But Jesus beheld <span class="ital">them,</span> and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_791"><span id="lf0610_label_964">27</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt276" id="lf0610_footnote_nt276_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then answered Peter and said unto him, Behold, we have forsaken all, and followed thee; what shall we have therefore?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_792"><span id="lf0610_label_966">28</span> And Jesus said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That ye which have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt277" id="lf0610_footnote_nt277_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_793"><span id="lf0610_label_968">29</span> And every one that hath forsaken houses, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my name&#x2019;s sake, shall <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>25<span class="bracket">]</span></span> receive an hundredfold, and shall inherit everlasting life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_794"><span id="lf0610_label_969">30</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt278" id="lf0610_footnote_nt278_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But many <span class="ital">that are</span> first shall be last; and the last <span class="ital">shall be</span> first.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_035" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_971">20</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_795"><span id="lf0610_label_972">1</span> For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man <span class="ital">that is</span> an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_796"><span id="lf0610_label_973">2</span> And when he had agreed with the labourers for a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt279" id="lf0610_footnote_nt279_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>penny a day, he sent them into his vineyard.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_797"><span id="lf0610_label_975">3</span> And he went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_798"><span id="lf0610_label_976">4</span> And said unto them; Go ye also into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you. And they went their way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_799"><span id="lf0610_label_977">5</span> Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour, and did likewise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_800"><span id="lf0610_label_978">6</span> And about the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle, and saith unto them, Why stand ye here all the day idle?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_801"><span id="lf0610_label_979">7</span> They say unto him, Because no man hath hired us. He saith unto them, Go ye also into the vineyard; and whatsoever is right, <span class="ital">that</span> shall ye receive.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_802"><span id="lf0610_label_980">8</span> So when even was come, the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward, Call the labourers, and give them <span class="ital">their</span> hire, beginning from the last unto the first.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_803"><span id="lf0610_label_981">9</span> And when they came that <span class="ital">were hired</span> about the eleventh hour, they received every man a penny.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_804"><span id="lf0610_label_982">10</span> But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_805"><span id="lf0610_label_983">11</span> And when they had received <span class="ital">it,</span> they murmured against the goodman of the house,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_806"><span id="lf0610_label_984">12</span> Saying, These last <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt280" id="lf0610_footnote_nt280_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>have wrought <span class="ital">but</span> one hour, and thou hast made them equal unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_807"><span id="lf0610_label_986">13</span> But he answered one of them, and said, Friend, I do thee no wrong: didst not thou agree with me for a penny?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_808"><span id="lf0610_label_987">14</span> Take <span class="ital">that</span> thine <span class="ital">is,</span> and go thy way: I will give unto this last, even as unto thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_809"><span id="lf0610_label_988">15</span> Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own? Is thine eye evil, because I am good?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_810"><span id="lf0610_label_989">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt281" id="lf0610_footnote_nt281_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>So the last shall be first, and the first last: for many be called, but few chosen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_811"><span id="lf0610_label_991">17</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt282" id="lf0610_footnote_nt282_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way, and said unto them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_812"><span id="lf0610_label_993">18</span> Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes, and they shall condemn him to death,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_813"><span id="lf0610_label_994">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt283" id="lf0610_footnote_nt283_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock, and to scourge, and to crucify <span class="ital">him:</span> and the third day he shall rise again.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_814"><span id="lf0610_label_996">20</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt284" id="lf0610_footnote_nt284_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then came to him the mother of Zebedee&#x2019;s children with her sons, worshipping <span class="ital">him,</span> and desiring a certain thing of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_815"><span id="lf0610_label_998">21</span> And he said unto her, What wilt thou? She saith unto him, Grant that these my two sons may sit, the one on thy right hand, and the other on the left, in thy kingdom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_816"><span id="lf0610_label_999">22</span> But Jesus answered and said, Ye know not what ye ask. Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of, and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with? They say unto him, We are able.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_817"><span id="lf0610_label_1000">23</span> And he saith unto them, Ye shall drink indeed of my cup, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with: but to sit on my right hand, and on my left, is not mine to give, but <span class="ital">it shall be given to them</span> for whom it is prepared of my Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_818"><span id="lf0610_label_1001">24</span> And when the ten heard <span class="ital">it,</span> they were moved with indignation against the two brethren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_819"><span id="lf0610_label_1002">25</span> But Jesus called them <span class="ital">unto him,</span> and said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt285" id="lf0610_footnote_nt285_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them, and they that are great exercise authority upon them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_820"><span id="lf0610_label_1004">26</span> But it shall not be so among you: but whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>26<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_821"><span id="lf0610_label_1005">27</span> And whosoever will be chief among you, let him be your servant:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_822"><span id="lf0610_label_1006">28</span> Even as the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt286" id="lf0610_footnote_nt286_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_823"><span id="lf0610_label_1008">29</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt287" id="lf0610_footnote_nt287_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_824"><span id="lf0610_label_1010">30</span> &#xB6; And, behold, two blind men sitting by the way side, when they heard that Jesus passed by, cried out, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, <span class="ital">thou</span> son of David.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_825"><span id="lf0610_label_1011">31</span> And the multitude rebuked them, because they should hold their peace: but they cried the more, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, <span class="ital">thou</span> son of David.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_826"><span id="lf0610_label_1012">32</span> And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said, What will ye that I shall do unto you?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_827"><span id="lf0610_label_1013">33</span> They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_828"><span id="lf0610_label_1014">34</span> So Jesus had compassion <span class="ital">on them,</span> and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_036" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_1015">21</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_829"><span id="lf0610_label_1016">1</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt288" id="lf0610_footnote_nt288_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem, and were come to Bethphage, unto the mount of Olives, then sent Jesus two disciples,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_830"><span id="lf0610_label_1018">2</span> Saying unto them, Go into the village over against you, and straightway ye shall find an ass tied, and a colt with her: loose <span class="ital">them,</span> and bring <span class="ital">them</span> unto me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_831"><span id="lf0610_label_1019">3</span> And if any <span class="ital">man</span> say ought unto you, ye shall say, The Lord hath need of them; and straightway he will send them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_832"><span id="lf0610_label_1020">4</span> All this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_833"><span id="lf0610_label_1021">5</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt289" id="lf0610_footnote_nt289_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Tell ye the daughter of Sion, Behold, thy King cometh unto thee, meek, and sitting upon an ass, and a colt the foal of an ass.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_834"><span id="lf0610_label_1023">6</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt290" id="lf0610_footnote_nt290_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the disciples went, and did as Jesus commanded them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_835"><span id="lf0610_label_1025">7</span> And brought the ass, and the colt, and put on them their clothes, and they set <span class="ital">him</span> thereon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_836"><span id="lf0610_label_1026">8</span> And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way; others cut down branches from the trees, and strawed <span class="ital">them</span> in the way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_837"><span id="lf0610_label_1027">9</span> And the multitudes that went before, and that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna to the son of David: Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> he that cometh in the name of the Lord; Hosanna in the highest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_838"><span id="lf0610_label_1028">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt291" id="lf0610_footnote_nt291_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when he was come into Jerusalem, all the city was moved, saying, Who is this?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_839"><span id="lf0610_label_1030">11</span> And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_840"><span id="lf0610_label_1031">12</span> &#xB6; And Jesus went into the temple of God, and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_841"><span id="lf0610_label_1032">13</span> And said unto them, It is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt292" id="lf0610_footnote_nt292_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>My house shall be called the house of prayer; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt293" id="lf0610_footnote_nt293_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>but ye have made it a den of thieves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_842"><span id="lf0610_label_1035">14</span> And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple; and he healed them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_843"><span id="lf0610_label_1036">15</span> And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did, and the children crying in the temple, and saying, Hosanna to the son of David; they were sore displeased,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_844"><span id="lf0610_label_1037">16</span> And said unto him, Hearest thou what these say? And Jesus saith unto them, Yea; have ye never read, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt294" id="lf0610_footnote_nt294_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_845"><span id="lf0610_label_1039">17</span> &#xB6; And he left them, and went out of the city into Bethany; and he lodged there.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_846"><span id="lf0610_label_1040">18</span> Now in the morning as he returned into the city, he hungered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_847"><span id="lf0610_label_1041">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt295" id="lf0610_footnote_nt295_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when he saw a fig tree in the way, he came to it, and found nothing thereon, but leaves only, and said unto it, Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever. And presently the fig tree withered away.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_848"><span id="lf0610_label_1043">20</span> And when the disciples saw <span class="ital">it,</span> they marvelled, saying, How soon is the fig tree withered away!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_849"><span id="lf0610_label_1044">21</span> Jesus answered and said unto them, Verily I say unto you, If ye have faith, and doubt not, ye <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>27<span class="bracket">]</span></span> shall not only do this <span class="ital">which is done</span> to the fig tree, but also if ye shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; it shall be done.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_850"><span id="lf0610_label_1045">22</span> And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_851"><span id="lf0610_label_1046">23</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt296" id="lf0610_footnote_nt296_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when he was come into the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching, and said, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_852"><span id="lf0610_label_1048">24</span> And Jesus answered and said unto them, I also will ask you one thing, which if ye tell me, I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_853"><span id="lf0610_label_1049">25</span> The baptism of John, whence was it? from heaven, or of men? And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say unto us, Why did ye not then believe him?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_854"><span id="lf0610_label_1050">26</span> But if we shall say, Of men; we fear the people; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt297" id="lf0610_footnote_nt297_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for all hold John as a prophet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_855"><span id="lf0610_label_1052">27</span> And they answered Jesus, and said, We cannot tell. And he said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_856"><span id="lf0610_label_1053">28</span> &#xB6; But what think ye? A <span class="ital">certain</span> man had two sons; and he came to the first, and said, Son, go work to day in my vineyard.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_857"><span id="lf0610_label_1054">29</span> He answered and said, I will not: but afterward he repented, and went.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_858"><span id="lf0610_label_1055">30</span> And he came to the second, and said likewise. And he answered and said, I <span class="ital">go,</span> sir: and went not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_859"><span id="lf0610_label_1056">31</span> Whether of them twain did the will of <span class="ital">his</span> father? They say unto him, The first. Jesus saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_860"><span id="lf0610_label_1057">32</span> For <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt298" id="lf0610_footnote_nt298_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>John came unto you in the way of righteousness, and ye believed him not: but the publicans and the harlots believed him: and ye, when ye had seen <span class="ital">it,</span> repented not afterward, that ye might believe him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_861"><span id="lf0610_label_1059">33</span> &#xB6; Hear another parable: There was a certain householder, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt299" id="lf0610_footnote_nt299_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>which planted a vineyard, and hedged it round about, and digged a winepress in it, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_862"><span id="lf0610_label_1061">34</span> And when the time of the fruit drew near, he sent his servants to the husbandmen, that they might receive the fruits of it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_863"><span id="lf0610_label_1062">35</span> And the husbandmen took his servants, and beat one, and killed another, and stoned another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_864"><span id="lf0610_label_1063">36</span> Again, he sent other servants more than the first: and they did unto them likewise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_865"><span id="lf0610_label_1064">37</span> But last of all he sent unto them his son, saying, They will reverence my son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_866"><span id="lf0610_label_1065">38</span> But when the husbandmen saw the son, they said among themselves, This is the heir; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt300" id="lf0610_footnote_nt300_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>come, let us kill him, and let us seize on his inheritance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_867"><span id="lf0610_label_1067">39</span> And they caught him, and cast <span class="ital">him</span> out of the vineyard, and slew <span class="ital">him.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_868"><span id="lf0610_label_1068">40</span> When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh, what will he do unto those husbandmen?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_869"><span id="lf0610_label_1069">41</span> They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out <span class="ital">his</span> vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_870"><span id="lf0610_label_1070">42</span> Jesus saith unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt301" id="lf0610_footnote_nt301_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Did ye never read in the scriptures, The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner: this is the Lord&#x2019;s doing, and it is marvellous in our eyes?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_871"><span id="lf0610_label_1072">43</span> Therefore say I unto you, The kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_872"><span id="lf0610_label_1073">44</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt302" id="lf0610_footnote_nt302_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken: but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_873"><span id="lf0610_label_1075">45</span> And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables, they perceived that he spake of them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_874"><span id="lf0610_label_1076">46</span> But when they sought to lay hands on him, they feared the multitude, because they took him for a prophet.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_037" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_1077">22</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_875"><span id="lf0610_label_1078">1</span> And Jesus answered <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt303" id="lf0610_footnote_nt303_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and spake unto them again by parables, and said,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_876"><span id="lf0610_label_1080">2</span> The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king, which made a marriage for his son,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_877"><span id="lf0610_label_1081">3</span> And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding: and they would not come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_878"><span id="lf0610_label_1082">4</span> Again, he sent forth other servants, saying, Tell them which are bidden, Behold, I have prepared my dinner: my oxen and <span class="ital">my</span> fatlings <span class="ital">are</span> killed, and all things <span class="ital">are</span> ready: come unto the marriage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_879"><span id="lf0610_label_1083">5</span> But they made light of <span class="ital">it,</span> and went their ways, one to his farm, another to his merchandise:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_880"><span id="lf0610_label_1084">6</span> And the remnant took his servants, and entreated <span class="ital">them</span> spitefully, and slew <span class="ital">them.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_881"><span id="lf0610_label_1085">7</span> But when the king heard <span class="ital">thereof,</span> he was wroth: and he sent forth his armies, and destroyed those murderers, and burned up their city.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_882"><span id="lf0610_label_1086">8</span> Then saith he to his servants, The wedding is ready, but they which were bidden were not worthy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_883"><span id="lf0610_label_1087">9</span> Go ye therefore into the highways, and as many as ye shall find, bid to the marriage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_884"><span id="lf0610_label_1088">10</span> So those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together all as many as they found, both bad and good: and the wedding was furnished with guests.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_885"><span id="lf0610_label_1089">11</span> &#xB6; And when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_886"><span id="lf0610_label_1090">12</span> And he saith unto him, Friend, how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment? And he was speechless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_887"><span id="lf0610_label_1091">13</span> Then said the king to the servants, Bind him hand and foot, and take him away, and cast <span class="ital">him</span> into outer darkness; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_888"><span id="lf0610_label_1092">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt304" id="lf0610_footnote_nt304_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For many are called, but few <span class="ital">are</span> chosen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_889"><span id="lf0610_label_1094">15</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt305" id="lf0610_footnote_nt305_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then went the Pharisees, and took counsel how they might entangle him in <span class="ital">his</span> talk.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_890"><span id="lf0610_label_1096">16</span> And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians, saying, Master, we know that thou art true, and teachest the way of God in truth, neither carest thou for any <span class="ital">man:</span> for thou regardest not the person of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_891"><span id="lf0610_label_1097">17</span> Tell us therefore, What thinkest thou? Is it lawful to give tribute unto C&#xE6;sar, or not?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_892"><span id="lf0610_label_1098">18</span> But Jesus perceived their wickedness, and said, Why tempt ye me, <span class="ital">ye</span> hypocrites?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_893"><span id="lf0610_label_1099">19</span> Shew me the tribute money. And they brought unto him a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt306" id="lf0610_footnote_nt306_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>penny.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_894"><span id="lf0610_label_1101">20</span> And he saith unto them, Whose <span class="ital">is</span> this image and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt307" id="lf0610_footnote_nt307_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>superscription?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_895"><span id="lf0610_label_1103">21</span> They say unto him, C&#xE6;sar&#x2019;s. Then saith he unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt308" id="lf0610_footnote_nt308_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Render therefore unto C&#xE6;sar the things which are C&#xE6;sar&#x2019;s; and unto God the things that are God&#x2019;s.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_896"><span id="lf0610_label_1105">22</span> When they had heard <span class="ital">these words,</span> they marvelled, and left him, and went their way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_897"><span id="lf0610_label_1106">23</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt309" id="lf0610_footnote_nt309_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The same day came to him the Sadducees, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt310" id="lf0610_footnote_nt310_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>which say that there is no resurrection, and asked him,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_898"><span id="lf0610_label_1109">24</span> Saying, Master, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt311" id="lf0610_footnote_nt311_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Moses said, If a man die, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_899"><span id="lf0610_label_1111">25</span> Now there were with us seven brethren: and the first, when he had married a wife, deceased, and, having no issue, left his wife unto his brother:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_900"><span id="lf0610_label_1112">26</span> Likewise the second also, and the third, unto the seventh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_901"><span id="lf0610_label_1113">27</span> And last of all the woman died also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_902"><span id="lf0610_label_1114">28</span> Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven? for they all had her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_903"><span id="lf0610_label_1115">29</span> Jesus answered and said unto them, Ye do err, not knowing the scriptures, nor the power of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_904"><span id="lf0610_label_1116">30</span> For in the resurrection they neither marry, nor are given in marriage, but are as the angels of God in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_905"><span id="lf0610_label_1117">31</span> But as touching the resurrection of the dead, have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God, saying,</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>29<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_906"><span id="lf0610_label_1118">32</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt312" id="lf0610_footnote_nt312_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob? God is not the God of the dead, but of the living.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_907"><span id="lf0610_label_1120">33</span> And when the multitude heard <span class="ital">this,</span> they were astonished at his doctrine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_908"><span id="lf0610_label_1121">34</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt313" id="lf0610_footnote_nt313_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence, they were gathered together.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_909"><span id="lf0610_label_1123">35</span> Then one of them, <span class="ital">which was</span> a lawyer, asked <span class="ital">him a question,</span> tempting him, and saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_910"><span id="lf0610_label_1124">36</span> Master, which <span class="ital">is</span> the great commandment in the law?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_911"><span id="lf0610_label_1125">37</span> Jesus said unto him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt314" id="lf0610_footnote_nt314_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_912"><span id="lf0610_label_1127">38</span> This is the first and great commandment.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_913"><span id="lf0610_label_1128">39</span> And the second <span class="ital">is</span> like unto it, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt315" id="lf0610_footnote_nt315_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_914"><span id="lf0610_label_1130">40</span> On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_915"><span id="lf0610_label_1131">41</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt316" id="lf0610_footnote_nt316_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>While the Pharisees were gathered together, Jesus asked them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_916"><span id="lf0610_label_1133">42</span> Saying, What think ye of Christ? whose son is he? They say unto him, <span class="ital">The son</span> of David.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_917"><span id="lf0610_label_1134">43</span> He saith unto them, How then doth David in spirit call him Lord, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_918"><span id="lf0610_label_1135">44</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt317" id="lf0610_footnote_nt317_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The <span class="sc">Lord</span> said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, till I make thine enemies thy footstool?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_919"><span id="lf0610_label_1137">45</span> If David then call him Lord, how is he his son?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_920"><span id="lf0610_label_1138">46</span> And no man was able to answer him a word, neither durst any <span class="ital">man</span> from that day forth ask him any more <span class="ital">questions.</span></p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_038" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_1139">23</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_921"><span id="lf0610_label_1140">1</span> Then spake Jesus to the multitude, and to his disciples,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_922"><span id="lf0610_label_1141">2</span> Saying, The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses&#x2019; seat:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_923"><span id="lf0610_label_1142">3</span> All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe, <span class="ital">that</span> observe and do; but do not ye after their works: for they say, and do not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_924"><span id="lf0610_label_1143">4</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt318" id="lf0610_footnote_nt318_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne, and lay <span class="ital">them</span> on men&#x2019;s shoulders; but they <span class="ital">themselves</span> will not move them with one of their fingers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_925"><span id="lf0610_label_1145">5</span> But all their works they do for to be seen of men: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt319" id="lf0610_footnote_nt319_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge the borders of their garments,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_926"><span id="lf0610_label_1147">6</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt320" id="lf0610_footnote_nt320_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And love the uppermost rooms at feasts, and the chief seats in the synagogues,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_927"><span id="lf0610_label_1149">7</span> And greetings in the markets, and to be called of men, Rabbi, Rabbi.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_928"><span id="lf0610_label_1150">8</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt321" id="lf0610_footnote_nt321_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But be not ye called Rabbi: for one is your Master, <span class="ital">even</span> Christ; and all ye are brethren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_929"><span id="lf0610_label_1152">9</span> And call no <span class="ital">man</span> your father upon the earth: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt322" id="lf0610_footnote_nt322_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for one is your Father, which is in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_930"><span id="lf0610_label_1154">10</span> Neither be ye called masters: for one is your Master, <span class="ital">even</span> Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_931"><span id="lf0610_label_1155">11</span> But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_932"><span id="lf0610_label_1156">12</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt323" id="lf0610_footnote_nt323_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_933"><span id="lf0610_label_1158">13</span> &#xB6; But <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt324" id="lf0610_footnote_nt324_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men: for ye neither go in <span class="ital">yourselves,</span> neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_934"><span id="lf0610_label_1160">14</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt325" id="lf0610_footnote_nt325_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for ye devour widows&#x2019; houses, and for a pretence make long prayer: therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_935"><span id="lf0610_label_1162">15</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte, and when he is made, ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_936"><span id="lf0610_label_1163">16</span> Woe unto you, <span class="ital">ye</span> blind guides, which say, Whosoever shall swear by the temple, it is nothing; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple, he is a debtor!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_937"><span id="lf0610_label_1164">17</span> <span class="ital">Ye</span> fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gold, or the temple that sanctifieth the gold?</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>30<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_938"><span id="lf0610_label_1165">18</span> And, Whosoever shall swear by the altar, it is nothing; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it, he is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt326" id="lf0610_footnote_nt326_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>guilty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_939"><span id="lf0610_label_1167">19</span> <span class="ital">Ye</span> fools and blind: for whether <span class="ital">is</span> greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifieth the gift?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_940"><span id="lf0610_label_1168">20</span> Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar, sweareth by it, and by all things thereon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_941"><span id="lf0610_label_1169">21</span> And whoso shall swear by the temple, sweareth by it, and by him that dwelleth therein.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_942"><span id="lf0610_label_1170">22</span> And he that shall swear by heaven, sweareth by the throne of God, and by him that sitteth thereon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_943"><span id="lf0610_label_1171">23</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt327" id="lf0610_footnote_nt327_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have omitted the weightier <span class="ital">matters</span> of the law, judgment, mercy, and faith: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_944"><span id="lf0610_label_1173">24</span> <span class="ital">Ye</span> blind guides, which strain at a gnat, and swallow a camel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_945"><span id="lf0610_label_1174">25</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt328" id="lf0610_footnote_nt328_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter, but within they are full of extortion and excess.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_946"><span id="lf0610_label_1176">26</span> <span class="ital">Thou</span> blind Pharisee, cleanse first that <span class="ital">which is</span> within the cup and platter, that the outside of them may be clean also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_947"><span id="lf0610_label_1177">27</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres, which indeed appear beautiful outward, but are within full of dead <span class="ital">men&#x2019;s</span> bones, and of all uncleanness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_948"><span id="lf0610_label_1178">28</span> Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men, but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_949"><span id="lf0610_label_1179">29</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! because ye build the tombs of the prophets, and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_950"><span id="lf0610_label_1180">30</span> And say, If we had been in the days of our fathers, we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_951"><span id="lf0610_label_1181">31</span> Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves, that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_952"><span id="lf0610_label_1182">32</span> Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_953"><span id="lf0610_label_1183">33</span> <span class="ital">Ye</span> serpents, <span class="ital">ye</span> generation of vipers, how can ye escape the damnation of hell?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_954"><span id="lf0610_label_1184">34</span> &#xB6; Wherefore, behold, I send unto you prophets, and wise men, and scribes: and <span class="ital">some</span> of them ye shall kill and crucify; and <span class="ital">some</span> of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues, and persecute <span class="ital">them</span> from city to city:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_955"><span id="lf0610_label_1185">35</span> That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt329" id="lf0610_footnote_nt329_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias, whom ye slew between the temple and the altar.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_956"><span id="lf0610_label_1187">36</span> Verily I say unto you, All these things shall come upon this generation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_957"><span id="lf0610_label_1188">37</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt330" id="lf0610_footnote_nt330_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, <span class="ital">thou</span> that killest the prophets, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt331" id="lf0610_footnote_nt331_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt332" id="lf0610_footnote_nt332_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under <span class="ital">her</span> wings, and ye would not!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_958"><span id="lf0610_label_1192">38</span> Behold, your house is left unto you desolate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_959"><span id="lf0610_label_1193">39</span> For I say unto you, Ye shall not see me henceforth, till ye shall say, Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> he that cometh in the name of the Lord.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_039" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_1194">24</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_960"><span id="lf0610_label_1195">1</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt333" id="lf0610_footnote_nt333_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jesus went out, and departed from the temple: and his disciples came to <span class="ital">him</span> for to shew him the buildings of the temple.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_961"><span id="lf0610_label_1197">2</span> And Jesus said unto them, See ye not all these things? verily I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt334" id="lf0610_footnote_nt334_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>There shall not be left here one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_962"><span id="lf0610_label_1199">3</span> &#xB6; And as he sat upon the mount of Olives, the disciples came unto him privately, saying, Tell us, when shall these things be? and what <span class="ital">shall be</span> the sign of thy coming, and of the end of the world?</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>31<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_963"><span id="lf0610_label_1200">4</span> And Jesus answered and said unto them, Take heed that no man deceive you</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_964"><span id="lf0610_label_1201">5</span> For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_965"><span id="lf0610_label_1202">6</span> And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all <span class="ital">these things</span> must come to pass, but the end is not yet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_966"><span id="lf0610_label_1203">7</span> For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be famines, and pestilences, and earthquakes, in divers places.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_967"><span id="lf0610_label_1204">8</span> All these <span class="ital">are</span> the beginning of sorrows.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_968"><span id="lf0610_label_1205">9</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt335" id="lf0610_footnote_nt335_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted, and shall kill you: and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name&#x2019;s sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_969"><span id="lf0610_label_1207">10</span> And then shall many be offended, and shall betray one another, and shall hate one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_970"><span id="lf0610_label_1208">11</span> And many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_971"><span id="lf0610_label_1209">12</span> And because iniquity shall abound, the love of many shall wax cold</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_972"><span id="lf0610_label_1210">13</span> But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_973"><span id="lf0610_label_1211">14</span> And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_974"><span id="lf0610_label_1212">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt336" id="lf0610_footnote_nt336_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt337" id="lf0610_footnote_nt337_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_975"><span id="lf0610_label_1215">16</span> Then let them which be in Jud&#xE6;a flee into the mountains:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_976"><span id="lf0610_label_1216">17</span> Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_977"><span id="lf0610_label_1217">18</span> Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_978"><span id="lf0610_label_1218">19</span> And woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_979"><span id="lf0610_label_1219">20</span> But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter, neither on the sabbath day:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_980"><span id="lf0610_label_1220">21</span> For then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_981"><span id="lf0610_label_1221">22</span> And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: but for the elect&#x2019;s sake those days shall be shortened.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_982"><span id="lf0610_label_1222">23</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt338" id="lf0610_footnote_nt338_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then if any man shall say unto you, Lo, here <span class="ital">is</span> Christ, or there; believe <span class="ital">it</span> not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_983"><span id="lf0610_label_1224">24</span> For there shall arise false Christs, and false prophets, and shall shew great signs and wonders; insomuch that, if <span class="ital">it were</span> possible, they shall deceive the very elect.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_984"><span id="lf0610_label_1225">25</span> Behold, I have told you before.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_985"><span id="lf0610_label_1226">26</span> Wherefore if they shall say unto you, Behold, he is in the desert; go not forth: behold, <span class="ital">he is</span> in the secret chambers; believe <span class="ital">it</span> not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_986"><span id="lf0610_label_1227">27</span> For as the lightning cometh out of the east, and shineth even unto the west; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_987"><span id="lf0610_label_1228">28</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt339" id="lf0610_footnote_nt339_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For wheresoever the carcase is, there will the eagles be gathered together.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_988"><span id="lf0610_label_1230">29</span> &#xB6; Immediately after the tribulation of those days <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt340" id="lf0610_footnote_nt340_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>shall the sun be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_989"><span id="lf0610_label_1232">30</span> And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven: and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt341" id="lf0610_footnote_nt341_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_990"><span id="lf0610_label_1234">31</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt342" id="lf0610_footnote_nt342_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he shall send his angels <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt343" id="lf0610_footnote_nt343_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>with a great sound of a trumpet, and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_991"><span id="lf0610_label_1237">32</span> Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer <span class="ital">is</span> nigh:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_992"><span id="lf0610_label_1238">33</span> So likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, <span class="ital">even</span> at the doors.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>32<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_993"><span id="lf0610_label_1239">34</span> Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass, till all these things be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_994"><span id="lf0610_label_1240">35</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt344" id="lf0610_footnote_nt344_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_995"><span id="lf0610_label_1242">36</span> &#xB6; But of that day and hour knoweth no <span class="ital">man,</span> no, not the angels of heaven, but my Father only.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_996"><span id="lf0610_label_1243">37</span> But as the days of Noe <span class="ital">were,</span> so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_997"><span id="lf0610_label_1244">38</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt345" id="lf0610_footnote_nt345_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_998"><span id="lf0610_label_1246">39</span> And knew not until the flood came, and took them all away; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_999"><span id="lf0610_label_1247">40</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt346" id="lf0610_footnote_nt346_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then shall two be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1000"><span id="lf0610_label_1249">41</span> Two <span class="ital">women shall be</span> grinding at the mill; the one shall be taken, and the other left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1001"><span id="lf0610_label_1250">42</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt347" id="lf0610_footnote_nt347_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Watch therefore: for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1002"><span id="lf0610_label_1252">43</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt348" id="lf0610_footnote_nt348_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But know this, that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come, he would have watched, and would not have suffered his house to be broken up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1003"><span id="lf0610_label_1254">44</span> Therefore be ye also ready: for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1004"><span id="lf0610_label_1255">45</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt349" id="lf0610_footnote_nt349_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1005"><span id="lf0610_label_1257">46</span> Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1006"><span id="lf0610_label_1258">47</span> Verily I say unto you, That he shall make him ruler over all his goods.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1007"><span id="lf0610_label_1259">48</span> But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1008"><span id="lf0610_label_1260">49</span> And shall begin to smite <span class="ital">his</span> fellowservants, and to eat and drink with the drunken;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1009"><span id="lf0610_label_1261">50</span> The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for <span class="ital">him,</span> and in an hour that he is not aware of,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1010"><span id="lf0610_label_1262">51</span> And shall <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt350" id="lf0610_footnote_nt350_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>cut him asunder, and appoint <span class="ital">him</span> his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_040" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_1264">25</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1011"><span id="lf0610_label_1265">1</span> Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1012"><span id="lf0610_label_1266">2</span> And five of them were wise, and five <span class="ital">were</span> foolish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1013"><span id="lf0610_label_1267">3</span> They that <span class="ital">were</span> foolish took their lamps, and took no oil with them:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1014"><span id="lf0610_label_1268">4</span> But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1015"><span id="lf0610_label_1269">5</span> While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1016"><span id="lf0610_label_1270">6</span> And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1017"><span id="lf0610_label_1271">7</span> Then all those virgins arose, and trimmed their lamps.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1018"><span id="lf0610_label_1272">8</span> And the foolish said unto the wise, Give us of your oil; for our lamps are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt351" id="lf0610_footnote_nt351_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>gone out.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1019"><span id="lf0610_label_1274">9</span> But the wise answered, saying, <span class="ital">Not so;</span> lest there be not enough for us and you: but go ye rather to them that sell, and buy for yourselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1020"><span id="lf0610_label_1275">10</span> And while they went to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage: and the door was shut.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1021"><span id="lf0610_label_1276">11</span> Afterward came also the other virgins, saying, Lord, Lord, open to us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1022"><span id="lf0610_label_1277">12</span> But he answered and said, Verily I say unto you, I know you not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1023"><span id="lf0610_label_1278">13</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt352" id="lf0610_footnote_nt352_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1024"><span id="lf0610_label_1280">14</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt353" id="lf0610_footnote_nt353_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For <span class="ital">the kingdom of heaven is</span> as a man travelling into a far country, <span class="ital">who</span> called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1025"><span id="lf0610_label_1282">15</span> And unto one he gave five <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt354" id="lf0610_footnote_nt354_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1026"><span id="lf0610_label_1284">16</span> Then he that had received the five talents <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>33<span class="bracket">]</span></span> went and traded with the same, and made <span class="ital">them</span> other five talents.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1027"><span id="lf0610_label_1285">17</span> And likewise he that <span class="ital">had received</span> two, he also gained other two.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1028"><span id="lf0610_label_1286">18</span> But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord&#x2019;s money.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1029"><span id="lf0610_label_1287">19</span> After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1030"><span id="lf0610_label_1288">20</span> And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1031"><span id="lf0610_label_1289">21</span> His lord said unto him, Well done, <span class="ital">thou</span> good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1032"><span id="lf0610_label_1290">22</span> He also that had received two talents came and said, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me two talents: behold, I have gained two other talents beside them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1033"><span id="lf0610_label_1291">23</span> His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1034"><span id="lf0610_label_1292">24</span> Then he which had received the one talent came and said, Lord, I knew thee that thou art an hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strawed:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1035"><span id="lf0610_label_1293">25</span> And I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, <span class="ital">there</span> thou hast <span class="ital">that is</span> thine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1036"><span id="lf0610_label_1294">26</span> His lord answered and said unto him, <span class="ital">Thou</span> wicked and slothful servant, thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not, and gather where I have not strawed:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1037"><span id="lf0610_label_1295">27</span> Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and <span class="ital">then</span> at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1038"><span id="lf0610_label_1296">28</span> Take therefore the talent from him, and give <span class="ital">it</span> unto him which hath ten talents.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1039"><span id="lf0610_label_1297">29</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt355" id="lf0610_footnote_nt355_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1040"><span id="lf0610_label_1299">30</span> And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1041"><span id="lf0610_label_1300">31</span> &#xB6; When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1042"><span id="lf0610_label_1301">32</span> And before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth <span class="ital">his</span> sheep from the goats:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1043"><span id="lf0610_label_1302">33</span> And he shall set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1044"><span id="lf0610_label_1303">34</span> Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1045"><span id="lf0610_label_1304">35</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt356" id="lf0610_footnote_nt356_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1046"><span id="lf0610_label_1306">36</span> Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1047"><span id="lf0610_label_1307">37</span> Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed <span class="ital">thee?</span> or thirsty, and gave <span class="ital">thee</span> drink?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1048"><span id="lf0610_label_1308">38</span> When saw we thee a stranger, and took <span class="ital">thee</span> in? or naked, and clothed <span class="ital">thee?</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1049"><span id="lf0610_label_1309">39</span> Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1050"><span id="lf0610_label_1310">40</span> And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done <span class="ital">it</span> unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done <span class="ital">it</span> unto me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1051"><span id="lf0610_label_1311">41</span> Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt357" id="lf0610_footnote_nt357_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1052"><span id="lf0610_label_1313">42</span> For I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1053"><span id="lf0610_label_1314">43</span> I was a stranger, and ye took me not in: <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>34<span class="bracket">]</span></span> naked, and ye clothed me not: sick, and in prison, and ye visited me not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1054"><span id="lf0610_label_1315">44</span> Then shall they also answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, or athirst, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and did not minister unto thee?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1055"><span id="lf0610_label_1316">45</span> Then shall he answer them, saying, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye did <span class="ital">it</span> not to one of the least of these, ye did <span class="ital">it</span> not to me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1056"><span id="lf0610_label_1317">46</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt358" id="lf0610_footnote_nt358_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_041" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_1319">26</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1057"><span id="lf0610_label_1320">1</span> And it came to pass, when Jesus had finished all these sayings, he said unto his disciples,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1058"><span id="lf0610_label_1321">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt359" id="lf0610_footnote_nt359_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Ye know that after two days is <span class="ital">the feast of</span> the passover, and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1059"><span id="lf0610_label_1323">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt360" id="lf0610_footnote_nt360_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then assembled together the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders of the people, unto the palace of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1060"><span id="lf0610_label_1325">4</span> And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty, and kill <span class="ital">him.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1061"><span id="lf0610_label_1326">5</span> But they said, Not on the feast <span class="ital">day,</span> lest there be an uproar among the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1062"><span id="lf0610_label_1327">6</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt361" id="lf0610_footnote_nt361_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Now when Jesus was in Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1063"><span id="lf0610_label_1329">7</span> There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment, and poured it on his head, as he sat <span class="ital">at meat.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1064"><span id="lf0610_label_1330">8</span> But when his disciples saw <span class="ital">it,</span> they had indignation, saying, To what purpose <span class="ital">is</span> this waste?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1065"><span id="lf0610_label_1331">9</span> For this ointment might have been sold for much, and given to the poor.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1066"><span id="lf0610_label_1332">10</span> When Jesus understood <span class="ital">it,</span> he said unto them, Why trouble ye the woman? for she hath wrought a good work upon me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1067"><span id="lf0610_label_1333">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt362" id="lf0610_footnote_nt362_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For ye have the poor always with you; but me ye have not always.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1068"><span id="lf0610_label_1335">12</span> For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body, she did <span class="ital">it</span> for my burial.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1069"><span id="lf0610_label_1336">13</span> Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, <span class="ital">there</span> shall also this, that this woman hath done, be told for a memorial of her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1070"><span id="lf0610_label_1337">14</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt363" id="lf0610_footnote_nt363_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then one of the twelve, called Judas Iscariot, went unto the chief priests,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1071"><span id="lf0610_label_1339">15</span> And said <span class="ital">unto them,</span> What will ye give me, and I will deliver him unto you? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1072"><span id="lf0610_label_1340">16</span> And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1073"><span id="lf0610_label_1341">17</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt364" id="lf0610_footnote_nt364_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Now the first <span class="ital">day</span> of the <span class="ital">feast of</span> unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus, saying unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1074"><span id="lf0610_label_1343">18</span> And he said, Go into the city to such a man, and say unto him, The Master saith, My time is at hand; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1075"><span id="lf0610_label_1344">19</span> And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them; and they made ready the passover.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1076"><span id="lf0610_label_1345">20</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt365" id="lf0610_footnote_nt365_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Now when the even was come, he sat down with the twelve.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1077"><span id="lf0610_label_1347">21</span> And as they did eat, he said, Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1078"><span id="lf0610_label_1348">22</span> And they were exceeding sorrowful, and began every one of them to say unto him, Lord, is it I?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1079"><span id="lf0610_label_1349">23</span> And he answered and said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt366" id="lf0610_footnote_nt366_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He that dippeth <span class="ital">his</span> hand with me in the dish, the same shall betray me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1080"><span id="lf0610_label_1351">24</span> The Son of man goeth as it is written of him: but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! it had been good for that man if he had not been born.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1081"><span id="lf0610_label_1352">25</span> Then Judas, which betrayed him, answered and said, Master, is it I? He said unto him, Thou hast said.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1082"><span id="lf0610_label_1353">26</span> &#xB6; And as they were eating, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt367" id="lf0610_footnote_nt367_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jesus took bread, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt368" id="lf0610_footnote_nt368_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>blessed <span class="ital">it,</span> and brake <span class="ital">it,</span> and gave <span class="ital">it</span> to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1083"><span id="lf0610_label_1356">27</span> And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and gave <span class="ital">it</span> to them, saying, Drink ye all of it;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>35<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1084"><span id="lf0610_label_1357">28</span> For this is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many for the remission of sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1085"><span id="lf0610_label_1358">29</span> But I say unto you, I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father&#x2019;s kingdom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1086"><span id="lf0610_label_1359">30</span> And when they had sung an <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt369" id="lf0610_footnote_nt369_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1087"><span id="lf0610_label_1361">31</span> Then saith Jesus unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt370" id="lf0610_footnote_nt370_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt371" id="lf0610_footnote_nt371_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1088"><span id="lf0610_label_1364">32</span> But after I am risen again, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt372" id="lf0610_footnote_nt372_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will go before you into Galilee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1089"><span id="lf0610_label_1366">33</span> Peter answered and said unto him, Though all <span class="ital">men</span> shall be offended because of thee, <span class="ital">yet</span> will I never be offended.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1090"><span id="lf0610_label_1367">34</span> Jesus said unto him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt373" id="lf0610_footnote_nt373_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Verily I say unto thee, That this night, before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1091"><span id="lf0610_label_1369">35</span> Peter said unto him, Though I should die with thee, yet will I not deny thee. Likewise also said all the disciples.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1092"><span id="lf0610_label_1370">36</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt374" id="lf0610_footnote_nt374_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane, and saith unto the disciples, Sit ye here, while I go and pray yonder.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1093"><span id="lf0610_label_1372">37</span> And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and very heavy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1094"><span id="lf0610_label_1373">38</span> Then saith he unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1095"><span id="lf0610_label_1374">39</span> And he went a little farther, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou <span class="ital">wilt.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1096"><span id="lf0610_label_1375">40</span> And he cometh unto the disciples, and findeth them asleep, and saith unto Peter, What, could ye not watch with me one hour?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1097"><span id="lf0610_label_1376">41</span> Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed <span class="ital">is</span> willing, but the flesh <span class="ital">is</span> weak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1098"><span id="lf0610_label_1377">42</span> He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1099"><span id="lf0610_label_1378">43</span> And he came and found them asleep again: for their eyes were heavy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1100"><span id="lf0610_label_1379">44</span> And he left them, and went away again, and prayed the third time, saying the same words.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1101"><span id="lf0610_label_1380">45</span> Then cometh he to his disciples, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take <span class="ital">your</span> rest: behold, the hour is at hand, and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1102"><span id="lf0610_label_1381">46</span> Rise, let us be going: behold, he is at hand that doth betray me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1103"><span id="lf0610_label_1382">47</span> &#xB6; And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt375" id="lf0610_footnote_nt375_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>while he yet spake, lo, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and elders of the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1104"><span id="lf0610_label_1384">48</span> Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he: hold him fast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1105"><span id="lf0610_label_1385">49</span> And forthwith he came to Jesus, and said, Hail, master; and kissed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1106"><span id="lf0610_label_1386">50</span> And Jesus said unto him, Friend, wherefore art thou come? Then came they, and laid hands on Jesus, and took him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1107"><span id="lf0610_label_1387">51</span> And, behold, one of them which were with Jesus stretched out <span class="ital">his</span> hand, and drew his sword, and struck a servant of the high priest&#x2019;s, and smote off his ear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1108"><span id="lf0610_label_1388">52</span> Then said Jesus unto him, Put up again thy sword into his place: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt376" id="lf0610_footnote_nt376_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1109"><span id="lf0610_label_1390">53</span> Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father, and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1110"><span id="lf0610_label_1391">54</span> But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt377" id="lf0610_footnote_nt377_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>that thus it must be?</p>
