<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1776"><span id="lf0610_label_2267">20</span> And he answered and said unto them, <span class="ital">It is</span> one of the twelve, that dippeth with me in the dish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1777"><span id="lf0610_label_2268">21</span> The Son of man indeed goeth, as it is written of him: but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! good were it for that man if he had never been born.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>61<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1778"><span id="lf0610_label_2269">22</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt571" id="lf0610_footnote_nt571_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as they did eat, Jesus took bread, and blessed, and brake <span class="ital">it,</span> and gave to them, and said, Take, eat: this is my body.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1779"><span id="lf0610_label_2271">23</span> And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave <span class="ital">it</span> to them: and they all drank of it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1780"><span id="lf0610_label_2272">24</span> And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1781"><span id="lf0610_label_2273">25</span> Verily I say unto you, I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1782"><span id="lf0610_label_2274">26</span> &#xB6; And when they had sung an <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt572" id="lf0610_footnote_nt572_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1783"><span id="lf0610_label_2276">27</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt573" id="lf0610_footnote_nt573_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1784"><span id="lf0610_label_2278">28</span> But after that I am risen, I will go before you into Galilee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1785"><span id="lf0610_label_2279">29</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt574" id="lf0610_footnote_nt574_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet <span class="ital">will</span> not I.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1786"><span id="lf0610_label_2281">30</span> And Jesus saith unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this day, <span class="ital">even</span> in this night, before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1787"><span id="lf0610_label_2282">31</span> But he spake the more vehemently, If I should die with thee, I will not deny thee in any wise. Likewise also said they all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1788"><span id="lf0610_label_2283">32</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt575" id="lf0610_footnote_nt575_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane: and he saith to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1789"><span id="lf0610_label_2285">33</span> And he taketh with him Peter and James and John, and began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1790"><span id="lf0610_label_2286">34</span> And saith unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death: tarry ye here, and watch.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1791"><span id="lf0610_label_2287">35</span> And he went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass from him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1792"><span id="lf0610_label_2288">36</span> And he said, Abba, Father, all things <span class="ital">are</span> possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt576" id="lf0610_footnote_nt576_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>not what I will, but what thou wilt.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1793"><span id="lf0610_label_2290">37</span> And he cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1794"><span id="lf0610_label_2291">38</span> Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly <span class="ital">is</span> ready, but the flesh <span class="ital">is</span> weak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1795"><span id="lf0610_label_2292">39</span> And again he went away, and prayed, and spake the same words.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1796"><span id="lf0610_label_2293">40</span> And when he returned, he found them asleep again, (for their eyes were heavy,) neither wist they what to answer him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1797"><span id="lf0610_label_2294">41</span> And he cometh the third time, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take <span class="ital">your</span> rest: it is enough, the hour is come; behold, the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1798"><span id="lf0610_label_2295">42</span> Rise up, let us go; lo, he that betrayeth me is at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1799"><span id="lf0610_label_2296">43</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt577" id="lf0610_footnote_nt577_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And immediately, while he yet spake, cometh Judas, one of the twelve, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1800"><span id="lf0610_label_2298">44</span> And he that betrayed him had given them a token, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he; take him, and lead <span class="ital">him</span> away safely.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1801"><span id="lf0610_label_2299">45</span> And as soon as he was come, he goeth straightway to him, and saith, Master, master; and kissed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1802"><span id="lf0610_label_2300">46</span> &#xB6; And they laid their hands on him, and took him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1803"><span id="lf0610_label_2301">47</span> And one of them that stood by drew a sword, and smote a servant of the high priest, and cut off his ear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1804"><span id="lf0610_label_2302">48</span> And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and <span class="ital">with</span> staves to take me?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1805"><span id="lf0610_label_2303">49</span> I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and ye took me not: but the scriptures must be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1806"><span id="lf0610_label_2304">50</span> And they all forsook him, and fled.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>62<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1807"><span id="lf0610_label_2305">51</span> And there followed him a certain young man, having a linen cloth cast about <span class="ital">his</span> naked <span class="ital">body;</span> and the young men laid hold on him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1808"><span id="lf0610_label_2306">52</span> And he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1809"><span id="lf0610_label_2307">53</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt578" id="lf0610_footnote_nt578_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And they led Jesus away to the high priest: and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1810"><span id="lf0610_label_2309">54</span> And Peter followed him afar off, even into the palace of the high priest: and he sat with the servants, and warmed himself at the fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1811"><span id="lf0610_label_2310">55</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt579" id="lf0610_footnote_nt579_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1812"><span id="lf0610_label_2312">56</span> For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1813"><span id="lf0610_label_2313">57</span> And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1814"><span id="lf0610_label_2314">58</span> We heard him say, I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and within three days I will build another made without hands.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1815"><span id="lf0610_label_2315">59</span> But neither so did their witness agree together.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1816"><span id="lf0610_label_2316">60</span> And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what <span class="ital">is it which</span> these witness against thee?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1817"><span id="lf0610_label_2317">61</span> But he held his peace, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him, and said unto him, Art thou the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1818"><span id="lf0610_label_2318">62</span> And Jesus said, I am: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt580" id="lf0610_footnote_nt580_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1819"><span id="lf0610_label_2320">63</span> Then the high priest rent his clothes, and saith, What need we any further witnesses?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1820"><span id="lf0610_label_2321">64</span> Ye have heard the blasphemy: what think ye? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1821"><span id="lf0610_label_2322">65</span> And some began to spit on him, and to cover his face, and to buffet him, and to say unto him, Prophesy: and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1822"><span id="lf0610_label_2323">66</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt581" id="lf0610_footnote_nt581_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1823"><span id="lf0610_label_2325">67</span> And when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1824"><span id="lf0610_label_2326">68</span> But he denied, saying, I know not, neither understand I what thou sayest. And he went out into the porch; and the cock crew.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1825"><span id="lf0610_label_2327">69</span> And a maid saw him again, and began to say to them that stood by, This is <span class="ital">one</span> of them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1826"><span id="lf0610_label_2328">70</span> And he denied it again. And a little after, they that stood by said again to Peter, Surely thou art <span class="ital">one</span> of them: for thou art a Galil&#xE6;an, and thy speech agreeth <span class="ital">thereto.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1827"><span id="lf0610_label_2329">71</span> But he began to curse and to swear, <span class="ital">saying,</span> I know not this man of whom ye speak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1828"><span id="lf0610_label_2330">72</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt582" id="lf0610_footnote_nt582_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the second time the cock crew. And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him, Before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice. And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt583" id="lf0610_footnote_nt583_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>when he thought thereon, he wept.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_059" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_2333">15</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1829"><span id="lf0610_label_2334">1</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt584" id="lf0610_footnote_nt584_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council, and bound Jesus, and carried <span class="ital">him</span> away, and delivered <span class="ital">him</span> to Pilate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1830"><span id="lf0610_label_2336">2</span> And Pilate asked him, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answering said unto him, Thou sayest <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1831"><span id="lf0610_label_2337">3</span> And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1832"><span id="lf0610_label_2338">4</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt585" id="lf0610_footnote_nt585_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1833"><span id="lf0610_label_2340">5</span> But Jesus yet answered nothing; so that Pilate marvelled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1834"><span id="lf0610_label_2341">6</span> Now at <span class="ital">that</span> feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1835"><span id="lf0610_label_2342">7</span> And there was <span class="ital">one</span> named Barabbas, <span class="ital">which lay</span> bound with them that had made insurrection with him, who had committed murder in the insurrection.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>63<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1836"><span id="lf0610_label_2343">8</span> And the multitude crying aloud began to desire <span class="ital">him to do</span> as he had ever done unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1837"><span id="lf0610_label_2344">9</span> But Pilate answered them, saying, Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1838"><span id="lf0610_label_2345">10</span> For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1839"><span id="lf0610_label_2346">11</span> But the chief priests moved the people, that he should rather release Barabbas unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1840"><span id="lf0610_label_2347">12</span> And Pilate answered and said again unto them, What will ye then that I shall do <span class="ital">unto him</span> whom ye call the King of the Jews?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1841"><span id="lf0610_label_2348">13</span> And they cried out again, Crucify him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1842"><span id="lf0610_label_2349">14</span> Then Pilate said unto them, Why, what evil hath he done? And they cried out the more exceedingly, Crucify him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1843"><span id="lf0610_label_2350">15</span> &#xB6; And <span class="ital">so</span> Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged <span class="ital">him,</span> to be crucified.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1844"><span id="lf0610_label_2351">16</span> And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Pr&#xE6;torium; and they call together the whole band.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1845"><span id="lf0610_label_2352">17</span> And they clothed him with purple, and platted a crown of thorns, and put it about his <span class="ital">head,</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1846"><span id="lf0610_label_2353">18</span> And began to salute him, Hail, King of the Jews!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1847"><span id="lf0610_label_2354">19</span> And they smote him on the head with a reed, and did spit upon him, and bowing <span class="ital">their</span> knees worshipped him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1848"><span id="lf0610_label_2355">20</span> And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1849"><span id="lf0610_label_2356">21</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt586" id="lf0610_footnote_nt586_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian, who passed by, coming out of the country, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to bear his cross.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1850"><span id="lf0610_label_2358">22</span> And they bring him unto the place Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, The place of a skull.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1851"><span id="lf0610_label_2359">23</span> And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh: but he received <span class="ital">it</span> not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1852"><span id="lf0610_label_2360">24</span> And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1853"><span id="lf0610_label_2361">25</span> And it was the third hour, and they crucified him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1854"><span id="lf0610_label_2362">26</span> And the superscription of his accusation was written over, THE KING OF THE JEWS.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1855"><span id="lf0610_label_2363">27</span> And with him they crucify two thieves; the one on his right hand, and the other on his left</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1856"><span id="lf0610_label_2364">28</span> And the scripture was fulfilled, which saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt587" id="lf0610_footnote_nt587_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he was numbered with the transgressors.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1857"><span id="lf0610_label_2366">29</span> And they that passed by railed on him, wagging their heads, and saying, Ah, thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest <span class="ital">it</span> in three days,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1858"><span id="lf0610_label_2367">30</span> Save thyself, and come down from the cross.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1859"><span id="lf0610_label_2368">31</span> Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes, He saved others; himself he cannot save.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1860"><span id="lf0610_label_2369">32</span> Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross, that we may see and believe. And they that were crucified with him reviled him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1861"><span id="lf0610_label_2370">33</span> And when the sixth hour was come, there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1862"><span id="lf0610_label_2371">34</span> And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt588" id="lf0610_footnote_nt588_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1863"><span id="lf0610_label_2373">35</span> And some of them that stood by, when they heard <span class="ital">it,</span> said, Behold, he calleth Elias.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1864"><span id="lf0610_label_2374">36</span> And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar, and put <span class="ital">it</span> on a reed, and gave him to drink, saying, Let alone; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1865"><span id="lf0610_label_2375">37</span> And Jesus cried with a loud voice, and gave up the ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1866"><span id="lf0610_label_2376">38</span> And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1867"><span id="lf0610_label_2377">39</span> &#xB6; And when the centurion, which stood over against him, saw that he so cried out, and gave up the ghost, he said, Truly this man was the Son of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1868"><span id="lf0610_label_2378">40</span> There were also women looking on afar off: among whom was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses, and Salome;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>64<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1869"><span id="lf0610_label_2379">41</span> (Who also, when he was in Galilee, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt589" id="lf0610_footnote_nt589_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>followed him, and ministered unto him;) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1870"><span id="lf0610_label_2381">42</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt590" id="lf0610_footnote_nt590_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And now when the even was come, because it was the preparation, that is, the day before the sabbath,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1871"><span id="lf0610_label_2383">43</span> Joseph of Arimath&#xE6;a, an honourable counsellor, which also waited for the kingdom of God, came, and went in boldly unto Pilate, and craved the body of Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1872"><span id="lf0610_label_2384">44</span> And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead: and calling <span class="ital">unto him</span> the centurion, he asked him whether he had been any while dead.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1873"><span id="lf0610_label_2385">45</span> And when he knew <span class="ital">it</span> of the centurion, he gave the body to Joseph.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1874"><span id="lf0610_label_2386">46</span> And he bought fine linen, and took him down, and wrapped him in the linen, and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock, and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1875"><span id="lf0610_label_2387">47</span> And Mary Magdalene and Mary <span class="ital">the mother</span> of Joses beheld where he was laid.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_060" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_2388">16</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1876"><span id="lf0610_label_2389">1</span> And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the <span class="ital">mother</span> of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1877"><span id="lf0610_label_2390">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt591" id="lf0610_footnote_nt591_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And very early in the morning the first <span class="ital">day</span> of the week, they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1878"><span id="lf0610_label_2392">3</span> And they said among themselves, Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1879"><span id="lf0610_label_2393">4</span> And when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away: for it was very great.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1880"><span id="lf0610_label_2394">5</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt592" id="lf0610_footnote_nt592_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And entering into the sepulchre, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, clothed in a long white garment; and they were affrighted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1881"><span id="lf0610_label_2396">6</span> And he saith unto them, Be not affrighted: Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth, which was crucified: he is risen; he is not here: behold the place where they laid him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1882"><span id="lf0610_label_2397">7</span> But go your way, tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee: there shall ye see him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt593" id="lf0610_footnote_nt593_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>as he said unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1883"><span id="lf0610_label_2399">8</span> And they went out quickly, and fled from the sepulchre; for they trembled and were amazed: neither said they any thing to any <span class="ital">man;</span> for they were afraid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1884"><span id="lf0610_label_2400">9</span> &#xB6; Now when <span class="ital">Jesus</span> was risen early the first <span class="ital">day</span> of the week, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt594" id="lf0610_footnote_nt594_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt595" id="lf0610_footnote_nt595_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>out of whom he had cast seven devils.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1885"><span id="lf0610_label_2403">10</span> <span class="ital">And</span> she went and told them that had been with him, as they mourned and wept.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1886"><span id="lf0610_label_2404">11</span> And they, when they had heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, believed not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1887"><span id="lf0610_label_2405">12</span> &#xB6; After that he appeared in another form <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt596" id="lf0610_footnote_nt596_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>unto two of them, as they walked, and went into the country.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1888"><span id="lf0610_label_2407">13</span> And they went and told <span class="ital">it</span> unto the residue: neither believed they them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1889"><span id="lf0610_label_2408">14</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt597" id="lf0610_footnote_nt597_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt598" id="lf0610_footnote_nt598_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1890"><span id="lf0610_label_2411">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt599" id="lf0610_footnote_nt599_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1891"><span id="lf0610_label_2413">16</span> He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt600" id="lf0610_footnote_nt600_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>but he that believeth not shall be damned.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1892"><span id="lf0610_label_2415">17</span> And these signs shall follow them that believe; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt601" id="lf0610_footnote_nt601_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>In my name shall they cast out devils; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt602" id="lf0610_footnote_nt602_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>they shall speak with new tongues;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1893"><span id="lf0610_label_2418">18</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt603" id="lf0610_footnote_nt603_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>They shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt604" id="lf0610_footnote_nt604_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1894"><span id="lf0610_label_2421">19</span> &#xB6; So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt605" id="lf0610_footnote_nt605_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1895"><span id="lf0610_label_2423">20</span> And they went forth, and preached every where, the Lord working with <span class="ital">them,</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt606" id="lf0610_footnote_nt606_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and confirming the word with signs following. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>65<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_061" class="type-part S_Luke">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_011">THE GOSPEL ACCORDING TO S. LUKE.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_062" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_2425">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1896"><span id="lf0610_label_2426">1</span> <span class="csc">Forasmuch</span> as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1897"><span id="lf0610_label_2427">2</span> Even as they delivered them unto us, which from the beginning were eyewitnesses, and ministers of the word;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1898"><span id="lf0610_label_2428">3</span> It seemed good to me also, having had perfect understanding of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt607" id="lf0610_footnote_nt607_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>all things from the very first, to write unto thee in order, most excellent Theophilus,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1899"><span id="lf0610_label_2430">4</span> That thou mightest know the certainty of those things, wherein thou hast been instructed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1900"><span id="lf0610_label_2431">5</span> &#xB6; <span class="csc">There</span> was in the days of Herod, the king of Jud&#xE6;a, a certain priest named Zacharias, of the course of Abia: and his wife <span class="ital">was</span> of the daughters of Aaron, and her name <span class="ital">was</span> Elisabeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1901"><span id="lf0610_label_2432">6</span> And they were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1902"><span id="lf0610_label_2433">7</span> And they had no child, because that Elisabeth was barren, and they both were <span class="ital">now</span> well stricken in years.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1903"><span id="lf0610_label_2434">8</span> And it came to pass, that while he executed the priest&#x2019;s office before God in the order of his course,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1904"><span id="lf0610_label_2435">9</span> According to the custom of the priest&#x2019;s office, his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1905"><span id="lf0610_label_2436">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt608" id="lf0610_footnote_nt608_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1906"><span id="lf0610_label_2438">11</span> And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1907"><span id="lf0610_label_2439">12</span> And when Zacharias saw <span class="ital">him,</span> he was troubled, and fear fell upon him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1908"><span id="lf0610_label_2440">13</span> But the angel said unto him, Fear not, Zacharias: for thy prayer is heard; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son, and thou shalt call his name John.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1909"><span id="lf0610_label_2441">14</span> And thou shalt have joy and gladness; and many shall rejoice at his birth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1910"><span id="lf0610_label_2442">15</span> For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord, and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost, even from his mother&#x2019;s womb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1911"><span id="lf0610_label_2443">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt609" id="lf0610_footnote_nt609_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1912"><span id="lf0610_label_2445">17</span> And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias, to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children, and the disobedient <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt610" id="lf0610_footnote_nt610_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to the wisdom of the just; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1913"><span id="lf0610_label_2447">18</span> And Zacharias said unto the angel, Whereby shall I know this? for I am an old man, and my wife well stricken in years.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1914"><span id="lf0610_label_2448">19</span> And the angel answering said unto him, I am Gabriel, that stand in the presence of God; and am sent to speak unto thee, and to shew thee these glad tidings.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1915"><span id="lf0610_label_2449">20</span> And, behold, thou shalt be dumb, and not able to speak, until the day that these things shall be performed, because thou believest not my words, which shall be fulfilled in their season.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1916"><span id="lf0610_label_2450">21</span> And the people waited for Zacharias, and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1917"><span id="lf0610_label_2451">22</span> And when he came out, he could not speak unto them: and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple: for he beckoned unto them, and remained speechless.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>66<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1918"><span id="lf0610_label_2452">23</span> And it came to pass, that, as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished, he departed to his own house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1919"><span id="lf0610_label_2453">24</span> And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived, and hid herself five months, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1920"><span id="lf0610_label_2454">25</span> Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on <span class="ital">me,</span> to take away my reproach among men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1921"><span id="lf0610_label_2455">26</span> And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee, named Nazareth,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1922"><span id="lf0610_label_2456">27</span> To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the virgin&#x2019;s name <span class="ital">was</span> Mary.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1923"><span id="lf0610_label_2457">28</span> And the angel came in unto her, and said, Hail, <span class="ital">thou that art</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt611" id="lf0610_footnote_nt611_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>highly favoured, the Lord <span class="ital">is</span> with thee: blessed <span class="ital">art</span> thou among women.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1924"><span id="lf0610_label_2459">29</span> And when she saw <span class="ital">him,</span> she was troubled at his saying, and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1925"><span id="lf0610_label_2460">30</span> And the angel said unto her, Fear not, Mary: for thou hast found favour with God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1926"><span id="lf0610_label_2461">31</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt612" id="lf0610_footnote_nt612_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name JESUS.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1927"><span id="lf0610_label_2463">32</span> He shall be great, and shall be called the Son of the Highest: and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1928"><span id="lf0610_label_2464">33</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt613" id="lf0610_footnote_nt613_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever; and of his kingdom there shall be no end.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1929"><span id="lf0610_label_2466">34</span> Then said Mary unto the angel, How shall this be, seeing I know not a man?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1930"><span id="lf0610_label_2467">35</span> And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1931"><span id="lf0610_label_2468">36</span> And, behold, thy cousin Elisabeth, she hath also conceived a son in her old age: and this is the sixth month with her, who was called barren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1932"><span id="lf0610_label_2469">37</span> For with God nothing shall be impossible.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1933"><span id="lf0610_label_2470">38</span> And Mary said, Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1934"><span id="lf0610_label_2471">39</span> And Mary arose in those days, and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Juda;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1935"><span id="lf0610_label_2472">40</span> And entered into the house of Zacharias, and saluted Elisabeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1936"><span id="lf0610_label_2473">41</span> And it came to pass, that, when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe leaped in her womb; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1937"><span id="lf0610_label_2474">42</span> And she spake out with a loud voice, and said, Blessed <span class="ital">art</span> thou among women, and blessed <span class="ital">is</span> the fruit of thy womb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1938"><span id="lf0610_label_2475">43</span> And whence <span class="ital">is</span> this to me, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1939"><span id="lf0610_label_2476">44</span> For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1940"><span id="lf0610_label_2477">45</span> And blessed <span class="ital">is</span> she <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt614" id="lf0610_footnote_nt614_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1941"><span id="lf0610_label_2479">46</span> And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1942"><span id="lf0610_label_2480">47</span> And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1943"><span id="lf0610_label_2481">48</span> For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden: for, behold, from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1944"><span id="lf0610_label_2482">49</span> For he that is mighty hath done to me great things; and holy <span class="ital">is</span> his name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1945"><span id="lf0610_label_2483">50</span> And his mercy <span class="ital">is</span> on them that fear him from generation to generation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1946"><span id="lf0610_label_2484">51</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt615" id="lf0610_footnote_nt615_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He hath shewed strength with his arm; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt616" id="lf0610_footnote_nt616_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1947"><span id="lf0610_label_2487">52</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt617" id="lf0610_footnote_nt617_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He hath put down the mighty from <span class="ital">their</span> seats, and exalted them of low degree.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1948"><span id="lf0610_label_2489">53</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt618" id="lf0610_footnote_nt618_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1949"><span id="lf0610_label_2491">54</span> He hath holpen his servant Israel, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt619" id="lf0610_footnote_nt619_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>in remembrance of <span class="ital">his</span> mercy;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>67<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1950"><span id="lf0610_label_2493">55</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt620" id="lf0610_footnote_nt620_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>As he spake to our fathers, to Abraham, and to his seed for ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1951"><span id="lf0610_label_2495">56</span> And Mary abode with her about three months, and returned to her own house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1952"><span id="lf0610_label_2496">57</span> Now Elisabeth&#x2019;s full tune came that she should be delivered; and she brought forth a son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1953"><span id="lf0610_label_2497">58</span> And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her; and they rejoiced with her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1954"><span id="lf0610_label_2498">59</span> And it came to pass, that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child; and they called him Zacharias, after the name of his father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1955"><span id="lf0610_label_2499">60</span> And his mother answered and said, Not <span class="ital">so;</span> but he shall be called John.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1956"><span id="lf0610_label_2500">61</span> And they said unto her, There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1957"><span id="lf0610_label_2501">62</span> And they made signs to his father, how he would have him called.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1958"><span id="lf0610_label_2502">63</span> And he asked for a writing table, and wrote, saying, His name is John. And they marvelled all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1959"><span id="lf0610_label_2503">64</span> And his mouth was opened immediately, and his tongue <span class="ital">loosed,</span> and he spake, and praised God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1960"><span id="lf0610_label_2504">65</span> And fear came on all that dwelt round about them: and all these <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt621" id="lf0610_footnote_nt621_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Jud&#xE6;a.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1961"><span id="lf0610_label_2506">66</span> And all they <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt622" id="lf0610_footnote_nt622_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>that heard <span class="ital">them</span> laid <span class="ital">them</span> up in their hearts, saying, What manner of child shall this be! And the hand of the Lord was with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1962"><span id="lf0610_label_2508">67</span> And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost, and prophesied, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1963"><span id="lf0610_label_2509">68</span> Blessed <span class="ital">be</span> the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1964"><span id="lf0610_label_2510">69</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt623" id="lf0610_footnote_nt623_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1965"><span id="lf0610_label_2512">70</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt624" id="lf0610_footnote_nt624_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets, which have been since the world began:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1966"><span id="lf0610_label_2514">71</span> That we should be saved from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1967"><span id="lf0610_label_2515">72</span> To perform the mercy <span class="ital">promised</span> to our fathers, and to remember his holy covenant;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1968"><span id="lf0610_label_2516">73</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt625" id="lf0610_footnote_nt625_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The oath which he sware to our father Abraham,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1969"><span id="lf0610_label_2518">74</span> That he would grant unto us, that we being delivered out of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt626" id="lf0610_footnote_nt626_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>hand of our enemies might serve him without fear,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1970"><span id="lf0610_label_2520">75</span> In holiness and righteousness before him, all the days of our life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1971"><span id="lf0610_label_2521">76</span> And thou, child, shalt be called the prophet of the Highest: for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1972"><span id="lf0610_label_2522">77</span> To give knowledge of salvation unto his people <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt627" id="lf0610_footnote_nt627_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>by the remission of their sins,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1973"><span id="lf0610_label_2524">78</span> Through the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt628" id="lf0610_footnote_nt628_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>tender mercy of our God; whereby the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt629" id="lf0610_footnote_nt629_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>dayspring from on high hath visited us,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1974"><span id="lf0610_label_2527">79</span> To give light to them that sit in darkness and <span class="ital">in</span> the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1975"><span id="lf0610_label_2528">80</span> And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_063" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_2529">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1976"><span id="lf0610_label_2530">1</span> And it came to pass in those days, that there went out a decree from C&#xE6;sar Augustus, that all the world should be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt630" id="lf0610_footnote_nt630_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>taxed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1977"><span id="lf0610_label_2532">2</span> (<span class="ital">And</span> this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1978"><span id="lf0610_label_2533">3</span> And all went to be taxed, every one into his own city.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1979"><span id="lf0610_label_2534">4</span> And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Jud&#xE6;a, unto <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt631" id="lf0610_footnote_nt631_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the city of David, which is called Bethlehem; (because he was of the house and lineage of David:)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1980"><span id="lf0610_label_2536">5</span> To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife, being great with child.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1981"><span id="lf0610_label_2537">6</span> And so it was, that, while they were there, the days were accomplished that she should be delivered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1982"><span id="lf0610_label_2538">7</span> And she brought forth her firstborn son, and wrapped him in swaddling clothes, and laid him in a manger; because there was no room for them in the inn.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>68<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1983"><span id="lf0610_label_2539">8</span> And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field, keeping <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt632" id="lf0610_footnote_nt632_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>watch over their flock by night.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1984"><span id="lf0610_label_2541">9</span> And, lo, the angel of the Lord came upon them, and the glory of the Lord shone round about them: and they were sore afraid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1985"><span id="lf0610_label_2542">10</span> And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1986"><span id="lf0610_label_2543">11</span> For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1987"><span id="lf0610_label_2544">12</span> And this <span class="ital">shall be</span> a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1988"><span id="lf0610_label_2545">13</span> And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1989"><span id="lf0610_label_2546">14</span> Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1990"><span id="lf0610_label_2547">15</span> And it came to pass, as the angels were gone away from them into heaven, the shepherds said one to another, Let us now go even unto Bethlehem, and see this thing which is come to pass, which the Lord hath made known unto us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1991"><span id="lf0610_label_2548">16</span> And they came with haste, and found Mary, and Joseph, and the babe lying in a manger.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1992"><span id="lf0610_label_2549">17</span> And when they had seen <span class="ital">it,</span> they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1993"><span id="lf0610_label_2550">18</span> And all they that heard <span class="ital">it</span> wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1994"><span id="lf0610_label_2551">19</span> But Mary kept all these things, and pondered <span class="ital">them</span> in her heart.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1995"><span id="lf0610_label_2552">20</span> And the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, as it was told unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1996"><span id="lf0610_label_2553">21</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt633" id="lf0610_footnote_nt633_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child, his name was called <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt634" id="lf0610_footnote_nt634_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>JESUS, which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1997"><span id="lf0610_label_2556">22</span> And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished, they brought him to Jerusalem, to present <span class="ital">him</span> to the Lord;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1998"><span id="lf0610_label_2557">23</span> (As it is written in the law of the Lord, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt635" id="lf0610_footnote_nt635_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_1999"><span id="lf0610_label_2559">24</span> And to offer a sacrifice according to <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt636" id="lf0610_footnote_nt636_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>that which is said in the law of the Lord, A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2000"><span id="lf0610_label_2561">25</span> And, behold, there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name <span class="ital">was</span> Simeon; and the same man <span class="ital">was</span> just and devout, waiting for the consolation of Israel: and the Holy Ghost was upon him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2001"><span id="lf0610_label_2562">26</span> And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost, that he should not see death, before he had seen the Lord&#x2019;s Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2002"><span id="lf0610_label_2563">27</span> And he came by the Spirit into the temple: and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him after the custom of the law,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2003"><span id="lf0610_label_2564">28</span> Then took he him up in his arms, and blessed God, and said,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2004"><span id="lf0610_label_2565">29</span> Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, according to thy word:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2005"><span id="lf0610_label_2566">30</span> For mine eyes have seen thy salvation,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2006"><span id="lf0610_label_2567">31</span> Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2007"><span id="lf0610_label_2568">32</span> A light to lighten the Gentiles, and the glory of thy people Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2008"><span id="lf0610_label_2569">33</span> And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2009"><span id="lf0610_label_2570">34</span> And Simeon blessed them, and said unto Mary his mother, Behold, this <span class="ital">child</span> is set for the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt637" id="lf0610_footnote_nt637_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>fall and rising again of many in Israel; and for a sign which shall be spoken against;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2010"><span id="lf0610_label_2572">35</span> (Yea, a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also,) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2011"><span id="lf0610_label_2573">36</span> And there was one Anna, a prophetess, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Aser: she was of a great age, and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2012"><span id="lf0610_label_2574">37</span> And she <span class="ital">was</span> a widow of about fourscore <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>69<span class="bracket">]</span></span> and four years, which departed not from the temple, but served <span class="ital">God</span> with fastings and prayers night and day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2013"><span id="lf0610_label_2575">38</span> And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord, and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt638" id="lf0610_footnote_nt638_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2014"><span id="lf0610_label_2577">39</span> And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city Nazareth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2015"><span id="lf0610_label_2578">40</span> And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, filled with wisdom: and the grace of God was upon him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2016"><span id="lf0610_label_2579">41</span> Now his parents went to Jerusalem <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt639" id="lf0610_footnote_nt639_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>every year at the feast of the passover.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2017"><span id="lf0610_label_2581">42</span> And when he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2018"><span id="lf0610_label_2582">43</span> And when they had fulfilled the days, as they returned, the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem; and Joseph and his mother knew not <span class="ital">of it</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2019"><span id="lf0610_label_2583">44</span> But they, supposing him to have been in the company, went a day&#x2019;s journey; and they sought him among <span class="ital">their</span> kinsfolk and acquaintance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2020"><span id="lf0610_label_2584">45</span> And when they found him not, they turned back again to Jerusalem, seeking him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2021"><span id="lf0610_label_2585">46</span> And it came to pass, that after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the doctors, both hearing them, and asking them questions.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2022"><span id="lf0610_label_2586">47</span> And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2023"><span id="lf0610_label_2587">48</span> And when they saw him, they were amazed: and his mother said unto him, Son, why hast thou thus dealt with us? behold, thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2024"><span id="lf0610_label_2588">49</span> And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father&#x2019;s business?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2025"><span id="lf0610_label_2589">50</span> And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2026"><span id="lf0610_label_2590">51</span> And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth, and was subject unto them: but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2027"><span id="lf0610_label_2591">52</span> And Jesus increased in wisdom and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt640" id="lf0610_footnote_nt640_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>stature, and in favour with God and man.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_064" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_2593">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2028"><span id="lf0610_label_2594">1</span> Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius C&#xE6;sar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Jud&#xE6;a, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of Itur&#xE6;a and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2029"><span id="lf0610_label_2595">2</span> Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests, the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2030"><span id="lf0610_label_2596">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt641" id="lf0610_footnote_nt641_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he came into all the country about Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2031"><span id="lf0610_label_2598">4</span> As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt642" id="lf0610_footnote_nt642_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2032"><span id="lf0610_label_2600">5</span> Every valley shall be filled, and every mountain and hill shall be brought low; and the crooked shall be made straight, and the rough ways <span class="ital">shall be</span> made smooth;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2033"><span id="lf0610_label_2601">6</span> And all flesh shall see the salvation of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2034"><span id="lf0610_label_2602">7</span> Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt643" id="lf0610_footnote_nt643_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2035"><span id="lf0610_label_2604">8</span> Bring forth therefore fruits <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt644" id="lf0610_footnote_nt644_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>worthy of repentance, and begin not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to <span class="ital">our</span> father: for I say unto you, That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2036"><span id="lf0610_label_2606">9</span> And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2037"><span id="lf0610_label_2607">10</span> And the people asked him, saying, What shall we do then?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2038"><span id="lf0610_label_2608">11</span> He answereth and saith unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt645" id="lf0610_footnote_nt645_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He that hath two coats, let him impart to him that hath none; and he that hath meat, let him do likewise.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>70<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2039"><span id="lf0610_label_2610">12</span> Then came also publicans to be baptized, and said unto him, Master, what shall we do?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2040"><span id="lf0610_label_2611">13</span> And he said unto them, Exact no more than that which is appointed you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2041"><span id="lf0610_label_2612">14</span> And the soldiers likewise demanded of him, saying, And what shall we do? And he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt646" id="lf0610_footnote_nt646_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Do violence to no man, neither accuse <span class="ital">any</span> falsely; and be content with your <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt647" id="lf0610_footnote_nt647_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>wages.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2042"><span id="lf0610_label_2615">15</span> And as the people were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt648" id="lf0610_footnote_nt648_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in expectation, and all men <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt649" id="lf0610_footnote_nt649_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>mused in their hearts of John, whether he were the Christ, or not;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2043"><span id="lf0610_label_2618">16</span> John answered, saying unto <span class="ital">them</span> all, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt650" id="lf0610_footnote_nt650_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I indeed baptize you with water; but one mightier than I cometh, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2044"><span id="lf0610_label_2620">17</span> Whose fan <span class="ital">is</span> in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and will gather the wheat into his garner; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2045"><span id="lf0610_label_2621">18</span> And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2046"><span id="lf0610_label_2622">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt651" id="lf0610_footnote_nt651_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip&#x2019;s wife, and for all the evils which Herod had done,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2047"><span id="lf0610_label_2624">20</span> Added yet this above all, that he shut up John in prison.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2048"><span id="lf0610_label_2625">21</span> Now when all the people were baptized, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt652" id="lf0610_footnote_nt652_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a><a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt653" id="lf0610_footnote_nt653_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>it came to pass, that Jesus also being baptized, and praying, the heaven was opened,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2049"><span id="lf0610_label_2628">22</span> And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him, and a voice came from heaven, which said, Thou art my beloved Son; in thee I am well pleased.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2050"><span id="lf0610_label_2629">23</span> And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age, being (as was supposed) the son of Joseph, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Heli,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2051"><span id="lf0610_label_2630">24</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Matthat, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Levi, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Melchi, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Janna, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Joseph,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2052"><span id="lf0610_label_2631">25</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Mattathias, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Amos, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Naum, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Esli, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Nagge,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2053"><span id="lf0610_label_2632">26</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Maath, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Mattathias, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Semei, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Joseph, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Juda,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2054"><span id="lf0610_label_2633">27</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Joanna, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Rhesa, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Zorobabel, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Salathiel, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Neri,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2055"><span id="lf0610_label_2634">28</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Melchi, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Addi, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Cosam, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Elmodam, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Er,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2056"><span id="lf0610_label_2635">29</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Jose, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Eliezer, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Jorim, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Matthat, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Levi,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2057"><span id="lf0610_label_2636">30</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Simeon, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Juda, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Joseph, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Jonan, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Eliakim,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2058"><span id="lf0610_label_2637">31</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Melea, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Menan, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Mattatha, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Nathan, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of David,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2059"><span id="lf0610_label_2638">32</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Jesse, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Obed, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Booz, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Salmon, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Naasson,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2060"><span id="lf0610_label_2639">33</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Aminadab, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Aram, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Esrom, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Phares, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Juda,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2061"><span id="lf0610_label_2640">34</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Jacob, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Isaac, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Abraham, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Thara, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Nachor,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2062"><span id="lf0610_label_2641">35</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Saruch, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Ragau, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Phalec, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Heber, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Sala,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2063"><span id="lf0610_label_2642">36</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Cainan, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Arphaxad, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Sem, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Noe, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Lamech,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2064"><span id="lf0610_label_2643">37</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Mathusala, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Enoch, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Jared, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Maleleel, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Cainan,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2065"><span id="lf0610_label_2644">38</span> Which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Enos, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Seth, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of Adam, which was <span class="ital">the son</span> of God.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_065" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_2645">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2066"><span id="lf0610_label_2646">1</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt654" id="lf0610_footnote_nt654_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2067"><span id="lf0610_label_2648">2</span> Being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2068"><span id="lf0610_label_2649">3</span> And the devil said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, command this stone that it be made bread.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2069"><span id="lf0610_label_2650">4</span> And Jesus answered him, saying, It is written, That man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2070"><span id="lf0610_label_2651">5</span> And the devil, taking him up into an high mountain, shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2071"><span id="lf0610_label_2652">6</span> And the devil said unto him, All this power will I give thee, and the glory of them: for that is delivered unto me; and to whomsoever I will I give it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2072"><span id="lf0610_label_2653">7</span> If thou therefore wilt <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt655" id="lf0610_footnote_nt655_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>worship me, all shall be thine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2073"><span id="lf0610_label_2655">8</span> And Jesus answered and said unto him, Get thee behind me, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2074"><span id="lf0610_label_2656">9</span> And he brought him to Jerusalem, and set him on a pinnacle of the temple, and said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down from hence:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2075"><span id="lf0610_label_2657">10</span> For it is written, He shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2076"><span id="lf0610_label_2658">11</span> And in <span class="ital">their</span> hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2077"><span id="lf0610_label_2659">12</span> And Jesus answering said unto him, It is said, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2078"><span id="lf0610_label_2660">13</span> And when the devil had ended all the temptation, he departed from him for a season.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2079"><span id="lf0610_label_2661">14</span> &#xB6; And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee: and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2080"><span id="lf0610_label_2662">15</span> And he taught in their synagogues, being glorified of all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2081"><span id="lf0610_label_2663">16</span> &#xB6; And he came to <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt656" id="lf0610_footnote_nt656_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Nazareth, where he had been brought up: and, as his custom was, he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and stood up for to read.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2082"><span id="lf0610_label_2665">17</span> And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias. And when he had opened the book, he found the place where it was written,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2083"><span id="lf0610_label_2666">18</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt657" id="lf0610_footnote_nt657_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The Spirit of the Lord <span class="ital">is</span> upon me, because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty them that are bruised,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2084"><span id="lf0610_label_2668">19</span> To preach the acceptable year of the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2085"><span id="lf0610_label_2669">20</span> And he closed the book, and he gave <span class="ital">it</span> again to the minister, and sat down. And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2086"><span id="lf0610_label_2670">21</span> And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2087"><span id="lf0610_label_2671">22</span> And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph&#x2019;s son?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2088"><span id="lf0610_label_2672">23</span> And he said unto them, Ye will surely say unto me this proverb, Physician, heal thyself: whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum, do also here in thy country.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2089"><span id="lf0610_label_2673">24</span> And he said, Verily I say unto you, No <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt658" id="lf0610_footnote_nt658_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>prophet is accepted in his own country.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2090"><span id="lf0610_label_2675">25</span> But I tell you of a truth, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt659" id="lf0610_footnote_nt659_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when great famine was throughout all the land;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2091"><span id="lf0610_label_2677">26</span> But unto none of them was Elias sent, save unto Sarepta, <span class="ital">a city</span> of Sidon, unto a woman <span class="ital">that was</span> a widow.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>72<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2092"><span id="lf0610_label_2678">27</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt660" id="lf0610_footnote_nt660_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet; and none of them was cleansed, saving Naaman the Syrian.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2093"><span id="lf0610_label_2680">28</span> And all they in the synagogue, when they heard these things, were filled with wrath,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2094"><span id="lf0610_label_2681">29</span> And rose up, and thrust him out of the city, and led him unto the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt661" id="lf0610_footnote_nt661_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>brow of the hill whereon their city was built, that they might cast him down headlong.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2095"><span id="lf0610_label_2683">30</span> But he passing through the midst of them went his way,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2096"><span id="lf0610_label_2684">31</span> And came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee, and taught them on the sabbath days.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2097"><span id="lf0610_label_2685">32</span> And they were astonished at his doctrine: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt662" id="lf0610_footnote_nt662_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for his word was with power.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2098"><span id="lf0610_label_2687">33</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt663" id="lf0610_footnote_nt663_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And in the synagogue there was a man, which had a spirit of an unclean devil, and cried out with a loud voice,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2099"><span id="lf0610_label_2689">34</span> Saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt664" id="lf0610_footnote_nt664_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Let <span class="ital">us</span> alone; what have we to do with thee, <span class="ital">thou</span> Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art; the Holy One of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2100"><span id="lf0610_label_2691">35</span> And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him. And when the devil had thrown him in the midst, he came out of him, and hurt him not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2101"><span id="lf0610_label_2692">36</span> And they were all amazed, and spake among themselves, saying, What a word <span class="ital">is</span> this! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits, and they come out.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2102"><span id="lf0610_label_2693">37</span> And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2103"><span id="lf0610_label_2694">38</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt665" id="lf0610_footnote_nt665_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he arose out of the synagogue, and entered into Simon&#x2019;s house. And Simon&#x2019;s wife&#x2019;s mother was taken with a great fever; and they besought him for her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2104"><span id="lf0610_label_2696">39</span> And he stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her: and immediately she arose and ministered unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2105"><span id="lf0610_label_2697">40</span> &#xB6; Now when the sun was setting, all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2106"><span id="lf0610_label_2698">41</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt666" id="lf0610_footnote_nt666_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And devils also came out of many, crying out, and saying, Thou art Christ the Son of God. And he rebuking <span class="ital">them</span> suffered them not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt667" id="lf0610_footnote_nt667_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to speak: for they knew that he was Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2107"><span id="lf0610_label_2701">42</span> And when it was day, he departed and went into a desert place: and the people sought him, and came unto him, and stayed him, that he should not depart from them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2108"><span id="lf0610_label_2702">43</span> And he said unto them, I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also: for therefore am I sent.</p>
