<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2435"><span id="lf0610_label_3117">28</span> But he said, Yea rather, blessed <span class="ital">are</span> they that hear the word of God, and keep it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2436"><span id="lf0610_label_3118">29</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt749" id="lf0610_footnote_nt749_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when the people were gathered thick together, he began to say, This is an evil generation: they seek a sign; and there shall no sign be given it, but the sign of Jonas the prophet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2437"><span id="lf0610_label_3120">30</span> For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites, so shall also the Son of man be to this generation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2438"><span id="lf0610_label_3121">31</span> The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation, and condemn them: for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon <span class="ital">is</span> here.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2439"><span id="lf0610_label_3122">32</span> The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for they repented at the preaching of Jonas; and, behold, a greater than Jonas <span class="ital">is</span> here.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2440"><span id="lf0610_label_3123">33</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt750" id="lf0610_footnote_nt750_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>No man, when he hath lighted a candle, putteth <span class="ital">it</span> in a secret place, neither under a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt751" id="lf0610_footnote_nt751_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>bushel, but on a candlestick, that they which come in may see the light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2441"><span id="lf0610_label_3126">34</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt752" id="lf0610_footnote_nt752_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The light of the body is the eye: therefore when thine eye is single, thy whole body also is full of light; but when <span class="ital">thine eye</span> is evil, thy body also <span class="ital">is</span> full of darkness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2442"><span id="lf0610_label_3128">35</span> Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2443"><span id="lf0610_label_3129">36</span> If thy whole body therefore <span class="ital">be</span> full of light, having no part dark, the whole shall be full of light, as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2444"><span id="lf0610_label_3130">37</span> &#xB6; And as he spake, a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him: and he went in, and sat down to meat.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2445"><span id="lf0610_label_3131">38</span> And when the Pharisee saw <span class="ital">it,</span> he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2446"><span id="lf0610_label_3132">39</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt753" id="lf0610_footnote_nt753_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the Lord said unto him, Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2447"><span id="lf0610_label_3134">40</span> <span class="ital">Ye</span> fools, did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2448"><span id="lf0610_label_3135">41</span> But rather give alms <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt754" id="lf0610_footnote_nt754_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of such things as ye have; and, behold, all things are clean unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2449"><span id="lf0610_label_3137">42</span> But woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs, and pass over judgment and the love of God: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2450"><span id="lf0610_label_3138">43</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt755" id="lf0610_footnote_nt755_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues, and greetings in the markets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2451"><span id="lf0610_label_3140">44</span> Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are as graves which appear not, and the men that walk over <span class="ital">them</span> are not aware <span class="ital">of them.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2452"><span id="lf0610_label_3141">45</span> &#xB6; Then answered one of the lawyers, and said <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>86<span class="bracket">]</span></span> unto him, Master, thus saying thou reproachest us also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2453"><span id="lf0610_label_3142">46</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt756" id="lf0610_footnote_nt756_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he said, Woe unto you also, <span class="ital">ye</span> lawyers! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne, and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2454"><span id="lf0610_label_3144">47</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt757" id="lf0610_footnote_nt757_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Woe unto you! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets, and your fathers killed them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2455"><span id="lf0610_label_3146">48</span> Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers: for they indeed killed them, and ye build their sepulchres.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2456"><span id="lf0610_label_3147">49</span> Therefore also said the wisdom of God, I will send them prophets and apostles, and <span class="ital">some</span> of them they shall slay and persecute:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2457"><span id="lf0610_label_3148">50</span> That the blood of all the prophets, which was shed from the foundation of the world, may be required of this generation;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2458"><span id="lf0610_label_3149">51</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt758" id="lf0610_footnote_nt758_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias, which perished between the altar and the temple: verily I say unto you, It shall be required of this generation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2459"><span id="lf0610_label_3151">52</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt759" id="lf0610_footnote_nt759_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Woe unto you, lawyers! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge: ye entered not in yourselves, and them that were entering in ye <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt760" id="lf0610_footnote_nt760_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>hindered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2460"><span id="lf0610_label_3154">53</span> And as he said these things unto them, the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge <span class="ital">him</span> vehemently, and to provoke him to speak of many things:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2461"><span id="lf0610_label_3155">54</span> Laying wait for him, and seeking to catch something out of his mouth, that they might accuse him.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_073" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3156">12</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2462"><span id="lf0610_label_3157">1</span> In <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt761" id="lf0610_footnote_nt761_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the mean time, when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people, insomuch that they trode one upon another, he began to say unto his disciples first of all, Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2463"><span id="lf0610_label_3159">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt762" id="lf0610_footnote_nt762_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; neither hid, that shall not be known.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2464"><span id="lf0610_label_3161">3</span> Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2465"><span id="lf0610_label_3162">4</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt763" id="lf0610_footnote_nt763_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And I say unto you my friends, Be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after that have no more that they can do.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2466"><span id="lf0610_label_3164">5</span> But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, Fear him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2467"><span id="lf0610_label_3165">6</span> Are not five sparrows sold for two <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt764" id="lf0610_footnote_nt764_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>farthings, and not one of them is forgotten before God?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2468"><span id="lf0610_label_3167">7</span> But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Fear not therefore: ye are of more value than many sparrows.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2469"><span id="lf0610_label_3168">8</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt765" id="lf0610_footnote_nt765_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Also I say unto you, Whosoever shall confess me before men, him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2470"><span id="lf0610_label_3170">9</span> But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2471"><span id="lf0610_label_3171">10</span> And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2472"><span id="lf0610_label_3172">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt766" id="lf0610_footnote_nt766_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when they bring you unto the synagogues, and <span class="ital">unto</span> magistrates, and powers, take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer, or what ye shall say:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2473"><span id="lf0610_label_3174">12</span> For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2474"><span id="lf0610_label_3175">13</span> &#xB6; And one of the company said unto him, Master, speak to my brother, that he divide the inheritance with me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2475"><span id="lf0610_label_3176">14</span> And he said unto him, Man, who made me a judge or a divider over you?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2476"><span id="lf0610_label_3177">15</span> And he said unto them, Take heed, and beware of covetousness: for a man&#x2019;s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2477"><span id="lf0610_label_3178">16</span> And he spake a parable unto them, saying, The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully:</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>87<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2478"><span id="lf0610_label_3179">17</span> And he thought within himself, saying, What shall I do, because I have no room where to bestow my fruits?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2479"><span id="lf0610_label_3180">18</span> And he said, This will I do: I will pull down my barns, and build greater; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2480"><span id="lf0610_label_3181">19</span> And I will say to my soul, Soul, thou hast much goods laid up for many years; take thine ease, eat, drink, <span class="ital">and</span> be merry.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2481"><span id="lf0610_label_3182">20</span> But God said unto him, <span class="ital">Thou</span> fool, this night <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt767" id="lf0610_footnote_nt767_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>thy soul shall be required of thee: then whose shall those things be, which thou hast provided?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2482"><span id="lf0610_label_3184">21</span> So <span class="ital">is</span> he that layeth up treasure for himself, and is not rich toward God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2483"><span id="lf0610_label_3185">22</span> &#xB6; And he said unto his disciples, Therefore I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt768" id="lf0610_footnote_nt768_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat; neither for the body, what ye shall put on.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2484"><span id="lf0610_label_3187">23</span> The life is more than meat, and the body <span class="ital">is more</span> than raiment.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2485"><span id="lf0610_label_3188">24</span> Consider the ravens: for they neither sow nor reap; which neither have storehouse nor barn; and God feedeth them: how much more are ye better than the fowls?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2486"><span id="lf0610_label_3189">25</span> And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2487"><span id="lf0610_label_3190">26</span> If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least, why take ye thought for the rest?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2488"><span id="lf0610_label_3191">27</span> Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not; and yet I say unto you, that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2489"><span id="lf0610_label_3192">28</span> If then God so clothe the grass, which is to day in the field, and to morrow is cast into the oven; how much more <span class="ital">will he clothe</span> you, O ye of little faith?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2490"><span id="lf0610_label_3193">29</span> And seek not ye what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt769" id="lf0610_footnote_nt769_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>neither be ye of doubtful mind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2491"><span id="lf0610_label_3195">30</span> For all these things do the nations of the world seek after: and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2492"><span id="lf0610_label_3196">31</span> &#xB6; But rather seek ye the kingdom of God; and all these things shall be added unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2493"><span id="lf0610_label_3197">32</span> Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father&#x2019;s good pleasure to give you the kingdom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2494"><span id="lf0610_label_3198">33</span> Sell that ye have, and give alms; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt770" id="lf0610_footnote_nt770_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>provide yourselves bags which wax not old, a treasure in the heavens that faileth not, where no thief approacheth, neither moth corrupteth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2495"><span id="lf0610_label_3200">34</span> For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2496"><span id="lf0610_label_3201">35</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt771" id="lf0610_footnote_nt771_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Let your loins be girded about, and <span class="ital">your</span> lights burning;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2497"><span id="lf0610_label_3203">36</span> And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2498"><span id="lf0610_label_3204">37</span> Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching: verily I say unto you, that he shall gird himself, and make them to sit down to meat, and will come forth and serve them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2499"><span id="lf0610_label_3205">38</span> And if he shall come in the second watch, or come in the third watch, and find <span class="ital">them</span> so, blessed are those servants.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2500"><span id="lf0610_label_3206">39</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt772" id="lf0610_footnote_nt772_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And this know, that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come, he would have watched, and not have suffered his house to be broken through.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2501"><span id="lf0610_label_3208">40</span> Be ye therefore ready also: for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2502"><span id="lf0610_label_3209">41</span> &#xB6; Then Peter said unto him, Lord, speakest thou this parable unto us, or even to all?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2503"><span id="lf0610_label_3210">42</span> And the Lord said, Who then is that faithful and wise steward, whom <span class="ital">his</span> lord shall make ruler over his household, to give <span class="ital">them their</span> portion of meat in due season?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2504"><span id="lf0610_label_3211">43</span> Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2505"><span id="lf0610_label_3212">44</span> Of a truth I say unto you, that he will make him ruler over all that he hath.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>88<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2506"><span id="lf0610_label_3213">45</span> But and if that servant say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens, and to eat and drink, and to be drunken;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2507"><span id="lf0610_label_3214">46</span> The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for <span class="ital">him,</span> and at an hour when he is not aware, and will <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt773" id="lf0610_footnote_nt773_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>cut him in sunder, and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2508"><span id="lf0610_label_3216">47</span> And that servant, which knew his lord&#x2019;s will, and prepared not <span class="ital">himself,</span> neither did according to his will, shall be beaten with many <span class="ital">stripes.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2509"><span id="lf0610_label_3217">48</span> But he that knew not, and did commit things worthy of stripes, shall be beaten with few <span class="ital">stripes.</span> For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2510"><span id="lf0610_label_3218">49</span> &#xB6; I am come to send fire on the earth; and what will I, if it be already kindled?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2511"><span id="lf0610_label_3219">50</span> But I have a baptism to be baptized with; and how am I <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt774" id="lf0610_footnote_nt774_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>straitened till it be accomplished!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2512"><span id="lf0610_label_3221">51</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt775" id="lf0610_footnote_nt775_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth? I tell you, Nay; but rather division:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2513"><span id="lf0610_label_3223">52</span> For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided, three against two, and two against three.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2514"><span id="lf0610_label_3224">53</span> The father shall be divided against the son, and the son against the father; the mother against the daughter, and the daughter against the mother; the mother in law against her daughter in law, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2515"><span id="lf0610_label_3225">54</span> &#xB6; And he said also to the people, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt776" id="lf0610_footnote_nt776_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>When ye see a cloud rise out of the west, straightway ye say, There cometh a shower; and so it is.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2516"><span id="lf0610_label_3227">55</span> And when <span class="ital">ye see</span> the south wind blow, ye say, There will be heat; and it cometh to pass.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2517"><span id="lf0610_label_3228">56</span> <span class="ital">Ye</span> hypocrites, ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth; but how is it that ye do not discern this time?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2518"><span id="lf0610_label_3229">57</span> Yea, and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2519"><span id="lf0610_label_3230">58</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt777" id="lf0610_footnote_nt777_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate, <span class="ital">as thou art</span> in the way, give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him; lest he hale thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and the officer cast thee into prison.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2520"><span id="lf0610_label_3232">59</span> I tell thee, thou shalt not depart thence, till thou hast paid the very last <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt778" id="lf0610_footnote_nt778_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>mite.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_074" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3234">13</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2521"><span id="lf0610_label_3235">1</span> There were present at that season some that told him of the Galil&#xE6;ans, whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2522"><span id="lf0610_label_3236">2</span> And jesus answering said unto them, Suppose ye that these Galil&#xE6;ans were sinners above all the Galil&#xE6;ans, because they suffered such things?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2523"><span id="lf0610_label_3237">3</span> I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2524"><span id="lf0610_label_3238">4</span> Or those eighteen, upon whom the tower in Siloam fell, and slew them, think ye that they were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt779" id="lf0610_footnote_nt779_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2525"><span id="lf0610_label_3240">5</span> I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2526"><span id="lf0610_label_3241">6</span> &#xB6; He spake also this parable; A certain <span class="ital">man</span> had a fig tree planted in his vineyard; and he came and sought fruit thereon, and found none.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2527"><span id="lf0610_label_3242">7</span> Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard, Behold, these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree, and find none: cut it down; why cumbereth it the ground?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2528"><span id="lf0610_label_3243">8</span> And he answering said unto him, Lord, let it alone this year also, till I shall dig about it, and dung <span class="ital">it:</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2529"><span id="lf0610_label_3244">9</span> And if it bear fruit, <span class="ital">well:</span> and if not, <span class="ital">then</span> after that thou shalt cut it down.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2530"><span id="lf0610_label_3245">10</span> And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2531"><span id="lf0610_label_3246">11</span> &#xB6; And, behold, there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years, and was bowed together, and could in no wise lift up <span class="ital">herself.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2532"><span id="lf0610_label_3247">12</span> And when Jesus saw her, he called <span class="ital">her to him,</span> and said unto her, Woman, thou art loosed from thine infirmity.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>89<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2533"><span id="lf0610_label_3248">13</span> And he laid <span class="ital">his</span> hands on her: and immediately she was made straight, and glorified God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2534"><span id="lf0610_label_3249">14</span> And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation, because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day, and said unto the people, There are six days in which men ought to work: in them therefore come and be healed, and not on the sabbath day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2535"><span id="lf0610_label_3250">15</span> The Lord then answered him, and said, <span class="ital">Thou</span> hypocrite, doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or <span class="ital">his</span> ass from the stall, and lead <span class="ital">him</span> away to watering?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2536"><span id="lf0610_label_3251">16</span> And ought not this woman, being a daughter of Abraham, whom Satan hath bound, lo, these eighteen years, be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2537"><span id="lf0610_label_3252">17</span> And when he had said these things, all his adversaries were ashamed: and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2538"><span id="lf0610_label_3253">18</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt780" id="lf0610_footnote_nt780_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then said he, Unto what is the kingdom of God like? and whereunto shall I resemble it?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2539"><span id="lf0610_label_3255">19</span> It is like a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and cast into his garden; and it grew, and waxed a great tree; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2540"><span id="lf0610_label_3256">20</span> And again he said, Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2541"><span id="lf0610_label_3257">21</span> It is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt781" id="lf0610_footnote_nt781_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>measures of meal, till the whole was leavened.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2542"><span id="lf0610_label_3259">22</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt782" id="lf0610_footnote_nt782_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he went through the cities and villages, teaching, and journeying toward Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2543"><span id="lf0610_label_3261">23</span> Then said one unto him, Lord, are there few that be saved? And he said unto them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2544"><span id="lf0610_label_3262">24</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt783" id="lf0610_footnote_nt783_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Strive to enter in at the strait gate: for many, I say unto you, will seek to enter in, and shall not be able.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2545"><span id="lf0610_label_3264">25</span> When once the master of the house is risen up, and hath shut to the door, and ye begin to stand without, and to knock at the door, saying, Lord, Lord, open unto us; and he shall answer and say unto you, I know you not whence ye are:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2546"><span id="lf0610_label_3265">26</span> Then shall ye begin to say, We have eaten and drunk in thy presence, and thou hast taught in our streets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2547"><span id="lf0610_label_3266">27</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt784" id="lf0610_footnote_nt784_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But he shall say, I tell you, I know you not whence ye are; depart from me, all <span class="ital">ye</span> workers of iniquity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2548"><span id="lf0610_label_3268">28</span> There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth, when ye shall see Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, and all the prophets, in the kingdom of God, and you <span class="ital">yourselves</span> thrust out.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2549"><span id="lf0610_label_3269">29</span> And they shall come from the east, and <span class="ital">from</span> the west, and from the north, and <span class="ital">from</span> the south, and shall sit down in the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2550"><span id="lf0610_label_3270">30</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt785" id="lf0610_footnote_nt785_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, there are last which shall be first, and there are first which shall be last.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2551"><span id="lf0610_label_3272">31</span> &#xB6; The same day there came certain of the Pharisees, saying unto him, Get thee out, and depart hence: for Herod will kill thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2552"><span id="lf0610_label_3273">32</span> And he said unto them, Go ye, and tell that fox, Behold, I cast out devils, and I do cures to day and to morrow, and the third <span class="ital">day</span> I shall be perfected.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2553"><span id="lf0610_label_3274">33</span> Nevertheless I must walk to day, and to morrow: and the <span class="ital">day</span> following: for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2554"><span id="lf0610_label_3275">34</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt786" id="lf0610_footnote_nt786_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, which killest the prophets, and stonest them that are sent unto thee; how often would I have gathered thy children together, as a hen <span class="ital">doth gather</span> her brood under <span class="ital">her</span> wings, and ye would not</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2555"><span id="lf0610_label_3277">35</span> Behold, your house is left unto you desolate: and verily I say unto you, Ye shall not see me, until <span class="ital">the time</span> come when ye shall say, Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> he that cometh in the name of the Lord.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_075" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3278">14</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2556"><span id="lf0610_label_3279">1</span> And it came to pass, as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day, that they watched him.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>90<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2557"><span id="lf0610_label_3280">2</span> And, behold, there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2558"><span id="lf0610_label_3281">3</span> And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2559"><span id="lf0610_label_3282">4</span> And they held their peace. And he took <span class="ital">him,</span> and healed him, and let him go;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2560"><span id="lf0610_label_3283">5</span> And answered them, saying, Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit, and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2561"><span id="lf0610_label_3284">6</span> And they could not answer him again to these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2562"><span id="lf0610_label_3285">7</span> &#xB6; And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden, when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms; saying unto them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2563"><span id="lf0610_label_3286">8</span> When thou art bidden of any <span class="ital">man</span> to a wedding, sit not down in the highest room; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2564"><span id="lf0610_label_3287">9</span> And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee, Give this man place; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2565"><span id="lf0610_label_3288">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt787" id="lf0610_footnote_nt787_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But when thou art bidden, go and sit down in the lowest room; that when he that bade thee cometh, he may say unto thee, Friend, go up higher: then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2566"><span id="lf0610_label_3290">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt788" id="lf0610_footnote_nt788_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2567"><span id="lf0610_label_3292">12</span> &#xB6; Then said he also to him that bade him, When thou makest a dinner or a supper, call not thy friends, nor thy brethren, neither thy kinsmen, nor <span class="ital">thy</span> rich neighbours; lest they also bid thee again, and a recompence be made thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2568"><span id="lf0610_label_3293">13</span> But when thou makest a feast, call <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt789" id="lf0610_footnote_nt789_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the poor, the maimed, the lame, the blind:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2569"><span id="lf0610_label_3295">14</span> And thou shalt be blessed; for they cannot recompense thee: for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2570"><span id="lf0610_label_3296">15</span> &#xB6; And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things, he said unto him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt790" id="lf0610_footnote_nt790_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2571"><span id="lf0610_label_3298">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt791" id="lf0610_footnote_nt791_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then said he unto him, A certain man made a great supper, and bade many:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2572"><span id="lf0610_label_3300">17</span> And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden, Come; for all things are now ready.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2573"><span id="lf0610_label_3301">18</span> And they all with one <span class="ital">consent</span> began to make excuse. The first said unto him, I have bought a piece of ground, and I must needs go and see it: I pray thee have me excused.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2574"><span id="lf0610_label_3302">19</span> And another said, I have bought five yoke of oxen, and I go to prove them: I pray thee have me excused.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2575"><span id="lf0610_label_3303">20</span> And another said, I have married a wife, and therefore I cannot come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2576"><span id="lf0610_label_3304">21</span> So that servant came, and shewed his lord these things. Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant, Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city, and bring in hither the poor, and the maimed, and the halt, and the blind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2577"><span id="lf0610_label_3305">22</span> And the servant said, Lord, it is done as thou hast commanded, and yet there is room.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2578"><span id="lf0610_label_3306">23</span> And the lord said unto the servant, Go out into the highways and hedges, and compel <span class="ital">them</span> to come in, that my house may be filled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2579"><span id="lf0610_label_3307">24</span> For I say unto you, That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2580"><span id="lf0610_label_3308">25</span> &#xB6; And there went great multitudes with him: and he turned, and said unto them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2581"><span id="lf0610_label_3309">26</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt792" id="lf0610_footnote_nt792_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>If any <span class="ital">man</span> come to me, and hate not his father, and mother, and wife, and children, and brethren, and sisters, yea, and his own life also, he cannot be my disciple.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2582"><span id="lf0610_label_3311">27</span> And whosoever doth not bear his cross, and come after me, cannot be my disciple.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2583"><span id="lf0610_label_3312">28</span> For which of you, intending to build a tower, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>91<span class="bracket">]</span></span> sitteth not down first, and counteth the cost, whether he have <span class="ital">sufficient</span> to finish <span class="ital">it?</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2584"><span id="lf0610_label_3313">29</span> Lest haply, after he hath laid the foundation, and is not able to finish <span class="ital">it,</span> all that behold <span class="ital">it</span> begin to mock him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2585"><span id="lf0610_label_3314">30</span> Saying, This man began to build, and was not able to finish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2586"><span id="lf0610_label_3315">31</span> Or what king, going to make war against another king, sitteth not down first, and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2587"><span id="lf0610_label_3316">32</span> Or else, while the other is yet a great way off, he sendeth an ambassage, and desireth conditions of peace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2588"><span id="lf0610_label_3317">33</span> So likewise, whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath, he cannot be my disciple.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2589"><span id="lf0610_label_3318">34</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt793" id="lf0610_footnote_nt793_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Salt <span class="ital">is</span> good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2590"><span id="lf0610_label_3320">35</span> It is neither fit for the land, nor yet for the dunghill; <span class="ital">but</span> men cast it out. He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_076" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3321">15</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2591"><span id="lf0610_label_3322">1</span> Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2592"><span id="lf0610_label_3323">2</span> And the Pharisees and scribes murmured, saying, This man receiveth sinners, and eateth with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2593"><span id="lf0610_label_3324">3</span> &#xB6; And he spake this parable unto them, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2594"><span id="lf0610_label_3325">4</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt794" id="lf0610_footnote_nt794_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>What man of you, having an hundred sheep, if he lose one of them, doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness, and go after that which is lost, until he find it?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2595"><span id="lf0610_label_3327">5</span> And when he hath found <span class="ital">it,</span> he layeth <span class="ital">it</span> on his shoulders, rejoicing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2596"><span id="lf0610_label_3328">6</span> And when he cometh home, he calleth together <span class="ital">his</span> friends and neighbours, saying unto them, Rejoice with me; for I have found my sheep which was lost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2597"><span id="lf0610_label_3329">7</span> I say unto you, that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth, more than over ninety and nine just persons, which need no repentance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2598"><span id="lf0610_label_3330">8</span> &#xB6; Either what woman having ten <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt795" id="lf0610_footnote_nt795_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>pieces of silver, if she lose one piece, doth not light a candle, and sweep the house, and seek diligently till she find <span class="ital">it?</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2599"><span id="lf0610_label_3332">9</span> And when she hath found <span class="ital">it,</span> she calleth <span class="ital">her</span> friends and <span class="ital">her</span> neighbours together, saying, Rejoice with me; for I have found the piece which I had lost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2600"><span id="lf0610_label_3333">10</span> Likewise, I say unto you, there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2601"><span id="lf0610_label_3334">11</span> &#xB6; And he said, A certain man had two sons:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2602"><span id="lf0610_label_3335">12</span> And the younger of them said to <span class="ital">his</span> father, Father, give me the portion of goods that falleth <span class="ital">to me.</span> And he divided unto them <span class="ital">his</span> living.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2603"><span id="lf0610_label_3336">13</span> And not many days after the younger son gathered all together, and took his journey into a far country, and there wasted his substance with riotous living.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2604"><span id="lf0610_label_3337">14</span> And when he had spent all, there arose a mighty famine in that land; and he began to be in want.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2605"><span id="lf0610_label_3338">15</span> And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2606"><span id="lf0610_label_3339">16</span> And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat: and no man gave unto him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2607"><span id="lf0610_label_3340">17</span> And when he came to himself, he said, How many hired servants of my father&#x2019;s have bread enough and to spare, and I perish with hunger!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2608"><span id="lf0610_label_3341">18</span> I will arise and go to my father, and will say unto him, Father, I have sinned against heaven, and before thee,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2609"><span id="lf0610_label_3342">19</span> And am no more worthy to be called thy son: make me as one of thy hired servants.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2610"><span id="lf0610_label_3343">20</span> And he arose, and came to his father. But when he was yet a great way off, his father saw him, and had compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>92<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2611"><span id="lf0610_label_3344">21</span> And the son said unto him, Father, I have sinned against heaven, and in thy sight, and am no more worthy to be called thy son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2612"><span id="lf0610_label_3345">22</span> But the father said to his servants, Bring forth the best robe, and put <span class="ital">it</span> on him; and put a ring on his hand, and shoes on <span class="ital">his</span> feet:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2613"><span id="lf0610_label_3346">23</span> And bring hither the fatted calf, and kill <span class="ital">it;</span> and let us eat, and be merry:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2614"><span id="lf0610_label_3347">24</span> For this my son was dead, and is alive again; he was lost, and is found. And they began to be merry.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2615"><span id="lf0610_label_3348">25</span> Now his elder son was in the field: and as he came and drew nigh to the house, he heard musick and dancing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2616"><span id="lf0610_label_3349">26</span> And he called one of the servants, and asked what these things meant.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2617"><span id="lf0610_label_3350">27</span> And he said unto him, Thy brother is come; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf, because he hath received him safe and sound.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2618"><span id="lf0610_label_3351">28</span> And he was angry, and would not go in: therefore came his father out, and intreated him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2619"><span id="lf0610_label_3352">29</span> And he answering said to <span class="ital">his</span> father, Lo, these many years do I serve thee, neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment: and yet thou never gavest me a kid, that I might make merry with my friends:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2620"><span id="lf0610_label_3353">30</span> But as soon as this thy son was come, which hath devoured thy living with harlots, thou hast killed for him the fatted calf.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2621"><span id="lf0610_label_3354">31</span> And he said unto him, Son, thou art ever with me, and all that I have is thine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2622"><span id="lf0610_label_3355">32</span> It was meet that we should make merry, and be glad: for this thy brother was dead, and is alive again; and was lost, and is found.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_077" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3356">16</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2623"><span id="lf0610_label_3357">1</span> And he said also unto his disciples, There was a certain rich man, which had a steward; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2624"><span id="lf0610_label_3358">2</span> And he called him, and said unto him, How is it that I hear this of thee? give an account of thy stewardship; for thou mayest be no longer steward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2625"><span id="lf0610_label_3359">3</span> Then the steward said within himself, What shall I do? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship: I cannot dig; to beg I am ashamed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2626"><span id="lf0610_label_3360">4</span> I am resolved what to do, that, when I am put out of the stewardship, they may receive me into their houses.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2627"><span id="lf0610_label_3361">5</span> So he called every one of his lord&#x2019;s debtors <span class="ital">unto him,</span> and said unto the first, How much owest thou unto my lord?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2628"><span id="lf0610_label_3362">6</span> And he said, An hundred <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt796" id="lf0610_footnote_nt796_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>measures of oil. And he said unto him, Take thy bill, and sit down quickly, and write fifty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2629"><span id="lf0610_label_3364">7</span> Then said he to another, And how much owest thou? And he said, An hundred <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt797" id="lf0610_footnote_nt797_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>measures of wheat. And he said unto him, Take thy bill, and write fourscore.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2630"><span id="lf0610_label_3366">8</span> And the lord commended the unjust steward, because he had done wisely: for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2631"><span id="lf0610_label_3367">9</span> And I say unto you, Make to yourselves friends of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt798" id="lf0610_footnote_nt798_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>mammon of unrighteousness; that, when ye fail, they may receive you into everlasting habitations.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2632"><span id="lf0610_label_3369">10</span> He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much: and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2633"><span id="lf0610_label_3370">11</span> If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt799" id="lf0610_footnote_nt799_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>mammon, who will commit to your trust the true <span class="ital">riches?</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2634"><span id="lf0610_label_3372">12</span> And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man&#x2019;s, who shall give you that which is your own?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2635"><span id="lf0610_label_3373">13</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt800" id="lf0610_footnote_nt800_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>No servant can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>93<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2636"><span id="lf0610_label_3375">14</span> And the Pharisees also, who were covetous, heard all these things: and they derided him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2637"><span id="lf0610_label_3376">15</span> And he said unto them, Ye are they which justify yourselves before men; but God knoweth your hearts: for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2638"><span id="lf0610_label_3377">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt801" id="lf0610_footnote_nt801_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The law and the prophets <span class="ital">were</span> until John: since that time the kingdom of God is preached, and every man presseth into it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2639"><span id="lf0610_label_3379">17</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt802" id="lf0610_footnote_nt802_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass, than one tittle of the law to fail.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2640"><span id="lf0610_label_3381">18</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt803" id="lf0610_footnote_nt803_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Whosoever putteth away his wife, and marrieth another, committeth adultery: and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from <span class="ital">her</span> husband committeth adultery.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2641"><span id="lf0610_label_3383">19</span> &#xB6; There was a certain rich man, which was clothed in purple and fine linen, and fared sumptuously every day:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2642"><span id="lf0610_label_3384">20</span> And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus, which was laid at his gate, full of sores.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2643"><span id="lf0610_label_3385">21</span> And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man&#x2019;s table: moreover the dogs came and licked his sores.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2644"><span id="lf0610_label_3386">22</span> And it came to pass, that the beggar died, and was carried by the angels into Abraham&#x2019;s bosom: the rich man also died, and was buried;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2645"><span id="lf0610_label_3387">23</span> And in hell he lift up his eyes, being in torments, and seeth Abraham afar off, and Lazarus in his bosom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2646"><span id="lf0610_label_3388">24</span> And he cried and said, Father Abraham, have mercy on me, and send Lazarus, that he may dip the tip of his finger in water, and cool my tongue; for I am tormented in this flame.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2647"><span id="lf0610_label_3389">25</span> But Abraham said, Son, remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things, and likewise Lazarus evil things: but now he is comforted, and thou art tormented.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2648"><span id="lf0610_label_3390">26</span> And beside all this, between us and you there is a great gulf fixed: so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot; neither can they pass to us, that <span class="ital">would come</span> from thence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2649"><span id="lf0610_label_3391">27</span> Then he said, I pray thee therefore, father, that thou wouldest send him to my father&#x2019;s house:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2650"><span id="lf0610_label_3392">28</span> For I have five brethren; that he may testify unto them, lest they also come into this place of torment.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2651"><span id="lf0610_label_3393">29</span> Abraham saith unto him, They have Moses and the prophets; let them hear them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2652"><span id="lf0610_label_3394">30</span> And he said, Nay, father Abraham: but if one went unto them from the dead, they will repent.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2653"><span id="lf0610_label_3395">31</span> And he said unto him, If they hear not Moses and the prophets, neither will they be persuaded, though one rose from the dead.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_078" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3396">17</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2654"><span id="lf0610_label_3397">1</span> Then said he unto the disciples, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt804" id="lf0610_footnote_nt804_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>It is impossible but that offences will come: but woe <span class="ital">unto him,</span> through whom they come!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2655"><span id="lf0610_label_3399">2</span> It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and he cast into the sea, than that he should offend one of these little ones.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2656"><span id="lf0610_label_3400">3</span> &#xB6; Take heed to yourselves: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt805" id="lf0610_footnote_nt805_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>If thy brother trespass against thee, rebuke him; and if he repent, forgive him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2657"><span id="lf0610_label_3402">4</span> And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day, and seven times in a day turn again to thee, saying, I repent; thou shalt forgive him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2658"><span id="lf0610_label_3403">5</span> And the apostles said unto the Lord, Increase our faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2659"><span id="lf0610_label_3404">6</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt806" id="lf0610_footnote_nt806_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the Lord said, If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye might say unto this sycamine tree, Be thou plucked up by the root, and be thou planted in the sea; and it should obey you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2660"><span id="lf0610_label_3406">7</span> But which of you, having a servant plowing or feeding cattle, will say unto him by and by, when he is come from the field, Go and sit down to meat?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2661"><span id="lf0610_label_3407">8</span> And will not rather say unto him, Make ready wherewith I may sup, and gird thyself, and serve me, till I have eaten and drunken; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2662"><span id="lf0610_label_3408">9</span> Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him? I trow not.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>94<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2663"><span id="lf0610_label_3409">10</span> So likewise ye, when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you, say, We are unprofitable servants: we have done that which was our duty to do.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2664"><span id="lf0610_label_3410">11</span> &#xB6; And it came to pass, as he went to Jerusalem, that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2665"><span id="lf0610_label_3411">12</span> And as he entered into a certain village, there met him ten men that were lepers, which stood afar off:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2666"><span id="lf0610_label_3412">13</span> And they lifted up <span class="ital">their</span> voices, and said, Jesus, Master, have mercy on us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2667"><span id="lf0610_label_3413">14</span> And when he saw <span class="ital">them,</span> he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt807" id="lf0610_footnote_nt807_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Go shew yourselves unto the priests. And it came to pass, that, as they went, they were cleansed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2668"><span id="lf0610_label_3415">15</span> And one of them, when he saw that he was healed, turned back, and with a loud voice glorified God,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2669"><span id="lf0610_label_3416">16</span> And fell down on <span class="ital">his</span> face at his feet, giving him thanks: and he was a Samaritan.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2670"><span id="lf0610_label_3417">17</span> And Jesus answering said, Were there not ten cleansed? but where <span class="ital">are</span> the nine?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2671"><span id="lf0610_label_3418">18</span> There are not found that returned to give glory to God, save this stranger.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2672"><span id="lf0610_label_3419">19</span> And he said unto him, Arise, go thy way: thy faith hath made thee whole.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2673"><span id="lf0610_label_3420">20</span> &#xB6; And when he was demanded of the Pharisees, when the kingdom of God should come, he answered them and said, The kingdom of God cometh not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt808" id="lf0610_footnote_nt808_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>with observation:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2674"><span id="lf0610_label_3422">21</span> Neither shall they say, Lo here! or, lo there! for, behold, the kingdom of God is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt809" id="lf0610_footnote_nt809_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>within you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2675"><span id="lf0610_label_3424">22</span> And he said unto the disciples, The days will come, when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man, and ye shall not see <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2676"><span id="lf0610_label_3425">23</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt810" id="lf0610_footnote_nt810_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And they shall say to you, See here; or, see there: go not after <span class="ital">them,</span> nor follow <span class="ital">them.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2677"><span id="lf0610_label_3427">24</span> For as the lightning, that lighteneth out of the one <span class="ital">part</span> under heaven, shineth unto the other <span class="ital">part</span> under heaven; so shall also the Son of man be in his day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2678"><span id="lf0610_label_3428">25</span> But first must he suffer many things, and be rejected of this generation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2679"><span id="lf0610_label_3429">26</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt811" id="lf0610_footnote_nt811_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as it was in the days of Noe, so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2680"><span id="lf0610_label_3431">27</span> They did eat, they drank, they married wives, they were given in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark, and the flood came, and destroyed them all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2681"><span id="lf0610_label_3432">28</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt812" id="lf0610_footnote_nt812_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot; they did eat, they drank, they bought, they sold, they planted, they builded;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2682"><span id="lf0610_label_3434">29</span> But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven, and destroyed <span class="ital">them</span> all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2683"><span id="lf0610_label_3435">30</span> Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2684"><span id="lf0610_label_3436">31</span> In that day, he which shall be upon the housetop, and his stuff in the house, let him not come down to take it away: and he that is in the field, let him likewise not return back.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2685"><span id="lf0610_label_3437">32</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt813" id="lf0610_footnote_nt813_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Remember Lot&#x2019;s wife.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2686"><span id="lf0610_label_3439">33</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt814" id="lf0610_footnote_nt814_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2687"><span id="lf0610_label_3441">34</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt815" id="lf0610_footnote_nt815_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I tell you, in that night there shall be two <span class="ital">men</span> in one bed; the one shall be taken, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt816" id="lf0610_footnote_nt816_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>and the other shall be left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2688"><span id="lf0610_label_3444">35</span> Two <span class="ital">women</span> shall be grinding together; the one shall be taken, and the other left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2689"><span id="lf0610_label_3445">36</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt817" id="lf0610_footnote_nt817_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Two <span class="ital">men</span> shall be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2690"><span id="lf0610_label_3447">37</span> And they answered and said unto him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt818" id="lf0610_footnote_nt818_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Where, Lord? And he said unto them, Wheresoever the body <span class="ital">is,</span> thither will the eagles be gathered together.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_079" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3449">18</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2691"><span id="lf0610_label_3450">1</span> And he spake a parable unto them <span class="ital">to this end,</span> that men ought <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt819" id="lf0610_footnote_nt819_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>always to pray, and not to faint;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2692"><span id="lf0610_label_3452">2</span> Saying, There was in a city a judge, which feared not God, neither regarded man:</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>95<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2693"><span id="lf0610_label_3453">3</span> And there was a widow in that city; and she came unto him, saying, Avenge me of mine adversary.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2694"><span id="lf0610_label_3454">4</span> And he would not for a while: but afterward he said within himself, Though I fear not God, nor regard man;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2695"><span id="lf0610_label_3455">5</span> Yet because this widow troubleth me, I will avenge her, lest by her continual coming she weary me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2696"><span id="lf0610_label_3456">6</span> And the Lord said, Hear what the unjust judge saith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2697"><span id="lf0610_label_3457">7</span> And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2698"><span id="lf0610_label_3458">8</span> I tell you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2699"><span id="lf0610_label_3459">9</span> And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt820" id="lf0610_footnote_nt820_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>that they were righteous, and despised others:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2700"><span id="lf0610_label_3461">10</span> Two men went up into the temple to pray; the one a Pharisee, and the other a publican.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2701"><span id="lf0610_label_3462">11</span> The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself, God, I thank thee, that I am not as other men <span class="ital">are,</span> extortioners, unjust, adulterers, or even as this publican.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2702"><span id="lf0610_label_3463">12</span> I fast twice in the week, I give tithes of all that I possess.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2703"><span id="lf0610_label_3464">13</span> And the publican, standing afar off, would not lift up so much as <span class="ital">his</span> eyes unto heaven, but smote upon his breast, saying, God be merciful to me a sinner.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2704"><span id="lf0610_label_3465">14</span> I tell you, this man went down to his house justified <span class="ital">rather</span> than the other: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt821" id="lf0610_footnote_nt821_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2705"><span id="lf0610_label_3467">15</span> And they brought unto him also infants, that he would touch them: but when <span class="ital">his</span> disciples saw <span class="ital">it,</span> they rebuked them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2706"><span id="lf0610_label_3468">16</span> But Jesus called them <span class="ital">unto him,</span> and said, Suffer little children to come unto me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2707"><span id="lf0610_label_3469">17</span> Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2708"><span id="lf0610_label_3470">18</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt822" id="lf0610_footnote_nt822_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And a certain ruler asked him, saying, Good Master, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2709"><span id="lf0610_label_3472">19</span> And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? none <span class="ital">is</span> good, save one, <span class="ital">that is,</span> God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2710"><span id="lf0610_label_3473">20</span> Thou knowest the commandments, Do not commit adultery, Do not kill, Do not steal, Do not bear false witness, Honour thy father and thy mother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2711"><span id="lf0610_label_3474">21</span> And he said, All these have I kept from my youth up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2712"><span id="lf0610_label_3475">22</span> Now when Jesus heard these things, he said unto him, Yet lackest thou one thing: sell all that thou hast, and distribute unto the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come, follow me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2713"><span id="lf0610_label_3476">23</span> And when he heard this, he was very sorrowful: for he was very rich.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2714"><span id="lf0610_label_3477">24</span> And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful, he said, How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2715"><span id="lf0610_label_3478">25</span> For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle&#x2019;s eye, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2716"><span id="lf0610_label_3479">26</span> And they that heard <span class="ital">it</span> said, Who then can be saved?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2717"><span id="lf0610_label_3480">27</span> And he said, The things which are impossible with men are possible with God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2718"><span id="lf0610_label_3481">28</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt823" id="lf0610_footnote_nt823_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then Peter said, Lo, we have left all, and followed thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2719"><span id="lf0610_label_3483">29</span> And he said unto them, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or parents, or brethren, or wife, or children, for the kingdom of God&#x2019;s sake,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2720"><span id="lf0610_label_3484">30</span> Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time, and in the world to come life everlasting.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2721"><span id="lf0610_label_3485">31</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt824" id="lf0610_footnote_nt824_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then he took <span class="ital">unto him</span> the twelve, and said unto them, Behold, we go up to Jerusalem, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>96<span class="bracket">]</span></span> and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2722"><span id="lf0610_label_3487">32</span> For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles, and shall be mocked, and spitefully entreated, and spitted on:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2723"><span id="lf0610_label_3488">33</span> And they shall scourge <span class="ital">him,</span> and put him to death: and the third day he shall rise again.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2724"><span id="lf0610_label_3489">34</span> And they understood none of these things: and this saying was hid from them, neither knew they the things which were spoken.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2725"><span id="lf0610_label_3490">35</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt825" id="lf0610_footnote_nt825_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And it came to pass, that as he was come nigh unto Jericho, a certain blind man sat by the way side begging:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2726"><span id="lf0610_label_3492">36</span> And hearing the multitude pass by, he asked what it meant.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2727"><span id="lf0610_label_3493">37</span> And they told him, that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2728"><span id="lf0610_label_3494">38</span> And he cried, saying, Jesus, <span class="ital">thou</span> son of David, have mercy on me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2729"><span id="lf0610_label_3495">39</span> And they which went before rebuked him, that he should hold his peace: but he cried so much the more, <span class="ital">Thou</span> son of David, have mercy on me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2730"><span id="lf0610_label_3496">40</span> And Jesus stood, and commanded him to be brought unto him: and when he was come near, he asked him,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2731"><span id="lf0610_label_3497">41</span> Saying, What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee? And he said, Lord, that I may receive my sight.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2732"><span id="lf0610_label_3498">42</span> And Jesus said unto him, Receive thy sight: thy faith hath saved thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2733"><span id="lf0610_label_3499">43</span> And immediately he received his sight, and followed him, glorifying God: and all the people, when they saw <span class="ital">it,</span> gave praise unto God.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_080" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3500">19</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2734"><span id="lf0610_label_3501">1</span> And <span class="ital">Jesus</span> entered and passed through Jericho.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2735"><span id="lf0610_label_3502">2</span> And, behold, <span class="ital">there was</span> a man named Zacch&#xE6;us, which was the chief among the publicans, and he was rich.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2736"><span id="lf0610_label_3503">3</span> And he sought to see Jesus who he was; and could not for the press, because he was little of stature.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2737"><span id="lf0610_label_3504">4</span> And he ran before, and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him: for he was to pass that <span class="ital">way.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2738"><span id="lf0610_label_3505">5</span> And when Jesus came to the place, he looked up, and saw him, and said unto him, Zacch&#xE6;us, make haste, and come down; for to day I must abide at thy house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2739"><span id="lf0610_label_3506">6</span> And he made haste, and came down, and received him joyfully.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2740"><span id="lf0610_label_3507">7</span> And when they saw <span class="ital">it,</span> they all murmured, saying, That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2741"><span id="lf0610_label_3508">8</span> And Zacch&#xE6;us stood, and said unto the Lord; Behold, Lord, the half of my goods I give to the poor; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation, I restore <span class="ital">him</span> fourfold.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2742"><span id="lf0610_label_3509">9</span> And Jesus said unto him, This day is salvation come to this house, forsomuch as he also is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt826" id="lf0610_footnote_nt826_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>a son of Abraham.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2743"><span id="lf0610_label_3511">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt827" id="lf0610_footnote_nt827_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2744"><span id="lf0610_label_3513">11</span> And as they heard these things, he added and spake a parable, because he was nigh to Jerusalem, and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2745"><span id="lf0610_label_3514">12</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt828" id="lf0610_footnote_nt828_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He said therefore, A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom, and to return.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2746"><span id="lf0610_label_3516">13</span> And he called his ten servants, and delivered them ten <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt829" id="lf0610_footnote_nt829_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>pounds, and said unto them, Occupy till I come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2747"><span id="lf0610_label_3518">14</span> But his citizens hated him, and sent a message after him, saying, We will not have this <span class="ital">man</span> to reign over us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2748"><span id="lf0610_label_3519">15</span> And it came to pass, that when he was returned, having received the kingdom, then he commanded these servants to be called unto him, to whom he had given the money, that he might know how much every man had gained by trading.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2749"><span id="lf0610_label_3520">16</span> Then came the first, saying, Lord, thy pound hath gained ten pounds.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>97<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2750"><span id="lf0610_label_3521">17</span> And he said unto him, Well, thou good servant: because thou hast been faithful in a very little, have thou authority over ten cities.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2751"><span id="lf0610_label_3522">18</span> And the second came, saying, Lord, thy pound hath gained five pounds.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2752"><span id="lf0610_label_3523">19</span> And he said likewise to him, Be thou also over five cities.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2753"><span id="lf0610_label_3524">20</span> And another came, saying, Lord, behold, <span class="ital">here is</span> thy pound, which I have kept laid up in a napkin:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2754"><span id="lf0610_label_3525">21</span> For I feared thee, because thou art an austere <span class="ital">man:</span> thou takest up that thou layedst not down, and reapest that thou didst not sow.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2755"><span id="lf0610_label_3526">22</span> And he saith unto him, Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee, <span class="ital">thou</span> wicked servant. Thou knewest that I was an austere man, taking up that I laid not down, and reaping that I did not sow:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2756"><span id="lf0610_label_3527">23</span> Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank, that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2757"><span id="lf0610_label_3528">24</span> And he said unto them that stood by, Take from him the pound, and give <span class="ital">it</span> to him that hath ten pounds.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2758"><span id="lf0610_label_3529">25</span> (And they said unto him, Lord, he hath ten pounds.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2759"><span id="lf0610_label_3530">26</span> For I say unto you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt830" id="lf0610_footnote_nt830_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>That unto every one which hath shall be given; and from him that hath not, even that he hath shall be taken away from him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2760"><span id="lf0610_label_3532">27</span> But those mine enemies, which would not that I should reign over them, bring hither, and slay <span class="ital">them</span> before me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2761"><span id="lf0610_label_3533">28</span> &#xB6; And when he had thus spoken, he went before, ascending up to Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2762"><span id="lf0610_label_3534">29</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt831" id="lf0610_footnote_nt831_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And it came to pass, when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount called <span class="ital">the mount</span> of Olives, he sent two of his disciples,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2763"><span id="lf0610_label_3536">30</span> Saying, Go ye into the village over against <span class="ital">you;</span> in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied, whereon yet never man sat: loose him, and bring <span class="ital">him hither.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2764"><span id="lf0610_label_3537">31</span> And if any man ask you, Why do ye loose <span class="ital">him?</span> thus shall ye say unto him, Because the Lord hath need of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2765"><span id="lf0610_label_3538">32</span> And they that were sent went their way, and found even as he had said unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2766"><span id="lf0610_label_3539">33</span> And as they were loosing the colt, the owners thereof said unto them, Why loose ye the colt?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2767"><span id="lf0610_label_3540">34</span> And they said, The Lord hath need of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2768"><span id="lf0610_label_3541">35</span> And they brought him to Jesus: and they cast their garments upon the colt, and they set Jesus thereon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2769"><span id="lf0610_label_3542">36</span> And as he went, they spread their clothes in the way.</p>
