<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2770"><span id="lf0610_label_3543">37</span> And when he was come nigh, even now at the descent of the mount of Olives, the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2771"><span id="lf0610_label_3544">38</span> Saying, Blessed <span class="ital">be</span> the King that cometh in the name of the Lord: peace in heaven, and glory in the highest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2772"><span id="lf0610_label_3545">39</span> And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him, Master, rebuke thy disciples.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2773"><span id="lf0610_label_3546">40</span> And he answered and said unto them, I tell you that, if these should hold their peace, the stones would immediately cry out.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2774"><span id="lf0610_label_3547">41</span> &#xB6; And when he was come near, he beheld the city, and wept over it,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2775"><span id="lf0610_label_3548">42</span> Saying, If thou hadst known, even thou, at least in this thy day, the things <span class="ital">which belong</span> unto thy peace! but now they are hid from thine eyes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2776"><span id="lf0610_label_3549">43</span> For the days shall come upon thee, that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee, and compass thee round, and keep thee in on every side,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2777"><span id="lf0610_label_3550">44</span> And shall lay thee even with the ground, and thy children within thee; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2778"><span id="lf0610_label_3551">45</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt832" id="lf0610_footnote_nt832_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he went into the temple, and began to <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>98<span class="bracket">]</span></span> <span id="lf0610_label_3553">46</span> cast out them that sold therein, and them that bought;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2779"><span id="lf0610_label_3554">46</span> Saying unto them, It is written, My house is the house of prayer: but ye have made it a den of thieves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2780"><span id="lf0610_label_3555">47</span> And he taught daily in the temple. But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2781"><span id="lf0610_label_3556">48</span> And could not find what they might do: for all the people <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt833" id="lf0610_footnote_nt833_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>were very attentive to hear him.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_081" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3558">20</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2782"><span id="lf0610_label_3559">1</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt834" id="lf0610_footnote_nt834_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>it came to pass, <span class="ital">that</span> on one of those days, as he taught the people in the temple, and preached the gospel, the chief priests and the scribes came upon <span class="ital">him</span> with the elders,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2783"><span id="lf0610_label_3561">2</span> And spake unto him, saying, Tell us, by what authority doest thou these things? or who is he that gave thee this authority?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2784"><span id="lf0610_label_3562">3</span> And he answered and said unto them, I will also ask you one thing; and answer me:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2785"><span id="lf0610_label_3563">4</span> The baptism of John, was it from heaven, or of men?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2786"><span id="lf0610_label_3564">5</span> And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then believed ye him not?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2787"><span id="lf0610_label_3565">6</span> But and if we say, Of men; all the people will stone us: for they be persuaded that John was a prophet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2788"><span id="lf0610_label_3566">7</span> And they answered, that they could not tell whence <span class="ital">it was.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2789"><span id="lf0610_label_3567">8</span> And Jesus said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2790"><span id="lf0610_label_3568">9</span> Then began he to speak to the people this parable; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt835" id="lf0610_footnote_nt835_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>A certain man planted a vineyard, and let it forth to husbandmen, and went into a far country for a long time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2791"><span id="lf0610_label_3570">10</span> And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen, that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard: but the husbandmen beat him, and sent <span class="ital">him</span> away empty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2792"><span id="lf0610_label_3571">11</span> And again he sent another servant: and they beat him also, and entreated <span class="ital">him</span> shamefully, and sent <span class="ital">him</span> away empty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2793"><span id="lf0610_label_3572">12</span> And again he sent <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt836" id="lf0610_footnote_nt836_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>a third: and they wounded him also, and cast <span class="ital">him</span> out.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2794"><span id="lf0610_label_3574">13</span> Then said the lord of the vineyard, What shall I do? I will send my beloved son: it may be they will reverence <span class="ital">him</span> when they see him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2795"><span id="lf0610_label_3575">14</span> But when the husbandmen saw him, they reasoned among themselves, saying, This is the heir: come, let us kill him, that the inheritance may be ours.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2796"><span id="lf0610_label_3576">15</span> So they cast him out of the vineyard, and killed <span class="ital">him.</span> What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2797"><span id="lf0610_label_3577">16</span> He shall come and destroy these husbandmen, and shall give the vineyard to others. And when they heard <span class="ital">it,</span> they said, God forbid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2798"><span id="lf0610_label_3578">17</span> And he beheld them, and said, What is this then that is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt837" id="lf0610_footnote_nt837_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2799"><span id="lf0610_label_3580">18</span> Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken; but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2800"><span id="lf0610_label_3581">19</span> &#xB6; And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him; and they feared the people: for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2801"><span id="lf0610_label_3582">20</span> And they watched <span class="ital">him,</span> and sent forth spies, which should feign themselves just men, that they might take hold of his words, that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2802"><span id="lf0610_label_3583">21</span> And they asked him, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt838" id="lf0610_footnote_nt838_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Master, we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly, neither acceptest thou the person <span class="ital">of any,</span> but teachest the way of God <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt839" id="lf0610_footnote_nt839_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>truly:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2803"><span id="lf0610_label_3586">22</span> Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto C&#xE6;sar, or no?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2804"><span id="lf0610_label_3587">23</span> But he perceived their craftiness, and said unto them, Why tempt ye me?</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>99<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2805"><span id="lf0610_label_3588">24</span> Shew me a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt840" id="lf0610_footnote_nt840_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>penny. Whose image and superscription hath it? They answered and said, C&#xE6;sar&#x2019;s.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2806"><span id="lf0610_label_3590">25</span> And he said unto them, Render therefore unto C&#xE6;sar the things which be C&#xE6;sar&#x2019;s, and unto God the things which be God&#x2019;s.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2807"><span id="lf0610_label_3591">26</span> And they could not take hold of his words before the people: and they marvelled at his answer, and held their peace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2808"><span id="lf0610_label_3592">27</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt841" id="lf0610_footnote_nt841_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then came to <span class="ital">him</span> certain of the Sadducees, which deny that there is any resurrection; and they asked him,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2809"><span id="lf0610_label_3594">28</span> Saying, Master, Moses wrote unto us, If any man&#x2019;s brother die, having a wife, and he die without children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2810"><span id="lf0610_label_3595">29</span> There were therefore seven brethren: and the first took a wife, and died without children.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2811"><span id="lf0610_label_3596">30</span> And the second took her to wife, and he died childless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2812"><span id="lf0610_label_3597">31</span> And the third took her; and in like manner the seven also: and they left no children, and died.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2813"><span id="lf0610_label_3598">32</span> Last of all the woman died also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2814"><span id="lf0610_label_3599">33</span> Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she? for seven had her to wife.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2815"><span id="lf0610_label_3600">34</span> And Jesus answering said unto them, The children of this world marry, and are given in marriage:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2816"><span id="lf0610_label_3601">35</span> But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world, and the resurrection from the dead, neither marry, nor are given in marriage:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2817"><span id="lf0610_label_3602">36</span> Neither can they die any more: for they are equal unto the angels; and are the children of God, being the children of the resurrection.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2818"><span id="lf0610_label_3603">37</span> Now that the dead are raised, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt842" id="lf0610_footnote_nt842_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>even Moses shewed at the bush, when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2819"><span id="lf0610_label_3605">38</span> For he is not a God of the dead, but of the living: for all live unto him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2820"><span id="lf0610_label_3606">39</span> &#xB6; Then certain of the scribes answering said, Master, thou hast well said.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2821"><span id="lf0610_label_3607">40</span> And after that they durst not ask him any <span class="ital">question at all.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2822"><span id="lf0610_label_3608">41</span> And he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt843" id="lf0610_footnote_nt843_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>How say they that Christ is David&#x2019;s son?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2823"><span id="lf0610_label_3610">42</span> And David himself saith in the book of Psalms, The <span class="csc">Lord</span> said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2824"><span id="lf0610_label_3611">43</span> Till I make thine enemies thy footstool.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2825"><span id="lf0610_label_3612">44</span> David therefore calleth him Lord, how is he then his son?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2826"><span id="lf0610_label_3613">45</span> &#xB6; Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2827"><span id="lf0610_label_3614">46</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt844" id="lf0610_footnote_nt844_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Beware of the scribes, which desire to walk in long robes, and love greetings in the markets, and the highest seats in the synagogues, and the chief rooms at feasts;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2828"><span id="lf0610_label_3616">47</span> Which devour widows&#x2019; houses, and for a shew make long prayers: the same shall receive greater damnation.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_082" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3617">21</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2829"><span id="lf0610_label_3618">1</span> And he looked up, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt845" id="lf0610_footnote_nt845_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2830"><span id="lf0610_label_3620">2</span> And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt846" id="lf0610_footnote_nt846_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>mites.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2831"><span id="lf0610_label_3622">3</span> And he said, Of a truth I say unto you, that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2832"><span id="lf0610_label_3623">4</span> For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God: but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2833"><span id="lf0610_label_3624">5</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt847" id="lf0610_footnote_nt847_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as some spake of the temple, how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts, he said,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2834"><span id="lf0610_label_3626">6</span> <span class="ital">As for</span> these things which ye behold, the days will come, in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2835"><span id="lf0610_label_3627">7</span> And they asked him, saying, Master, but when shall these things be? and what sign <span class="ital">will there be</span> when these things shall come to pass?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2836"><span id="lf0610_label_3628">8</span> And he said, Take heed that ye be not deceived: for many shall come in my name, saying, I <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>100<span class="bracket">]</span></span> am <span class="ital">Christ;</span> and the time draweth near: go ye not therefore after them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2837"><span id="lf0610_label_3629">9</span> But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions, be not terrified: for these things must first come to pass; but the end <span class="ital">is</span> not by and by.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2838"><span id="lf0610_label_3630">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt848" id="lf0610_footnote_nt848_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then said he unto them, Nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2839"><span id="lf0610_label_3632">11</span> And great earthquakes shall be in divers places, and famines, and pestilences; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2840"><span id="lf0610_label_3633">12</span> But before all these, they shall lay their hands on you, and persecute <span class="ital">you,</span> delivering <span class="ital">you</span> up to the synagogues, and into prisons, being brought before kings and rulers for my name&#x2019;s sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2841"><span id="lf0610_label_3634">13</span> And it shall turn to you for a testimony.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2842"><span id="lf0610_label_3635">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt849" id="lf0610_footnote_nt849_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Settle <span class="ital">it</span> therefore in your hearts, not to meditate before what ye shall answer:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2843"><span id="lf0610_label_3637">15</span> For I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2844"><span id="lf0610_label_3638">16</span> And ye shall be betrayed both by parents, and brethren, and kinsfolks, and friends; and <span class="ital">some</span> of you shall they cause to be put to death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2845"><span id="lf0610_label_3639">17</span> And ye shall be hated of all <span class="ital">men</span> for my name&#x2019;s sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2846"><span id="lf0610_label_3640">18</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt850" id="lf0610_footnote_nt850_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But there shall not an hair of your head perish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2847"><span id="lf0610_label_3642">19</span> In your patience possess ye your souls.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2848"><span id="lf0610_label_3643">20</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt851" id="lf0610_footnote_nt851_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies, then know that the desolation thereof is nigh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2849"><span id="lf0610_label_3645">21</span> Then let them which are in Jud&#xE6;a flee to the mountains; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out: and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2850"><span id="lf0610_label_3646">22</span> For these be the days of vengeance, that all things which are written may be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2851"><span id="lf0610_label_3647">23</span> But woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck, in those days! for there shall be great distress in the land, and wrath upon this people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2852"><span id="lf0610_label_3648">24</span> And they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations: and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2853"><span id="lf0610_label_3649">25</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt852" id="lf0610_footnote_nt852_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And there shall be signs in the sun, and in the moon, and in the stars; and upon the earth distress of nations, with perplexity; the sea and the waves roaring;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2854"><span id="lf0610_label_3651">26</span> Men&#x2019;s hearts failing them for fear, and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth: for the powers of heaven shall be shaken.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2855"><span id="lf0610_label_3652">27</span> And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2856"><span id="lf0610_label_3653">28</span> And when these things begin to come to pass, then look up, and lift up your heads; for your redemption draweth nigh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2857"><span id="lf0610_label_3654">29</span> And he spake to them a parable; Behold the fig tree, and all the trees;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2858"><span id="lf0610_label_3655">30</span> When they now shoot forth, ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2859"><span id="lf0610_label_3656">31</span> So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2860"><span id="lf0610_label_3657">32</span> Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass away, till all be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2861"><span id="lf0610_label_3658">33</span> Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2862"><span id="lf0610_label_3659">34</span> &#xB6; And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and <span class="ital">so</span> that day come upon you unawares.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2863"><span id="lf0610_label_3660">35</span> For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2864"><span id="lf0610_label_3661">36</span> Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2865"><span id="lf0610_label_3662">37</span> And in the day time he was teaching in the <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>101<span class="bracket">]</span></span> temple; and at night he went out, and abode in the mount that is called <span class="ital">the mount</span> of Olives.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2866"><span id="lf0610_label_3663">38</span> And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple, for to hear him.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_083" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3664">22</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2867"><span id="lf0610_label_3665">1</span> Now <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt853" id="lf0610_footnote_nt853_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh, which is called the Passover.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2868"><span id="lf0610_label_3667">2</span> And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him; for they feared the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2869"><span id="lf0610_label_3668">3</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt854" id="lf0610_footnote_nt854_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot, being of the number of the twelve.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2870"><span id="lf0610_label_3670">4</span> And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2871"><span id="lf0610_label_3671">5</span> And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2872"><span id="lf0610_label_3672">6</span> And he promised, and sought opportunity to betray him unto them <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt855" id="lf0610_footnote_nt855_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in the absence of the multitude.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2873"><span id="lf0610_label_3674">7</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt856" id="lf0610_footnote_nt856_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then came the day of unleavened bread, when the passover must be killed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2874"><span id="lf0610_label_3676">8</span> And he sent Peter and John, saying, Go and prepare us the passover, that we may eat.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2875"><span id="lf0610_label_3677">9</span> And they said unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2876"><span id="lf0610_label_3678">10</span> And he said unto them, Behold, when ye are entered into the city, there shall a man meet you, bearing a pitcher of water; follow him into the house where he entereth in.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2877"><span id="lf0610_label_3679">11</span> And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house, The Master saith unto thee, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2878"><span id="lf0610_label_3680">12</span> And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished: there make ready.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2879"><span id="lf0610_label_3681">13</span> And they went, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2880"><span id="lf0610_label_3682">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt857" id="lf0610_footnote_nt857_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when the hour was come, he sat down, and the twelve apostles with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2881"><span id="lf0610_label_3684">15</span> And he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt858" id="lf0610_footnote_nt858_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2882"><span id="lf0610_label_3686">16</span> For I say unto you, I will not any more eat thereof, until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2883"><span id="lf0610_label_3687">17</span> And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and said, Take this, and divide <span class="ital">it</span> among yourselves:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2884"><span id="lf0610_label_3688">18</span> For I say unto you, I will not drink of the fruit of the vine, until the kingdom of God shall come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2885"><span id="lf0610_label_3689">19</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt859" id="lf0610_footnote_nt859_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he took bread, and gave thanks, and brake <span class="ital">it,</span> and gave unto them, saying, This is my body which is given for you: this do in remembrance of me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2886"><span id="lf0610_label_3691">20</span> Likewise also the cup after supper, saying. This cup <span class="ital">is</span> the new testament in my blood, which is shed for you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2887"><span id="lf0610_label_3692">21</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt860" id="lf0610_footnote_nt860_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But, behold, the hand of him that betrayeth me <span class="ital">is</span> with me on the table.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2888"><span id="lf0610_label_3694">22</span> And truly the Son of man goeth, as it was determined: but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2889"><span id="lf0610_label_3695">23</span> And they began to enquire among themselves, which of them it was that should do this thing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2890"><span id="lf0610_label_3696">24</span> &#xB6; And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2891"><span id="lf0610_label_3697">25</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt861" id="lf0610_footnote_nt861_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he said unto them, The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2892"><span id="lf0610_label_3699">26</span> But ye <span class="ital">shall</span> not <span class="ital">be</span> so: but he that is greatest among you, let him be as the younger; and he that is chief, as he that doth serve.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2893"><span id="lf0610_label_3700">27</span> For whether <span class="ital">is</span> greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? <span class="ital">is</span> not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2894"><span id="lf0610_label_3701">28</span> Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2895"><span id="lf0610_label_3702">29</span> And I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>102<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2896"><span id="lf0610_label_3703">30</span> That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt862" id="lf0610_footnote_nt862_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2897"><span id="lf0610_label_3705">31</span> &#xB6; And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt863" id="lf0610_footnote_nt863_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Satan hath desired <span class="ital">to have</span> you, that he may sift <span class="ital">you</span> as wheat:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2898"><span id="lf0610_label_3707">32</span> But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2899"><span id="lf0610_label_3708">33</span> And he said unto him, Lord, I am ready to go with thee, both into prison, and to death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2900"><span id="lf0610_label_3709">34</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt864" id="lf0610_footnote_nt864_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he said, I tell thee, Peter, the cock shall not crow this day, before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2901"><span id="lf0610_label_3711">35</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt865" id="lf0610_footnote_nt865_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he said unto them, When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2902"><span id="lf0610_label_3713">36</span> Then said he unto them, But now, he that hath a purse, let him take <span class="ital">it,</span> and likewise <span class="ital">his</span> scrip: and he that hath no sword, let him sell his garment, and buy one.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2903"><span id="lf0610_label_3714">37</span> For I say unto you, that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt866" id="lf0610_footnote_nt866_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he was reckoned among the transgressors: for the things concerning me have an end.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2904"><span id="lf0610_label_3716">38</span> And they said, Lord, behold, here <span class="ital">are</span> two swords. And he said unto them, It is enough.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2905"><span id="lf0610_label_3717">39</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt867" id="lf0610_footnote_nt867_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he came out, and went, as he was wont, to the mount of Olives; and his disciples also followed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2906"><span id="lf0610_label_3719">40</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt868" id="lf0610_footnote_nt868_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when he was at the place, he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt869" id="lf0610_footnote_nt869_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>Pray that ye enter not into temptation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2907"><span id="lf0610_label_3722">41</span> And he was withdrawn from them about a stone&#x2019;s cast, and kneeled down, and prayed,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2908"><span id="lf0610_label_3723">42</span> Saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2909"><span id="lf0610_label_3724">43</span> And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2910"><span id="lf0610_label_3725">44</span> And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2911"><span id="lf0610_label_3726">45</span> And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2912"><span id="lf0610_label_3727">46</span> And said unto them, Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2913"><span id="lf0610_label_3728">47</span> &#xB6; And while he yet spake, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt870" id="lf0610_footnote_nt870_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>behold a multitude, and he that was called Judas, one of the twelve, went before them, and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2914"><span id="lf0610_label_3730">48</span> But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2915"><span id="lf0610_label_3731">49</span> When they which were about him saw what would follow, they said unto him, Lord, shall we smite with the sword?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2916"><span id="lf0610_label_3732">50</span> &#xB6; And one of them smote the servant of the high priest, and cut off his right ear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2917"><span id="lf0610_label_3733">51</span> And Jesus answered and said, Suffer ye thus far. And he touched his ear, and healed him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2918"><span id="lf0610_label_3734">52</span> Then Jesus said unto the chief priests, and captains of the temple, and the elders, which were come to him, Be ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and staves?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2919"><span id="lf0610_label_3735">53</span> When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2920"><span id="lf0610_label_3736">54</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt871" id="lf0610_footnote_nt871_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then took they him, and led <span class="ital">him,</span> and brought him into the high priest&#x2019;s house. And Peter followed afar off.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2921"><span id="lf0610_label_3738">55</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt872" id="lf0610_footnote_nt872_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall, and were set down together, Peter sat down among them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2922"><span id="lf0610_label_3740">56</span> But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire, and earnestly looked upon him, and said, This man was also with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2923"><span id="lf0610_label_3741">57</span> And he denied him, saying, Woman, I know him not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2924"><span id="lf0610_label_3742">58</span> And after a little while another saw him, and said, Thou art also of them. And Peter said, Man, I am not.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>103<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2925"><span id="lf0610_label_3743">59</span> And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed, saying, Of a truth this <span class="ital">fellow</span> also was with him: for he is a Galil&#xE6;an.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2926"><span id="lf0610_label_3744">60</span> And Peter said, Man, I know not what thou sayest. And immediately, while he yet spake, the cock crew.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2927"><span id="lf0610_label_3745">61</span> And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2928"><span id="lf0610_label_3746">62</span> And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2929"><span id="lf0610_label_3747">63</span> &#xB6; And the men that held Jesus mocked him, and smote <span class="ital">him.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2930"><span id="lf0610_label_3748">64</span> And when they had blindfolded him, they struck him on the face, and asked him, saying, Prophesy, who is it that smote thee?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2931"><span id="lf0610_label_3749">65</span> And many other things blasphemously spake they against him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2932"><span id="lf0610_label_3750">66</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt873" id="lf0610_footnote_nt873_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as soon as it was day, the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together, and led him into their council, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2933"><span id="lf0610_label_3752">67</span> Art thou the Christ? tell us. And he said unto them, If I tell you, ye will not believe:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2934"><span id="lf0610_label_3753">68</span> And if I also ask <span class="ital">you,</span> ye will not answer me, nor let <span class="ital">me</span> go.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2935"><span id="lf0610_label_3754">69</span> Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2936"><span id="lf0610_label_3755">70</span> Then said they all, Art thou then the Son of God? And he said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt874" id="lf0610_footnote_nt874_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Ye say that I am.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2937"><span id="lf0610_label_3757">71</span> And they said, What need we any further witness? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_084" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3758">23</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2938"><span id="lf0610_label_3759">1</span> And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2939"><span id="lf0610_label_3760">2</span> And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this <span class="ital">fellow</span> perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to C&#xE6;sar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2940"><span id="lf0610_label_3761">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt875" id="lf0610_footnote_nt875_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2941"><span id="lf0610_label_3763">4</span> Then said Pilate to the chief priests and <span class="ital">to</span> the people, I find no fault in this man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2942"><span id="lf0610_label_3764">5</span> And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2943"><span id="lf0610_label_3765">6</span> When Pilate heard of Galilee, he asked whether the man were a Galil&#xE6;an.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2944"><span id="lf0610_label_3766">7</span> And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod&#x2019;s jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2945"><span id="lf0610_label_3767">8</span> &#xB6; And when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceeding glad: for he was desirous to see him of a long <span class="ital">season,</span> because he had heard many things of him; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2946"><span id="lf0610_label_3768">9</span> Then he questioned with him in many words; but he answered him nothing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2947"><span id="lf0610_label_3769">10</span> And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2948"><span id="lf0610_label_3770">11</span> And Herod with his men of war set him at nought, and mocked <span class="ital">him,</span> and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe, and sent him again to Pilate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2949"><span id="lf0610_label_3771">12</span> &#xB6; And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2950"><span id="lf0610_label_3772">13</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt876" id="lf0610_footnote_nt876_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2951"><span id="lf0610_label_3774">14</span> Said unto them, Ye have brought this man unto me, as one that perverteth the people: and, behold, I, having examined <span class="ital">him</span> before you, have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2952"><span id="lf0610_label_3775">15</span> No, nor yet Herod: for I sent you to him; and, lo, nothing worthy of death is done unto him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2953"><span id="lf0610_label_3776">16</span> I will therefore chastise him, and release <span class="ital">him.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2954"><span id="lf0610_label_3777">17</span> (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2955"><span id="lf0610_label_3778">18</span> And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this <span class="ital">man,</span> and release unto us Barabbas:</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>104<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2956"><span id="lf0610_label_3779">19</span> (Who for a certain sedition made in the city, and for murder, was cast into prison.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2957"><span id="lf0610_label_3780">20</span> Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2958"><span id="lf0610_label_3781">21</span> But they cried, saying, Crucify <span class="ital">him,</span> crucify him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2959"><span id="lf0610_label_3782">22</span> And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let <span class="ital">him</span> go.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2960"><span id="lf0610_label_3783">23</span> And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2961"><span id="lf0610_label_3784">24</span> And Pilate <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt877" id="lf0610_footnote_nt877_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>gave sentence that it should be as they required.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2962"><span id="lf0610_label_3786">25</span> And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2963"><span id="lf0610_label_3787">26</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt878" id="lf0610_footnote_nt878_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as they led him away, they laid hold upon one Simon, a Cyrenian, coming out of the country, and on him they laid the cross, that he might bear <span class="ital">it</span> after Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2964"><span id="lf0610_label_3789">27</span> &#xB6; And there followed him a great company of people, and of women, which also bewailed and lamented him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2965"><span id="lf0610_label_3790">28</span> But Jesus turning unto them said, Daughters of Jerusalem, weep not for me, but weep for yourselves, and for your children.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2966"><span id="lf0610_label_3791">29</span> For, behold, the days are coming, in the which they shall say, Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the barren, and the wombs that never bare, and the paps which never gave suck.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2967"><span id="lf0610_label_3792">30</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt879" id="lf0610_footnote_nt879_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then shall they begin to say to the mountains, Fall on us; and to the hills, Cover us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2968"><span id="lf0610_label_3794">31</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt880" id="lf0610_footnote_nt880_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For if they do these things in a green tree, what shall be done in the dry?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2969"><span id="lf0610_label_3796">32</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt881" id="lf0610_footnote_nt881_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And there were also two other, malefactors, led with him to be put to death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2970"><span id="lf0610_label_3798">33</span> And when they were come to the place, which is called <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt882" id="lf0610_footnote_nt882_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Calvary, there they crucified him, and the malefactors, one on the right hand, and the other on the left.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2971"><span id="lf0610_label_3800">34</span> &#xB6; Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2972"><span id="lf0610_label_3801">35</span> And the people stood beholding. And the rulers also with them derided <span class="ital">him,</span> saying, He saved others; let him save himself, if he be Christ, the chosen of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2973"><span id="lf0610_label_3802">36</span> And the soldiers also mocked him, coming to him, and offering him vinegar,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2974"><span id="lf0610_label_3803">37</span> And saying, If thou be the king of the Jews, save thyself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2975"><span id="lf0610_label_3804">38</span> And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew, THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2976"><span id="lf0610_label_3805">39</span> &#xB6; And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him, saying, If thou be Christ, save thyself and us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2977"><span id="lf0610_label_3806">40</span> But the other answering rebuked him, saying, Dost not thou fear God, seeing thou art in the same condemnation?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2978"><span id="lf0610_label_3807">41</span> And we indeed justly; for we receive the due reward of our deeds: but this man hath done nothing amiss.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2979"><span id="lf0610_label_3808">42</span> And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2980"><span id="lf0610_label_3809">43</span> And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2981"><span id="lf0610_label_3810">44</span> And it was about the sixth hour, and there was a darkness over all the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt883" id="lf0610_footnote_nt883_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>earth until the ninth hour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2982"><span id="lf0610_label_3812">45</span> And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2983"><span id="lf0610_label_3813">46</span> &#xB6; And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice, he said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt884" id="lf0610_footnote_nt884_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Father, into thy hands I commend my spirit: and having said thus, he gave up the ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2984"><span id="lf0610_label_3815">47</span> Now when the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying, Certainly this was a righteous man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2985"><span id="lf0610_label_3816">48</span> And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>105<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2986"><span id="lf0610_label_3817">49</span> And all his acquaintance, and the women that followed him from Galilee, stood afar off, beholding these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2987"><span id="lf0610_label_3818">50</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt885" id="lf0610_footnote_nt885_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, <span class="ital">there was</span> a man named Joseph, a counsellor; <span class="ital">and he was</span> a good man, and a just.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2988"><span id="lf0610_label_3820">51</span> (The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them;) <span class="ital">he was</span> of Arimath&#xE6;a, a city of the Jews: who also himself waited for the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2989"><span id="lf0610_label_3821">52</span> This <span class="ital">man</span> went unto Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2990"><span id="lf0610_label_3822">53</span> And he took it down, and wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone, wherein never man before was laid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2991"><span id="lf0610_label_3823">54</span> And that day was the preparation, and the sabbath drew on.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2992"><span id="lf0610_label_3824">55</span> And the women also, which came with him from Galilee, followed after, and beheld the sepulchre, and how his body was laid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2993"><span id="lf0610_label_3825">56</span> And they returned, and prepared spices and ointments; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_085" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3826">24</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2994"><span id="lf0610_label_3827">1</span> Now <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt886" id="lf0610_footnote_nt886_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>upon the first <span class="ital">day</span> of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain <span class="ital">others</span> with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2995"><span id="lf0610_label_3829">2</span> And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2996"><span id="lf0610_label_3830">3</span> And they entered in, and found not the body of the Lord Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2997"><span id="lf0610_label_3831">4</span> And it came to pass, as they were much perplexed thereabout, behold, two men stood by them in shining garments:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2998"><span id="lf0610_label_3832">5</span> And as they were afraid, and bowed down <span class="ital">their</span> faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt887" id="lf0610_footnote_nt887_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the living among the dead?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_2999"><span id="lf0610_label_3834">6</span> He is not here, but is risen: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt888" id="lf0610_footnote_nt888_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3000"><span id="lf0610_label_3836">7</span> Saying, The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3001"><span id="lf0610_label_3837">8</span> And they remembered his words,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3002"><span id="lf0610_label_3838">9</span> And returned from the sepulchre, and told all these things unto the eleven, and to all the rest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3003"><span id="lf0610_label_3839">10</span> It was Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary <span class="ital">the mother</span> of James, and other <span class="ital">women that were</span> with them, which told these things unto the apostles.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3004"><span id="lf0610_label_3840">11</span> And their words seemed to them as idle tales, and they believed them not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3005"><span id="lf0610_label_3841">12</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt889" id="lf0610_footnote_nt889_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Then arose Peter, and ran unto the sepulchre; and stooping down, he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves, and departed, wondering in himself at that which was come to pass.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3006"><span id="lf0610_label_3843">13</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt890" id="lf0610_footnote_nt890_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem <span class="ital">about</span> threescore furlongs.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3007"><span id="lf0610_label_3845">14</span> And they talked together of all these things which had happened.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3008"><span id="lf0610_label_3846">15</span> And it came to pass, that, while they communed <span class="ital">together</span> and reasoned, Jesus himself drew near, and went with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3009"><span id="lf0610_label_3847">16</span> But their eyes were holden that they should not know him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3010"><span id="lf0610_label_3848">17</span> And he said unto them, What manner of communications <span class="ital">are</span> these that ye have one to another, as ye walk, and are sad?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3011"><span id="lf0610_label_3849">18</span> And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3012"><span id="lf0610_label_3850">19</span> And he said unto them, What things? And they said unto him, Concerning Jesus of Nazareth, which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3013"><span id="lf0610_label_3851">20</span> And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death, and have crucified him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3014"><span id="lf0610_label_3852">21</span> But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel: and beside all this, to day is the third day since these things were done.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>106<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3015"><span id="lf0610_label_3853">22</span> Yea, and certain women also of our company made us astonished, which were early at the sepulchre;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3016"><span id="lf0610_label_3854">23</span> And when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3017"><span id="lf0610_label_3855">24</span> And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre, and found <span class="ital">it</span> even so as the women had said: but him they saw not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3018"><span id="lf0610_label_3856">25</span> Then he said unto them, O fools, and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3019"><span id="lf0610_label_3857">26</span> Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3020"><span id="lf0610_label_3858">27</span> And beginning at Moses and all the prophets, he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3021"><span id="lf0610_label_3859">28</span> And they drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and he made as though he would have gone further.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3022"><span id="lf0610_label_3860">29</span> But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3023"><span id="lf0610_label_3861">30</span> And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed <span class="ital">it,</span> and brake, and gave to them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3024"><span id="lf0610_label_3862">31</span> And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt891" id="lf0610_footnote_nt891_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>vanished out of their sight.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3025"><span id="lf0610_label_3864">32</span> And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3026"><span id="lf0610_label_3865">33</span> And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3027"><span id="lf0610_label_3866">34</span> Saying, The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3028"><span id="lf0610_label_3867">35</span> And they told what things <span class="ital">were done</span> in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3029"><span id="lf0610_label_3868">36</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt892" id="lf0610_footnote_nt892_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace <span class="ital">be</span> unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3030"><span id="lf0610_label_3870">37</span> But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3031"><span id="lf0610_label_3871">38</span> And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3032"><span id="lf0610_label_3872">39</span> Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3033"><span id="lf0610_label_3873">40</span> And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them <span class="ital">his</span> hands and <span class="ital">his</span> feet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3034"><span id="lf0610_label_3874">41</span> And while they yet believed not for joy, and wondered, he said unto them, Have ye here any meat?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3035"><span id="lf0610_label_3875">42</span> And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish, and of an honeycomb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3036"><span id="lf0610_label_3876">43</span> And he took <span class="ital">it,</span> and did eat before them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3037"><span id="lf0610_label_3877">44</span> And he said unto them, These <span class="ital">are</span> the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and <span class="ital">in</span> the prophets, and <span class="ital">in</span> the psalms, concerning me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3038"><span id="lf0610_label_3878">45</span> Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3039"><span id="lf0610_label_3879">46</span> And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3040"><span id="lf0610_label_3880">47</span> And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3041"><span id="lf0610_label_3881">48</span> And ye are witnesses of these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3042"><span id="lf0610_label_3882">49</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt893" id="lf0610_footnote_nt893_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And, behold, I send the promise of my Father upon you: but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem, until ye be endued with power from on high.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3043"><span id="lf0610_label_3884">50</span> &#xB6; And he led them out as far as to Bethany, and he lifted up his hands, and blessed them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3044"><span id="lf0610_label_3885">51</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt894" id="lf0610_footnote_nt894_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And it came to pass, while he blessed them, he was parted from them, and carried up into heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3045"><span id="lf0610_label_3887">52</span> And they worshipped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3046"><span id="lf0610_label_3888">53</span> And were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>107<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_086" class="type-part S_John">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_013">THE GOSPEL ACCORDING TO S. JOHN.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_087" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3889">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3047"><span id="lf0610_label_3890">1</span> <span class="csc">In</span> the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3048"><span id="lf0610_label_3891">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt895" id="lf0610_footnote_nt895_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The same was in the beginning with God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3049"><span id="lf0610_label_3893">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt896" id="lf0610_footnote_nt896_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3050"><span id="lf0610_label_3895">4</span> In him was life; and the life was the light of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3051"><span id="lf0610_label_3896">5</span> And the light shineth in darkness; and the darkness comprehended it not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3052"><span id="lf0610_label_3897">6</span> &#xB6; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt897" id="lf0610_footnote_nt897_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>There was a man sent from God, whose name <span class="ital">was</span> John.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3053"><span id="lf0610_label_3899">7</span> The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all <span class="ital">men</span> through him might believe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3054"><span id="lf0610_label_3900">8</span> He was not that Light, but <span class="ital">was sent</span> to bear witness of that Light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3055"><span id="lf0610_label_3901">9</span> <span class="ital">That</span> was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3056"><span id="lf0610_label_3902">10</span> He was in the world, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt898" id="lf0610_footnote_nt898_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the world was made by him, and the world knew him not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3057"><span id="lf0610_label_3904">11</span> He came unto his own, and his own received him not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3058"><span id="lf0610_label_3905">12</span> But as many as received him, to them gave he <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt899" id="lf0610_footnote_nt899_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>power to become the sons of God, <span class="ital">even</span> to them that believe on his name:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3059"><span id="lf0610_label_3907">13</span> Which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3060"><span id="lf0610_label_3908">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt900" id="lf0610_footnote_nt900_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3061"><span id="lf0610_label_3910">15</span> &#xB6; John bare witness of him, and cried, saying, This was he of whom I spake, He that cometh after me is preferred before me: for he was before me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3062"><span id="lf0610_label_3911">16</span> And of his <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt901" id="lf0610_footnote_nt901_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3063"><span id="lf0610_label_3913">17</span> For the law was given by Moses, <span class="ital">but</span> grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3064"><span id="lf0610_label_3914">18</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt902" id="lf0610_footnote_nt902_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared <span class="ital">him.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3065"><span id="lf0610_label_3916">19</span> &#xB6; And this is the record of John, when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him, Who art thou?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3066"><span id="lf0610_label_3917">20</span> And he confessed, and denied not; but confessed, I am not the Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3067"><span id="lf0610_label_3918">21</span> And they asked him, What then? Art thou Elias? And he saith, I am not. Art thou <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt903" id="lf0610_footnote_nt903_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>that prophet? And he answered, No.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3068"><span id="lf0610_label_3920">22</span> Then said they unto him, Who art thou? that we may give an answer to them that sent us. What sayest thou of thyself?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3069"><span id="lf0610_label_3921">23</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt904" id="lf0610_footnote_nt904_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He said, I <span class="ital">am</span> the voice of one crying in the wilderness, Make straight the way of the Lord, as said the prophet Esaias.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3070"><span id="lf0610_label_3923">24</span> And they which were sent were of the Pharisees.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3071"><span id="lf0610_label_3924">25</span> And they asked him, and said unto him, Why baptizest thou then, if thou be not that Christ, nor Elias, neither that prophet?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3072"><span id="lf0610_label_3925">26</span> John answered them, saying, I baptize with water: but there standeth one among you, whom ye know not;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3073"><span id="lf0610_label_3926">27</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt905" id="lf0610_footnote_nt905_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He it is, who coming after me is preferred before me, whose shoe&#x2019;s latchet I am not worthy to unloose.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3074"><span id="lf0610_label_3928">28</span> These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan, where John was baptizing.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>108<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3075"><span id="lf0610_label_3929">29</span> &#xB6; The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt906" id="lf0610_footnote_nt906_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>taketh away the sin of the world</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3076"><span id="lf0610_label_3931">30</span> This is he of whom I said, After me cometh a man which is preferred before me: for he was before me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3077"><span id="lf0610_label_3932">31</span> And I knew him not: but that he should be made manifest to Israel, therefore am I come baptizing with water.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3078"><span id="lf0610_label_3933">32</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt907" id="lf0610_footnote_nt907_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And John bare record, saying, I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove, and it abode upon him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3079"><span id="lf0610_label_3935">33</span> And I knew him not: but he that sent me to baptize with water, the same said unto me, Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending, and remaining on him, the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3080"><span id="lf0610_label_3936">34</span> And I saw, and bare record that this is the Son of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3081"><span id="lf0610_label_3937">35</span> &#xB6; Again the next day after John stood, and two of his disciples;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3082"><span id="lf0610_label_3938">36</span> And looking upon Jesus as he walked, he saith, Behold the Lamb of God!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3083"><span id="lf0610_label_3939">37</span> And the two disciples heard him speak, and they followed Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3084"><span id="lf0610_label_3940">38</span> Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master,) where <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt908" id="lf0610_footnote_nt908_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>dwellest thou?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3085"><span id="lf0610_label_3942">39</span> He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day: for it was <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt909" id="lf0610_footnote_nt909_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>about the tenth hour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3086"><span id="lf0610_label_3944">40</span> One of the two which heard John <span class="ital">speak,</span> and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter&#x2019;s brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3087"><span id="lf0610_label_3945">41</span> He first findeth his own brother Simon, and saith unto him, We have found the Messias, which is, being interpreted, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt910" id="lf0610_footnote_nt910_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3088"><span id="lf0610_label_3947">42</span> And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt911" id="lf0610_footnote_nt911_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>A stone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3089"><span id="lf0610_label_3949">43</span> &#xB6; The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee, and findeth Philip, and saith unto him, Follow me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3090"><span id="lf0610_label_3950">44</span> Now Philip was of Bethsaida, the city of Andrew and Peter.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3091"><span id="lf0610_label_3951">45</span> Philip findeth Nathanael, and saith unto him, We have found him, of whom <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt912" id="lf0610_footnote_nt912_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Moses in the law, and the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt913" id="lf0610_footnote_nt913_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3092"><span id="lf0610_label_3954">46</span> And Nathanael said unto him, Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth? Philip saith unto him, Come and see.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3093"><span id="lf0610_label_3955">47</span> Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him, and saith of him, Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom is no guile!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3094"><span id="lf0610_label_3956">48</span> Nathanael saith unto him, Whence knowest thou me? Jesus answered and said unto him, Before that Philip called thee, when thou wast under the fig tree, I saw thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3095"><span id="lf0610_label_3957">49</span> Nathanael answered and saith unto him, Rabbi, thou art the Son of God; thou art the King of Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3096"><span id="lf0610_label_3958">50</span> Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3097"><span id="lf0610_label_3959">51</span> And he saith unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Hereafter ye shall see heaven open, and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_088" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3960">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3098"><span id="lf0610_label_3961">1</span> And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3099"><span id="lf0610_label_3962">2</span> And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3100"><span id="lf0610_label_3963">3</span> And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3101"><span id="lf0610_label_3964">4</span> Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3102"><span id="lf0610_label_3965">5</span> His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>109<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3103"><span id="lf0610_label_3966">6</span> And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3104"><span id="lf0610_label_3967">7</span> Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3105"><span id="lf0610_label_3968">8</span> And he saith unto them, Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast. And they bare <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3106"><span id="lf0610_label_3969">9</span> When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3107"><span id="lf0610_label_3970">10</span> And saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: <span class="ital">but</span> thou hast kept the good wine until now.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3108"><span id="lf0610_label_3971">11</span> This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3109"><span id="lf0610_label_3972">12</span> &#xB6; After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3110"><span id="lf0610_label_3973">13</span> &#xB6; And the Jews&#x2019; passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3111"><span id="lf0610_label_3974">14</span> And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3112"><span id="lf0610_label_3975">15</span> And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers&#x2019; money, and overthrew the tables;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3113"><span id="lf0610_label_3976">16</span> And said unto them that sold doves, Take these things hence; make not my Father&#x2019;s house an house of merchandise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3114"><span id="lf0610_label_3977">17</span> And his disciples remembered that it was written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt914" id="lf0610_footnote_nt914_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3115"><span id="lf0610_label_3979">18</span> &#xB6; Then answered the Jews and said unto him, What sign shewest thou unto us, seeing that thou doest these things?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3116"><span id="lf0610_label_3980">19</span> Jesus answered and said unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt915" id="lf0610_footnote_nt915_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3117"><span id="lf0610_label_3982">20</span> Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3118"><span id="lf0610_label_3983">21</span> But he spake of the temple of his body.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3119"><span id="lf0610_label_3984">22</span> When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3120"><span id="lf0610_label_3985">23</span> &#xB6; Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover, in the feast <span class="ital">day,</span> many believed in his name, when they saw the miracles which he did.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3121"><span id="lf0610_label_3986">24</span> But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all <span class="ital">men,</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3122"><span id="lf0610_label_3987">25</span> And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_089" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_3988">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3123"><span id="lf0610_label_3989">1</span> There was a man of the Pharisees, named Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3124"><span id="lf0610_label_3990">2</span> The same came to Jesus by night, and said unto him, Rabbi, we know that thou art a teacher come from God: for no man can do these miracles that thou doest, except God be with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3125"><span id="lf0610_label_3991">3</span> Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt916" id="lf0610_footnote_nt916_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3126"><span id="lf0610_label_3993">4</span> Nicodemus saith unto him, How can a man be born when he is old? can he enter the second time into his mother&#x2019;s womb, and be born?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3127"><span id="lf0610_label_3994">5</span> Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and <span class="ital">of</span> the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3128"><span id="lf0610_label_3995">6</span> That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_3129"><span id="lf0610_label_3996">7</span> Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt917" id="lf0610_footnote_nt917_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>again.</p>
