<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5158"><span id="lf0610_label_6493">1</span> I say the truth in Christ, I lie not, my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5159"><span id="lf0610_label_6494">2</span> That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5160"><span id="lf0610_label_6495">3</span> For I could wish that myself were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1330" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1330_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>accursed from Christ for my brethren, my kinsmen according to the flesh:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5161"><span id="lf0610_label_6497">4</span> Who are Israelites; to whom <span class="ital">pertaineth</span> the-adoption, and the glory, and the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1331" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1331_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>covenants, and the giving of the law, and the service <span class="ital">of God,</span> and the promises;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5162"><span id="lf0610_label_6499">5</span> Whose <span class="ital">are</span> the fathers, and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ <span class="ital">came,</span> who is over all, God blessed for ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5163"><span id="lf0610_label_6500">6</span> Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect. For they <span class="ital">are</span> not all Israel, which are of Israel:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5164"><span id="lf0610_label_6501">7</span> Neither, because they are the seed of Abraham, <span class="ital">are they</span> all children: but, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1332" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1332_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>In Isaac shall thy seed be called.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5165"><span id="lf0610_label_6503">8</span> That is, They which are the children of the flesh, these <span class="ital">are</span> not the children of God: but the children of the promise are counted for the seed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5166"><span id="lf0610_label_6504">9</span> For this <span class="ital">is</span> the word of promise, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1333" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1333_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>At this time will I come, and Sarah shall have a son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5167"><span id="lf0610_label_6506">10</span> And not only <span class="ital">this;</span> but when Rebecca also had conceived by one, <span class="ital">even</span> by our father Isaac;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5168"><span id="lf0610_label_6507">11</span> (For <span class="ital">the children</span> being not yet born, neither having done any good or evil, that the purpose of <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>187<span class="bracket">]</span></span> God according to election might stand, not of works, but of him that calleth;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5169"><span id="lf0610_label_6508">12</span> It was said unto her, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1334" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1334_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1335" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1335_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>elder shall serve the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1336" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1336_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>younger.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5170"><span id="lf0610_label_6512">13</span> As it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1337" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1337_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jacob have I loved, but Esau have I hated.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5171"><span id="lf0610_label_6514">14</span> What shall we say then? <span class="ital">Is there</span> unrighteousness with God? God forbid.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5172"><span id="lf0610_label_6515">15</span> For he saith to Moses, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1338" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1338_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy, and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5173"><span id="lf0610_label_6517">16</span> So then <span class="ital">it is</span> not of him that willeth, nor of him that runneth, but of God that sheweth mercy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5174"><span id="lf0610_label_6518">17</span> For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1339" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1339_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up, that I might shew my power in thee, and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5175"><span id="lf0610_label_6520">18</span> Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will <span class="ital">have mercy,</span> and whom he will he hardeneth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5176"><span id="lf0610_label_6521">19</span> Thou wilt say then unto me, Why doth he yet find fault? For who hath resisted his will?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5177"><span id="lf0610_label_6522">20</span> Nay but, O man, who art thou that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1340" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1340_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>repliest against God? <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1341" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1341_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Shall the thing formed say to him that formed <span class="ital">it,</span> Why hast thou made me thus?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5178"><span id="lf0610_label_6525">21</span> Hath not the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1342" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1342_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>potter power over the clay, of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour, and another unto dishonour?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5179"><span id="lf0610_label_6527">22</span> <span class="ital">What</span> if God, willing to shew <span class="ital">his</span> wrath, and to make his power known, endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1343" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1343_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>fitted to destruction:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5180"><span id="lf0610_label_6529">23</span> And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy, which he had afore prepared unto glory,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5181"><span id="lf0610_label_6530">24</span> Even us, whom he hath called, not of the Jews only, but also of the Gentiles?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5182"><span id="lf0610_label_6531">25</span> As he saith also in Osee, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1344" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1344_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will call them my people, which were not my people; and her beloved, which was not beloved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5183"><span id="lf0610_label_6533">26</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1345" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1345_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And it shall come to pass, <span class="ital">that</span> in the place where it was said unto them, Ye <span class="ital">are</span> not my people; there shall they be called the children of the living God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5184"><span id="lf0610_label_6535">27</span> Esaias also crieth concerning Israel, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1346" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1346_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea, a remnant shall be saved:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5185"><span id="lf0610_label_6537">28</span> For he will finish <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1347" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1347_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the work, and cut <span class="ital">it</span> short in righteousness: because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5186"><span id="lf0610_label_6539">29</span> And as Esaias said before, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1348" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1348_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed, we had been as Sodoma, and been made like unto Gomorrha.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5187"><span id="lf0610_label_6541">30</span> What shall we say then? That the Gentiles, which followed not after righteousness, have attained to righteousness, even the righteousness which is of faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5188"><span id="lf0610_label_6542">31</span> But Israel, which followed after the law of righteousness, hath not attained to the law of righteousness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5189"><span id="lf0610_label_6543">32</span> Wherefore? Because <span class="ital">they sought it</span> not by faith, but as it were by the works of the law. For they stumbled at that stumblingstone;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5190"><span id="lf0610_label_6544">33</span> As it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1349" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1349_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Behold, I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence: and whosoever believeth on him shall not be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1350" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1350_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ashamed.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_147" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6547">10</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5191"><span id="lf0610_label_6548">1</span> Brethren, my heart&#x2019;s desire and prayer to God for Israel is, that they might be saved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5192"><span id="lf0610_label_6549">2</span> For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God, but not according to knowledge.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5193"><span id="lf0610_label_6550">3</span> For they being ignorant of God&#x2019;s righteousness, and going about to establish their own righteousness, have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5194"><span id="lf0610_label_6551">4</span> For Christ <span class="ital">is</span> the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5195"><span id="lf0610_label_6552">5</span> For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1351" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1351_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>That the man which doeth those things shall live by them.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>188<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5196"><span id="lf0610_label_6554">6</span> But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1352" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1352_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Say not in thine heart, Who shall ascend into heaven? (that is, to bring Christ down <span class="ital">from above:</span>)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5197"><span id="lf0610_label_6556">7</span> Or, Who shall descend into the deep? (that is, to bring up Christ again from the dead.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5198"><span id="lf0610_label_6557">8</span> But what saith it? <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1353" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1353_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The word is nigh thee, <span class="ital">even</span> in thy mouth, and in thy heart: that is, the word of faith, which we preach;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5199"><span id="lf0610_label_6559">9</span> That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5200"><span id="lf0610_label_6560">10</span> For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5201"><span id="lf0610_label_6561">11</span> For the scripture saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1354" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1354_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5202"><span id="lf0610_label_6563">12</span> For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek: for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5203"><span id="lf0610_label_6564">13</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1355" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1355_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5204"><span id="lf0610_label_6566">14</span> How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard? and how shall they hear without a preacher?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5205"><span id="lf0610_label_6567">15</span> And how shall they preach, except they be sent? as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1356" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1356_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace, and bring glad tidings of good things!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5206"><span id="lf0610_label_6569">16</span> But they have not all obeyed the gospel. For Esaias saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1357" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1357_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Lord, who hath believed <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1358" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1358_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>our <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1359" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1359_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>report?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5207"><span id="lf0610_label_6573">17</span> So then faith <span class="ital">cometh</span> by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5208"><span id="lf0610_label_6574">18</span> But I say, Have they not heard? Yes verily, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1360" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1360_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>their sound went into all the earth, and their words unto the ends of the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5209"><span id="lf0610_label_6576">19</span> But I say, Did not Israel know? First Moses saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1361" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1361_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will provoke you to jealousy by <span class="ital">them that are</span> no people, <span class="ital">and</span> by a foolish nation I will anger you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5210"><span id="lf0610_label_6578">20</span> But Esaias is very bold, and saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1362" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1362_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I was found of them that sought me not; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5211"><span id="lf0610_label_6580">21</span> But to Israel he saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1363" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1363_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_148" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6582">11</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5212"><span id="lf0610_label_6583">1</span> I say then, Hath God cast away his people? God forbid. For I also am an Israelite, of the seed of Abraham, <span class="ital">of</span> the tribe of Benjamin.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5213"><span id="lf0610_label_6584">2</span> God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew. Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5214"><span id="lf0610_label_6585">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1364" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1364_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Lord, they have killed thy prophets, and digged down thine altars; and I am left alone, and they seek my life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5215"><span id="lf0610_label_6587">4</span> But what saith the answer of God unto him? <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1365" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1365_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I have reserved to myself seven thousand men, who have not bowed the knee to <span class="ital">the image of</span> Baal.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5216"><span id="lf0610_label_6589">5</span> Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5217"><span id="lf0610_label_6590">6</span> And if by grace, then <span class="ital">is it</span> no more of works: otherwise grace is no more grace. But if <span class="ital">it be</span> of works, then is it no more grace: otherwise work is no more work.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5218"><span id="lf0610_label_6591">7</span> What then? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for; but the election hath obtained it, and the rest were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1366" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1366_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>blinded</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5219"><span id="lf0610_label_6593">8</span> (According as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1367" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1367_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>God hath given them the spirit of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1368" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1368_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>slumber, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1369" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1369_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>eyes that they should not see, and ears that they should not hear;) unto this day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5220"><span id="lf0610_label_6597">9</span> And David saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1370" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1370_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Let their table be made a snare, and a trap, and a stumblingblock, and a recompence unto them:</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>189<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5221"><span id="lf0610_label_6599">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1371" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1371_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Let their eyes be darkened, that they may not see, and bow down their back alway.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5222"><span id="lf0610_label_6601">11</span> I say then, Have they stumbled that they should fall? God forbid: but <span class="ital">rather</span> through their fall salvation <span class="ital">is come</span> unto the Gentiles, for to provoke them to jealousy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5223"><span id="lf0610_label_6602">12</span> Now if the fall of them <span class="ital">be</span> the riches of the world, and the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1372" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1372_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles; how much more their fulness?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5224"><span id="lf0610_label_6604">13</span> For I speak to you Gentiles, inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles, I magnify mine office:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5225"><span id="lf0610_label_6605">14</span> If by any means I may provoke to emulation <span class="ital">them which are</span> my flesh, and might save some of them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5226"><span id="lf0610_label_6606">15</span> For if the casting away of them <span class="ital">be</span> the reconciling of the world, what <span class="ital">shall</span> the receiving <span class="ital">of them be,</span> but life from the dead?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5227"><span id="lf0610_label_6607">16</span> For if the firstfruit <span class="ital">be</span> holy, the lump <span class="ital">is</span> also <span class="ital">holy:</span> and if the root <span class="ital">be</span> holy, so <span class="ital">are</span> the branches.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5228"><span id="lf0610_label_6608">17</span> And if some of the branches be broken off, and thou, being a wild olive tree, wert graffed in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1373" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1373_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>among them, and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5229"><span id="lf0610_label_6610">18</span> Boast not against the branches. But if thou boast, thou bearest not the root, but the root thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5230"><span id="lf0610_label_6611">19</span> Thou wilt say then, The branches were broken off, that I might be graffed in.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5231"><span id="lf0610_label_6612">20</span> Well; because of unbelief they were broken off, and thou standest by faith. Be not highminded, but fear:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5232"><span id="lf0610_label_6613">21</span> For if God spared not the natural branches, <span class="ital">take heed</span> lest he also spare not thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5233"><span id="lf0610_label_6614">22</span> Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God: on them which fell, severity; but toward thee, goodness, if thou continue in <span class="ital">his</span> goodness: otherwise thou also shalt be cut off.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5234"><span id="lf0610_label_6615">23</span> And they also, if they abide not still in unbelief, shall be graffed in: for God is able to graff them in again.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5235"><span id="lf0610_label_6616">24</span> For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature, and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree: how much more shall these, which be the natural <span class="ital">branches,</span> be graffed into their own olive tree?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5236"><span id="lf0610_label_6617">25</span> For I would not, brethren, that ye should be ignorant of this mystery, lest ye should be wise in your own conceits; that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1374" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1374_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>blindness in part is happened to Israel, until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5237"><span id="lf0610_label_6619">26</span> And so all Israel shall be saved: as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1375" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1375_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer, and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5238"><span id="lf0610_label_6621">27</span> For this <span class="ital">is</span> my covenant unto them, when I shall take away their sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5239"><span id="lf0610_label_6622">28</span> As concerning the gospel, <span class="ital">they are</span> enemies for your sakes: but as touching the election, <span class="ital">they are</span> beloved for the fathers&#x2019; sakes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5240"><span id="lf0610_label_6623">29</span> For the gifts and calling of God <span class="ital">are</span> without repentance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5241"><span id="lf0610_label_6624">30</span> For as ye in times past have not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1376" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1376_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>believed God, yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5242"><span id="lf0610_label_6626">31</span> Even so have these also now not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1377" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1377_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>believed, that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5243"><span id="lf0610_label_6628">32</span> For God hath <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1378" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1378_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>concluded them all in unbelief, that he might have mercy upon all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5244"><span id="lf0610_label_6630">33</span> O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable <span class="ital">are</span> his judgments, and his ways past finding out!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5245"><span id="lf0610_label_6631">34</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1379" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1379_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For who hath known the mind of the Lord? or who hath been his counsellor?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5246"><span id="lf0610_label_6633">35</span> Or who hath first given to him, and it shall be recompensed unto him again?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5247"><span id="lf0610_label_6634">36</span> For of him, and through him, and to him, <span class="ital">are</span> all things: to whom <span class="ital">be</span> glory for ever. Amen.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_149" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6635">12</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5248"><span id="lf0610_label_6636">1</span> I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, <span class="ital">which is</span> your reasonable service.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5249"><span id="lf0610_label_6637">2</span> And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>190<span class="bracket">]</span></span> ye may prove what <span class="ital">is</span> that good, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1380" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1380_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5250"><span id="lf0610_label_6639">3</span> For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think <span class="ital">of himself</span> more highly than he ought to think; but to think <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1381" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1381_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5251"><span id="lf0610_label_6641">4</span> For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5252"><span id="lf0610_label_6642">5</span> So we, <span class="ital">being</span> many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5253"><span id="lf0610_label_6643">6</span> Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, <span class="ital">let us prophesy</span> according to the proportion of faith;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5254"><span id="lf0610_label_6644">7</span> Or ministry, <span class="ital">let us wait</span> on <span class="ital">our</span> ministering: or he that teacheth, on teaching;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5255"><span id="lf0610_label_6645">8</span> Or he that exhorteth, on exhortation: he that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1382" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1382_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>giveth, <span class="ital">let him do it</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1383" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1383_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>with simplicity; he that ruleth, with diligence; he that sheweth mercy, with cheerfulness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5256"><span id="lf0610_label_6648">9</span> <span class="ital">Let</span> love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5257"><span id="lf0610_label_6649">10</span> <span class="ital">Be</span> kindly affectioned one to another <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1384" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1384_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5258"><span id="lf0610_label_6651">11</span> Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5259"><span id="lf0610_label_6652">12</span> Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5260"><span id="lf0610_label_6653">13</span> Distributing to the necessity of saints; given to hospitality.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5261"><span id="lf0610_label_6654">14</span> Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5262"><span id="lf0610_label_6655">15</span> Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5263"><span id="lf0610_label_6656">16</span> <span class="ital">Be</span> of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1385" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1385_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5264"><span id="lf0610_label_6658">17</span> Recompense to no man evil for evil. Provide things honest in the sight of all men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5265"><span id="lf0610_label_6659">18</span> If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5266"><span id="lf0610_label_6660">19</span> Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but <span class="ital">rather</span> give place unto wrath: for it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1386" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1386_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Vengeance <span class="ital">is</span> mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5267"><span id="lf0610_label_6662">20</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1387" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1387_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Therefore if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5268"><span id="lf0610_label_6664">21</span> Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_150" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6665">13</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5269"><span id="lf0610_label_6666">1</span> Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers. For there is no power but of God: the powers that be are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1388" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1388_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ordained of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5270"><span id="lf0610_label_6668">2</span> Whosoever therefore resisteth the power, resisteth the ordinance of God: and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5271"><span id="lf0610_label_6669">3</span> For rulers are not a terror to good works, but to the evil. Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power? do that which is good, and thou shalt have praise of the same:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5272"><span id="lf0610_label_6670">4</span> For he is the minister of God to thee for good. But if thou do that which is evil, be afraid; for he beareth not the sword in vain: for he is the minister of God, a revenger to <span class="ital">execute</span> wrath upon him that doeth evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5273"><span id="lf0610_label_6671">5</span> Wherefore <span class="ital">ye</span> must needs be subject, not only for wrath, but also for conscience sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5274"><span id="lf0610_label_6672">6</span> For for this cause pay ye tribute also: for they are God&#x2019;s ministers, attending continually upon this very thing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5275"><span id="lf0610_label_6673">7</span> Render therefore to all their dues: tribute to whom tribute <span class="ital">is due;</span> custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5276"><span id="lf0610_label_6674">8</span> Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5277"><span id="lf0610_label_6675">9</span> For this, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness, Thou shalt not covet; and if <span class="ital">there be</span> any other commandment, it is briefly comprehended in this saying, namely, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>191<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5278"><span id="lf0610_label_6676">10</span> Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love <span class="ital">is</span> the fulfilling of the law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5279"><span id="lf0610_label_6677">11</span> And that, knowing the time, that now <span class="ital">it is</span> high time to awake out of sleep: for now <span class="ital">is</span> our salvation nearer than when we believed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5280"><span id="lf0610_label_6678">12</span> The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5281"><span id="lf0610_label_6679">13</span> Let us walk <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1389" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1389_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5282"><span id="lf0610_label_6681">14</span> But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to <span class="ital">fulfil</span> the lusts <span class="ital">thereof.</span></p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_151" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6682">14</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5283"><span id="lf0610_label_6683">1</span> Him that is weak in the faith receive ye, <span class="ital">but</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1390" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1390_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>not to doubtful disputations.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5284"><span id="lf0610_label_6685">2</span> For one believeth that he may eat all things: another, who is weak, eateth herbs.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5285"><span id="lf0610_label_6686">3</span> Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth: for God hath received him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5286"><span id="lf0610_label_6687">4</span> Who art thou that judgest another man&#x2019;s servant? to his own master he standeth or falleth. Yea, he shall be holden up: for God is able to make him stand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5287"><span id="lf0610_label_6688">5</span> One man esteemeth one day above another: another esteemeth every day <span class="ital">alike.</span> Let every man be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1391" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1391_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>fully persuaded in his own mind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5288"><span id="lf0610_label_6690">6</span> He that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1392" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1392_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>regardeth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1393" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1393_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>the day, regardeth <span class="ital">it</span> unto the Lord; and he that regardeth not the day, to the Lord he doth not regard <span class="ital">it.</span> He that eateth, eateth to the Lord, for he giveth God thanks; and he that eateth not, to the Lord he eateth not, and giveth God thanks.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5289"><span id="lf0610_label_6693">7</span> For none of us liveth to himself, and no man dieth to himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5290"><span id="lf0610_label_6694">8</span> For whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord&#x2019;s.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5291"><span id="lf0610_label_6695">9</span> For to this end Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5292"><span id="lf0610_label_6696">10</span> But why dost thou judge thy brother? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother? <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1394" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1394_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>for <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1395" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1395_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5293"><span id="lf0610_label_6699">11</span> For it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1396" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1396_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a><span class="ital">As</span> I live, saith the Lord, every knee shall bow to me, and every tongue shall confess to God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5294"><span id="lf0610_label_6701">12</span> So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5295"><span id="lf0610_label_6702">13</span> Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in <span class="ital">his</span> brother&#x2019;s way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5296"><span id="lf0610_label_6703">14</span> I know, and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus, that <span class="ital">there is</span> nothing <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1397" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1397_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>unclean of itself: but to him that esteemeth any thing to be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1398" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1398_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>unclean, to him <span class="ital">it is</span> unclean.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5297"><span id="lf0610_label_6706">15</span> But if thy brother be grieved with <span class="ital">thy</span> meat, now walkest thou not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1399" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1399_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>charitably. <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1400" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1400_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Destroy not him with thy meat, for whom Christ died.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5298"><span id="lf0610_label_6709">16</span> Let not then your good be evil spoken of:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5299"><span id="lf0610_label_6710">17</span> For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5300"><span id="lf0610_label_6711">18</span> For he that in these things serveth Christ <span class="ital">is</span> acceptable to God, and approved of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5301"><span id="lf0610_label_6712">19</span> Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace, and things wherewith one may edify another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5302"><span id="lf0610_label_6713">20</span> For meat destroy not the work of God. <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1401" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1401_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>All things indeed <span class="ital">are</span> pure; but <span class="ital">it is</span> evil for that man who eateth with offence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5303"><span id="lf0610_label_6715">21</span> <span class="ital">It is</span> good neither to eat <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1402" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1402_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>flesh, nor to drink wine, nor <span class="ital">any thing</span> whereby thy brother stumbleth, or is offended, or is made weak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5304"><span id="lf0610_label_6717">22</span> Hast thou faith? have <span class="ital">it</span> to thyself before God. Happy <span class="ital">is</span> he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>192<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5305"><span id="lf0610_label_6718">23</span> And he that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1403" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1403_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>doubteth is damned if he eat, because <span class="ital">he eateth</span> not of faith: for whatsoever <span class="ital">is</span> not of faith is sin.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_152" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6720">15</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5306"><span id="lf0610_label_6721">1</span> We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5307"><span id="lf0610_label_6722">2</span> Let every one of us please <span class="ital">his</span> neighbour for <span class="ital">his</span> good to edification.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5308"><span id="lf0610_label_6723">3</span> For even Christ pleased not himself; but, as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1404" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1404_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5309"><span id="lf0610_label_6725">4</span> For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5310"><span id="lf0610_label_6726">5</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1405" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1405_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1406" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1406_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>according to Christ Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5311"><span id="lf0610_label_6729">6</span> That ye may with one mind <span class="ital">and</span> one mouth glorify God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5312"><span id="lf0610_label_6730">7</span> Wherefore receive ye one another, as Christ also received us to the glory of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5313"><span id="lf0610_label_6731">8</span> Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God, to confirm the promises <span class="ital">made</span> unto the fathers:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5314"><span id="lf0610_label_6732">9</span> And that the Gentiles might glorify God for <span class="ital">his</span> mercy; as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1407" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1407_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles, and sing unto thy name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5315"><span id="lf0610_label_6734">10</span> And again he saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1408" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1408_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Rejoice, ye Gentiles, with his people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5316"><span id="lf0610_label_6736">11</span> And again, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1409" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1409_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Praise the Lord, all ye Gentiles; and laud him, all ye people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5317"><span id="lf0610_label_6738">12</span> And again, Esaias saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1410" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1410_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>There shall be a root of Jesse, and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles; in him shall the Gentiles trust.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5318"><span id="lf0610_label_6740">13</span> Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5319"><span id="lf0610_label_6741">14</span> And I myself also am persuaded of you, my brethren, that ye also are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5320"><span id="lf0610_label_6742">15</span> Nevertheless, brethren, I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort, as putting you in mind, because of the grace that is given to me of God,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5321"><span id="lf0610_label_6743">16</span> That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles, ministering the gospel of God, that the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1411" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1411_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable, being sanctified by the Holy Ghost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5322"><span id="lf0610_label_6745">17</span> I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5323"><span id="lf0610_label_6746">18</span> For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me, to make the Gentiles obedient, by word and deed,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5324"><span id="lf0610_label_6747">19</span> Through mighty signs and wonders, by the power of the Spirit of God; so that from Jerusalem, and round about unto Illyricum, I have fully preached the gospel of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5325"><span id="lf0610_label_6748">20</span> Yea, so have I strived to preach the gospel, not where Christ was named, lest I should build upon another man&#x2019;s foundation:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5326"><span id="lf0610_label_6749">21</span> But as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1412" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1412_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>To whom he was not spoken of, they shall see: and they that have not heard shall understand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5327"><span id="lf0610_label_6751">22</span> For which cause also I have been <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1413" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1413_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>much hindered from coming to you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5328"><span id="lf0610_label_6753">23</span> But now having no more place in these parts, and having a great desire these many years to come unto you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5329"><span id="lf0610_label_6754">24</span> Whensoever I take my journey into Spain, I will come to you: for I trust to see you in my journey, and to be brought on my way thitherward by you, if first I be somewhat filled <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1414" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1414_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>with your <span class="ital">company.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5330"><span id="lf0610_label_6756">25</span> But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5331"><span id="lf0610_label_6757">26</span> For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>193<span class="bracket">]</span></span> Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5332"><span id="lf0610_label_6758">27</span> It hath pleased them verily; and their debtors they are. For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things, their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5333"><span id="lf0610_label_6759">28</span> When therefore I have performed this, and have sealed to them this fruit, I will come by you into Spain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5334"><span id="lf0610_label_6760">29</span> And I am sure that, when I come unto you, I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5335"><span id="lf0610_label_6761">30</span> Now I beseech you, brethren, for the Lord Jesus Christ&#x2019;s sake, and for the love of the Spirit, that ye strive together with me in <span class="ital">your</span> prayers to God for me;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5336"><span id="lf0610_label_6762">31</span> That I may be delivered from them that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1415" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1415_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>do not believe in Jud&#xE6;a; and that my service which <span class="ital">I have</span> for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5337"><span id="lf0610_label_6764">32</span> That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God, and may with you be refreshed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5338"><span id="lf0610_label_6765">33</span> Now the God of peace <span class="ital">be</span> with you all. Amen.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_153" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6766">16</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5339"><span id="lf0610_label_6767">1</span> I commend unto you Phebe our sister, which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5340"><span id="lf0610_label_6768">2</span> That ye receive her in the Lord, as becometh saints, and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you: for she hath been a succourer of many, and of myself also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5341"><span id="lf0610_label_6769">3</span> Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5342"><span id="lf0610_label_6770">4</span> Who have for my life laid down their own necks: unto whom not only I give thanks, but also all the churches of the Gentiles.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5343"><span id="lf0610_label_6771">5</span> Likewise <span class="ital">greet</span> the church that is in their house. Salute my wellbeloved Ep&#xE6;netus, who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5344"><span id="lf0610_label_6772">6</span> Greet Mary, who bestowed much labour on us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5345"><span id="lf0610_label_6773">7</span> Salute Andronicus and Junia, my kinsmen, and my fellowprisoners, who are of note among the apostles, who also were in Christ before me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5346"><span id="lf0610_label_6774">8</span> Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5347"><span id="lf0610_label_6775">9</span> Salute Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5348"><span id="lf0610_label_6776">10</span> Salute Apelles approved in Christ. Salute them which are of Aristobulus&#x2019; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1416" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1416_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a><span class="ital">household.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5349"><span id="lf0610_label_6778">11</span> Salute Herodion my kinsman. Greet them that be of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1417" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1417_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a><span class="ital">household</span> of Narcissus, which are in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5350"><span id="lf0610_label_6780">12</span> Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa, who labour in the Lord. Salute the beloved Persis, which laboured much in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5351"><span id="lf0610_label_6781">13</span> Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord, and his mother and mine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5352"><span id="lf0610_label_6782">14</span> Salute Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, and the brethren which are with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5353"><span id="lf0610_label_6783">15</span> Salute Philologus, and Julia, Nereus, and his sister, and Olympas, and all the saints which are with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5354"><span id="lf0610_label_6784">16</span> Salute one another with an holy kiss. The churches of Christ salute you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5355"><span id="lf0610_label_6785">17</span> Now I beseech you, brethren, mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned; and avoid them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5356"><span id="lf0610_label_6786">18</span> For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ, but their own belly; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5357"><span id="lf0610_label_6787">19</span> For your obedience is come abroad unto all <span class="ital">men.</span> I am glad therefore on your behalf: but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1418" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1418_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>simple concerning evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5358"><span id="lf0610_label_6789">20</span> And the God of peace shall <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1419" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1419_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with you. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5359"><span id="lf0610_label_6791">21</span> Timotheus my workfellow, and Lucius, and Jason, and Sosipater, my kinsmen, salute you.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>194<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5360"><span id="lf0610_label_6792">22</span> I Tertius, who wrote <span class="ital">this</span> epistle, salute you in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5361"><span id="lf0610_label_6793">23</span> Gaius mine host, and of the whole church, saluteth you. Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you, and Quartus a brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5362"><span id="lf0610_label_6794">24</span> The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with you all. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5363"><span id="lf0610_label_6795">25</span> Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel, and the preaching of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery, which was kept secret since the world began,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5364"><span id="lf0610_label_6796">26</span> But now is made manifest, and by the scriptures of the prophets, according to the commandment of the everlasting God, made known to all nations for the obedience of faith:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5365"><span id="lf0610_label_6797">27</span> To God only wise, <span class="ital">be</span> glory through Jesus Christ for ever. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5366">&#xB6; Written to the Romans from Corinthus, <span class="ital">and sent</span> by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_154" class="type-part Corinthians_I">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_019">THE FIRST EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE CORINTHIANS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_155" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6798">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5367"><span id="lf0610_label_6799">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> called <span class="ital">to be</span> an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, and Sosthenes <span class="ital">our</span> brother,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5368"><span id="lf0610_label_6800">2</span> Unto the church of God which is at Corinth, to them that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1420" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1420_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>are sanctified in Christ Jesus, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1421" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1421_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>called <span class="ital">to be</span> saints, with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord, both theirs and ours:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5369"><span id="lf0610_label_6803">3</span> Grace <span class="ital">be</span> unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and <span class="ital">from</span> the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5370"><span id="lf0610_label_6804">4</span> I thank my God always on your behalf, for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5371"><span id="lf0610_label_6805">5</span> That in every thing ye are enriched by him, in all utterance, and <span class="ital">in</span> all knowledge;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5372"><span id="lf0610_label_6806">6</span> Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5373"><span id="lf0610_label_6807">7</span> So that ye come behind in no gift; waiting for the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1422" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1422_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>coming of our Lord Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5374"><span id="lf0610_label_6809">8</span> Who shall also confirm you unto the end, <span class="ital">that ye may be</span> blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5375"><span id="lf0610_label_6810">9</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1423" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1423_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>God <span class="ital">is</span> faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5376"><span id="lf0610_label_6812">10</span> Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and <span class="ital">that</span> there be no <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1424" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1424_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>divisions among you; but <span class="ital">that</span> ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5377"><span id="lf0610_label_6814">11</span> For it hath been declared unto me of you, my brethren, by them <span class="ital">which are of the house</span> of Chloe, that there are contentions among you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5378"><span id="lf0610_label_6815">12</span> Now this I say, that every one of you saith, I am of Paul; and I of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1425" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1425_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Apollos; and I of Cephas; and I of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5379"><span id="lf0610_label_6817">13</span> Is Christ divided? was Paul crucified for you? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5380"><span id="lf0610_label_6818">14</span> I thank God that I baptized none of you, but <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1426" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1426_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Crispus and Gaius;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5381"><span id="lf0610_label_6820">15</span> Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5382"><span id="lf0610_label_6821">16</span> And I baptized also the household of Stephanas: besides, I know not whether I baptized any other.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5383"><span id="lf0610_label_6822">17</span> For Christ sent me not to baptize, but to preach the gospel: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1427" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1427_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>not with wisdom of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1428" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1428_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>words, lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5384"><span id="lf0610_label_6825">18</span> For the preaching of the cross is to them that <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>195<span class="bracket">]</span></span> perish foolishness; but unto us which are saved it is the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1429" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1429_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>power of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5385"><span id="lf0610_label_6827">19</span> For it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1430" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1430_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5386"><span id="lf0610_label_6829">20</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1431" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1431_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Where <span class="ital">is</span> the wise? where <span class="ital">is</span> the scribe? where <span class="ital">is</span> the disputer of this world? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5387"><span id="lf0610_label_6831">21</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1432" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1432_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God, it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5388"><span id="lf0610_label_6833">22</span> For the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1433" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1433_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jews require a sign, and the Greeks seek after wisdom:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5389"><span id="lf0610_label_6835">23</span> But we preach Christ crucified, unto the Jews a stumblingblock, and unto the Greeks foolishness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5390"><span id="lf0610_label_6836">24</span> But unto them which are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5391"><span id="lf0610_label_6837">25</span> Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5392"><span id="lf0610_label_6838">26</span> For ye see your calling, brethren, how that not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, <span class="ital">are called:</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5393"><span id="lf0610_label_6839">27</span> But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5394"><span id="lf0610_label_6840">28</span> And base things of the world, and things which are despised, hath God chosen, <span class="ital">yea,</span> and things which are not, to bring to nought things that are:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5395"><span id="lf0610_label_6841">29</span> That no flesh should glory in his presence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5396"><span id="lf0610_label_6842">30</span> But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5397"><span id="lf0610_label_6843">31</span> That, according as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1434" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1434_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_156" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6845">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5398"><span id="lf0610_label_6846">1</span> And I, brethren, when I came to you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1435" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1435_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom, declaring unto you the testimony of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5399"><span id="lf0610_label_6848">2</span> For I determined not to know any thing among you, save Jesus Christ, and him crucified.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5400"><span id="lf0610_label_6849">3</span> And I was with you in weakness, and in fear, and in much trembling.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5401"><span id="lf0610_label_6850">4</span> And my speech and my preaching <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1436" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1436_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a><span class="ital">was</span> not with <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1437" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1437_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>enticing words of man&#x2019;s wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5402"><span id="lf0610_label_6853">5</span> That your faith should not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1438" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1438_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5403"><span id="lf0610_label_6855">6</span> Howbeit we speak wisdom among them that are perfect: yet not the wisdom of this world, nor of the princes of this world, that come to nought:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5404"><span id="lf0610_label_6856">7</span> But we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery, <span class="ital">even</span> the hidden <span class="ital">wisdom,</span> which God ordained before the world unto our glory:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5405"><span id="lf0610_label_6857">8</span> Which none of the princes of this world knew: for had they known <span class="ital">it,</span> they would not have crucified the Lord of glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5406"><span id="lf0610_label_6858">9</span> But as it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1439" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1439_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5407"><span id="lf0610_label_6860">10</span> But God hath revealed <span class="ital">them</span> unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5408"><span id="lf0610_label_6861">11</span> For what man knoweth the things of a man, save the spirit of man which is in him? even so the things of God knoweth no man, but the Spirit of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5409"><span id="lf0610_label_6862">12</span> Now we have received, not the spirit of the world, but the spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5410"><span id="lf0610_label_6863">13</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1440" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1440_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Which things also we speak, not in the words which man&#x2019;s wisdom teacheth, but which the Holy Ghost teacheth; comparing spiritual things with spiritual.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5411"><span id="lf0610_label_6865">14</span> But the natural man receiveth not the things <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>196<span class="bracket">]</span></span> of the Spirit of God: for they are foolishness unto him: neither can he know <span class="ital">them,</span> because they are spiritually discerned.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5412"><span id="lf0610_label_6866">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1441" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1441_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But he that is spiritual <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1442" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1442_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>judgeth all things, yet he himself is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1443" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1443_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>judged of no man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5413"><span id="lf0610_label_6870">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1444" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1444_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For who hath known the mind of the Lord, that he <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1445" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1445_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>may instruct him? But we have the mind of Christ.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_157" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6873">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5414"><span id="lf0610_label_6874">1</span> And I, brethren, could not speak unto you as unto spiritual, but as unto carnal, <span class="ital">even</span> as unto babes in Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5415"><span id="lf0610_label_6875">2</span> I have fed you with milk, and not with meat: for hitherto ye were not able <span class="ital">to bear it,</span> neither yet now are ye able.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5416"><span id="lf0610_label_6876">3</span> For ye are yet carnal: for whereas <span class="ital">there is</span> among you envying, and strife, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1446" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1446_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>divisions, are ye not carnal, and walk <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1447" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1447_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>as men?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5417"><span id="lf0610_label_6879">4</span> For while one saith, I am of Paul; and another, I <span class="ital">am</span> of Apollos; are ye not carnal?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5418"><span id="lf0610_label_6880">5</span> Who then is Paul, and who <span class="ital">is</span> Apollos, but ministers by whom ye believed, even as the Lord gave to every man?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5419"><span id="lf0610_label_6881">6</span> I have planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5420"><span id="lf0610_label_6882">7</span> So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5421"><span id="lf0610_label_6883">8</span> Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1448" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1448_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5422"><span id="lf0610_label_6885">9</span> For we are labourers together with God: ye are God&#x2019;s <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1449" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1449_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>husbandry, <span class="ital">ye are</span> God&#x2019;s building.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5423"><span id="lf0610_label_6887">10</span> According to the grace of God which is given unto me, as a wise masterbuilder, I have laid the foundation, and another buildeth thereon. But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5424"><span id="lf0610_label_6888">11</span> For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5425"><span id="lf0610_label_6889">12</span> Now if any man build upon this foundation gold, silver, precious stones, wood, hay, stubble;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5426"><span id="lf0610_label_6890">13</span> Every man&#x2019;s work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1450" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1450_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man&#x2019;s work of what sort it is.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5427"><span id="lf0610_label_6892">14</span> If any man&#x2019;s work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5428"><span id="lf0610_label_6893">15</span> If any man&#x2019;s work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5429"><span id="lf0610_label_6894">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1451" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1451_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and <span class="ital">that</span> the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5430"><span id="lf0610_label_6896">17</span> If any man <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1452" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1452_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which <span class="ital">temple</span> ye are.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5431"><span id="lf0610_label_6898">18</span> Let no man deceive himself. If any man among you seemeth to be wise in this world, let him become a fool, that he may be wise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5432"><span id="lf0610_label_6899">19</span> For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1453" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1453_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>He taketh the wise in their own craftiness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5433"><span id="lf0610_label_6901">20</span> And again, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1454" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1454_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise, that they are vain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5434"><span id="lf0610_label_6903">21</span> Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5435"><span id="lf0610_label_6904">22</span> Whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are yours;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5436"><span id="lf0610_label_6905">23</span> And ye are Christ&#x2019;s; and Christ <span class="ital">is</span> God&#x2019;s.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_158" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6906">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5437"><span id="lf0610_label_6907">1</span> Let a man so account of us, as of the ministers of Christ, and stewards of the mysteries of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5438"><span id="lf0610_label_6908">2</span> Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5439"><span id="lf0610_label_6909">3</span> But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you, or of man&#x2019;s <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1455" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1455_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>judgment: yea, I judge not mine own self.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5440"><span id="lf0610_label_6911">4</span> For I know nothing by myself; yet am I not hereby justified: but he that judgeth me is the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5441"><span id="lf0610_label_6912">5</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1456" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1456_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Therefore judge nothing before the time, until <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>197<span class="bracket">]</span></span> the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5442"><span id="lf0610_label_6914">6</span> And these things, brethren, I have in a figure transferred to myself and <span class="ital">to</span> Apollos for your sakes; that ye might learn in us not to think <span class="ital">of men</span> above that which is written, that no one of you be puffed up for one against another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5443"><span id="lf0610_label_6915">7</span> For who <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1457" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1457_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>maketh thee to differ <span class="ital">from another?</span> and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive <span class="ital">it,</span> why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received <span class="ital">it?</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5444"><span id="lf0610_label_6917">8</span> Now ye are full, now ye are rich, ye have reigned as kings without us: and I would to God ye did reign, that we also might reign with you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5445"><span id="lf0610_label_6918">9</span> For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last, as it were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1458" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1458_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>appointed to death: for we are made a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1459" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1459_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>spectacle unto the world, and to angels, and to men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5446"><span id="lf0610_label_6921">10</span> We <span class="ital">are</span> fools for Christ&#x2019;s sake, but ye <span class="ital">are</span> wise in Christ; we <span class="ital">are</span> weak, but ye <span class="ital">are</span> strong; ye <span class="ital">are</span> honourable, but we <span class="ital">are</span> despised.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5447"><span id="lf0610_label_6922">11</span> Even unto this present hour we both hunger, and thirst, and are naked, and are buffeted, and have no certain dwellingplace;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5448"><span id="lf0610_label_6923">12</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1460" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1460_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And labour, working with our own hands: being reviled, we bless; being persecuted, we suffer it:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5449"><span id="lf0610_label_6925">13</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1461" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1461_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Being defamed, we intreat: we are made as the filth of the world, <span class="ital">and are</span> the offscouring of all things unto this day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5450"><span id="lf0610_label_6927">14</span> I write not these things to shame you, but as my beloved sons I warn <span class="ital">you.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5451"><span id="lf0610_label_6928">15</span> For though ye have ten thousand instructers in Christ, yet <span class="ital">have ye</span> not many fathers: for in Christ Jesus I have begotten you through the gospel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5452"><span id="lf0610_label_6929">16</span> Wherefore I beseech you, be ye followers of me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5453"><span id="lf0610_label_6930">17</span> For this cause have I sent unto you Timotheus, who is my beloved son, and faithful in the Lord, who shall bring you into remembrance of my ways which be in Christ, as I teach every where in every church.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5454"><span id="lf0610_label_6931">18</span> Now some are puffed up, as though I would not come to you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5455"><span id="lf0610_label_6932">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1462" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1462_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>But I will come to you shortly, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1463" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1463_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>if the Lord will, and will know, not the speech of them which are puffed up, but the power.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5456"><span id="lf0610_label_6935">20</span> For the kingdom of God <span class="ital">is</span> not in word, but in power.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5457"><span id="lf0610_label_6936">21</span> What will ye? shall I come unto you with a rod, or in love, and <span class="ital">in</span> the spirit of meekness?</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_159" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_6937">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5458"><span id="lf0610_label_6938">1</span> It is reported commonly <span class="ital">that there is</span> fornication among you, and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles, that one should have his father&#x2019;s wife.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5459"><span id="lf0610_label_6939">2</span> And ye are puffed up, and have not rather mourned, that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_5460"><span id="lf0610_label_6940">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1464" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1464_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>For I verily, as absent in body, but present in spirit, have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1465" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1465_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>judged already, as though I were present, <span class="ital">concerning</span> him that hath so done this deed,</p>
