<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6117"><span id="lf0610_label_7770">10</span> For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse: for it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1612" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1612_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Cursed <span class="ital">is</span> every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6118"><span id="lf0610_label_7772">11</span> But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, <span class="ital">it is</span> evident: for, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1613" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1613_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The just shall live by faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6119"><span id="lf0610_label_7774">12</span> And the law is not of faith: but, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1614" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1614_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The man that doeth them shall live in them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6120"><span id="lf0610_label_7776">13</span> Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1615" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1615_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Cursed <span class="ital">is</span> every one that hangeth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1616" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1616_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>on a tree:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6121"><span id="lf0610_label_7779">14</span> That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6122"><span id="lf0610_label_7780">15</span> Brethren, I speak after the manner of men; Though <span class="ital">it be</span> but a man&#x2019;s <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1617" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1617_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>covenant, yet <span class="ital">if it be</span> confirmed, no man disannulleth, or addeth thereto.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6123"><span id="lf0610_label_7782">16</span> Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made. He saith not, And to seeds, as of many; but as of one, And to thy seed, which is Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6124"><span id="lf0610_label_7783">17</span> And this I say, <span class="ital">that</span> the covenant, that was confirmed before of God in Christ, the law, which was four hundred and thirty years after, cannot disannul, that it should make the promise of none effect.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6125"><span id="lf0610_label_7784">18</span> For if the inheritance <span class="ital">be</span> of the law, <span class="ital">it is</span> no more of promise: but God gave <span class="ital">it</span> to Abraham by promise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6126"><span id="lf0610_label_7785">19</span> Wherefore then <span class="ital">serveth</span> the law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise was made; <span class="ital">and it was</span> ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6127"><span id="lf0610_label_7786">20</span> Now a mediator is not <span class="ital">a mediator</span> of one, but God is one.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6128"><span id="lf0610_label_7787">21</span> <span class="ital">Is</span> the law then against the promises of God? God forbid: for if there had been a law given which could have given life, verily righteousness should have been by the law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6129"><span id="lf0610_label_7788">22</span> But the scripture hath concluded all under sin, that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6130"><span id="lf0610_label_7789">23</span> But before faith came, we were kept under the law, shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>223<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6131"><span id="lf0610_label_7790">24</span> Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster <span class="ital">to bring us</span> unto Christ, that we might be justified by faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6132"><span id="lf0610_label_7791">25</span> But after that faith is come, we are no longer under a schoolmaster.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6133"><span id="lf0610_label_7792">26</span> For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6134"><span id="lf0610_label_7793">27</span> For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6135"><span id="lf0610_label_7794">28</span> There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither bond nor free, there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6136"><span id="lf0610_label_7795">29</span> And if ye <span class="ital">be</span> Christ&#x2019;s, then are ye Abraham&#x2019;s seed, and heirs according to the promise.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_189" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7796">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6137"><span id="lf0610_label_7797">1</span> Now I say, <span class="ital">That</span> the heir, as long as he is a child, differeth nothing from a servant, though he be lord of all;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6138"><span id="lf0610_label_7798">2</span> But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6139"><span id="lf0610_label_7799">3</span> Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1618" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1618_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>elements of the world:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6140"><span id="lf0610_label_7801">4</span> But when the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6141"><span id="lf0610_label_7802">5</span> To redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6142"><span id="lf0610_label_7803">6</span> And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6143"><span id="lf0610_label_7804">7</span> Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6144"><span id="lf0610_label_7805">8</span> Howbeit then, when ye knew not God, ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6145"><span id="lf0610_label_7806">9</span> But now, after that ye have known God, or rather are known of God, how turn ye <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1619" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1619_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>again to the weak and beggarly <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1620" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1620_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>elements, whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6146"><span id="lf0610_label_7809">10</span> Ye observe days, and months, and times, and years.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6147"><span id="lf0610_label_7810">11</span> I am afraid of you, lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6148"><span id="lf0610_label_7811">12</span> Brethren, I beseech you, be as I <span class="ital">am;</span> for I <span class="ital">am</span> as ye <span class="ital">are:</span> ye have not injured me at all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6149"><span id="lf0610_label_7812">13</span> Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6150"><span id="lf0610_label_7813">14</span> And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not, nor rejected; but received me as an angel of God, <span class="ital">eren</span> as Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6151"><span id="lf0610_label_7814">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1621" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1621_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Where is then the blessedness ye spake of? for I bear you record, that, if <span class="ital">it had been</span> possible, ye would have plucked out your own eyes, and have given them to me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6152"><span id="lf0610_label_7816">16</span> Am I therefore become your enemy, because I tell you the truth?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6153"><span id="lf0610_label_7817">17</span> They zealously affect you, <span class="ital">but</span> not well; yea, they would exclude <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1622" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1622_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>you, that ye might affect them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6154"><span id="lf0610_label_7819">18</span> But <span class="ital">it is</span> good to be zealously affected always in <span class="ital">a</span> good <span class="ital">thing,</span> and not only when I am present with you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6155"><span id="lf0610_label_7820">19</span> My little children, of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6156"><span id="lf0610_label_7821">20</span> I desire to be present with you now, and to change my voice; for <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1623" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1623_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>I stand in doubt of you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6157"><span id="lf0610_label_7823">21</span> Tell me, ye that desire to be under the law, do ye not hear the law?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6158"><span id="lf0610_label_7824">22</span> For it is written, that Abraham had two sons, the one by a bondmaid, the other by a freewoman.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6159"><span id="lf0610_label_7825">23</span> But he <span class="ital">who was</span> of the bondwoman was born after the flesh; but he of the freewoman <span class="ital">was</span> by promise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6160"><span id="lf0610_label_7826">24</span> Which things are an allegory: for these are the two <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1624" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1624_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>covenants; the one from the mount Sinai, which gendereth to bondage, which is Agar.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6161"><span id="lf0610_label_7828">25</span> For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1625" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1625_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>answereth to Jerusalem which now is, and is in bondage with her children.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6162"><span id="lf0610_label_7830">26</span> But Jerusalem which is above is free, which is the mother of us all.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>224<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6163"><span id="lf0610_label_7831">27</span> For it is written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1626" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1626_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Rejoice, <span class="ital">thou</span> barren that bearest not; break forth and cry, thou that travailest not: for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6164"><span id="lf0610_label_7833">28</span> Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are the children of promise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6165"><span id="lf0610_label_7834">29</span> But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him <span class="ital">that was born</span> after the Spirit, even so <span class="ital">it is</span> now.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6166"><span id="lf0610_label_7835">30</span> Nevertheless what saith the scripture? <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1627" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1627_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Cast out the bondwoman and her son: for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6167"><span id="lf0610_label_7837">31</span> So then, brethren, we are not children of the bondwoman, but of the free.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_190" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7838">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6168"><span id="lf0610_label_7839">1</span> Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6169"><span id="lf0610_label_7840">2</span> Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6170"><span id="lf0610_label_7841">3</span> For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6171"><span id="lf0610_label_7842">4</span> Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6172"><span id="lf0610_label_7843">5</span> For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6173"><span id="lf0610_label_7844">6</span> For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6174"><span id="lf0610_label_7845">7</span> Ye did run well; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1628" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1628_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6175"><span id="lf0610_label_7847">8</span> This persuasion <span class="ital">cometh</span> not of him that calleth you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6176"><span id="lf0610_label_7848">9</span> A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6177"><span id="lf0610_label_7849">10</span> I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6178"><span id="lf0610_label_7850">11</span> And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6179"><span id="lf0610_label_7851">12</span> I would they were even cut off which trouble you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6180"><span id="lf0610_label_7852">13</span> For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only <span class="ital">use</span> not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6181"><span id="lf0610_label_7853">14</span> For all the law is fulfilled in one word, <span class="ital">even</span> in this; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1629" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1629_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6182"><span id="lf0610_label_7855">15</span> But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1630" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1630_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>that ye be not consumed one of another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6183"><span id="lf0610_label_7857">16</span> <span class="ital">This</span> I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1631" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1631_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6184"><span id="lf0610_label_7859">17</span> For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6185"><span id="lf0610_label_7860">18</span> But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6186"><span id="lf0610_label_7861">19</span> Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are <span class="ital">these;</span> Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6187"><span id="lf0610_label_7862">20</span> Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6188"><span id="lf0610_label_7863">21</span> Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told <span class="ital">you</span> in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6189"><span id="lf0610_label_7864">22</span> But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6190"><span id="lf0610_label_7865">23</span> Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6191"><span id="lf0610_label_7866">24</span> And they that are Christ&#x2019;s have crucified the flesh with the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1632" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1632_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>affections and lusts.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6192"><span id="lf0610_label_7868">25</span> If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6193"><span id="lf0610_label_7869">26</span> Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_191" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7870">6</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6194"><span id="lf0610_label_7871">1</span> Brethren, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1633" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1633_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6195"><span id="lf0610_label_7873">2</span> Bear ye one another&#x2019;s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6196"><span id="lf0610_label_7874">3</span> For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6197"><span id="lf0610_label_7875">4</span> But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6198"><span id="lf0610_label_7876">5</span> For every man shall bear his own burden.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6199"><span id="lf0610_label_7877">6</span> Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6200"><span id="lf0610_label_7878">7</span> Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6201"><span id="lf0610_label_7879">8</span> For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6202"><span id="lf0610_label_7880">9</span> And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6203"><span id="lf0610_label_7881">10</span> As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all <span class="ital">men,</span> especially unto them who are of the household of faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6204"><span id="lf0610_label_7882">11</span> Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6205"><span id="lf0610_label_7883">12</span> As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6206"><span id="lf0610_label_7884">13</span> For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6207"><span id="lf0610_label_7885">14</span> But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1634" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1634_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6208"><span id="lf0610_label_7887">15</span> For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6209"><span id="lf0610_label_7888">16</span> And as many as walk according to this rule, peace <span class="ital">be</span> on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6210"><span id="lf0610_label_7889">17</span> From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6211"><span id="lf0610_label_7890">18</span> Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with your spirit. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6212">&#xB6; Unto the Galatians written from Rome.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_192" class="type-part Ephesians">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_025">THE EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE EPHESIANS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_193" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7891">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6213"><span id="lf0610_label_7892">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6214"><span id="lf0610_label_7893">2</span> Grace <span class="ital">be</span> to you, and peace, from God our Father, and <span class="ital">from</span> the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6215"><span id="lf0610_label_7894">3</span> Blessed <span class="ital">be</span> the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1635" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1635_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a><span class="ital">places</span> in Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6216"><span id="lf0610_label_7896">4</span> According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6217"><span id="lf0610_label_7897">5</span> Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6218"><span id="lf0610_label_7898">6</span> To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6219"><span id="lf0610_label_7899">7</span> In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>226<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6220"><span id="lf0610_label_7900">8</span> Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6221"><span id="lf0610_label_7901">9</span> Having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1636" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1636_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>hath purposed in himself:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6222"><span id="lf0610_label_7903">10</span> That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1637" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1637_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>heaven, and which are on earth; <span class="ital">even</span> in him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6223"><span id="lf0610_label_7905">11</span> In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6224"><span id="lf0610_label_7906">12</span> That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1638" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1638_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>trusted in Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6225"><span id="lf0610_label_7908">13</span> In whom ye also <span class="ital">trusted,</span> after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6226"><span id="lf0610_label_7909">14</span> Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6227"><span id="lf0610_label_7910">15</span> Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6228"><span id="lf0610_label_7911">16</span> Cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6229"><span id="lf0610_label_7912">17</span> That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1639" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1639_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in the knowledge of him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6230"><span id="lf0610_label_7914">18</span> The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6231"><span id="lf0610_label_7915">19</span> And what <span class="ital">is</span> the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1640" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1640_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>of his mighty power,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6232"><span id="lf0610_label_7917">20</span> Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set <span class="ital">him</span> at his own right hand in the heavenly <span class="ital">places,</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6233"><span id="lf0610_label_7918">21</span> Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6234"><span id="lf0610_label_7919">22</span> And hath put all <span class="ital">things</span> under his feet, and gave him <span class="ital">to be</span> the head over all <span class="ital">things</span> to the church,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6235"><span id="lf0610_label_7920">23</span> Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_194" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7921">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6236"><span id="lf0610_label_7922">1</span> And you <span class="ital">hath he quickened,</span> who were dead in trespasses and sins;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6237"><span id="lf0610_label_7923">2</span> Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6238"><span id="lf0610_label_7924">3</span> Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1641" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1641_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6239"><span id="lf0610_label_7926">4</span> But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6240"><span id="lf0610_label_7927">5</span> Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6241"><span id="lf0610_label_7928">6</span> And hath raised <span class="ital">us</span> up together, and made <span class="ital">us</span> sit together in heavenly <span class="ital">places</span> in Christ Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6242"><span id="lf0610_label_7929">7</span> That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in <span class="ital">his</span> kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6243"><span id="lf0610_label_7930">8</span> For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: <span class="ital">it is</span> the gift of God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6244"><span id="lf0610_label_7931">9</span> Not of works, lest any man should boast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6245"><span id="lf0610_label_7932">10</span> For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1642" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1642_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ordained that we should walk in them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6246"><span id="lf0610_label_7934">11</span> Wherefore remember, that ye <span class="ital">being</span> in time past Gentiles in the flesh, who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6247"><span id="lf0610_label_7935">12</span> That at that time ye were without Christ, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>227<span class="bracket">]</span></span> being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6248"><span id="lf0610_label_7936">13</span> But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6249"><span id="lf0610_label_7937">14</span> For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition <span class="ital">between us;</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6250"><span id="lf0610_label_7938">15</span> Having abolished in his flesh the enmity, <span class="ital">even</span> the law of commandments <span class="ital">contained</span> in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, <span class="ital">so</span> making peace;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6251"><span id="lf0610_label_7939">16</span> And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross, having slain the enmity <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1643" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1643_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>thereby:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6252"><span id="lf0610_label_7941">17</span> And came and preached peace to you which were afar off, and to them that were nigh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6253"><span id="lf0610_label_7942">18</span> For through him we both have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1644" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1644_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>access by one Spirit unto the Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6254"><span id="lf0610_label_7944">19</span> Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6255"><span id="lf0610_label_7945">20</span> And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner <span class="ital">stone;</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6256"><span id="lf0610_label_7946">21</span> In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6257"><span id="lf0610_label_7947">22</span> In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_195" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7948">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6258"><span id="lf0610_label_7949">1</span> For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6259"><span id="lf0610_label_7950">2</span> If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6260"><span id="lf0610_label_7951">3</span> How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery; (as I wrote <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1645" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1645_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>afore in few words,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6261"><span id="lf0610_label_7953">4</span> Whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6262"><span id="lf0610_label_7954">5</span> Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men, as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6263"><span id="lf0610_label_7955">6</span> That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs, and of the same body, and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6264"><span id="lf0610_label_7956">7</span> Whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6265"><span id="lf0610_label_7957">8</span> Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6266"><span id="lf0610_label_7958">9</span> And to make all <span class="ital">men</span> see what <span class="ital">is</span> the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6267"><span id="lf0610_label_7959">10</span> To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly <span class="ital">places</span> might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6268"><span id="lf0610_label_7960">11</span> According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6269"><span id="lf0610_label_7961">12</span> In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6270"><span id="lf0610_label_7962">13</span> Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6271"><span id="lf0610_label_7963">14</span> For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6272"><span id="lf0610_label_7964">15</span> Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6273"><span id="lf0610_label_7965">16</span> That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6274"><span id="lf0610_label_7966">17</span> That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6275"><span id="lf0610_label_7967">18</span> May be able to comprehend with all saints what <span class="ital">is</span> the breadth, and length, and depth, and height;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6276"><span id="lf0610_label_7968">19</span> And to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6277"><span id="lf0610_label_7969">20</span> Now unto him that is able to do exceeding <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>228<span class="bracket">]</span></span> abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6278"><span id="lf0610_label_7970">21</span> Unto him <span class="ital">be</span> glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_196" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_7971">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6279"><span id="lf0610_label_7972">1</span> I therefore, the prisoner <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1646" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1646_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6280"><span id="lf0610_label_7974">2</span> With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6281"><span id="lf0610_label_7975">3</span> Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6282"><span id="lf0610_label_7976">4</span> <span class="ital">There is</span> one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6283"><span id="lf0610_label_7977">5</span> One Lord, one faith, one baptism,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6284"><span id="lf0610_label_7978">6</span> One God and Father of all, who <span class="ital">is</span> above all, and through all, and in you all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6285"><span id="lf0610_label_7979">7</span> But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6286"><span id="lf0610_label_7980">8</span> Wherefore he saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1647" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1647_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>When he ascended up on high, he led <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1648" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1648_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>captivity captive, and gave gifts unto men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6287"><span id="lf0610_label_7983">9</span> (Now that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6288"><span id="lf0610_label_7984">10</span> He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens, that he might <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1649" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1649_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>fill all things.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6289"><span id="lf0610_label_7986">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1650" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1650_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6290"><span id="lf0610_label_7988">12</span> For the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6291"><span id="lf0610_label_7989">13</span> Till we all come <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1651" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1651_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1652" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1652_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>stature of the fulness of Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6292"><span id="lf0610_label_7992">14</span> That we <span class="ital">henceforth</span> be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, <span class="ital">and</span> cunning craftiness, whereby they he in wait to deceive;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6293"><span id="lf0610_label_7993">15</span> But <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1653" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1653_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, <span class="ital">even</span> Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6294"><span id="lf0610_label_7995">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1654" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1654_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6295"><span id="lf0610_label_7997">17</span> This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6296"><span id="lf0610_label_7998">18</span> Having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1655" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1655_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a><a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1656" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1656_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>blindness of their heart:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6297"><span id="lf0610_label_8001">19</span> Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6298"><span id="lf0610_label_8002">20</span> But ye have not so learned Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6299"><span id="lf0610_label_8003">21</span> If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6300"><span id="lf0610_label_8004">22</span> That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6301"><span id="lf0610_label_8005">23</span> And be renewed in the spirit of your mind;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6302"><span id="lf0610_label_8006">24</span> And that ye put on <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1657" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1657_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1658" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1658_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>true holiness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6303"><span id="lf0610_label_8009">25</span> Wherefore putting away lying, speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6304"><span id="lf0610_label_8010">26</span> Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6305"><span id="lf0610_label_8011">27</span> Neither give place to the devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6306"><span id="lf0610_label_8012">28</span> Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with <span class="ital">his</span> hands the thing which is good, that he may have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1659" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1659_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to give to him that needeth.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>229<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6307"><span id="lf0610_label_8014">29</span> Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1660" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1660_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6308"><span id="lf0610_label_8016">30</span> And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6309"><span id="lf0610_label_8017">31</span> Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamour, and evil speaking, be put away from you, with all malice:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6310"><span id="lf0610_label_8018">32</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1661" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1661_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ&#x2019;s sake hath forgiven you.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_197" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8020">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6311"><span id="lf0610_label_8021">1</span> Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6312"><span id="lf0610_label_8022">2</span> And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6313"><span id="lf0610_label_8023">3</span> But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6314"><span id="lf0610_label_8024">4</span> Neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6315"><span id="lf0610_label_8025">5</span> For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6316"><span id="lf0610_label_8026">6</span> Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1662" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1662_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>disobedience.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6317"><span id="lf0610_label_8028">7</span> Be not ye therefore partakers with them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6318"><span id="lf0610_label_8029">8</span> For ye were sometimes darkness, but now <span class="ital">are ye</span> light in the Lord: walk as children of light:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6319"><span id="lf0610_label_8030">9</span> (For the fruit of the Spirit <span class="ital">is</span> in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6320"><span id="lf0610_label_8031">10</span> Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6321"><span id="lf0610_label_8032">11</span> And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove <span class="ital">them.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6322"><span id="lf0610_label_8033">12</span> For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6323"><span id="lf0610_label_8034">13</span> But all things that are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1663" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1663_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6324"><span id="lf0610_label_8036">14</span> Wherefore he saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1664" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1664_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6325"><span id="lf0610_label_8038">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1665" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1665_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6326"><span id="lf0610_label_8040">16</span> Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6327"><span id="lf0610_label_8041">17</span> Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord <span class="ital">is.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6328"><span id="lf0610_label_8042">18</span> And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6329"><span id="lf0610_label_8043">19</span> Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6330"><span id="lf0610_label_8044">20</span> Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6331"><span id="lf0610_label_8045">21</span> Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6332"><span id="lf0610_label_8046">22</span> Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6333"><span id="lf0610_label_8047">23</span> For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6334"><span id="lf0610_label_8048">24</span> Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so <span class="ital">let</span> the wives <span class="ital">be</span> to their own husbands in every thing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6335"><span id="lf0610_label_8049">25</span> Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6336"><span id="lf0610_label_8050">26</span> That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6337"><span id="lf0610_label_8051">27</span> That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6338"><span id="lf0610_label_8052">28</span> So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6339"><span id="lf0610_label_8053">29</span> For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>230<span class="bracket">]</span></span> nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6340"><span id="lf0610_label_8054">30</span> For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6341"><span id="lf0610_label_8055">31</span> For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6342"><span id="lf0610_label_8056">32</span> This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6343"><span id="lf0610_label_8057">33</span> Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife <span class="ital">see</span> that she reverence <span class="ital">her</span> husband.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_198" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8058">6</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6344"><span id="lf0610_label_8059">1</span> Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6345"><span id="lf0610_label_8060">2</span> Honour thy father and mother; which is the first commandment with promise;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6346"><span id="lf0610_label_8061">3</span> That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6347"><span id="lf0610_label_8062">4</span> And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6348"><span id="lf0610_label_8063">5</span> Servants, be obedient to them that are <span class="ital">your</span> masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6349"><span id="lf0610_label_8064">6</span> Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6350"><span id="lf0610_label_8065">7</span> With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6351"><span id="lf0610_label_8066">8</span> Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether <span class="ital">he be</span> bond or free.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6352"><span id="lf0610_label_8067">9</span> And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1666" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1666_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>forbearing threatening: knowing that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1667" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1667_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6353"><span id="lf0610_label_8070">10</span> Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6354"><span id="lf0610_label_8071">11</span> Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6355"><span id="lf0610_label_8072">12</span> For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1668" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1668_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>spiritual wickedness in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1669" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1669_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>high <span class="ital">places.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6356"><span id="lf0610_label_8075">13</span> Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1670" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1670_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>having done all, to stand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6357"><span id="lf0610_label_8077">14</span> Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6358"><span id="lf0610_label_8078">15</span> And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6359"><span id="lf0610_label_8079">16</span> Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6360"><span id="lf0610_label_8080">17</span> And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6361"><span id="lf0610_label_8081">18</span> Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6362"><span id="lf0610_label_8082">19</span> And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6363"><span id="lf0610_label_8083">20</span> For which I am an ambassador <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1671" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1671_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in bonds: that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1672" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1672_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6364"><span id="lf0610_label_8086">21</span> But that ye also may know my affairs, <span class="ital">and</span> how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6365"><span id="lf0610_label_8087">22</span> Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and <span class="ital">that</span> he might comfort your hearts.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6366"><span id="lf0610_label_8088">23</span> Peace <span class="ital">be</span> to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6367"><span id="lf0610_label_8089">24</span> Grace <span class="ital">be</span> with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1673" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1673_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in sincerity. <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1674" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1674_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6368">&#xB6; Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>231<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_199" class="type-part Philippians">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_027">THE EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE PHILIPPIANS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_200" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8092">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6369"><span id="lf0610_label_8093">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul</span> and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6370"><span id="lf0610_label_8094">2</span> Grace <span class="ital">be</span> unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and <span class="ital">from</span> the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6371"><span id="lf0610_label_8095">3</span> I thank my God upon every <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1675" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1675_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>remembrance of you,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6372"><span id="lf0610_label_8097">4</span> Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6373"><span id="lf0610_label_8098">5</span> For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6374"><span id="lf0610_label_8099">6</span> Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1676" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1676_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>will perform <span class="ital">it</span> until the day of Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6375"><span id="lf0610_label_8101">7</span> Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1677" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1677_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1678" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1678_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>partakers of my grace.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6376"><span id="lf0610_label_8104">8</span> For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6377"><span id="lf0610_label_8105">9</span> And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and <span class="ital">in</span> all <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1679" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1679_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>judgment;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6378"><span id="lf0610_label_8107">10</span> That ye may <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1680" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1680_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>approve things that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1681" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1681_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6379"><span id="lf0610_label_8110">11</span> Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6380"><span id="lf0610_label_8111">12</span> But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things <span class="ital">which happened</span> unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6381"><span id="lf0610_label_8112">13</span> So that my bonds <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1682" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1682_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in Christ are manifest in all <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1683" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1683_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the palace, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1684" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1684_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in all other <span class="ital">places;</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6382"><span id="lf0610_label_8116">14</span> And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6383"><span id="lf0610_label_8117">15</span> Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6384"><span id="lf0610_label_8118">16</span> The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6385"><span id="lf0610_label_8119">17</span> But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6386"><span id="lf0610_label_8120">18</span> What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6387"><span id="lf0610_label_8121">19</span> For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6388"><span id="lf0610_label_8122">20</span> According to my earnest expectation and <span class="ital">my</span> hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but <span class="ital">that</span> with all boldness, as always, <span class="ital">so</span> now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether <span class="ital">it be</span> by life, or by death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6389"><span id="lf0610_label_8123">21</span> For to me to live <span class="ital">is</span> Christ, and to die <span class="ital">is</span> gain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6390"><span id="lf0610_label_8124">22</span> But if I live in the flesh, this <span class="ital">is</span> the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6391"><span id="lf0610_label_8125">23</span> For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6392"><span id="lf0610_label_8126">24</span> Nevertheless to abide in the flesh <span class="ital">is</span> more needful for you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6393"><span id="lf0610_label_8127">25</span> And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>232<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6394"><span id="lf0610_label_8128">26</span> That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6395"><span id="lf0610_label_8129">27</span> Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6396"><span id="lf0610_label_8130">28</span> And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6397"><span id="lf0610_label_8131">29</span> For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6398"><span id="lf0610_label_8132">30</span> Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear <span class="ital">to be</span> in me.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_201" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8133">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6399"><span id="lf0610_label_8134">1</span> If <span class="ital">there be</span> therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6400"><span id="lf0610_label_8135">2</span> Fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love, <span class="ital">being</span> of one accord, of one mind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6401"><span id="lf0610_label_8136">3</span> <span class="ital">Let</span> nothing <span class="ital">be done</span> through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6402"><span id="lf0610_label_8137">4</span> Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6403"><span id="lf0610_label_8138">5</span> Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6404"><span id="lf0610_label_8139">6</span> Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6405"><span id="lf0610_label_8140">7</span> But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1685" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1685_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>likeness of men:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6406"><span id="lf0610_label_8142">8</span> And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6407"><span id="lf0610_label_8143">9</span> Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6408"><span id="lf0610_label_8144">10</span> That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of <span class="ital">things</span> in heaven, and <span class="ital">things</span> in earth, and <span class="ital">things</span> under the earth;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6409"><span id="lf0610_label_8145">11</span> And <span class="ital">that</span> every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ <span class="ital">is</span> Lord, to the glory of God the Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6410"><span id="lf0610_label_8146">12</span> Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6411"><span id="lf0610_label_8147">13</span> For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of <span class="ital">his</span> good pleasure.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6412"><span id="lf0610_label_8148">14</span> Do all things without murmurings and disputings:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6413"><span id="lf0610_label_8149">15</span> That ye may be blameless and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1686" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1686_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1687" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1687_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ye shine as lights in the world;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6414"><span id="lf0610_label_8152">16</span> Holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6415"><span id="lf0610_label_8153">17</span> Yea, and if I be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1688" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1688_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6416"><span id="lf0610_label_8155">18</span> For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6417"><span id="lf0610_label_8156">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1689" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1689_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timothens shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6418"><span id="lf0610_label_8158">20</span> For I have no man <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1690" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1690_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6419"><span id="lf0610_label_8160">21</span> For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ&#x2019;s.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6420"><span id="lf0610_label_8161">22</span> But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6421"><span id="lf0610_label_8162">23</span> Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6422"><span id="lf0610_label_8163">24</span> But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6423"><span id="lf0610_label_8164">25</span> Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, and companion in labour, and fellowsoldier, but your messenger, and he that ministered to my wants.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>233<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6424"><span id="lf0610_label_8165">26</span> For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6425"><span id="lf0610_label_8166">27</span> For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6426"><span id="lf0610_label_8167">28</span> I sent him therefore the more carefully, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6427"><span id="lf0610_label_8168">29</span> Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1691" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1691_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>hold such in reputation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6428"><span id="lf0610_label_8170">30</span> Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death, not regarding his life, to supply your lack of service toward me.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_202" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8171">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6429"><span id="lf0610_label_8172">1</span> Finally, my brethren, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed <span class="ital">is</span> not grievous, but for you <span class="ital">it is</span> safe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6430"><span id="lf0610_label_8173">2</span> Beware of dogs, beware of evil workers, beware of the concision.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6431"><span id="lf0610_label_8174">3</span> For we are the circumcision, which worship God in the spirit, and rejoice in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6432"><span id="lf0610_label_8175">4</span> Though I might also have confidence in the flesh. If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh, I more:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6433"><span id="lf0610_label_8176">5</span> Circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, <span class="ital">of</span> the tribe of Benjamin, an Hebrew of the Hebrews; as touching the law, a Pharisee;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6434"><span id="lf0610_label_8177">6</span> Concerning zeal, persecuting the church; touching the righteousness which is in the law, blameless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6435"><span id="lf0610_label_8178">7</span> But what things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6436"><span id="lf0610_label_8179">8</span> Yea doubtless, and I count all things <span class="ital">but</span> loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them <span class="ital">but</span> dung, that I may win Christ,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6437"><span id="lf0610_label_8180">9</span> And be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6438"><span id="lf0610_label_8181">10</span> That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6439"><span id="lf0610_label_8182">11</span> If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6440"><span id="lf0610_label_8183">12</span> Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6441"><span id="lf0610_label_8184">13</span> Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but <span class="ital">this</span> one thing <span class="ital">I do,</span> forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6442"><span id="lf0610_label_8185">14</span> I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6443"><span id="lf0610_label_8186">15</span> Let us therefore, as many as be perfect, be thus minded: and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded, God shall reveal even this unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6444"><span id="lf0610_label_8187">16</span> Nevertheless, whereto we have already attained, let us walk by the same rule, let us mind the same thing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6445"><span id="lf0610_label_8188">17</span> Brethren, be followers together of me, and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6446"><span id="lf0610_label_8189">18</span> (For many walk, of whom I have told you often, and now tell you even weeping, <span class="ital">that they are</span> the enemies of the cross of Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6447"><span id="lf0610_label_8190">19</span> Whose end <span class="ital">is</span> destruction, whose God <span class="ital">is their</span> belly, and <span class="ital">whose</span> glory <span class="ital">is</span> in their shame, who mind earthly things.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6448"><span id="lf0610_label_8191">20</span> For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6449"><span id="lf0610_label_8192">21</span> Who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_203" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8193">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6450"><span id="lf0610_label_8194">1</span> Therefore, my brethren dearly beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, <span class="ital">my</span> dearly beloved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6451"><span id="lf0610_label_8195">2</span> I beseech Euodias, and beseech Syntyche, that they be of the same mind in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6452"><span id="lf0610_label_8196">3</span> And I intreat thee also, true yokefellow, help those women which laboured with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and <span class="ital">with</span> other my fellowlabourers, whose names <span class="ital">are</span> in the book of life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6453"><span id="lf0610_label_8197">4</span> Rejoice in the Lord alway: <span class="ital">and</span> again I say, Rejoice.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6454"><span id="lf0610_label_8198">5</span> Let your moderation be known unto all men. The Lord <span class="ital">is</span> at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6455"><span id="lf0610_label_8199">6</span> Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1692" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1692_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>requests be made known unto God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6456"><span id="lf0610_label_8201">7</span> And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6457"><span id="lf0610_label_8202">8</span> Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things <span class="ital">are</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1693" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1693_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>honest, whatsoever things <span class="ital">are</span> just, whatsoever things <span class="ital">are</span> pure, whatsoever things <span class="ital">are</span> lovely, whatsoever things <span class="ital">are</span> of good report; if <span class="ital">there be</span> any virtue, and if <span class="ital">there be</span> any praise, think on these things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6458"><span id="lf0610_label_8204">9</span> Those things, which ye have both learned, and received, and heard, and seen in me, do: and the God of peace shall be with you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6459"><span id="lf0610_label_8205">10</span> But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly, that now at the last your care of me <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1694" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1694_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>hath flourished again; wherein ye were also careful, but ye lacked opportunity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6460"><span id="lf0610_label_8207">11</span> Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, <span class="ital">therewith</span> to be content.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6461"><span id="lf0610_label_8208">12</span> I know both how to be abased, and I know how to abound: every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry, both to abound and to suffer need.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6462"><span id="lf0610_label_8209">13</span> I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6463"><span id="lf0610_label_8210">14</span> Notwithstanding ye have well done, that ye did communicate with my affliction.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6464"><span id="lf0610_label_8211">15</span> Now ye Philippians know also, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving, but ye only.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6465"><span id="lf0610_label_8212">16</span> For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6466"><span id="lf0610_label_8213">17</span> Not because I desire a gift: but I desire fruit that may abound to your account.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6467"><span id="lf0610_label_8214">18</span> But <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1695" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1695_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>I have all, and abound: I am full, having received of Epaphroditus the things <span class="ital">which were sent</span> from you, an odour of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, wellpleasing to God.</p>
