<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6468"><span id="lf0610_label_8216">19</span> But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6469"><span id="lf0610_label_8217">20</span> Now unto God and our Father <span class="ital">be</span> glory for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6470"><span id="lf0610_label_8218">21</span> Salute every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren which are with me greet you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6471"><span id="lf0610_label_8219">22</span> All the saints salute you, chiefly they that are of C&#xE6;sar&#x2019;s household.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6472"><span id="lf0610_label_8220">23</span> The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with you all. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6473">&#xB6; It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>235<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_204" class="type-part Colossians">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_029">THE EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE COLOSSIANS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_205" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8221">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6474"><span id="lf0610_label_8222">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus <span class="ital">our</span> brother,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6475"><span id="lf0610_label_8223">2</span> To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace <span class="ital">be</span> unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6476"><span id="lf0610_label_8224">3</span> We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6477"><span id="lf0610_label_8225">4</span> Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love <span class="ital">which ye have</span> to all the saints,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6478"><span id="lf0610_label_8226">5</span> For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6479"><span id="lf0610_label_8227">6</span> Which is come unto you, as <span class="ital">it is</span> in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as <span class="ital">it doth</span> also in you, since the day ye heard <span class="ital">of it,</span> and knew the grace of God in truth:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6480"><span id="lf0610_label_8228">7</span> As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellow-servant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6481"><span id="lf0610_label_8229">8</span> Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6482"><span id="lf0610_label_8230">9</span> For this cause we also, since the day we heard <span class="ital">it,</span> do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6483"><span id="lf0610_label_8231">10</span> That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6484"><span id="lf0610_label_8232">11</span> Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6485"><span id="lf0610_label_8233">12</span> Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6486"><span id="lf0610_label_8234">13</span> Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated <span class="ital">us</span> into the kingdom of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1696" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1696_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>his dear Son:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6487"><span id="lf0610_label_8236">14</span> In whom we have redemption through his blood, <span class="ital">even</span> the forgiveness of sins:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6488"><span id="lf0610_label_8237">15</span> Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6489"><span id="lf0610_label_8238">16</span> For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether <span class="ital">they be</span> thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6490"><span id="lf0610_label_8239">17</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1697" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1697_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6491"><span id="lf0610_label_8241">18</span> And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1698" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1698_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in all <span class="ital">things</span> he might have the preeminence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6492"><span id="lf0610_label_8243">19</span> For it pleased <span class="ital">the Father</span> that in him should all fulness dwell;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6493"><span id="lf0610_label_8244">20</span> And, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1699" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1699_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, <span class="ital">I say,</span> whether <span class="ital">they be</span> things in earth, or things in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6494"><span id="lf0610_label_8246">21</span> And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1700" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1700_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in <span class="ital">your</span> mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6495"><span id="lf0610_label_8248">22</span> In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6496"><span id="lf0610_label_8249">23</span> If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and <span class="ital">be</span> not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, <span class="ital">and</span> which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6497"><span id="lf0610_label_8250">24</span> Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>236<span class="bracket">]</span></span> and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body&#x2019;s sake, which is the church:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6498"><span id="lf0610_label_8251">25</span> Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1701" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1701_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to fulfil the word of God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6499"><span id="lf0610_label_8253">26</span> <span class="ital">Even</span> the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6500"><span id="lf0610_label_8254">27</span> To whom God would make known what <span class="ital">is</span> the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1702" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1702_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in you, the hope of glory:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6501"><span id="lf0610_label_8256">28</span> Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6502"><span id="lf0610_label_8257">29</span> Whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_206" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8258">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6503"><span id="lf0610_label_8259">1</span> For I would that ye knew what great <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1703" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1703_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>conflict I have for you, and <span class="ital">for</span> them at Laodicea, and <span class="ital">for</span> as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6504"><span id="lf0610_label_8261">2</span> That their hearts might be comforted, being knit together in love, and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding, to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God, and of the Father, and of Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6505"><span id="lf0610_label_8262">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1704" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1704_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6506"><span id="lf0610_label_8264">4</span> And this I say, lest any man should beguile you with enticing words.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6507"><span id="lf0610_label_8265">5</span> For though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, joying and beholding your order, and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6508"><span id="lf0610_label_8266">6</span> As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, <span class="ital">so</span> walk ye in him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6509"><span id="lf0610_label_8267">7</span> Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6510"><span id="lf0610_label_8268">8</span> Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1705" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1705_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6511"><span id="lf0610_label_8270">9</span> For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6512"><span id="lf0610_label_8271">10</span> And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6513"><span id="lf0610_label_8272">11</span> In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6514"><span id="lf0610_label_8273">12</span> Buried with him in baptism, wherein also ye are risen with <span class="ital">him</span> through the faith of the operation of God, who hath raised him from the dead.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6515"><span id="lf0610_label_8274">13</span> And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6516"><span id="lf0610_label_8275">14</span> Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6517"><span id="lf0610_label_8276">15</span> <span class="ital">And</span> having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1706" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1706_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6518"><span id="lf0610_label_8278">16</span> Let no man therefore judge you <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1707" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1707_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in meat, or in drink, or <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1708" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1708_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in respect of an holyday, or of the new moon, or of the sabbath <span class="ital">days:</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6519"><span id="lf0610_label_8281">17</span> Which are a shadow of things to come; but the body <span class="ital">is</span> of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6520"><span id="lf0610_label_8282">18</span> Let no man <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1709" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1709_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>beguile you of your reward <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1710" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1710_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels, intruding into those things which he hath not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6521"><span id="lf0610_label_8285">19</span> And not holding the Head, from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered, and knit together, increaseth with the increase of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6522"><span id="lf0610_label_8286">20</span> Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1711" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1711_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>rudiments of the world, why, as though living in the world, are ye subject to ordinances,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6523"><span id="lf0610_label_8288">21</span> (Touch not; taste not; handle not;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6524"><span id="lf0610_label_8289">22</span> Which all are to perish with the using;) after the commandments and doctrines of men?</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>237<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6525"><span id="lf0610_label_8290">23</span> Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship, and humility, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1712" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1712_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>neglecting of the body; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_207" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8292">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6526"><span id="lf0610_label_8293">1</span> If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6527"><span id="lf0610_label_8294">2</span> Set your <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1713" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1713_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>affection on things above, not on things on the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6528"><span id="lf0610_label_8296">3</span> For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6529"><span id="lf0610_label_8297">4</span> When Christ, <span class="ital">who is</span> our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6530"><span id="lf0610_label_8298">5</span> Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6531"><span id="lf0610_label_8299">6</span> For which things&#x2019; sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6532"><span id="lf0610_label_8300">7</span> In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6533"><span id="lf0610_label_8301">8</span> But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6534"><span id="lf0610_label_8302">9</span> Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6535"><span id="lf0610_label_8303">10</span> And have put on the new <span class="ital">man,</span> which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6536"><span id="lf0610_label_8304">11</span> Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond <span class="ital">nor</span> free: but Christ <span class="ital">is</span> all, and in all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6537"><span id="lf0610_label_8305">12</span> Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6538"><span id="lf0610_label_8306">13</span> Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1714" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1714_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also <span class="ital">do</span> ye.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6539"><span id="lf0610_label_8308">14</span> And above all these things <span class="ital">put on</span> charity, which is the bond of perfectness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6540"><span id="lf0610_label_8309">15</span> And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6541"><span id="lf0610_label_8310">16</span> Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6542"><span id="lf0610_label_8311">17</span> And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, <span class="ital">do</span> all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6543"><span id="lf0610_label_8312">18</span> Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6544"><span id="lf0610_label_8313">19</span> Husbands, love <span class="ital">your</span> wives, and be not bitter against them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6545"><span id="lf0610_label_8314">20</span> Children, obey <span class="ital">your</span> parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6546"><span id="lf0610_label_8315">21</span> Fathers, provoke not your children <span class="ital">to anger,</span> lest they be discouraged.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6547"><span id="lf0610_label_8316">22</span> Servants, obey in all things <span class="ital">your</span> masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6548"><span id="lf0610_label_8317">23</span> And whatsoever ye do, do <span class="ital">it</span> heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6549"><span id="lf0610_label_8318">24</span> Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6550"><span id="lf0610_label_8319">25</span> But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_208" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8320">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6551"><span id="lf0610_label_8321">1</span> Masters, give unto <span class="ital">your</span> servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6552"><span id="lf0610_label_8322">2</span> Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6553"><span id="lf0610_label_8323">3</span> Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6554"><span id="lf0610_label_8324">4</span> That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>238<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6555"><span id="lf0610_label_8325">5</span> Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6556"><span id="lf0610_label_8326">6</span> Let your speech <span class="ital">be</span> alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6557"><span id="lf0610_label_8327">7</span> All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, <span class="ital">who is</span> a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6558"><span id="lf0610_label_8328">8</span> Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6559"><span id="lf0610_label_8329">9</span> With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is <span class="ital">one</span> of you. They shall make known unto you all things which <span class="ital">are done</span> here.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6560"><span id="lf0610_label_8330">10</span> Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister&#x2019;s son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6561"><span id="lf0610_label_8331">11</span> And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only <span class="ital">are my</span> fellow-workers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6562"><span id="lf0610_label_8332">12</span> Epaphras, who is <span class="ital">one</span> of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1715" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1715_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1716" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1716_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>complete in all the will of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6563"><span id="lf0610_label_8335">13</span> For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them <span class="ital">that are</span> in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6564"><span id="lf0610_label_8336">14</span> Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6565"><span id="lf0610_label_8337">15</span> Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6566"><span id="lf0610_label_8338">16</span> And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the <span class="ital">epistle</span> from Laodicea.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6567"><span id="lf0610_label_8339">17</span> And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6568"><span id="lf0610_label_8340">18</span> The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace <span class="ital">be</span> with you. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6569">&#xB6; Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_209" class="type-part Thessalonians_I">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_031">THE FIRST EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE THESSALONIANS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_210" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8341">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6570"><span id="lf0610_label_8342">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians <span class="ital">which is</span> in God the Father and <span class="ital">in</span> the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace <span class="ital">be</span> unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6571"><span id="lf0610_label_8343">2</span> We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6572"><span id="lf0610_label_8344">3</span> Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6573"><span id="lf0610_label_8345">4</span> Knowing, brethren <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1717" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1717_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>beloved, your election of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6574"><span id="lf0610_label_8347">5</span> For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6575"><span id="lf0610_label_8348">6</span> And ye became followers of us, and of the <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>239<span class="bracket">]</span></span> Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6576"><span id="lf0610_label_8349">7</span> So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6577"><span id="lf0610_label_8350">8</span> For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6578"><span id="lf0610_label_8351">9</span> For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6579"><span id="lf0610_label_8352">10</span> And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, <span class="ital">even</span> Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_211" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8353">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6580"><span id="lf0610_label_8354">1</span> For yourselves, brethren, know our entrance in unto you, that it was not in vain:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6581"><span id="lf0610_label_8355">2</span> But even after that we had suffered before, and were shamefully entreated, as ye know, at Philippi, we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6582"><span id="lf0610_label_8356">3</span> For our exhortation <span class="ital">was</span> not of deceit, nor of uncleanness, nor in guile:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6583"><span id="lf0610_label_8357">4</span> But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel, even so we speak; not as pleasing men, but God, which trieth our hearts.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6584"><span id="lf0610_label_8358">5</span> For neither at any time used we flattering words, as ye know, nor a cloke of covetousness; God <span class="ital">is</span> witness:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6585"><span id="lf0610_label_8359">6</span> Nor of men sought we glory, neither of you, nor <span class="ital">yet</span> of others, when we might have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1718" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1718_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>been burdensome, as the apostles of Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6586"><span id="lf0610_label_8361">7</span> But we were gentle among you, even as a nurse cherisheth her children:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6587"><span id="lf0610_label_8362">8</span> So being affectionately desirous of you, we were willing to have imparted unto you, not the gospel of God only, but also our own souls, because ye were dear unto us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6588"><span id="lf0610_label_8363">9</span> For ye remember, brethren, our labour and travail: for labouring night and day, because we would not be chargeable unto any of you, we preached unto you the gospel of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6589"><span id="lf0610_label_8364">10</span> Ye <span class="ital">are</span> witnesses, and God <span class="ital">also,</span> how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6590"><span id="lf0610_label_8365">11</span> As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you, as a father <span class="ital">doth</span> his children,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6591"><span id="lf0610_label_8366">12</span> That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6592"><span id="lf0610_label_8367">13</span> For this cause also thank we God without ceasing, because, when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us, ye received <span class="ital">it</span> not <span class="ital">as</span> the word of men, but as it is in truth, the word of God, which effectually worketh also in you that believe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6593"><span id="lf0610_label_8368">14</span> For ye, brethren, became followers of the churches of God which in Jud&#xE6;a are in Christ Jesus: for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen, even as they <span class="ital">have</span> of the Jews:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6594"><span id="lf0610_label_8369">15</span> Who both killed the Lord Jesus, and their own prophets, and have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1719" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1719_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>persecuted us; and they please not God, and are contrary to all men:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6595"><span id="lf0610_label_8371">16</span> Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved, to fill up their sins alway: for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6596"><span id="lf0610_label_8372">17</span> But we, brethren, being taken from you for a short time in presence, not in heart, endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6597"><span id="lf0610_label_8373">18</span> Wherefore we would have come unto you, even I Paul, once and again; but Satan hindered us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6598"><span id="lf0610_label_8374">19</span> For what <span class="ital">is</span> our hope, or joy, or crown of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1720" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1720_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>rejoicing? <span class="ital">Are</span> not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6599"><span id="lf0610_label_8376">20</span> For ye are our glory and joy.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_212" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8377">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6600"><span id="lf0610_label_8378">1</span> Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6601"><span id="lf0610_label_8379">2</span> And sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6602"><span id="lf0610_label_8380">3</span> That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6603"><span id="lf0610_label_8381">4</span> For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6604"><span id="lf0610_label_8382">5</span> For this cause, when I could no longer forbear, I sent to know your faith, lest by some means the tempter have tempted you, and our labour be in vain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6605"><span id="lf0610_label_8383">6</span> But now when Timotheus came from you unto us, and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity, and that ye have good remembrance of us always, desiring greatly to see us, as we also <span class="ital">to see</span> you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6606"><span id="lf0610_label_8384">7</span> Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6607"><span id="lf0610_label_8385">8</span> For now we <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1721" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1721_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>live, if ye stand fast in the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6608"><span id="lf0610_label_8387">9</span> For what thanks can we render to God again for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6609"><span id="lf0610_label_8388">10</span> Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face, and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6610"><span id="lf0610_label_8389">11</span> Now God himself and our Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1722" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1722_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>direct our way unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6611"><span id="lf0610_label_8391">12</span> And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all <span class="ital">men,</span> even as we <span class="ital">do</span> toward you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6612"><span id="lf0610_label_8392">13</span> To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_213" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8393">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6613"><span id="lf0610_label_8394">1</span> Furthermore then we <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1723" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1723_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>beseech you, brethren, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1724" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1724_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>exhort <span class="ital">you</span> by the Lord Jesus, that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, <span class="ital">so</span> ye would abound more and more.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6614"><span id="lf0610_label_8397">2</span> For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6615"><span id="lf0610_label_8398">3</span> For this is the will of God, <span class="ital">even</span> your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6616"><span id="lf0610_label_8399">4</span> That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6617"><span id="lf0610_label_8400">5</span> Not in the lust of concupiscence, even as the Gentiles which know not God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6618"><span id="lf0610_label_8401">6</span> That no <span class="ital">man</span> go beyond and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1725" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1725_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>defraud his brother <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1726" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1726_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in <span class="ital">any</span> matter: because that the Lord <span class="ital">is</span> the avenger of all such, as we also have forewarned you and testified.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6619"><span id="lf0610_label_8404">7</span> For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6620"><span id="lf0610_label_8405">8</span> He therefore that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1727" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1727_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6621"><span id="lf0610_label_8407">9</span> But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6622"><span id="lf0610_label_8408">10</span> And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia: but we beseech you, brethren, that ye increase more and more;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6623"><span id="lf0610_label_8409">11</span> And that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6624"><span id="lf0610_label_8410">12</span> That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without, and <span class="ital">that</span> ye may have lack <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1728" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1728_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of nothing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6625"><span id="lf0610_label_8412">13</span> But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6626"><span id="lf0610_label_8413">14</span> For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>241<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6627"><span id="lf0610_label_8414">15</span> For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive <span class="ital">and</span> remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6628"><span id="lf0610_label_8415">16</span> For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6629"><span id="lf0610_label_8416">17</span> Then we which are alive <span class="ital">and</span> remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6630"><span id="lf0610_label_8417">18</span> Wherefore <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1729" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1729_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>comfort one another with these words.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_214" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8419">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6631"><span id="lf0610_label_8420">1</span> But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6632"><span id="lf0610_label_8421">2</span> For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6633"><span id="lf0610_label_8422">3</span> For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6634"><span id="lf0610_label_8423">4</span> But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6635"><span id="lf0610_label_8424">5</span> Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6636"><span id="lf0610_label_8425">6</span> Therefore let us not sleep, as <span class="ital">do</span> others; but let us watch and be sober.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6637"><span id="lf0610_label_8426">7</span> For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6638"><span id="lf0610_label_8427">8</span> But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6639"><span id="lf0610_label_8428">9</span> For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6640"><span id="lf0610_label_8429">10</span> Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6641"><span id="lf0610_label_8430">11</span> Wherefore <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1730" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1730_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6642"><span id="lf0610_label_8432">12</span> And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6643"><span id="lf0610_label_8433">13</span> And to esteem them very highly in love for their work&#x2019;s sake. <span class="ital">And</span> be at peace among yourselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6644"><span id="lf0610_label_8434">14</span> Now we <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1731" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1731_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>exhort you, brethren, warn them that are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1732" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1732_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all <span class="ital">men.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6645"><span id="lf0610_label_8437">15</span> See that none render evil for evil unto any <span class="ital">man;</span> but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all <span class="ital">men.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6646"><span id="lf0610_label_8438">16</span> Rejoice evermore.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6647"><span id="lf0610_label_8439">17</span> Pray without ceasing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6648"><span id="lf0610_label_8440">18</span> In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6649"><span id="lf0610_label_8441">19</span> Quench not the Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6650"><span id="lf0610_label_8442">20</span> Despise not prophesyings.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6651"><span id="lf0610_label_8443">21</span> Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6652"><span id="lf0610_label_8444">22</span> Abstain from all appearance of evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6653"><span id="lf0610_label_8445">23</span> And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and <span class="ital">I pray God</span> your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6654"><span id="lf0610_label_8446">24</span> Faithful <span class="ital">is</span> he that calleth you, who also will do <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6655"><span id="lf0610_label_8447">25</span> Brethren, pray for us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6656"><span id="lf0610_label_8448">26</span> Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6657"><span id="lf0610_label_8449">27</span> I <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1733" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1733_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6658"><span id="lf0610_label_8451">28</span> The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with you. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6659">&#xB6; The first <span class="ital">epistle</span> unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>242<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_215" class="type-part Thessalonians_II">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_033">THE SECOND EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE THESSALONIANS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_216" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8452">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6660"><span id="lf0610_label_8453">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6661"><span id="lf0610_label_8454">2</span> Grace unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6662"><span id="lf0610_label_8455">3</span> We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6663"><span id="lf0610_label_8456">4</span> So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6664"><span id="lf0610_label_8457">5</span> <span class="ital">Which is</span> a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God, that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which ye also suffer:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6665"><span id="lf0610_label_8458">6</span> Seeing <span class="ital">it is</span> a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6666"><span id="lf0610_label_8459">7</span> And to you who are troubled rest with us, when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1734" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1734_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>his mighty angels,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6667"><span id="lf0610_label_8461">8</span> In flaming fire <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1735" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1735_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>taking vengeance on them that know not God, and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6668"><span id="lf0610_label_8463">9</span> Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord, and from the glory of his power;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6669"><span id="lf0610_label_8464">10</span> When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6670"><span id="lf0610_label_8465">11</span> Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1736" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1736_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>count you worthy of <span class="ital">this</span> calling, and fulfil all the good pleasure of <span class="ital">his</span> goodness, and the work of faith with power:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6671"><span id="lf0610_label_8467">12</span> That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and ye in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_217" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8468">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6672"><span id="lf0610_label_8469">1</span> Now we beseech you, brethren, by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and <span class="ital">by</span> our gathering together unto him,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6673"><span id="lf0610_label_8470">2</span> That ye be not soon shaken in mind, or be troubled, neither by spirit, nor by word, nor by letter as from us, as that the day of Christ is at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6674"><span id="lf0610_label_8471">3</span> Let no man deceive you by any means: for <span class="ital">that day shall not come,</span> except there come a falling away first, and that man of sin be revealed, the son of perdition;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6675"><span id="lf0610_label_8472">4</span> Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God, or that is worshipped; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God, shewing himself that he is God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6676"><span id="lf0610_label_8473">5</span> Remember ye not, that, when I was yet with you, I told you these things?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6677"><span id="lf0610_label_8474">6</span> And now ye know what <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1737" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1737_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6678"><span id="lf0610_label_8476">7</span> For the mystery of iniquity doth already work: only he who now letteth <span class="ital">will let,</span> until he be taken out of the way.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6679"><span id="lf0610_label_8477">8</span> And then shall that Wicked be revealed, whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth, and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming:</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>243<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6680"><span id="lf0610_label_8478">9</span> <span class="ital">Even him,</span> whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6681"><span id="lf0610_label_8479">10</span> And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish; because they received not the love of the truth, that they might be saved.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6682"><span id="lf0610_label_8480">11</span> And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion, that they should believe a lie:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6683"><span id="lf0610_label_8481">12</span> That they all might be damned who believed not the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6684"><span id="lf0610_label_8482">13</span> But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you, brethren beloved of the Lord, because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6685"><span id="lf0610_label_8483">14</span> Whereunto he called you by our gospel, to the obtaining of the glory of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1738" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1738_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>our Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6686"><span id="lf0610_label_8485">15</span> Therefore, brethren, stand fast, and hold the traditions which ye have been taught, whether by word, or our epistle.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6687"><span id="lf0610_label_8486">16</span> Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given <span class="ital">us</span> everlasting consolation and good hope through grace,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6688"><span id="lf0610_label_8487">17</span> Comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_218" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8488">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6689"><span id="lf0610_label_8489">1</span> Finally, brethren, pray for us, that the word of the Lord <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1739" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1739_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>may have <span class="ital">free</span> course, and be glorified, even as <span class="ital">it is</span> with you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6690"><span id="lf0610_label_8491">2</span> And that we may be delivered from <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1740" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1740_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>unreasonable and wicked men: for all <span class="ital">men</span> have not faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6691"><span id="lf0610_label_8493">3</span> But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you, and keep <span class="ital">you</span> from evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6692"><span id="lf0610_label_8494">4</span> And we have confidence in the Lord touching you, that ye both do and will do the things which we command you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6693"><span id="lf0610_label_8495">5</span> And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1741" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1741_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the patient waiting for Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6694"><span id="lf0610_label_8497">6</span> Now we command you, brethren, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly, and not after the tradition which he received of us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6695"><span id="lf0610_label_8498">7</span> For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us: for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6696"><span id="lf0610_label_8499">8</span> Neither did we eat any man&#x2019;s bread for nought; but wrought with labour and travail night and day, that we might not be chargeable to any of you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6697"><span id="lf0610_label_8500">9</span> Not because we have not power, but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6698"><span id="lf0610_label_8501">10</span> For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6699"><span id="lf0610_label_8502">11</span> For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly, working not at all, but are busybodies.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6700"><span id="lf0610_label_8503">12</span> Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6701"><span id="lf0610_label_8504">13</span> But ye, brethren, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1742" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1742_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>be not weary in well doing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6702"><span id="lf0610_label_8506">14</span> And if any man obey not our word <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1743" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1743_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>by this epistle, note that man, and have no company with him, that he may be ashamed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6703"><span id="lf0610_label_8508">15</span> Yet count <span class="ital">him</span> not as an enemy, but admonish <span class="ital">him</span> as a brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6704"><span id="lf0610_label_8509">16</span> Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord <span class="ital">be</span> with you all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6705"><span id="lf0610_label_8510">17</span> The salutation of Paul with mine own hand, which is the token in every epistle: so I write.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6706"><span id="lf0610_label_8511">18</span> The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with you all. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6707">&#xB6; The second <span class="ital">epistle</span> to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>244<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_219" class="type-part Timothy_I">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_035">THE FIRST EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO TIMOTHY.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_220" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8512">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6708"><span id="lf0610_label_8513">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, <span class="ital">which is</span> our hope;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6709"><span id="lf0610_label_8514">2</span> Unto Timothy, <span class="ital">my</span> own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, <span class="ital">and</span> peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6710"><span id="lf0610_label_8515">3</span> As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6711"><span id="lf0610_label_8516">4</span> Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1744" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1744_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>godly edifying which is in faith: <span class="ital">so do.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6712"><span id="lf0610_label_8518">5</span> Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and <span class="ital">of</span> a good conscience, and <span class="ital">of</span> faith unfeigned:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6713"><span id="lf0610_label_8519">6</span> From which some <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1745" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1745_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6714"><span id="lf0610_label_8521">7</span> Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6715"><span id="lf0610_label_8522">8</span> But we know that the law <span class="ital">is</span> good, if a man use it lawfully;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6716"><span id="lf0610_label_8523">9</span> Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6717"><span id="lf0610_label_8524">10</span> For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6718"><span id="lf0610_label_8525">11</span> According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6719"><span id="lf0610_label_8526">12</span> And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6720"><span id="lf0610_label_8527">13</span> Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did <span class="ital">it</span> ignorantly in unbelief.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6721"><span id="lf0610_label_8528">14</span> And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6722"><span id="lf0610_label_8529">15</span> This <span class="ital">is</span> a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6723"><span id="lf0610_label_8530">16</span> Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6724"><span id="lf0610_label_8531">17</span> Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, <span class="ital">be</span> honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6725"><span id="lf0610_label_8532">18</span> This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6726"><span id="lf0610_label_8533">19</span> Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6727"><span id="lf0610_label_8534">20</span> Of whom is Hymen&#xE6;us and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_221" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8535">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6728"><span id="lf0610_label_8536">1</span> I <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1746" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1746_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, <span class="ital">and</span> giving of thanks, be made for all men;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6729"><span id="lf0610_label_8538">2</span> For kings, and <span class="ital">for</span> all that are in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1747" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1747_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>245<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6730"><span id="lf0610_label_8540">3</span> For this <span class="ital">is</span> good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6731"><span id="lf0610_label_8541">4</span> Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6732"><span id="lf0610_label_8542">5</span> For <span class="ital">there is</span> one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6733"><span id="lf0610_label_8543">6</span> Who gave himself a ransom for all, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1748" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1748_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to be testified in due time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6734"><span id="lf0610_label_8545">7</span> Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, <span class="ital">and</span> he not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6735"><span id="lf0610_label_8546">8</span> I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6736"><span id="lf0610_label_8547">9</span> In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1749" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1749_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6737"><span id="lf0610_label_8549">10</span> But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6738"><span id="lf0610_label_8550">11</span> Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6739"><span id="lf0610_label_8551">12</span> But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6740"><span id="lf0610_label_8552">13</span> For Adam was first formed, then Eve.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6741"><span id="lf0610_label_8553">14</span> And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6742"><span id="lf0610_label_8554">15</span> Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_222" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8555">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6743"><span id="lf0610_label_8556">1</span> This <span class="ital">is</span> a true saying, If a man desire the office of a bishop, he desireth a good work.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6744"><span id="lf0610_label_8557">2</span> A bishop then must be blameless, the husband of one wife, vigilant, sober, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1750" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1750_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of good behaviour, given to hospitality, apt to teach;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6745"><span id="lf0610_label_8559">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1751" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1751_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Not given to wine, no striker, not greedy of filthy lucre; but patient, not a brawler, not covetous;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6746"><span id="lf0610_label_8561">4</span> One that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6747"><span id="lf0610_label_8562">5</span> (For if a man know not how to rule his own house, how shall he take care of the church of God?)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6748"><span id="lf0610_label_8563">6</span> Not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1752" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1752_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>a novice, lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6749"><span id="lf0610_label_8565">7</span> Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6750"><span id="lf0610_label_8566">8</span> Likewise <span class="ital">must</span> the deacons <span class="ital">be</span> grave, not doubletongued, not given to much wine, not greedy of filthy lucre;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6751"><span id="lf0610_label_8567">9</span> Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6752"><span id="lf0610_label_8568">10</span> And let these also first be proved; then let them use the office of a deacon, being <span class="ital">found</span> blameless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6753"><span id="lf0610_label_8569">11</span> Even so <span class="ital">must their</span> wives <span class="ital">be</span> grave, not slanderers, sober, faithful in all things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6754"><span id="lf0610_label_8570">12</span> Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6755"><span id="lf0610_label_8571">13</span> For they that have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1753" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1753_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6756"><span id="lf0610_label_8573">14</span> These things write I unto thee, hoping to come unto thee shortly:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6757"><span id="lf0610_label_8574">15</span> But if I tarry long, that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God, which is the church of the living God, the pillar and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1754" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1754_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ground of the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6758"><span id="lf0610_label_8576">16</span> And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_223" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8577">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6759"><span id="lf0610_label_8578">1</span> Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>246<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6760"><span id="lf0610_label_8579">2</span> Speaking lies in hypocrisy; having their conscience seared with a hot iron;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6761"><span id="lf0610_label_8580">3</span> Forbidding to marry, <span class="ital">and commanding</span> to abstain from meats, which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6762"><span id="lf0610_label_8581">4</span> For every creature of God <span class="ital">is</span> good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6763"><span id="lf0610_label_8582">5</span> For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6764"><span id="lf0610_label_8583">6</span> If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things, thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ, nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine, whereunto thou hast attained.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6765"><span id="lf0610_label_8584">7</span> But refuse profane and old wives&#x2019; fables, and exercise thyself <span class="ital">rather</span> unto godliness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6766"><span id="lf0610_label_8585">8</span> For bodily exercise profiteth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1755" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1755_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>little: but godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6767"><span id="lf0610_label_8587">9</span> This <span class="ital">is</span> a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6768"><span id="lf0610_label_8588">10</span> For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach, because we trust in the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, specially of those that believe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6769"><span id="lf0610_label_8589">11</span> These things command and teach.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6770"><span id="lf0610_label_8590">12</span> Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6771"><span id="lf0610_label_8591">13</span> Till I come, give attendance to reading, to exhortation, to doctrine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6772"><span id="lf0610_label_8592">14</span> Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6773"><span id="lf0610_label_8593">15</span> Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1756" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1756_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6774"><span id="lf0610_label_8595">16</span> Take heed unto thyself, and unto the doctrine; continue in them: for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself, and them that hear thee.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_224" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8596">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6775"><span id="lf0610_label_8597">1</span> Rebuke not an elder, but intreat <span class="ital">him</span> as a father; <span class="ital">and</span> the younger men as brethren;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6776"><span id="lf0610_label_8598">2</span> The elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters, with all purity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6777"><span id="lf0610_label_8599">3</span> Honour widows that are widows indeed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6778"><span id="lf0610_label_8600">4</span> But if any widow have children or nephews, let them learn first to shew <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1757" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1757_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>piety at home, and to requite their parents: for that is good and acceptable before God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6779"><span id="lf0610_label_8602">5</span> Now she that is a widow indeed, and desolate, trusteth in God, and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6780"><span id="lf0610_label_8603">6</span> But she that liveth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1758" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1758_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in pleasure is dead while she liveth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6781"><span id="lf0610_label_8605">7</span> And these things give in charge, that they may be blameless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6782"><span id="lf0610_label_8606">8</span> But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1759" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1759_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6783"><span id="lf0610_label_8608">9</span> Let not a widow be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1760" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1760_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>taken into the number under threescore years old, having been the wife of one man,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6784"><span id="lf0610_label_8610">10</span> Well reported of for good works; if she have brought up children, if she have lodged strangers, if she have washed the saints&#x2019; feet, if she have relieved the afflicted, if she have diligently followed every good work.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6785"><span id="lf0610_label_8611">11</span> But the younger widows refuse: for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ, they will marry;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6786"><span id="lf0610_label_8612">12</span> Having damnation, because they have cast off their first faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6787"><span id="lf0610_label_8613">13</span> And withal they learn <span class="ital">to be</span> idle, wandering about from house to house; and not only idle, but tattlers also and busybodies, speaking things which they ought not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6788"><span id="lf0610_label_8614">14</span> I will therefore that the younger women marry, bear children, guide the house, give none occasion to the adversary <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1761" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1761_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>to speak reproachfully.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>247<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6789"><span id="lf0610_label_8616">15</span> For some are already turned aside after Satan.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6790"><span id="lf0610_label_8617">16</span> If any man or woman that believeth have widows, let them relieve them, and let not the church be charged; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6791"><span id="lf0610_label_8618">17</span> Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour, especially they who labour in the word and doctrine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6792"><span id="lf0610_label_8619">18</span> For the scripture saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1762" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1762_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn. And, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1763" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1763_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The labourer <span class="ital">is</span> worthy of his reward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6793"><span id="lf0610_label_8622">19</span> Against an elder receive not an accusation, but <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1764" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1764_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>before two or three witnesses.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6794"><span id="lf0610_label_8624">20</span> Them that sin rebuke before all, that others also may fear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6795"><span id="lf0610_label_8625">21</span> I charge <span class="ital">thee</span> before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, and the elect angels, that thou observe these things <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1765" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1765_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>without preferring one before another, doing nothing by partiality.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6796"><span id="lf0610_label_8627">22</span> Lay hands suddenly on no man, neither be partaker of other men&#x2019;s sins: keep thyself pure.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6797"><span id="lf0610_label_8628">23</span> Drink no longer water, but use a little wine for thy stomach&#x2019;s sake and thine often infirmities.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6798"><span id="lf0610_label_8629">24</span> Some men&#x2019;s sins are open beforehand, going before to judgment; and some <span class="ital">men</span> they follow after.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6799"><span id="lf0610_label_8630">25</span> Likewise also the good works <span class="ital">of some</span> are manifest beforehand; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_225" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8631">6</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6800"><span id="lf0610_label_8632">1</span> Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour, that the name of God and <span class="ital">his</span> doctrine be not blasphemed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6801"><span id="lf0610_label_8633">2</span> And they that have believing masters, let them not despise <span class="ital">them,</span> because they are brethren; but rather do <span class="ital">them</span> service, because they are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1766" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1766_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>faithful and beloved, partakers of the benefit. These things teach and exhort.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6802"><span id="lf0610_label_8635">3</span> If any man teach otherwise, and consent not to wholesome words, <span class="ital">even</span> the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6803"><span id="lf0610_label_8636">4</span> He is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1767" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1767_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>proud, knowing nothing, but <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1768" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1768_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>doting about questions and strifes of words, whereof cometh envy, strife, railings, evil surmisings,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6804"><span id="lf0610_label_8639">5</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1769" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1769_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds, and destitute of the truth, supposing that gain is godliness: from such withdraw thyself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6805"><span id="lf0610_label_8641">6</span> But godliness with contentment is great gain.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6806"><span id="lf0610_label_8642">7</span> For we brought nothing into <span class="ital">this</span> world, <span class="ital">and it is</span> certain we can carry nothing out.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6807"><span id="lf0610_label_8643">8</span> And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6808"><span id="lf0610_label_8644">9</span> But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and <span class="ital">into</span> many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6809"><span id="lf0610_label_8645">10</span> For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1770" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1770_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.</p>
