<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6810"><span id="lf0610_label_8647">11</span> But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6811"><span id="lf0610_label_8648">12</span> Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6812"><span id="lf0610_label_8649">13</span> I give thee charge in the sight of God, who quickeneth all things, and <span class="ital">before</span> Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1771" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1771_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>confession;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6813"><span id="lf0610_label_8651">14</span> That thou keep <span class="ital">this</span> commandment without spot, unrebukeable, until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6814"><span id="lf0610_label_8652">15</span> Which in his times he shall shew, <span class="ital">who is</span> the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>248<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6815"><span id="lf0610_label_8653">16</span> Who only hath immortality, dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto; whom no man hath seen, nor can see: to whom <span class="ital">be</span> honour and power everlasting. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6816"><span id="lf0610_label_8654">17</span> Charge them that are rich in this world, that they be not highminded, nor trust in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1772" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1772_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>uncertain riches, but in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6817"><span id="lf0610_label_8656">18</span> That they do good, that they be rich in good works, ready to distribute, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1773" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1773_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>willing to communicate;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6818"><span id="lf0610_label_8658">19</span> Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come, that they may lay hold on eternal life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6819"><span id="lf0610_label_8659">20</span> O Timothy, keep that which is committed to thy trust, avoiding profane <span class="ital">and</span> vain babblings, and oppositions of science falsely so called:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6820"><span id="lf0610_label_8660">21</span> Which some professing have erred concerning the faith. Grace <span class="ital">be</span> with thee. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6821">&#xB6; The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana..</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_226" class="type-part Timothy_II">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_037">THE SECOND EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO TIMOTHY.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_227" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8661">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6822"><span id="lf0610_label_8662">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6823"><span id="lf0610_label_8663">2</span> To Timothy, <span class="ital">my</span> dearly beloved son: Grace, mercy, <span class="ital">and</span> peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6824"><span id="lf0610_label_8664">3</span> I thank God, whom I serve from <span class="ital">my</span> forefathers with pure conscience, that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6825"><span id="lf0610_label_8665">4</span> Greatly desiring to see thee, being mindful of thy tears, that I may be filled with joy;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6826"><span id="lf0610_label_8666">5</span> When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee, which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois, and thy mother Eunice; and I am persuaded that in thee also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6827"><span id="lf0610_label_8667">6</span> Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6828"><span id="lf0610_label_8668">7</span> For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1774" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1774_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>and of love, and of a sound mind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6829"><span id="lf0610_label_8670">8</span> Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner: but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6830"><span id="lf0610_label_8671">9</span> Who hath saved us, and called <span class="ital">us</span> with an holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6831"><span id="lf0610_label_8672">10</span> But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ, who hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6832"><span id="lf0610_label_8673">11</span> Whereunto I am appointed a preacher, and an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6833"><span id="lf0610_label_8674">12</span> For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1775" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1775_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>believed, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1776" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1776_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6834"><span id="lf0610_label_8677">13</span> Hold fast the form of sound words, which thou hast heard of me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6835"><span id="lf0610_label_8678">14</span> That good thing which was committed unto <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>249<span class="bracket">]</span></span> thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6836"><span id="lf0610_label_8679">15</span> This thou knowest, that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6837"><span id="lf0610_label_8680">16</span> The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus; for he oft refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6838"><span id="lf0610_label_8681">17</span> But, when he was in Rome, he sought me out very diligently, and found <span class="ital">me.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6839"><span id="lf0610_label_8682">18</span> The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day: and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus, thou knowest very well.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_228" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8683">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6840"><span id="lf0610_label_8684">1</span> Thou therefore, my son, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6841"><span id="lf0610_label_8685">2</span> And the things that thou hast heard of me <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1777" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1777_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>among many witnesses, the same commit thou to faithful men, who shall be able to teach others also.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6842"><span id="lf0610_label_8687">3</span> Thou therefore endure hardness, as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6843"><span id="lf0610_label_8688">4</span> No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of <span class="ital">this</span> life; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6844"><span id="lf0610_label_8689">5</span> And if a man also strive for masteries, <span class="ital">yet</span> is he not crowned, except he strive lawfully.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6845"><span id="lf0610_label_8690">6</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1778" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1778_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6846"><span id="lf0610_label_8692">7</span> Consider what I say; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6847"><span id="lf0610_label_8693">8</span> Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6848"><span id="lf0610_label_8694">9</span> Wherein I suffer trouble, as an evil doer, <span class="ital">even</span> unto bonds; but the word of God is not bound.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6849"><span id="lf0610_label_8695">10</span> Therefore I endure all things for the elect&#x2019;s sakes, that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6850"><span id="lf0610_label_8696">11</span> <span class="ital">It is</span> a faithful saying: For if we be dead with <span class="ital">him,</span> we shall also live with <span class="ital">him:</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6851"><span id="lf0610_label_8697">12</span> If we suffer, we shall also reign with <span class="ital">him:</span> if we deny <span class="ital">him,</span> he also will deny us:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6852"><span id="lf0610_label_8698">13</span> If we believe not, <span class="ital">yet</span> he abideth faithful: he cannot deny himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6853"><span id="lf0610_label_8699">14</span> Of these things put <span class="ital">them</span> in remembrance, charging <span class="ital">them</span> before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit, <span class="ital">but</span> to the subverting of the hearers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6854"><span id="lf0610_label_8700">15</span> Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6855"><span id="lf0610_label_8701">16</span> But shun profane <span class="ital">and</span> vain babblings: for they will increase unto more ungodliness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6856"><span id="lf0610_label_8702">17</span> And their word will eat as doth a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1779" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1779_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>canker: of whom is Hymen&#xE6;us and Philetus;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6857"><span id="lf0610_label_8704">18</span> Who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already; and overthrow the faith of some.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6858"><span id="lf0610_label_8705">19</span> Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1780" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1780_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>sure, having <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1781" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1781_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6859"><span id="lf0610_label_8708">20</span> But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6860"><span id="lf0610_label_8709">21</span> If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master&#x2019;s use, <span class="ital">and</span> prepared unto every good work.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6861"><span id="lf0610_label_8710">22</span> Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6862"><span id="lf0610_label_8711">23</span> But foolish and unlearned questions avoid, knowing that they do gender strifes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6863"><span id="lf0610_label_8712">24</span> And the servant of the Lord must not strive; but be gentle unto all <span class="ital">men,</span> apt to teach, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1782" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1782_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>patient,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6864"><span id="lf0610_label_8714">25</span> In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>250<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6865"><span id="lf0610_label_8715">26</span> And <span class="ital">that</span> they may <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1783" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1783_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1784" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1784_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>taken captive by him at his will.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_229" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8718">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6866"><span id="lf0610_label_8719">1</span> This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6867"><span id="lf0610_label_8720">2</span> For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6868"><span id="lf0610_label_8721">3</span> Without natural affection, trucebreakers, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1785" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1785_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6869"><span id="lf0610_label_8723">4</span> Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6870"><span id="lf0610_label_8724">5</span> Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6871"><span id="lf0610_label_8725">6</span> For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6872"><span id="lf0610_label_8726">7</span> Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6873"><span id="lf0610_label_8727">8</span> Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1786" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1786_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>reprobate concerning the faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6874"><span id="lf0610_label_8729">9</span> But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all <span class="ital">men,</span> as theirs also was.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6875"><span id="lf0610_label_8730">10</span> But <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1787" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1787_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6876"><span id="lf0610_label_8732">11</span> Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of <span class="ital">them</span> all the Lord delivered me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6877"><span id="lf0610_label_8733">12</span> Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6878"><span id="lf0610_label_8734">13</span> But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6879"><span id="lf0610_label_8735">14</span> But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned <span class="ital">them;</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6880"><span id="lf0610_label_8736">15</span> And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6881"><span id="lf0610_label_8737">16</span> All scripture <span class="ital">is</span> given by inspiration of God, and <span class="ital">is</span> profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6882"><span id="lf0610_label_8738">17</span> That the man of God may be perfect, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1788" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1788_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>throughly furnished unto all good works.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_230" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8740">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6883"><span id="lf0610_label_8741">1</span> I charge <span class="ital">thee</span> therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6884"><span id="lf0610_label_8742">2</span> Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6885"><span id="lf0610_label_8743">3</span> For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6886"><span id="lf0610_label_8744">4</span> And they shall turn away <span class="ital">their</span> ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6887"><span id="lf0610_label_8745">5</span> But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1789" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1789_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>make full proof of thy ministry.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6888"><span id="lf0610_label_8747">6</span> For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6889"><span id="lf0610_label_8748">7</span> I have fought a good fight, I have finished <span class="ital">my</span> course, I have kept the faith:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6890"><span id="lf0610_label_8749">8</span> Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1790" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1790_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>all them also that love his appearing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6891"><span id="lf0610_label_8751">9</span> Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6892"><span id="lf0610_label_8752">10</span> For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6893"><span id="lf0610_label_8753">11</span> Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6894"><span id="lf0610_label_8754">12</span> And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>251<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6895"><span id="lf0610_label_8755">13</span> The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring <span class="ital">with thee,</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1791" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1791_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>and the books, <span class="ital">but</span> especially the parchments.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6896"><span id="lf0610_label_8757">14</span> Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6897"><span id="lf0610_label_8758">15</span> Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1792" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1792_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>our words.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6898"><span id="lf0610_label_8760">16</span> At my first answer no man stood with me, but all <span class="ital">men</span> forsook me: <span class="ital">I pray God</span> that it may not be laid to their charge.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6899"><span id="lf0610_label_8761">17</span> Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and <span class="ital">that</span> all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6900"><span id="lf0610_label_8762">18</span> And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve <span class="ital">me</span> unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom <span class="ital">be</span> glory for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6901"><span id="lf0610_label_8763">19</span> Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6902"><span id="lf0610_label_8764">20</span> Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6903"><span id="lf0610_label_8765">21</span> Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6904"><span id="lf0610_label_8766">22</span> The Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with thy spirit. Grace <span class="ital">be</span> with you. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6905">&#xB6; The second <span class="ital">epistle</span> unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_231" class="type-part Titus">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_039">THE EPISTLE OF PAUL TO TITUS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_232" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8767">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6906"><span id="lf0610_label_8768">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God&#x2019;s elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6907"><span id="lf0610_label_8769">2</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1793" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1793_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>In hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6908"><span id="lf0610_label_8771">3</span> But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6909"><span id="lf0610_label_8772">4</span> To Titus, <span class="ital">mine</span> own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, <span class="ital">and</span> peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6910"><span id="lf0610_label_8773">5</span> For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1794" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1794_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6911"><span id="lf0610_label_8775">6</span> If any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6912"><span id="lf0610_label_8776">7</span> For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1795" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1795_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6913"><span id="lf0610_label_8778">8</span> But a lover of hospitality, a lover of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1796" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1796_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6914"><span id="lf0610_label_8780">9</span> Holding fast the faithful word <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1797" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1797_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6915"><span id="lf0610_label_8782">10</span> For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6916"><span id="lf0610_label_8783">11</span> Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre&#x2019;s sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6917"><span id="lf0610_label_8784">12</span> One of themselves, <span class="ital">even</span> a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians <span class="ital">are</span> alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>252<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6918"><span id="lf0610_label_8785">13</span> This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6919"><span id="lf0610_label_8786">14</span> Not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men, that turn from the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6920"><span id="lf0610_label_8787">15</span> Unto the pure all things <span class="ital">are</span> pure: but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving <span class="ital">is</span> nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6921"><span id="lf0610_label_8788">16</span> They profess that they know God; but in works they deny <span class="ital">him,</span> being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1798" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1798_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>reprobate.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_233" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8790">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6922"><span id="lf0610_label_8791">1</span> But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6923"><span id="lf0610_label_8792">2</span> That the aged men be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1799" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1799_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6924"><span id="lf0610_label_8794">3</span> The aged women likewise, that <span class="ital">they be</span> in behaviour as becometh <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1800" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1800_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>holiness, not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1801" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1801_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6925"><span id="lf0610_label_8797">4</span> That they may teach the young women to be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1802" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1802_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6926"><span id="lf0610_label_8799">5</span> <span class="ital">To be</span> discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6927"><span id="lf0610_label_8800">6</span> Young men likewise exhort to be <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1803" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1803_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>sober minded.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6928"><span id="lf0610_label_8802">7</span> In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine <span class="ital">shewing</span> uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6929"><span id="lf0610_label_8803">8</span> Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6930"><span id="lf0610_label_8804">9</span> <span class="ital">Exhort</span> servants to be obedient unto their own masters, <span class="ital">and</span> to please <span class="ital">them</span> well in all <span class="ital">things;</span> not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1804" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1804_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>answering again;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6931"><span id="lf0610_label_8806">10</span> Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6932"><span id="lf0610_label_8807">11</span> For the grace of God <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1805" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1805_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6933"><span id="lf0610_label_8809">12</span> Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6934"><span id="lf0610_label_8810">13</span> Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6935"><span id="lf0610_label_8811">14</span> Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6936"><span id="lf0610_label_8812">15</span> These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_234" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8813">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6937"><span id="lf0610_label_8814">1</span> Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6938"><span id="lf0610_label_8815">2</span> To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, <span class="ital">but</span> gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6939"><span id="lf0610_label_8816">3</span> For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, <span class="ital">and</span> hating one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6940"><span id="lf0610_label_8817">4</span> But after that the kindness and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1806" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1806_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6941"><span id="lf0610_label_8819">5</span> Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6942"><span id="lf0610_label_8820">6</span> Which he shed on us <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1807" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1807_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6943"><span id="lf0610_label_8822">7</span> That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6944"><span id="lf0610_label_8823">8</span> <span class="ital">This is</span> a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6945"><span id="lf0610_label_8824">9</span> But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>253<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6946"><span id="lf0610_label_8825">10</span> A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6947"><span id="lf0610_label_8826">11</span> Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6948"><span id="lf0610_label_8827">12</span> When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6949"><span id="lf0610_label_8828">13</span> Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6950"><span id="lf0610_label_8829">14</span> And let ours also learn to <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1808" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1808_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6951"><span id="lf0610_label_8831">15</span> All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace <span class="ital">be</span> with you all. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6952">&#xB6; It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from N copolis of Macedonia,</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_235" class="type-part Philemon">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_041">THE EPISTLE OF PAUL TO PHILEMON.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_236" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8832">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6953"><span id="lf0610_label_8833">1</span> <span class="csc">Paul,</span> a prisoner of Jesus Christ, and Timothy <span class="ital">our</span> brother, unto Philemon our dearly beloved, and fellowlabourer,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6954"><span id="lf0610_label_8834">2</span> And to <span class="ital">our</span> beloved Apphia, and Archippus our fellowsoldier, and to the church in thy house:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6955"><span id="lf0610_label_8835">3</span> Grace to you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6956"><span id="lf0610_label_8836">4</span> I thank my God, making mention of thee always in my prayers,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6957"><span id="lf0610_label_8837">5</span> Hearing of thy love and faith, which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus, and toward all saints;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6958"><span id="lf0610_label_8838">6</span> That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6959"><span id="lf0610_label_8839">7</span> For we have great joy and consolation in thy love, because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee, brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6960"><span id="lf0610_label_8840">8</span> Wherefore, though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6961"><span id="lf0610_label_8841">9</span> Yet for love&#x2019;s sake I rather beseech <span class="ital">thee,</span> being such an one as Paul the aged, and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6962"><span id="lf0610_label_8842">10</span> I beseech thee for my son Onesimus, whom I have begotten in my bonds:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6963"><span id="lf0610_label_8843">11</span> Which in time past was to thee unprofitable, but now profitable to thee and to me:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6964"><span id="lf0610_label_8844">12</span> Whom I have sent again: thou therefore receive him, that is, mine own bowels:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6965"><span id="lf0610_label_8845">13</span> Whom I would have retained with me, that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6966"><span id="lf0610_label_8846">14</span> But without thy mind would I do nothing; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity, but willingly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6967"><span id="lf0610_label_8847">15</span> For perhaps he therefore departed for a season, that thou shouldest receive him for ever;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6968"><span id="lf0610_label_8848">16</span> Not now as a servant, but above a servant, a brother beloved, specially to me, but how much more unto thee, both in the flesh, and in the Lord?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6969"><span id="lf0610_label_8849">17</span> If thou count me therefore a partner, receive him as myself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6970"><span id="lf0610_label_8850">18</span> If he hath wronged thee, or oweth <span class="ital">thee</span> ought, put that on mine account;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6971"><span id="lf0610_label_8851">19</span> I Paul have written <span class="ital">it</span> with mine own hand, I will repay <span class="ital">it:</span> albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6972"><span id="lf0610_label_8852">20</span> Yea, brother, let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my bowels in the Lord.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>254<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6973"><span id="lf0610_label_8853">21</span> Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee, knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6974"><span id="lf0610_label_8854">22</span> But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6975"><span id="lf0610_label_8855">23</span> There salute thee Epaphras, my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6976"><span id="lf0610_label_8856">24</span> Marcus, Aristarchus, Demas, Lucas, my fellowlabourers.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6977"><span id="lf0610_label_8857">25</span> The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ <span class="ital">be</span> with your spirit. Amen.</p>
<div class="cit">
<p class="indent-no" id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6978">&#xB6; Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus a servant.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_237" class="type-part Hebrews">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_043">THE EPISTLE OF PAUL THE APOSTLE TO THE HEBREWS.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_238" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8858">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6979"><span id="lf0610_label_8859">1</span> <span class="csc">God,</span> who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6980"><span id="lf0610_label_8860">2</span> Hath in these last days spoken unto us by <span class="ital">his</span> Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6981"><span id="lf0610_label_8861">3</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1809" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1809_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Who being the brightness of <span class="ital">his</span> glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6982"><span id="lf0610_label_8863">4</span> Being made so much better than the angels, as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6983"><span id="lf0610_label_8864">5</span> For unto which of the angels said he at any time, Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee? And again, I will be to him a Father, and he shall be to me a Son?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6984"><span id="lf0610_label_8865">6</span> And again, when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world, he saith, And let all the angels of God worship him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6985"><span id="lf0610_label_8866">7</span> And of the angels he saith, Who maketh his angels spirits, and his ministers a flame of fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6986"><span id="lf0610_label_8867">8</span> But unto the Son <span class="ital">he saith,</span> Thy throne, O God, <span class="ital">is</span> for ever and ever: a sceptre of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1810" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1810_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>righteousness <span class="ital">is</span> the sceptre of thy kingdom.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6987"><span id="lf0610_label_8869">9</span> Thou hast loved righteousness, and hated iniquity; therefore God, <span class="ital">even</span> thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6988"><span id="lf0610_label_8870">10</span> And, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1811" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1811_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou, Lord, in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth; and the heavens are the works of thine hands:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6989"><span id="lf0610_label_8872">11</span> They shall perish; but thou remainest; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6990"><span id="lf0610_label_8873">12</span> And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up, and they shall be changed: but thou art the same, and thy years shall not fail.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6991"><span id="lf0610_label_8874">13</span> But to which of the angels said he at any time, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1812" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1812_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Sit on my right hand, until I make thine enemies thy footstool?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6992"><span id="lf0610_label_8876">14</span> Are they not all ministering spirits, sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation?</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_239" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8877">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6993"><span id="lf0610_label_8878">1</span> Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard, lest at any time we should <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1813" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1813_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>let <span class="ital">them</span> slip.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6994"><span id="lf0610_label_8880">2</span> For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>255<span class="bracket">]</span></span> and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6995"><span id="lf0610_label_8881">3</span> How shall we escape, if we neglect so great salvation; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord, and was confirmed unto us by them that heard <span class="ital">him;</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6996"><span id="lf0610_label_8882">4</span> God also bearing <span class="ital">them</span> witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1814" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1814_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6997"><span id="lf0610_label_8884">5</span> For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come, whereof we speak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6998"><span id="lf0610_label_8885">6</span> But one in a certain place testified, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1815" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1815_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>What is man, that thou art mindful of him? or the son of man, that thou visitest him?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_6999"><span id="lf0610_label_8887">7</span> Thou madest him <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1816" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1816_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>a little lower than the angels; thou crownedst him with glory and honour, and didst set him over the works of thy hands:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7000"><span id="lf0610_label_8889">8</span> Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet. For in that he put all in subjection under him, he left nothing <span class="ital">that is</span> not put under him. But now we see not yet all things put under him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7001"><span id="lf0610_label_8890">9</span> But we see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1817" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1817_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7002"><span id="lf0610_label_8892">10</span> For it became him, for whom <span class="ital">are</span> all things, and by whom <span class="ital">are</span> all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7003"><span id="lf0610_label_8893">11</span> For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified <span class="ital">are</span> all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7004"><span id="lf0610_label_8894">12</span> Saying, I will declare thy name unto my brethren, in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7005"><span id="lf0610_label_8895">13</span> And again, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1818" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1818_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will put my trust in him. And again, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1819" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1819_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Behold I and the children which God hath given me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7006"><span id="lf0610_label_8898">14</span> Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7007"><span id="lf0610_label_8899">15</span> And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7008"><span id="lf0610_label_8900">16</span> For verily <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1820" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1820_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>he took not on <span class="ital">him the nature of</span> angels; but he took on <span class="ital">him</span> the seed of Abraham.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7009"><span id="lf0610_label_8902">17</span> Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto <span class="ital">his</span> brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things <span class="ital">pertaining</span> to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7010"><span id="lf0610_label_8903">18</span> For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_240" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8904">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7011"><span id="lf0610_label_8905">1</span> Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7012"><span id="lf0610_label_8906">2</span> Who was faithful to him that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1821" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1821_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>appointed him, as also Moses <span class="ital">was faithful</span> in all his house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7013"><span id="lf0610_label_8908">3</span> For this <span class="ital">man</span> was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7014"><span id="lf0610_label_8909">4</span> For every house is builded by some <span class="ital">man;</span> but he that built all things <span class="ital">is</span> God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7015"><span id="lf0610_label_8910">5</span> And Moses verily <span class="ital">was</span> faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7016"><span id="lf0610_label_8911">6</span> But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7017"><span id="lf0610_label_8912">7</span> Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1822" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1822_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>To day if ye will hear his voice,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7018"><span id="lf0610_label_8914">8</span> Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7019"><span id="lf0610_label_8915">9</span> When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my works forty years.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>256<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7020"><span id="lf0610_label_8916">10</span> Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, and said, They do alway err in <span class="ital">their</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1823" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1823_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>heart; and they have not known my ways.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7021"><span id="lf0610_label_8918">11</span> So I sware in my wrath, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1824" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1824_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>They shall not enter into my rest.)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7022"><span id="lf0610_label_8920">12</span> Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7023"><span id="lf0610_label_8921">13</span> But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7024"><span id="lf0610_label_8922">14</span> For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7025"><span id="lf0610_label_8923">15</span> While it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7026"><span id="lf0610_label_8924">16</span> For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7027"><span id="lf0610_label_8925">17</span> But with whom was he grieved forty years? <span class="ital">was it</span> not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7028"><span id="lf0610_label_8926">18</span> And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7029"><span id="lf0610_label_8927">19</span> So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_241" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8928">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7030"><span id="lf0610_label_8929">1</span> Let us therefore fear, lest, a promise being left <span class="ital">us</span> of entering into his rest, any of you should seem to come short of it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7031"><span id="lf0610_label_8930">2</span> For unto us was the gospel preached, as well as unto them: but <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1825" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1825_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>the word preached did not profit them, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1826" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1826_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>not being mixed with faith in them that heard <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7032"><span id="lf0610_label_8933">3</span> For we which have believed do enter into rest, as he said, As I have sworn in my wrath, if they shall enter into my rest: although the works were finished from the foundation of the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7033"><span id="lf0610_label_8934">4</span> For he spake in a certain place of the seventh <span class="ital">day</span> on this wise, And God did rest the seventh day from all his works.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7034"><span id="lf0610_label_8935">5</span> And in this <span class="ital">place</span> again, If they shall enter into my rest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7035"><span id="lf0610_label_8936">6</span> Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein, and they to whom <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1827" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1827_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7036"><span id="lf0610_label_8938">7</span> Again, he limiteth a certain day, saying in David, To day, after so long a time; as it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7037"><span id="lf0610_label_8939">8</span> For if <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1828" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1828_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Jesus had given them rest, then would he not afterward have spoken of another day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7038"><span id="lf0610_label_8941">9</span> There remaineth therefore a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1829" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1829_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>rest to the people of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7039"><span id="lf0610_label_8943">10</span> For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God <span class="ital">did</span> from his.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7040"><span id="lf0610_label_8944">11</span> Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest, lest any man fall after the same example of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1830" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1830_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>unbelief.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7041"><span id="lf0610_label_8946">12</span> For the word of God <span class="ital">is</span> quick, and powerful, and sharper than any twoedged sword, piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit, and of the joints and marrow, and <span class="ital">is</span> a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7042"><span id="lf0610_label_8947">13</span> Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight: but all things <span class="ital">are</span> naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7043"><span id="lf0610_label_8948">14</span> Seeing then that we have a great high priest, that is passed into the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast <span class="ital">our</span> profession.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7044"><span id="lf0610_label_8949">15</span> For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as <span class="ital">we are, yet</span> without sin.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7045"><span id="lf0610_label_8950">16</span> Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_242" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8951">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7046"><span id="lf0610_label_8952">1</span> For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things <span class="ital">pertaining</span> to God, that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7047"><span id="lf0610_label_8953">2</span> Who <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1831" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1831_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>can have compassion on the ignorant, and on them that are out of the way; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7048"><span id="lf0610_label_8955">3</span> And by reason hereof he ought, as for the people, so also for himself, to offer for sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7049"><span id="lf0610_label_8956">4</span> And no man taketh this honour unto himself, but he that is called of God, as <span class="ital">was</span> Aaron.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7050"><span id="lf0610_label_8957">5</span> So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest; but he that said unto him, Thou art my Son, to day have I begotten thee</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7051"><span id="lf0610_label_8958">6</span> As he saith also in another <span class="ital">place,</span> Thou <span class="ital">art</span> a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7052"><span id="lf0610_label_8959">7</span> Who in the days of his flesh, when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death, and was heard <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1832" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1832_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in that he feared;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7053"><span id="lf0610_label_8961">8</span> Though he were a Son, yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7054"><span id="lf0610_label_8962">9</span> And being made perfect, he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7055"><span id="lf0610_label_8963">10</span> Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7056"><span id="lf0610_label_8964">11</span> Of whom we have many things to say, and hard to be uttered, seeing ye are dull of hearing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7057"><span id="lf0610_label_8965">12</span> For when for the time ye ought to be teachers, ye have need that one teach you again which <span class="ital">be</span> the first principles of the oracles of God; and are become such as have need of milk, and not of strong meat.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7058"><span id="lf0610_label_8966">13</span> For every one that useth milk <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1833" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1833_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a><span class="ital">is</span> unskilful in the word of righteousness: for he is a babe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7059"><span id="lf0610_label_8968">14</span> But strong meat belongeth to them that are <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1834" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1834_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of full age, <span class="ital">even</span> those who by reason <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1835" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1835_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_243" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8971">6</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7060"><span id="lf0610_label_8972">1</span> Therefore leaving <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1836" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1836_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the principles of the doctrine of Christ, let us go on unto perfection; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works, and of faith toward God,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7061"><span id="lf0610_label_8974">2</span> Of the doctrine of baptisms, and of laying on of hands, and of resurrection of the dead, and of eternal judgment.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7062"><span id="lf0610_label_8975">3</span> And this will we do, if God permit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7063"><span id="lf0610_label_8976">4</span> For <span class="ital">it is</span> impossible for those who were once enlightened, and have tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7064"><span id="lf0610_label_8977">5</span> And have tasted the good word of God, and the powers of the world to come,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7065"><span id="lf0610_label_8978">6</span> If they shall fall away, to renew them again unto repentance; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh, and put <span class="ital">him</span> to an open shame.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7066"><span id="lf0610_label_8979">7</span> For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it, and bringeth forth herbs meet for them <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1837" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1837_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>by whom it is dressed, receiveth blessing from God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7067"><span id="lf0610_label_8981">8</span> But that which beareth thorns and briers <span class="ital">is</span> rejected, and <span class="ital">is</span> nigh unto cursing; whose end <span class="ital">is</span> to be burned.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7068"><span id="lf0610_label_8982">9</span> But, beloved, we are persuaded better things of you, and things that accompany salvation, though we thus speak.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7069"><span id="lf0610_label_8983">10</span> For God <span class="ital">is</span> not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love, which ye have shewed toward his name, in that ye have ministered to the saints, and do minister.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7070"><span id="lf0610_label_8984">11</span> And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7071"><span id="lf0610_label_8985">12</span> That ye be not slothful, but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7072"><span id="lf0610_label_8986">13</span> For when God made promise to Abraham, because he could swear by no greater, he sware by himself,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7073"><span id="lf0610_label_8987">14</span> Saying, Surely blessing I will bless thee, and multiplying I will multiply thee.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>258<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7074"><span id="lf0610_label_8988">15</span> And so, after he had patiently endured, he obtained the promise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7075"><span id="lf0610_label_8989">16</span> For men verily swear by the greater: and an oath for confirmation <span class="ital">is</span> to them an end of all strife.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7076"><span id="lf0610_label_8990">17</span> Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1838" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1838_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>confirmed <span class="ital">it</span> by an oath:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7077"><span id="lf0610_label_8992">18</span> That by two immutable things, in which <span class="ital">it was</span> impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7078"><span id="lf0610_label_8993">19</span> Which <span class="ital">hope</span> we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and stedfast, and which entereth into that within the veil;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7079"><span id="lf0610_label_8994">20</span> Whither the forerunner is for us entered, <span class="ital">even</span> Jesus, made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_244" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_8995">7</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7080"><span id="lf0610_label_8996">1</span> For this Melchisedec, king of Salem, priest of the most high God, who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings, and blessed him;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7081"><span id="lf0610_label_8997">2</span> To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all; first being by interpretation King of righteousness, and after that also King of Salem, which is, King of peace;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7082"><span id="lf0610_label_8998">3</span> Without father, without mother, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1839" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1839_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>without descent, having neither beginning of days, nor end of life; but made like unto the Son of God; abideth a priest continually.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7083"><span id="lf0610_label_9000">4</span> Now consider how great this man <span class="ital">was,</span> unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7084"><span id="lf0610_label_9001">5</span> And verily they that are of the sons of Levi, who receive the office of the priesthood, have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law, that is, of their brethren, though they come out of the loins of Abraham:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7085"><span id="lf0610_label_9002">6</span> But he whose <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1840" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1840_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham, and blessed him that had the promises.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7086"><span id="lf0610_label_9004">7</span> And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7087"><span id="lf0610_label_9005">8</span> And here men that die receive tithes; but there he <span class="ital">receiveth them,</span> of whom it is witnessed that he liveth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7088"><span id="lf0610_label_9006">9</span> And as I may so say, Levi also, who receiveth tithes, payed tithes in Abraham.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7089"><span id="lf0610_label_9007">10</span> For he was yet in the loins of his father, when Melchisedec met him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7090"><span id="lf0610_label_9008">11</span> If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood, (for under it the people received the law,) what further need <span class="ital">was there</span> that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec, and not be called after the order of Aaron?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7091"><span id="lf0610_label_9009">12</span> For the priesthood being changed, there is made of necessity a change also of the law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7092"><span id="lf0610_label_9010">13</span> For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe, of which no man gave attendance at the altar.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7093"><span id="lf0610_label_9011">14</span> For <span class="ital">it is</span> evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7094"><span id="lf0610_label_9012">15</span> And it is yet far more evident: for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7095"><span id="lf0610_label_9013">16</span> Who is made, not after the law of a carnal commandment, but after the power of an endless life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7096"><span id="lf0610_label_9014">17</span> For he testifieth, Thou <span class="ital">art</span> a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7097"><span id="lf0610_label_9015">18</span> For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7098"><span id="lf0610_label_9016">19</span> For the law made nothing perfect, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1841" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1841_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>but the bringing in of a better hope <span class="ital">did;</span> by the which we draw nigh unto God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7099"><span id="lf0610_label_9018">20</span> And inasmuch as not without an oath <span class="ital">he was made priest:</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7100"><span id="lf0610_label_9019">21</span> (For those priests were made <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1842" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1842_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>without an oath; <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>259<span class="bracket">]</span></span> but this with an oath by him that said unto him, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1843" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1843_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The Lord sware and will not repent, Thou <span class="ital">art</span> a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec:)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7101"><span id="lf0610_label_9022">22</span> By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7102"><span id="lf0610_label_9023">23</span> And they truly were many priests, because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7103"><span id="lf0610_label_9024">24</span> But this <span class="ital">man,</span> because he continueth ever, hath <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1844" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1844_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>an unchangeable priesthood.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7104"><span id="lf0610_label_9026">25</span> Wherefore he is able also to save them <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1845" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1845_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to the uttermost that come unto God by him, seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7105"><span id="lf0610_label_9028">26</span> For such an high priest became us, <span class="ital">who is</span> holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7106"><span id="lf0610_label_9029">27</span> Who needeth not daily, as those high priests, to offer up sacrifice, first for his own sins, and then for the people&#x2019;s: for this he did once, when he offered up himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7107"><span id="lf0610_label_9030">28</span> For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity; but the word of the oath, which was since the law, <span class="ital">maketh</span> the Son, who is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1846" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1846_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>consecrated for evermore.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_245" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9032">8</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7108"><span id="lf0610_label_9033">1</span> Now of the things which we have spoken <span class="ital">this is</span> the sum: We have such an high priest, who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7109"><span id="lf0610_label_9034">2</span> A minister <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1847" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1847_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of the sanctuary, and of the true tabernacle, which the Lord pitched, and not man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7110"><span id="lf0610_label_9036">3</span> For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices: wherefore <span class="ital">it is</span> of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7111"><span id="lf0610_label_9037">4</span> For if he were on earth, he should not be a priest, seeing that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1848" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1848_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>there are priests that offer gifts according to the law:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7112"><span id="lf0610_label_9039">5</span> Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things, as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle: for, See, saith he, <span class="ital">that</span> thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7113"><span id="lf0610_label_9040">6</span> But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry, by how much also he is the mediator of a better <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1849" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1849_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>covenant, which was established upon better promises.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7114"><span id="lf0610_label_9042">7</span> For if that first <span class="ital">covenant</span> had been faultless, then should no place have been sought for the second.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7115"><span id="lf0610_label_9043">8</span> For finding fault with them, he saith, Behold, the days come, saith the Lord, when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1850" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1850_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>with the house of Judah:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7116"><span id="lf0610_label_9045">9</span> Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt; because they continued not in my covenant, and I regarded them not, saith the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7117"><span id="lf0610_label_9046">10</span> For this <span class="ital">is</span> the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days, saith the Lord; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1851" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1851_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I will <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1852" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1852_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>put my laws into their mind, and write them <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1853" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1853_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in their hearts: and I will be to them a God, and they shall be to me a people:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7118"><span id="lf0610_label_9050">11</span> And they shall not teach every man his neighbour, and every man his brother, saying, Know the Lord: for all shall know me, from the least to the greatest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7119"><span id="lf0610_label_9051">12</span> For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7120"><span id="lf0610_label_9052">13</span> In that he saith, A new <span class="ital">covenant,</span> he hath made the first old. Now that which decayeth and waxeth old <span class="ital">is</span> ready to vanish away.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_246" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9053">9</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7121"><span id="lf0610_label_9054">1</span> Then verily the first <span class="ital">covenant</span> had also <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1854" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1854_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ordinances of divine service, and a worldly sanctuary.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7122"><span id="lf0610_label_9056">2</span> For there was a tabernacle made; the first, wherein <span class="ital">was</span> the candlestick, and the table, and the shewbread; which is called <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1855" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1855_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>the sanctuary.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>260<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7123"><span id="lf0610_label_9058">3</span> And after the second veil, the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7124"><span id="lf0610_label_9059">4</span> Which had the golden censer, and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold, wherein <span class="ital">was</span> the golden pot that had manna, and Aaron&#x2019;s rod that budded, and the tables of the covenant;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7125"><span id="lf0610_label_9060">5</span> And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat; of which we cannot now speak particularly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7126"><span id="lf0610_label_9061">6</span> Now when these things were thus ordained, the priests went always into the first tabernacle, accomplishing the service <span class="ital">of God.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7127"><span id="lf0610_label_9062">7</span> But into the second <span class="ital">went</span> the high priest alone once every year, not without blood, which he offered for himself, and <span class="ital">for</span> the errors of the people:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7128"><span id="lf0610_label_9063">8</span> The Holy Ghost this signifying, that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7129"><span id="lf0610_label_9064">9</span> Which <span class="ital">was</span> a figure for the time then present, in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices, that could not make him that did the service perfect, as pertaining to the conscience;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7130"><span id="lf0610_label_9065">10</span> <span class="ital">Which stood</span> only in meats and drinks, and divers washings, and carnal <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1856" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1856_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ordinances, imposed <span class="ital">on them</span> until the time of reformation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7131"><span id="lf0610_label_9067">11</span> But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come, by a greater and more perfect tabernacle, not made with hands, that is to say, not of this building;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7132"><span id="lf0610_label_9068">12</span> Neither by the blood of goats and calves, but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption <span class="ital">for us.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7133"><span id="lf0610_label_9069">13</span> For if the blood of bulls and of goats, and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean, sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh:</p>
