<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7451"><span id="lf0610_label_9494">11</span> Let him eschew evil, and do good; let him seek peace, and ensue it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7452"><span id="lf0610_label_9495">12</span> For the eyes of the Lord <span class="ital">are</span> over the righteous, and his ears <span class="ital">are open</span> unto their prayers: but the face of the Lord <span class="ital">is</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1953" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1953_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>against them that do evil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7453"><span id="lf0610_label_9497">13</span> And who <span class="ital">is</span> he that will harm you, if ye be followers of that which is good?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7454"><span id="lf0610_label_9498">14</span> But and if ye suffer for righteousness&#x2019; sake, happy <span class="ital">are ye:</span> and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1954" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1954_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>be not afraid of their terror, neither be troubled;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7455"><span id="lf0610_label_9500">15</span> But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts: and <span class="ital">be</span> ready always to <span class="ital">give</span> an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1955" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1955_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>fear:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7456"><span id="lf0610_label_9502">16</span> Having a good conscience; that, whereas they speak evil of you, as of evildoers, they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7457"><span id="lf0610_label_9503">17</span> For <span class="ital">it is</span> better, if the will of God be so, that ye suffer for well doing, than for evil doing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7458"><span id="lf0610_label_9504">18</span> For Christ also hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh, but quickened by the Spirit:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7459"><span id="lf0610_label_9505">19</span> By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7460"><span id="lf0610_label_9506">20</span> Which sometime were disobedient, when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah, while the ark was a preparing, wherein few, that is, eight souls were saved by water.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7461"><span id="lf0610_label_9507">21</span> The like figure whereunto <span class="ital">even</span> baptism doth also now save us (not the putting away of the filth of the flesh, but the answer of a good conscience toward God,) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7462"><span id="lf0610_label_9508">22</span> Who is gone into heaven, and is on the right hand of God; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_261" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9509">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7463"><span id="lf0610_label_9510">1</span> Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7464"><span id="lf0610_label_9511">2</span> That he no longer should live the rest of <span class="ital">his</span> time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7465"><span id="lf0610_label_9512">3</span> For the time past of <span class="ital">our</span> life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles, when we walked in lasciviousness, lusts, excess of wine, revellings, banquetings, and abominable idolatries:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7466"><span id="lf0610_label_9513">4</span> Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with <span class="ital">them</span> to the same excess of riot, speaking evil of <span class="ital">you:</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7467"><span id="lf0610_label_9514">5</span> Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7468"><span id="lf0610_label_9515">6</span> For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead, that they might be judged according to men in the flesh, but live according to God in the spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7469"><span id="lf0610_label_9516">7</span> But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7470"><span id="lf0610_label_9517">8</span> And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1956" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1956_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>shall cover the multitude of sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7471"><span id="lf0610_label_9519">9</span> Use hospitality one to another without grudging.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7472"><span id="lf0610_label_9520">10</span> As every man hath received the gift, <span class="ital">even so</span> minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7473"><span id="lf0610_label_9521">11</span> If any man speak, <span class="ital">let him speak</span> as the oracles of God; if any man minister, <span class="ital">let him do it</span> as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7474"><span id="lf0610_label_9522">12</span> Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7475"><span id="lf0610_label_9523">13</span> But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ&#x2019;s sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7476"><span id="lf0610_label_9524">14</span> If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy <span class="ital">are ye;</span> for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7477"><span id="lf0610_label_9525">15</span> But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or <span class="ital">as</span> a thief, or <span class="ital">as</span> an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men&#x2019;s matters.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7478"><span id="lf0610_label_9526">16</span> Yet if <span class="ital">any man suffer</span> as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7479"><span id="lf0610_label_9527">17</span> For the time <span class="ital">is come</span> that judgment must begin at the house of God: and if <span class="ital">it</span> first <span class="ital">begin</span> at us, what shall the end <span class="ital">be</span> of them that obey not the gospel of God?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7480"><span id="lf0610_label_9528">18</span> And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7481"><span id="lf0610_label_9529">19</span> Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls <span class="ital">to him</span> in well doing, as unto a faithful Creator.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_262" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9530">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7482"><span id="lf0610_label_9531">1</span> The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7483"><span id="lf0610_label_9532">2</span> Feed the flock of God <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1957" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1957_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>which is among you, taking the oversight <span class="ital">thereof,</span> not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7484"><span id="lf0610_label_9534">3</span> Neither as <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1958" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1958_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>being lords over <span class="ital">God&#x2019;s</span> heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7485"><span id="lf0610_label_9536">4</span> And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7486"><span id="lf0610_label_9537">5</span> Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all <span class="ital">of you</span> be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7487"><span id="lf0610_label_9538">6</span> Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>274<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7488"><span id="lf0610_label_9539">7</span> Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7489"><span id="lf0610_label_9540">8</span> Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7490"><span id="lf0610_label_9541">9</span> Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7491"><span id="lf0610_label_9542">10</span> But the God of all grace, who hath called us <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1959" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1959_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle <span class="ital">you.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7492"><span id="lf0610_label_9544">11</span> To him <span class="ital">be</span> glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7493"><span id="lf0610_label_9545">12</span> By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7494"><span id="lf0610_label_9546">13</span> The <span class="ital">church that is</span> at Babylon, elected together with <span class="ital">you,</span> saluteth you; and <span class="ital">so doth</span> Marcus my son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7495"><span id="lf0610_label_9547">14</span> Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace <span class="ital">be</span> with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_263" class="type-part Peter_II">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_049">THE SECOND EPISTLE GENERAL OF PETER.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_264" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9548">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7496"><span id="lf0610_label_9549">1</span> <span class="csc">Simon</span> Peter, a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ, to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7497"><span id="lf0610_label_9550">2</span> Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7498"><span id="lf0610_label_9551">3</span> According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that <span class="ital">pertain</span> unto life and godliness, through the knowledge of him that hath called us <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1960" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1960_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to glory and virtue:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7499"><span id="lf0610_label_9553">4</span> Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7500"><span id="lf0610_label_9554">5</span> And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7501"><span id="lf0610_label_9555">6</span> And to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7502"><span id="lf0610_label_9556">7</span> And to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7503"><span id="lf0610_label_9557">8</span> For if these things be in you, and abound, they make <span class="ital">you that ye shall</span> neither <span class="ital">be</span> barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7504"><span id="lf0610_label_9558">9</span> But he that lacketh these things is blind, and cannot see afar off, and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7505"><span id="lf0610_label_9559">10</span> Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7506"><span id="lf0610_label_9560">11</span> For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7507"><span id="lf0610_label_9561">12</span> Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things, though ye know <span class="ital">them,</span> and be established in the present truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7508"><span id="lf0610_label_9562">13</span> Yea, I think it meet, as long as I am in this tabernacle, to stir you up by putting <span class="ital">you</span> in remembrance;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7509"><span id="lf0610_label_9563">14</span> Knowing that shortly I must put off <span class="ital">this</span> my tabernacle, even as <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1961" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1961_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>275<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7510"><span id="lf0610_label_9565">15</span> Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7511"><span id="lf0610_label_9566">16</span> For we have not followed cunningly devised fables, when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but were eyewitnesses of his majesty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7512"><span id="lf0610_label_9567">17</span> For he received from God the Father honour and glory, when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7513"><span id="lf0610_label_9568">18</span> And this voice which came from heaven we heard, when we were with him in the holy mount.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7514"><span id="lf0610_label_9569">19</span> We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7515"><span id="lf0610_label_9570">20</span> Knowing this first, that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7516"><span id="lf0610_label_9571">21</span> For the prophecy came not <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1962" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1962_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in old time by the will of man: but holy men of God spake <span class="ital">as they were</span> moved by the Holy Ghost.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_265" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9573">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7517"><span id="lf0610_label_9574">1</span> But there were false prophets also among the people, even as there shall be false teachers among you, who privily shall bring in damnable heresies, even denying the Lord that bought them, and bring upon themselves swift destruction.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7518"><span id="lf0610_label_9575">2</span> And many shall follow their <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1963" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1963_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>pernicious ways; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7519"><span id="lf0610_label_9577">3</span> And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you: whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not, and their damnation slumbereth not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7520"><span id="lf0610_label_9578">4</span> For if God spared not the angels that sinned, but cast <span class="ital">them</span> down to hell, and delivered <span class="ital">them</span> into chains of darkness, to be reserved unto judgment;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7521"><span id="lf0610_label_9579">5</span> And spared not the old world, but saved Noah the eighth <span class="ital">person,</span> a preacher of righteousness, bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7522"><span id="lf0610_label_9580">6</span> And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned <span class="ital">them</span> with an overthrow, making <span class="ital">them</span> an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7523"><span id="lf0610_label_9581">7</span> And delivered just Lot, vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7524"><span id="lf0610_label_9582">8</span> (For that righteous man dwelling among them, in seeing and hearing, vexed <span class="ital">his</span> righteous soul from day to day with <span class="ital">their</span> unlawful deeds;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7525"><span id="lf0610_label_9583">9</span> The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations, and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7526"><span id="lf0610_label_9584">10</span> But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness, and despise <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1964" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1964_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>government. <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1965" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1965_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Presumptuous <span class="ital">are they,</span> selfwilled, they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7527"><span id="lf0610_label_9587">11</span> Whereas angels, which are greater in power and might, bring not railing accusation <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1966" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1966_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>against them before the Lord.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7528"><span id="lf0610_label_9589">12</span> But these, as natural brute beasts, made to be taken and destroyed, speak evil of the things that they understand not; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7529"><span id="lf0610_label_9590">13</span> And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness, <span class="ital">as</span> they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time. Spots <span class="ital">they are</span> and blemishes, sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7530"><span id="lf0610_label_9591">14</span> Having eyes full of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1967" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1967_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>adultery, and that cannot cease from sin; beguiling unstable souls: an heart they have exercised with covetous practices; cursed children:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7531"><span id="lf0610_label_9593">15</span> Which have forsaken the right way, and are gone astray, following the way of Balaam <span class="ital">the son</span> of Bosor, who loved the wages of unrighteousness;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7532"><span id="lf0610_label_9594">16</span> But was rebuked for his iniquity: the dumb <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>276<span class="bracket">]</span></span> ass speaking with man&#x2019;s voice forbad the madness of the prophet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7533"><span id="lf0610_label_9595">17</span> These are wells without water, clouds that are carried with a tempest; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7534"><span id="lf0610_label_9596">18</span> For when they speak great swelling <span class="ital">words</span> of vanity, they allure through the lusts of the flesh, <span class="ital">through much</span> wantonness, those that were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1968" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1968_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>clean escaped from them who live in error.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7535"><span id="lf0610_label_9598">19</span> While they promise them liberty, they themselves are the servants of corruption: for of whom a man is overcome, of the same is he brought in bondage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7536"><span id="lf0610_label_9599">20</span> For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ, they are again entangled therein, and overcome, the latter end is worse with them than the beginning.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7537"><span id="lf0610_label_9600">21</span> For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than, after they have known <span class="ital">it,</span> to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7538"><span id="lf0610_label_9601">22</span> But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb, The dog <span class="ital">is</span> turned to his own vomit again; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_266" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9602">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7539"><span id="lf0610_label_9603">1</span> This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; in <span class="ital">both</span> which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7540"><span id="lf0610_label_9604">2</span> That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets, and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7541"><span id="lf0610_label_9605">3</span> Knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7542"><span id="lf0610_label_9606">4</span> And saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue as <span class="ital">they were</span> from the beginning of the creation.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7543"><span id="lf0610_label_9607">5</span> For this they willingly are ignorant of, that by the word of God the heavens were of old, and the earth <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1969" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1969_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>standing out of the water and in the water:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7544"><span id="lf0610_label_9609">6</span> Whereby the world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7545"><span id="lf0610_label_9610">7</span> But the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7546"><span id="lf0610_label_9611">8</span> But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day <span class="ital">is</span> with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7547"><span id="lf0610_label_9612">9</span> The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7548"><span id="lf0610_label_9613">10</span> But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat, the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7549"><span id="lf0610_label_9614">11</span> <span class="ital">Seeing</span> then <span class="ital">that</span> all these things shall be dissolved, what manner <span class="ital">of persons</span> ought ye to be in <span class="ital">all</span> holy conversation and godliness,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7550"><span id="lf0610_label_9615">12</span> Looking for and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1970" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1970_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>hasting unto the coming of the day of God, wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7551"><span id="lf0610_label_9617">13</span> Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7552"><span id="lf0610_label_9618">14</span> Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7553"><span id="lf0610_label_9619">15</span> And account <span class="ital">that</span> the longsuffering of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1971" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1971_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>our Lord <span class="ital">is</span> salvation; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you;</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>277<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7554"><span id="lf0610_label_9621">16</span> As also in all <span class="ital">his</span> epistles, speaking in them of these things; in which are some things hard to be understood, which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest, as <span class="ital">they do</span> also the other scriptures, unto their own destruction.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7555"><span id="lf0610_label_9622">17</span> Ye therefore, beloved, seeing ye know <span class="ital">these things</span> before, beware lest ye also, being led away with the error of the wicked, fall from your own stedfastness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7556"><span id="lf0610_label_9623">18</span> But grow in grace, and <span class="ital">in</span> the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him <span class="ital">be</span> glory both now and for ever. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_267" class="type-part John_I">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_051">THE FIRST EPISTLE GENERAL OF JOHN.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_268" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9624">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7557"><span id="lf0610_label_9625">1</span> <span class="csc">That</span> which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7558"><span id="lf0610_label_9626">2</span> (For the life was manifested, and we have seen <span class="ital">it,</span> and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7559"><span id="lf0610_label_9627">3</span> That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship <span class="ital">is</span> with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7560"><span id="lf0610_label_9628">4</span> And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7561"><span id="lf0610_label_9629">5</span> This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7562"><span id="lf0610_label_9630">6</span> If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7563"><span id="lf0610_label_9631">7</span> But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7564"><span id="lf0610_label_9632">8</span> If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7565"><span id="lf0610_label_9633">9</span> If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us <span class="ital">our</span> sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7566"><span id="lf0610_label_9634">10</span> If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_269" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9635">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7567"><span id="lf0610_label_9636">1</span> My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7568"><span id="lf0610_label_9637">2</span> And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for <span class="ital">the sins of</span> the whole world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7569"><span id="lf0610_label_9638">3</span> And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7570"><span id="lf0610_label_9639">4</span> He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7571"><span id="lf0610_label_9640">5</span> But whose keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7572"><span id="lf0610_label_9641">6</span> He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7573"><span id="lf0610_label_9642">7</span> Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7574"><span id="lf0610_label_9643">8</span> Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>278<span class="bracket">]</span></span> the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7575"><span id="lf0610_label_9644">9</span> He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7576"><span id="lf0610_label_9645">10</span> He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1972" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1972_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>occasion of stumbling in him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7577"><span id="lf0610_label_9647">11</span> But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7578"><span id="lf0610_label_9648">12</span> I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name&#x2019;s sake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7579"><span id="lf0610_label_9649">13</span> I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him <span class="ital">that is</span> from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7580"><span id="lf0610_label_9650">14</span> I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him <span class="ital">that is</span> from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7581"><span id="lf0610_label_9651">15</span> Love not the world, neither the things <span class="ital">that are</span> in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7582"><span id="lf0610_label_9652">16</span> For all that <span class="ital">is</span> in the world, the lust of the flesh, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1973" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1973_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7583"><span id="lf0610_label_9654">17</span> And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7584"><span id="lf0610_label_9655">18</span> Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7585"><span id="lf0610_label_9656">19</span> They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would <span class="ital">no doubt</span> have continued with us: but <span class="ital">they went out,</span> that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7586"><span id="lf0610_label_9657">20</span> But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7587"><span id="lf0610_label_9658">21</span> I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7588"><span id="lf0610_label_9659">22</span> Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7589"><span id="lf0610_label_9660">23</span> Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: [<span class="ital">but</span>] <span class="ital">he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7590"><span id="lf0610_label_9661">24</span> Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7591"><span id="lf0610_label_9662">25</span> And this is the promise that he hath promised us, <span class="ital">even</span> eternal life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7592"><span id="lf0610_label_9663">26</span> These <span class="ital">things</span> have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7593"><span id="lf0610_label_9664">27</span> But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1974" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1974_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7594"><span id="lf0610_label_9666">28</span> And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7595"><span id="lf0610_label_9667">29</span> If ye know that he is righteous, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1975" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1975_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ye know that every one <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1976" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1976_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>that doeth righteousness is born of him.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_270" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9670">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7596"><span id="lf0610_label_9671">1</span> Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7597"><span id="lf0610_label_9672">2</span> Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>279<span class="bracket">]</span></span> we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7598"><span id="lf0610_label_9673">3</span> And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7599"><span id="lf0610_label_9674">4</span> Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7600"><span id="lf0610_label_9675">5</span> And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7601"><span id="lf0610_label_9676">6</span> Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7602"><span id="lf0610_label_9677">7</span> Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7603"><span id="lf0610_label_9678">8</span> He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7604"><span id="lf0610_label_9679">9</span> Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7605"><span id="lf0610_label_9680">10</span> In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God; neither he that loveth not his brother.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7606"><span id="lf0610_label_9681">11</span> For this is the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1977" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1977_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7607"><span id="lf0610_label_9683">12</span> Not as Cain, <span class="ital">who</span> was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother&#x2019;s righteous.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7608"><span id="lf0610_label_9684">13</span> Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7609"><span id="lf0610_label_9685">14</span> We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not <span class="ital">his</span> brother abideth in death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7610"><span id="lf0610_label_9686">15</span> Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7611"><span id="lf0610_label_9687">16</span> Hereby perceive we the love <span class="ital">of God,</span> because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down <span class="ital">our</span> lives for the brethren.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7612"><span id="lf0610_label_9688">17</span> But whoso hath this world&#x2019;s good, and seeth his brother <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1978" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1978_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>have need, and shutteth up his bowels <span class="ital">of compassion</span> from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7613"><span id="lf0610_label_9690">18</span> My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7614"><span id="lf0610_label_9691">19</span> And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1979" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1979_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>assure our hearts before him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7615"><span id="lf0610_label_9693">20</span> For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7616"><span id="lf0610_label_9694">21</span> Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, <span class="ital">then</span> have we confidence toward God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7617"><span id="lf0610_label_9695">22</span> And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1980" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1980_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7618"><span id="lf0610_label_9697">23</span> And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7619"><span id="lf0610_label_9698">24</span> And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_271" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9699">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7620"><span id="lf0610_label_9700">1</span> Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7621"><span id="lf0610_label_9701">2</span> Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7622"><span id="lf0610_label_9702">3</span> And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that <span class="ital">spirit</span> of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7623"><span id="lf0610_label_9703">4</span> Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7624"><span id="lf0610_label_9704">5</span> They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>280<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7625"><span id="lf0610_label_9705">6</span> We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7626"><span id="lf0610_label_9706">7</span> Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7627"><span id="lf0610_label_9707">8</span> He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7628"><span id="lf0610_label_9708">9</span> In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7629"><span id="lf0610_label_9709">10</span> Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son <span class="ital">to be</span> the propitiation for our sins.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7630"><span id="lf0610_label_9710">11</span> Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7631"><span id="lf0610_label_9711">12</span> No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7632"><span id="lf0610_label_9712">13</span> Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7633"><span id="lf0610_label_9713">14</span> And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son <span class="ital">to be</span> the Saviour of the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7634"><span id="lf0610_label_9714">15</span> Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7635"><span id="lf0610_label_9715">16</span> And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7636"><span id="lf0610_label_9716">17</span> Herein is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1981" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1981_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7637"><span id="lf0610_label_9718">18</span> There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7638"><span id="lf0610_label_9719">19</span> We love him, because he first loved us.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7639"><span id="lf0610_label_9720">20</span> If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7640"><span id="lf0610_label_9721">21</span> And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_272" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9722">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7641"><span id="lf0610_label_9723">1</span> Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7642"><span id="lf0610_label_9724">2</span> By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7643"><span id="lf0610_label_9725">3</span> For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7644"><span id="lf0610_label_9726">4</span> For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, <span class="ital">even</span> our faith.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7645"><span id="lf0610_label_9727">5</span> Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7646"><span id="lf0610_label_9728">6</span> This is he that came by water and blood, <span class="ital">even</span> Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7647"><span id="lf0610_label_9729">7</span> For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7648"><span id="lf0610_label_9730">8</span> And there are three that bear witness in earth, the spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7649"><span id="lf0610_label_9731">9</span> If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7650"><span id="lf0610_label_9732">10</span> He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7651"><span id="lf0610_label_9733">11</span> And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7652"><span id="lf0610_label_9734">12</span> He that hath the Son hath life; <span class="ital">and</span> he that hath not the Son <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1982" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1982_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>of God hath not life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7653"><span id="lf0610_label_9736">13</span> These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>281<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7654"><span id="lf0610_label_9737">14</span> And this is the confidence that we have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1983" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1983_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7655"><span id="lf0610_label_9739">15</span> And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7656"><span id="lf0610_label_9740">16</span> If any man see his brother sin a sin <span class="ital">which is</span> not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7657"><span id="lf0610_label_9741">17</span> All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7658"><span id="lf0610_label_9742">18</span> We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7659"><span id="lf0610_label_9743">19</span> <span class="ital">And</span> we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7660"><span id="lf0610_label_9744">20</span> And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, <span class="ital">even</span> in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7661"><span id="lf0610_label_9745">21</span> Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_273" class="type-part John_II">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_053">THE SECOND EPISTLE OF JOHN.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_274" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9746">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7662"><span id="lf0610_label_9747">1</span> <span class="csc">The</span> elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7663"><span id="lf0610_label_9748">2</span> For the truth&#x2019;s sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7664"><span id="lf0610_label_9749">3</span> Grace be with you, mercy, <span class="ital">and</span> peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7665"><span id="lf0610_label_9750">4</span> I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7666"><span id="lf0610_label_9751">5</span> And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7667"><span id="lf0610_label_9752">6</span> And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7668"><span id="lf0610_label_9753">7</span> For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7669"><span id="lf0610_label_9754">8</span> Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1984" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1984_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>wrought, but that we receive a full reward.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7670"><span id="lf0610_label_9756">9</span> Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7671"><span id="lf0610_label_9757">10</span> If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into <span class="ital">your</span> house, neither bid him God speed:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7672"><span id="lf0610_label_9758">11</span> For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7673"><span id="lf0610_label_9759">12</span> Having many things to write unto you, I would not <span class="ital">write</span> with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1985" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1985_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>face to face, that our joy may be full.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7674"><span id="lf0610_label_9761">13</span> The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>282<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_275" class="type-part John_III">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_055">THE THIRD EPISTLE OF JOHN.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_276" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9762">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7675"><span id="lf0610_label_9763">1</span> <span class="csc">The</span> elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1986" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1986_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>in the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7676"><span id="lf0610_label_9765">2</span> Beloved, I <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1987" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1987_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7677"><span id="lf0610_label_9767">3</span> For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7678"><span id="lf0610_label_9768">4</span> I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7679"><span id="lf0610_label_9769">5</span> Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7680"><span id="lf0610_label_9770">6</span> Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7681"><span id="lf0610_label_9771">7</span> Because that for his name&#x2019;s sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7682"><span id="lf0610_label_9772">8</span> We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7683"><span id="lf0610_label_9773">9</span> I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7684"><span id="lf0610_label_9774">10</span> Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteth <span class="ital">them</span> out of the church.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7685"><span id="lf0610_label_9775">11</span> Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7686"><span id="lf0610_label_9776">12</span> Demetrius hath good report of all <span class="ital">men,</span> and of the truth itself: yea, and we <span class="ital">also</span> bear record; and ye know that our record is true.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7687"><span id="lf0610_label_9777">13</span> I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7688"><span id="lf0610_label_9778">14</span> But I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1988" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1988_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>face to face. Peace <span class="ital">be</span> to thee. <span class="ital">Our</span> friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_277" class="type-part Jude">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_057">THE GENERAL EPISTLE OF JUDE.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_278" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9780">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7689"><span id="lf0610_label_9781">1</span> <span class="csc">Jude,</span> the servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to them that are sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ, <span class="ital">and</span> called:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7690"><span id="lf0610_label_9782">2</span> Mercy unto you, and peace, and love, be multiplied.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7691"><span id="lf0610_label_9783">3</span> Beloved, when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation, it was needful for me to write unto you, and exhort <span class="ital">you</span> that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7692"><span id="lf0610_label_9784">4</span> For there are certain men crept in unawares, who were before of old ordained to this condemnation, ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness, and denying the only Lord God, and our Lord Jesus Christ.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>283<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7693"><span id="lf0610_label_9785">5</span> I will therefore put you in remembrance, though ye once knew this, how that the Lord, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed them that believed not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7694"><span id="lf0610_label_9786">6</span> And the angels which kept not their <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1989" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1989_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>first estate, but left their own habitation, he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7695"><span id="lf0610_label_9788">7</span> Even as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities about them in like manner, giving themselves over to fornication, and going after <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1990" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1990_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>strange flesh, are set forth for an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7696"><span id="lf0610_label_9790">8</span> Likewise also these <span class="ital">filthy</span> dreamers defile the flesh, despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7697"><span id="lf0610_label_9791">9</span> Yet Michael the archangel, when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses, durst not bring against him a railing accusation, but said, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1991" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1991_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>The Lord rebuke thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7698"><span id="lf0610_label_9793">10</span> But these speak evil of those things which they know not: but what they know naturally, as brute beasts, in those things they corrupt themselves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7699"><span id="lf0610_label_9794">11</span> Woe unto them! for they have gone in the way of Cain, and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward, and perished in the gainsaying of Core.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7700"><span id="lf0610_label_9795">12</span> These are spots in your feasts of charity, when they feast with you, feeding themselves without fear: clouds <span class="ital">they are</span> without water, carried about of winds; trees whose fruit withereth, without fruit, twice dead, plucked up by the roots;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7701"><span id="lf0610_label_9796">13</span> Raging waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7702"><span id="lf0610_label_9797">14</span> And Enoch also, the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7703"><span id="lf0610_label_9798">15</span> To execute judgment upon all, and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed, and of all their hard <span class="ital">speeches</span> which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7704"><span id="lf0610_label_9799">16</span> These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their own lusts; and their mouth speaketh great swelling <span class="ital">words,</span> having men&#x2019;s persons in admiration because of advantage.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7705"><span id="lf0610_label_9800">17</span> But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7706"><span id="lf0610_label_9801">18</span> How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time, who should walk after their own ungodly lusts.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7707"><span id="lf0610_label_9802">19</span> These be they who separate themselves, sensual, having not the Spirit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7708"><span id="lf0610_label_9803">20</span> But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7709"><span id="lf0610_label_9804">21</span> Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7710"><span id="lf0610_label_9805">22</span> And of some have compassion, making a difference:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7711"><span id="lf0610_label_9806">23</span> And others save with fear, pulling <span class="ital">them</span> out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7712"><span id="lf0610_label_9807">24</span> Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present <span class="ital">you</span> faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7713"><span id="lf0610_label_9808">25</span> To the only wise God our Saviour, <span class="ital">be</span> glory and majesty, dominion and power, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1992" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1992_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>both now and ever. Amen.</p>
</div>
</div>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>284<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<div id="lf0610_div_279" class="type-part Revelation">
<h2 id="lf0610_head_059">THE REVELATION OF S. JOHN THE DIVINE.</h2>
<div id="lf0610_div_280" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9810">1</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7714"><span id="lf0610_label_9811">1</span> <span class="csc">The</span> Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified <span class="ital">it</span> by his angel unto his servant John:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7715"><span id="lf0610_label_9812">2</span> Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7716"><span id="lf0610_label_9813">3</span> Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time <span class="ital">is</span> at hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7717"><span id="lf0610_label_9814">4</span> <span class="csc">John</span> to the seven churches <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1993" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1993_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>which are in Asia: Grace <span class="ital">be</span> unto you, and peace, from him <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1994" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1994_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7718"><span id="lf0610_label_9817">5</span> And from Jesus Christ, <span class="ital">who is</span> the faithful witness, <span class="ital">and</span> the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1995" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1995_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1996" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1996_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and washed us from our sins in his own blood,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7719"><span id="lf0610_label_9820">6</span> And hath <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1997" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1997_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him <span class="ital">be</span> glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7720"><span id="lf0610_label_9822">7</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1998" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1998_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they <span class="ital">also</span> which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7721"><span id="lf0610_label_9824">8</span> I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7722"><span id="lf0610_label_9825">9</span> I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7723"><span id="lf0610_label_9826">10</span> I was in the Spirit on the Lord&#x2019;s day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7724"><span id="lf0610_label_9827">11</span> Saying, I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and send <span class="ital">it</span> unto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt1999" id="lf0610_footnote_nt1999_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7725"><span id="lf0610_label_9829">12</span> And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7726"><span id="lf0610_label_9830">13</span> And in the midst of the seven candlesticks <span class="ital">one</span> like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7727"><span id="lf0610_label_9831">14</span> His head and <span class="ital">his</span> hairs <span class="ital">were</span> white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes <span class="ital">were</span> as a flame of fire;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7728"><span id="lf0610_label_9832">15</span> And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7729"><span id="lf0610_label_9833">16</span> And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance <span class="ital">was</span> as the sun shineth in his strength.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7730"><span id="lf0610_label_9834">17</span> And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2000" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2000_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I am the first and the last:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7731"><span id="lf0610_label_9836">18</span> <span class="ital">I am</span> he that liveth, and was dead; and, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>285<span class="bracket">]</span></span> behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7732"><span id="lf0610_label_9837">19</span> Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7733"><span id="lf0610_label_9838">20</span> The mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_281" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9839">2</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7734"><span id="lf0610_label_9840">1</span> Unto the angel of the church of Ephesus write; These things saith he that holdeth the seven stars in his right hand, who walketh in the midst of the seven golden candlesticks;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7735"><span id="lf0610_label_9841">2</span> I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7736"><span id="lf0610_label_9842">3</span> And hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name&#x2019;s sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7737"><span id="lf0610_label_9843">4</span> Nevertheless I have <span class="ital">somewhat</span> against thee, because thou hast left thy first love.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7738"><span id="lf0610_label_9844">5</span> Remember therefore from whence thou art fallen, and repent, and do the first works; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7739"><span id="lf0610_label_9845">6</span> But this thou hast, that thou hatest the deeds of the Nicolaitanes, which I also hate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7740"><span id="lf0610_label_9846">7</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7741"><span id="lf0610_label_9847">8</span> And unto the angel of the church in Smyrna write; These things saith the first and the last, which was dead, and is alive;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7742"><span id="lf0610_label_9848">9</span> I know thy works, and tribulation, and poverty, (but thou art rich) and <span class="ital">I know</span> the blasphemy of them which say they are Jews, and are not, but <span class="ital">are</span> the synagogue of Satan.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7743"><span id="lf0610_label_9849">10</span> Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast <span class="ital">some</span> of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7744"><span id="lf0610_label_9850">11</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; He that overcometh shall not be hurt of the second death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7745"><span id="lf0610_label_9851">12</span> And to the angel of the church in Pergamos write; These things saith he which hath the sharp sword with two edges;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7746"><span id="lf0610_label_9852">13</span> I know thy works, and where thou dwellest, <span class="ital">even</span> where Satan&#x2019;s seat <span class="ital">is:</span> and thou holdest fast my name, and hast not denied my faith, even in those days wherein Antipas <span class="ital">was</span> my faithful martyr, who was slain among you, where Satan dwelleth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7747"><span id="lf0610_label_9853">14</span> But I have a few things against thee, because thou hast there them that hold the doctrine of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2001" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2001_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Balaam, who taught Balac to cast a stumblingblock before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed unto idols, and to commit fornication.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7748"><span id="lf0610_label_9855">15</span> So hast thou also them that hold the doctrine of the Nicolaitanes, which thing I hate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7749"><span id="lf0610_label_9856">16</span> Repent; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7750"><span id="lf0610_label_9857">17</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth <span class="ital">it.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7751"><span id="lf0610_label_9858">18</span> And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet <span class="ital">are</span> like fine brass;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7752"><span id="lf0610_label_9859">19</span> I know thy works, and charity, and service, and faith, and thy patience, and thy works; and the last <span class="ital">to be</span> more than the first.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>286<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7753"><span id="lf0610_label_9860">20</span> Notwithstanding I have a few things against thee, because thou sufferest that woman <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2002" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2002_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Jezebel, which calleth herself a prophetess, to teach and to seduce my servants to commit fornication, and to eat things sacrificed unto idols.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7754"><span id="lf0610_label_9862">21</span> And I gave her space to repent of her fornication; and she repented not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7755"><span id="lf0610_label_9863">22</span> Behold, I will cast her into a bed, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7756"><span id="lf0610_label_9864">23</span> And I will kill her children with death; and all the churches shall know that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2003" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2003_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>I am he which searcheth the reins and hearts: and I will give unto every one of you according to your works.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7757"><span id="lf0610_label_9866">24</span> But unto you I say, and unto the rest in Thyatira, as many as have not this doctrine, and which have not known the depths of Satan, as they speak; I will put upon you none other burden.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7758"><span id="lf0610_label_9867">25</span> But that which ye have <span class="ital">already</span> hold fast till I come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7759"><span id="lf0610_label_9868">26</span> And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7760"><span id="lf0610_label_9869">27</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2004" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2004_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he shall rule them with a rod of iron; as the vessels of a potter shall they be broken to shivers: even as I received of my Father.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7761"><span id="lf0610_label_9871">28</span> And I will give him the morning star.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7762"><span id="lf0610_label_9872">29</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_282" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9873">3</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7763"><span id="lf0610_label_9874">1</span> And unto the angel of the church in Sardis write; These things saith he that hath the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars; I know thy works, that thou hast a name that thou livest, and art dead.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7764"><span id="lf0610_label_9875">2</span> Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7765"><span id="lf0610_label_9876">3</span> Remember therefore how thou hast received and heard, and hold fast, and repent. <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2005" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2005_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>If therefore thou shalt not watch, I will come on thee as a thief, and thou shalt not know what hour I will come upon thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7766"><span id="lf0610_label_9878">4</span> Thou hast a few names even in Sardis which have not defiled their garments; and they shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7767"><span id="lf0610_label_9879">5</span> He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2006" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2006_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7768"><span id="lf0610_label_9881">6</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.</p>
