<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7769"><span id="lf0610_label_9882">7</span> And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write; These things saith he that is holy, he that is true, he that hath the key of David, he that openeth, and no man shutteth; and shutteth, and no man openeth;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7770"><span id="lf0610_label_9883">8</span> I know thy works: behold, I have set before thee an open door, and no man can shut it: for thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7771"><span id="lf0610_label_9884">9</span> Behold, I will make them of the synagogue of Satan, which say they are Jews, and are not, but do lie; behold, I will make them to come and worship before thy feet, and to know that I have loved thee.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7772"><span id="lf0610_label_9885">10</span> Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7773"><span id="lf0610_label_9886">11</span> Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7774"><span id="lf0610_label_9887">12</span> Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out: and I will write upon him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, <span class="ital">which is</span> new Jerusalem, which cometh down out of heaven from my God: and <span class="ital">I will write upon him</span> my new name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7775"><span id="lf0610_label_9888">13</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>287<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7776"><span id="lf0610_label_9889">14</span> And unto the angel of the church <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2007" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2007_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7777"><span id="lf0610_label_9891">15</span> I know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot: I would thou wert cold or hot.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7778"><span id="lf0610_label_9892">16</span> So then because thou art lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will spue thee out of my mouth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7779"><span id="lf0610_label_9893">17</span> Because thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7780"><span id="lf0610_label_9894">18</span> I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich; and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, and <span class="ital">that</span> the shame of thy nakedness do not appear; and anoint thine eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7781"><span id="lf0610_label_9895">19</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2008" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2008_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7782"><span id="lf0610_label_9897">20</span> Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7783"><span id="lf0610_label_9898">21</span> To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7784"><span id="lf0610_label_9899">22</span> He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_283" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9900">4</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7785"><span id="lf0610_label_9901">1</span> After this I looked, and, behold, a door <span class="ital">was</span> opened in heaven: and the first voice which I heard <span class="ital">was</span> as it were of a trumpet talking with me; which said, Come up hither, and I will shew thee things which must be hereafter.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7786"><span id="lf0610_label_9902">2</span> And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and <span class="ital">one</span> sat on the throne.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7787"><span id="lf0610_label_9903">3</span> And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper and a sardine stone: and <span class="ital">there was</span> a rainbow round about the throne, in sight like unto an emerald.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7788"><span id="lf0610_label_9904">4</span> And round about the throne <span class="ital">were</span> four and twenty seats: and upon the seats I saw four and twenty elders sitting, clothed in white raiment; and they had on their heads crowns of gold.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7789"><span id="lf0610_label_9905">5</span> And out of the throne proceeded lightnings and thunderings and voices: and <span class="ital">there were</span> seven lamps of fire burning before the throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7790"><span id="lf0610_label_9906">6</span> And before the throne <span class="ital">there was</span> a sea of glass like unto crystal: and in the midst of the throne, and round about the throne, <span class="ital">were</span> four beasts full of eyes before and behind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7791"><span id="lf0610_label_9907">7</span> And the first beast <span class="ital">was</span> like a lion, and the second beast like a calf, and the third beast had a face as a man, and the fourth beast <span class="ital">was</span> like a flying eagle.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7792"><span id="lf0610_label_9908">8</span> And the four beasts had each of them six wings about <span class="ital">him;</span> and <span class="ital">they were</span> full of eyes within: and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2009" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2009_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>they rest not day and night, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2010" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2010_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7793"><span id="lf0610_label_9911">9</span> And when those beasts give glory and honour and thanks to him that sat on the throne, who liveth for ever and ever,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7794"><span id="lf0610_label_9912">10</span> The four and twenty elders fall down before him that sat on the throne, and worship him that liveth for ever and ever, and cast their crowns before the throne, saying,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7795"><span id="lf0610_label_9913">11</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2011" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2011_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_284" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9915">5</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7796"><span id="lf0610_label_9916">1</span> And I saw in the right hand of him that sat on the throne a book written within and on the backside, sealed with seven seals.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7797"><span id="lf0610_label_9917">2</span> And I saw a strong angel proclaiming with a loud voice, Who is worthy to open the book, and to loose the seals thereof?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7798"><span id="lf0610_label_9918">3</span> And no man in heaven, nor in earth, neither under the earth, was able to open the book, neither to look thereon.</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>288<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7799"><span id="lf0610_label_9919">4</span> And I wept much, because no man was found worthy to open and to read the book, neither to look thereon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7800"><span id="lf0610_label_9920">5</span> And one of the elders saith unto me, Weep not: behold, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2012" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2012_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the Lion of the tribe of Juda, the Root of David, hath prevailed to open the book, and to loose the seven seals thereof.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7801"><span id="lf0610_label_9922">6</span> And I beheld, and, lo, in the midst of the throne and of the four beasts, and in the midst of the elders, stood a Lamb as it had been slain, having seven horns and seven eyes, which are the seven Spirits of God sent forth into all the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7802"><span id="lf0610_label_9923">7</span> And he came and took the book out of the right hand of him that sat upon the throne.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7803"><span id="lf0610_label_9924">8</span> And when he had taken the book, the four beasts and four <span class="ital">and</span> twenty elders fell down before the Lamb, having every one of them harps, and golden vials full of <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2013" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2013_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>odours, which are the prayers of saints.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7804"><span id="lf0610_label_9926">9</span> And they sung a new song, saying, Thou art worthy to take the book, and to open the seals thereof: for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7805"><span id="lf0610_label_9927">10</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2014" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2014_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7806"><span id="lf0610_label_9929">11</span> And I beheld, and I heard the voice of many angels round about the throne and the beasts and the elders: and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand, and thousands of thousands;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7807"><span id="lf0610_label_9930">12</span> Saying with a loud voice, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7808"><span id="lf0610_label_9931">13</span> And every creature which is in heaven, and on the earth, and under the earth, and such as are in the sea, and all that are in them, heard I saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2015" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2015_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>Blessing, and honour, and glory, and power, <span class="ital">be</span> unto him that sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb for ever and ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7809"><span id="lf0610_label_9933">14</span> And the four beasts said, Amen. And the four <span class="ital">and</span> twenty elders fell down and worshipped him that liveth for ever and ever.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_285" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9934">6</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7810"><span id="lf0610_label_9935">1</span> And I saw when the Lamb opened one of the seals, and I heard, as it were the noise of thunder, one of the four beasts saying, Come and see.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7811"><span id="lf0610_label_9936">2</span> And I saw, and behold a white horse: and he that sat on him had a bow; and a crown was given unto him: and he went forth conquering, and to conquer.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7812"><span id="lf0610_label_9937">3</span> And when he had opened the second seal, I heard the second beast say, Come and see.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7813"><span id="lf0610_label_9938">4</span> And there went out another horse <span class="ital">that was</span> red: and <span class="ital">power</span> was given to him that sat thereon to take peace from the earth, and that they should kill one another: and there was given unto him a great sword.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7814"><span id="lf0610_label_9939">5</span> And when he had opened the third-seal, I heard the third beast say, Come and see. And I beheld, and lo a black horse; and he that sat on him had a pair of balances in his hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7815"><span id="lf0610_label_9940">6</span> And I heard a voice in the midst of the four beasts say, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2016" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2016_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>A measure of wheat for a penny, and three measures of barley for a penny; and <span class="ital">see</span> thou hurt not the oil and the wine.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7816"><span id="lf0610_label_9942">7</span> And when he had opened the fourth seal, I heard the voice of the fourth beast say, Come and see.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7817"><span id="lf0610_label_9943">8</span> And I looked, and behold a pale horse: and his name that sat on him was Death, and Hell followed with him. And power was given <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2017" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2017_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>unto them over the fourth part of the earth, to kill with sword, and with hunger, and with death, and with the beasts of the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7818"><span id="lf0610_label_9945">9</span> And when he had opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of them that were slain for the word of God, and for the testimony which they held:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7819"><span id="lf0610_label_9946">10</span> And they cried with a loud voice, saying, How long, O Lord, holy and true, dost thou not <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>289<span class="bracket">]</span></span> judge and avenge our blood on them that dwell on the earth?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7820"><span id="lf0610_label_9947">11</span> And white robes were given unto every one of them; and it was said unto them, that they should rest yet for a little season, until their fellowservants also and their brethren, that should be killed as they <span class="ital">were,</span> should be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7821"><span id="lf0610_label_9948">12</span> And I beheld when he had opened the sixth seal, and, lo, there was a great earthquake; and the sun became black as sackcloth of hair, and the moon became as blood;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7822"><span id="lf0610_label_9949">13</span> And the stars of heaven fell unto the earth, even as a fig tree casteth her <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2018" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2018_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>untimely figs, when she is shaken of a mighty wind.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7823"><span id="lf0610_label_9951">14</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2019" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2019_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And the heaven departed as a scroll when it is rolled together; and every mountain and island were moved out of their places.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7824"><span id="lf0610_label_9953">15</span> And the kings of the earth, and the great men, and the rich men, and the chief captains, and the mighty men, and every bondman, and every free man, hid themselves in the dens and in the rocks of the mountains;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7825"><span id="lf0610_label_9954">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2020" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2020_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And said to the mountains and rocks, Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him that sitteth on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7826"><span id="lf0610_label_9956">17</span> For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_286" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9957">7</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7827"><span id="lf0610_label_9958">1</span> And after these things I saw four angels standing on the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, that the wind should not blow on the earth, nor on the sea, nor on any tree.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7828"><span id="lf0610_label_9959">2</span> And I saw another angel ascending from the east, having the seal of the living God: and he cried with a loud voice to the four angels, to whom it was given to hurt the earth and the sea,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7829"><span id="lf0610_label_9960">3</span> Saying, Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7830"><span id="lf0610_label_9961">4</span> And I heard the number of them which were sealed: <span class="ital">and there were</span> sealed an hundred <span class="ital">and</span> forty <span class="ital">and</span> four thousand of all the tribes of the children of Israel.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7831"><span id="lf0610_label_9962">5</span> Of the tribe of Juda <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Reuben <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Gad <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7832"><span id="lf0610_label_9963">6</span> Of the tribe of Aser <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Nepthalim <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Manasses <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7833"><span id="lf0610_label_9964">7</span> Of the tribe of Simeon <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Levi <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Issachar <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7834"><span id="lf0610_label_9965">8</span> Of the tribe of Zabulon <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand, Of the tribe of Joseph <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Benjamin <span class="ital">were</span> sealed twelve thousand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7835"><span id="lf0610_label_9966">9</span> After this I beheld, and lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7836"><span id="lf0610_label_9967">10</span> And cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7837"><span id="lf0610_label_9968">11</span> And all the angels stood round about the throne, and <span class="ital">about</span> the elders and the four beasts, and fell before the throne on their faces, and worshipped God,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7838"><span id="lf0610_label_9969">12</span> Saying, Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, <span class="ital">be</span> unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7839"><span id="lf0610_label_9970">13</span> And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7840"><span id="lf0610_label_9971">14</span> And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>290<span class="bracket">]</span></span> And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7841"><span id="lf0610_label_9972">15</span> Therefore are they before the throne of God, and serve him day and night in his temple: and he that sitteth on the throne shall <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2021" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2021_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>dwell among them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7842"><span id="lf0610_label_9974">16</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2022" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2022_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7843"><span id="lf0610_label_9976">17</span> For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2023" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2023_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_287" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9978">8</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7844"><span id="lf0610_label_9979">1</span> And when he had opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven about the space of half an hour.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7845"><span id="lf0610_label_9980">2</span> And I saw the seven angels which stood before God; and to them were given seven trumpets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7846"><span id="lf0610_label_9981">3</span> And another angel came and stood at the altar, having a golden censer; and there was given unto him much incense, that he should <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2024" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2024_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>offer <span class="ital">it</span> with the prayers of all saints upon the golden altar which was before the throne.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7847"><span id="lf0610_label_9983">4</span> And the smoke of the incense, <span class="ital">which came</span> with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel&#x2019;s hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7848"><span id="lf0610_label_9984">5</span> And the angel took the censer, and filled it with fire of the altar, and cast <span class="ital">it</span> into the earth: and there were voices, and thunderings, and lightnings, and an earthquake.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7849"><span id="lf0610_label_9985">6</span> And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7850"><span id="lf0610_label_9986">7</span> The first angel sounded, and there followed hail and fire mingled with blood, and they were cast upon the earth: and the third part of trees was burnt up, and all green gras was burnt up.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7851"><span id="lf0610_label_9987">8</span> And the second angel sounded, and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea: and the third part of the sea became blood;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7852"><span id="lf0610_label_9988">9</span> And the third part of the creatures which were in the sea, and had life, died; and the third part of the ships were destroyed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7853"><span id="lf0610_label_9989">10</span> And the third angel sounded, and there fell a great star from heaven, burning as it were a lamp; and it fell upon the third part of the rivers, and upon the fountains of waters;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7854"><span id="lf0610_label_9990">11</span> And the name of the star is called Wormwood: and the third part of the waters became wormwood; and many men died of the waters, because they were made bitter.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7855"><span id="lf0610_label_9991">12</span> And the fourth angel sounded, and the third part of the sun was smitten, and the third part of the moon, and the third part of the stars; so as the third part of them was darkened, and the day shone not for a third part of it, and the night likewise.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7856"><span id="lf0610_label_9992">13</span> And I beheld, and heard an angel flying through the midst of heaven, saying with a loud voice, Woe, woe, woe, to the inhabiters of the earth by reason of the other voices of the trumpet of the three angels, which are yet to sound!</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_288" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_9993">9</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7857"><span id="lf0610_label_9994">1</span> And the fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star fall from heaven unto the earth: and to him was given the key of the bottomless pit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7858"><span id="lf0610_label_9995">2</span> And he opened the bottomless pit; and there arose a smoke out of the pit, as the smoke of a great furnace; and the sun and the air were darkened by reason of the smoke of the pit.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7859"><span id="lf0610_label_9996">3</span> And there came out of the smoke locusts upon the earth: and unto them was given power, as the scorpions of the earth have power.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7860"><span id="lf0610_label_9997">4</span> And it was commanded them that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing, neither any tree; but only those men which have not the seal of God in their foreheads.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7861"><span id="lf0610_label_9998">5</span> And to them it was given that they should not kill them, but that they should be tormented <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>291<span class="bracket">]</span></span> five months: and their torment <span class="ital">was</span> as the torment of a scorpion, when he striketh a man.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7862"><span id="lf0610_label_9999">6</span> And in those days shall men seek death, and shall not find it; and shall desire to die, and death shall flee from them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7863"><span id="lf0610_label_10000">7</span> And the shapes of the locusts <span class="ital">were</span> like unto horses prepared unto battle; and on their heads <span class="ital">were</span> as it were crowns like gold, and their faces <span class="ital">were</span> as the faces of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7864"><span id="lf0610_label_10001">8</span> And they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were as <span class="ital">the teeth</span> of lions.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7865"><span id="lf0610_label_10002">9</span> And they had breastplates, as it were breastplates of iron; and the sound of their wings <span class="ital">was</span> as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7866"><span id="lf0610_label_10003">10</span> And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power <span class="ital">was</span> to hurt men five months.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7867"><span id="lf0610_label_10004">11</span> And they had a king over them, <span class="ital">which is</span> the angel of the bottomless pit, whose name in the Hebrew tongue <span class="ital">is</span> Abaddon, but in the Greek tongue hath <span class="ital">his</span> name <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2025" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2025_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>Apollyon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7868"><span id="lf0610_label_10006">12</span> One woe is past; <span class="ital">and,</span> behold, there come two woes more hereafter.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7869"><span id="lf0610_label_10007">13</span> And the sixth angel sounded, and I heard a voice from the four horns of the golden altar which is before God,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7870"><span id="lf0610_label_10008">14</span> Saying to the sixth angel which had the trumpet, Loose the four angels which are bound in the great river Euphrates.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7871"><span id="lf0610_label_10009">15</span> And the four angels were loosed, which were prepared <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2026" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2026_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>for an hour, and a day, and a month, and a year, for to slay the third part of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7872"><span id="lf0610_label_10011">16</span> And the number of the army of the horsemen <span class="ital">were</span> two hundred thousand thousand: and I heard the number of them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7873"><span id="lf0610_label_10012">17</span> And thus I saw the horses in the vision, and them that sat on them, having breastplates of fire, and of jacinth, and brimstone: and the heads of the horses <span class="ital">were</span> as the heads of lions; and out of their mouths issued fire and smoke and brimstone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7874"><span id="lf0610_label_10013">18</span> By these three was the third part of men killed, by the fire, and by the smoke, and by the brimstone, which issued out of their mouths.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7875"><span id="lf0610_label_10014">19</span> For their power is in their mouth, and in their tails: for their tails <span class="ital">were</span> like unto serpents, and had heads, and with them they do hurt.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7876"><span id="lf0610_label_10015">20</span> And the rest of the men which were not killed by these plagues yet repented not of the works of their hands, that they should not worship devils, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2027" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2027_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and idols of gold, and silver, and brass, and stone, and of wood: which neither can see, nor hear, nor walk:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7877"><span id="lf0610_label_10017">21</span> Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_289" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10018">10</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7878"><span id="lf0610_label_10019">1</span> And I saw another mighty angel come down from heaven, clothed with a cloud: and a rainbow <span class="ital">was</span> upon his head, and his face <span class="ital">was</span> as it were the sun, and his feet as pillars of fire:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7879"><span id="lf0610_label_10020">2</span> And he had in his hand a little book open: and he set his right foot upon the sea, and <span class="ital">his</span> left <span class="ital">foot</span> on the earth,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7880"><span id="lf0610_label_10021">3</span> And cried with a loud voice, as <span class="ital">when</span> a lion roareth: and when he had cried, seven thunders uttered their voices.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7881"><span id="lf0610_label_10022">4</span> And when the seven thunders had uttered their voices, I was about to write: and I heard a voice from heaven saying unto me, Seal up those things which the seven thunders uttered, and write them not.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7882"><span id="lf0610_label_10023">5</span> And the angel which I saw stand upon the sea and upon the earth lifted up his hand to heaven,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7883"><span id="lf0610_label_10024">6</span> And sware by him that liveth for ever and ever, who created heaven, and the things that therein are, and the earth, and the things that <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>292<span class="bracket">]</span></span> therein are, and the sea, and the things which are therein, that there should be time no longer:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7884"><span id="lf0610_label_10025">7</span> But in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when he shall begin to sound, the mystery of God should be finished, as he hath declared to his servants the prophets.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7885"><span id="lf0610_label_10026">8</span> And the voice which I heard from heaven spake unto me again, and said, Go <span class="ital">and</span> take the little book which is open in the hand of the angel which standeth upon the sea and upon the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7886"><span id="lf0610_label_10027">9</span> And I went unto the angel, and said unto him, Give me the little book. And he said unto me, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2028" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2028_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Take <span class="ital">it,</span> and eat it up; and it shall make thy belly bitter, but it shall be in thy mouth sweet as honey.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7887"><span id="lf0610_label_10029">10</span> And I took the little book out of the angel&#x2019;s hand, and ate it up; and it was in my mouth sweet as honey: and as soon as I had eaten it, my belly was bitter.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7888"><span id="lf0610_label_10030">11</span> And he said unto me, Thou must prophesy again before many peoples, and nations, and tongues, and kings.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_290" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10031">11</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7889"><span id="lf0610_label_10032">1</span> And there was given me a reed like unto a rod: and the angel stood, saying, Rise, and measure the temple of God, and the altar, and them that worship therein.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7890"><span id="lf0610_label_10033">2</span> But the court which is without the temple <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2029" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2029_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>leave out, and measure it not; for it is given unto the Gentiles: and the holy city shall they tread under foot forty <span class="ital">and</span> two months.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7891"><span id="lf0610_label_10035">3</span> And <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2030" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2030_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>I will give <span class="ital">power</span> unto my two witnesses, and they shall prophesy a thousand two hundred <span class="ital">and</span> threescore days, clothed in sackcloth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7892"><span id="lf0610_label_10037">4</span> These are the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2031" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2031_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>two olive trees, and the two candlesticks standing before the God of the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7893"><span id="lf0610_label_10039">5</span> And if any man will hurt them, fire proceedeth out of their mouth, and devoureth their enemies: and if any man will hurt them, he must in this manner be killed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7894"><span id="lf0610_label_10040">6</span> These have power to shut heaven, that it rain not in the days of their prophecy: and have power over waters to turn them to blood, and to smite the earth with all plagues, as often as they will.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7895"><span id="lf0610_label_10041">7</span> And when they shall have finished their testimony, the beast that ascendeth out of the bottomless pit shall make war against them, and shall overcome them, and kill them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7896"><span id="lf0610_label_10042">8</span> And their dead bodies <span class="ital">shall lie</span> in the street of the great city, which spiritually is called Sodom and Egypt, where also our Lord was crucified.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7897"><span id="lf0610_label_10043">9</span> And they of the people and kindreds and tongues and nations shall see their dead bodies three days and an half, and shall not suffer their dead bodies to be put in graves.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7898"><span id="lf0610_label_10044">10</span> And they that dwell upon the earth shall rejoice over them, and make merry, and shall send gifts one to another; because these two prophets tormented them that dwelt on the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7899"><span id="lf0610_label_10045">11</span> And after three days and an half the Spirit of life from God entered into them, and they stood upon their feet; and great fear fell upon them which saw them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7900"><span id="lf0610_label_10046">12</span> And they heard a great voice from heaven saying unto them, Come up hither. And they ascended up to heaven in a cloud; and their enemies beheld them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7901"><span id="lf0610_label_10047">13</span> And the same hour was there a great earthquake, and the tenth part of the city fell, and in the earthquake were slain <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2032" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2032_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>of men seven thousand: and the remnant were affrighted, and gave glory to the God of heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7902"><span id="lf0610_label_10049">14</span> The second woe is past; <span class="ital">and,</span> behold, the third woe cometh quickly.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7903"><span id="lf0610_label_10050">15</span> And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdoms of this world are become <span class="ital">the kingdoms</span> of our Lord, and of his Christ; and he shall reign for ever and ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7904"><span id="lf0610_label_10051">16</span> And the four and twenty elders, which sat before God on their seats, fell upon their faces, and worshipped God,</p>
<span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>293<span class="bracket">]</span></span>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7905"><span id="lf0610_label_10052">17</span> Saying, We give thee thanks, O Lord God Almighty, which art, and wast, and art to come; because thou hast taken to thee thy great power, and hast reigned.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7906"><span id="lf0610_label_10053">18</span> And the nations were angry, and thy wrath is come, and the time of the dead, that they should be judged, and that thou shouldest give reward unto thy servants the prophets, and to the saints, and them that fear thy name, small and great; and shouldest destroy them which <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2033" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2033_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>destroy the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7907"><span id="lf0610_label_10055">19</span> And the temple of God was opened in heaven, and there was seen in his temple the ark of his testament: and there were lightnings, and voices, and thunderings, and an earthquake, and great hail.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_291" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10056">12</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7908"><span id="lf0610_label_10057">1</span> And there appeared a great <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2034" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2034_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>wonder in heaven; a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and upon her head a crown of twelve stars:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7909"><span id="lf0610_label_10059">2</span> And she being with child cried, travailing in birth, and pained to be delivered.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7910"><span id="lf0610_label_10060">3</span> And there appeared another <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2035" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2035_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>wonder in heaven; and behold a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and seven crowns upon his heads.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7911"><span id="lf0610_label_10062">4</span> And his tail drew the third part of the stars of heaven, and did cast them to the earth: and the dragon stood before the woman which was ready to be delivered, for to devour her child as soon as it was born.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7912"><span id="lf0610_label_10063">5</span> And she brought forth a man child, who was to rule all nations with a rod of iron: and her child was caught up unto God, and <span class="ital">to</span> his throne.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7913"><span id="lf0610_label_10064">6</span> And the woman fled into the wilderness, where she hath a place prepared of God, that they should feed her there a thousand two hundred <span class="ital">and</span> threescore days.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7914"><span id="lf0610_label_10065">7</span> And there was war in heaven: Michael and his angels fought against the dragon; and the dragon fought and his angels,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7915"><span id="lf0610_label_10066">8</span> And prevailed not; neither was their place found any more in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7916"><span id="lf0610_label_10067">9</span> And the great dragon was cast out, that old serpent, called the Devil, and Satan, which deceiveth the whole world: he was cast out into the earth, and his angels were cast out with him.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7917"><span id="lf0610_label_10068">10</span> And I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7918"><span id="lf0610_label_10069">11</span> And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7919"><span id="lf0610_label_10070">12</span> Therefore rejoice, <span class="ital">ye</span> heavens, and ye that dwell in them. Woe to the inhabiters of the earth and of the sea! for the devil is come down unto you, having great wrath, because he knoweth that he hath but a short time.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7920"><span id="lf0610_label_10071">13</span> And when the dragon saw that he was cast unto the earth, he persecuted the woman which brought forth the man <span class="ital">child.</span></p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7921"><span id="lf0610_label_10072">14</span> And to the woman were given two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness, into her place, where she is nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7922"><span id="lf0610_label_10073">15</span> And the serpent cast out of his mouth water as a flood after the woman, that he might cause her to be carried away of the flood.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7923"><span id="lf0610_label_10074">16</span> And the earth helped the woman, and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the flood which the dragon cast out of his mouth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7924"><span id="lf0610_label_10075">17</span> And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went to make war with the remnant of her <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>294<span class="bracket">]</span></span> seed, which keep the commandments of God, and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_292" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10076">13</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7925"><span id="lf0610_label_10077">1</span> And I stood upon the sand of the sea, and saw a beast rise up out of the sea, having seven heads and ten horns, and upon his horns ten crowns, and upon his heads the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2036" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2036_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>name of blasphemy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7926"><span id="lf0610_label_10079">2</span> And the beast which I saw was like unto a leopard, and his feet were as <span class="ital">the feet</span> of a bear, and his mouth as the mouth of a lion: and the dragon gave him his power, and his seat, and great authority.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7927"><span id="lf0610_label_10080">3</span> And I saw one of his heads as it were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2037" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2037_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>wounded to death; and his deadly wound was healed: and all the world wondered after the beast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7928"><span id="lf0610_label_10082">4</span> And they worshipped the dragon which gave power unto the beast: and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who <span class="ital">is</span> like unto the beast? who is able to make war with him?</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7929"><span id="lf0610_label_10083">5</span> And there was given unto him a mouth speaking great things and blasphemies; and power was given unto him <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2038" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2038_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>to continue forty <span class="ital">and</span> two months.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7930"><span id="lf0610_label_10085">6</span> And he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his tabernacle, and them that <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2039" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2039_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>dwell in heaven.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7931"><span id="lf0610_label_10087">7</span> And it was given unto him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them: and power was given him over all kindreds, and tongues, and nations.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7932"><span id="lf0610_label_10088">8</span> And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7933"><span id="lf0610_label_10089">9</span> If any man have an ear, let him hear.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7934"><span id="lf0610_label_10090">10</span> He that leadeth into captivity shall go into captivity: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2040" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2040_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>he that killeth with the sword must be killed with the sword. Here is the patience and the faith of the saints.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7935"><span id="lf0610_label_10092">11</span> And I beheld another beast coming up out of the earth; and he had two horns like a lamb, and he spake as a dragon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7936"><span id="lf0610_label_10093">12</span> And he exerciseth all the power of the first beast before him, and causeth the earth and them which dwell therein to worship the first beast, whose deadly wound was healed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7937"><span id="lf0610_label_10094">13</span> And he doeth great wonders, so that he maketh fire come down from heaven on the earth in the sight of men,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7938"><span id="lf0610_label_10095">14</span> And deceiveth them that dwell on the earth by <span class="ital">the means of</span> those miracles which he had power to do in the sight of the beast; saying to them that dwell on the earth, that they should make an image to the beast, which had the wound by a sword, and did live.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7939"><span id="lf0610_label_10096">15</span> And he had power to give <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2041" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2041_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>life unto the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause that as many as would not worship the image of the beast should be killed.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7940"><span id="lf0610_label_10098">16</span> And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2042" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2042_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7941"><span id="lf0610_label_10100">17</span> And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7942"><span id="lf0610_label_10101">18</span> Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast: for it is the number of a man; and his number <span class="ital">is</span> Six hundred threescore <span class="ital">and</span> six.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_293" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10102">14</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7943"><span id="lf0610_label_10103">1</span> And I looked, and, lo, a Lamb stood on the mount Sion, and with him an hundred forty <span class="ital">and</span> four thousand, having his Father&#x2019;s name written in their foreheads.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7944"><span id="lf0610_label_10104">2</span> And I heard a voice from heaven, as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of a great thunder: and I heard the voice of harpers harping with their harps:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7945"><span id="lf0610_label_10105">3</span> And they sung as it were a new song before the throne, and before the four beasts, and the elders: and no man could learn that song but the <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>295<span class="bracket">]</span></span> hundred <span class="ital">and</span> forty <span class="ital">and</span> four thousand, which were redeemed from the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7946"><span id="lf0610_label_10106">4</span> These are they which were not defiled with women; for they are virgins. These are they which follow the Lamb whithersoever he goeth. These <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2043" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2043_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>were redeemed from among men, <span class="ital">being</span> the firstfruits unto God and to the Lamb.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7947"><span id="lf0610_label_10108">5</span> And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7948"><span id="lf0610_label_10109">6</span> And I saw another angel fly in the midst of heaven, having the everlasting gospel to preach unto them that dwell on the earth, and to every nation, and kindred, and tongue, and people,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7949"><span id="lf0610_label_10110">7</span> Saying with a loud voice, Fear God, and give glory to him; for the hour of his judgment is come: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2044" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2044_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>and worship him that made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and the fountains of waters.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7950"><span id="lf0610_label_10112">8</span> And there followed another angel, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2045" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2045_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Babylon is fallen, is fallen, that great city, because she made all nations drink of the wine of the wrath of her fornication.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7951"><span id="lf0610_label_10114">9</span> And the third angel followed them, saying with a loud voice, If any man worship the beast and his image, and receive <span class="ital">his</span> mark in his forehead, or in his hand,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7952"><span id="lf0610_label_10115">10</span> The same shall drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is poured out without mixture into the cup of his indignation; and he shall be tormented with fire and brimstone in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7953"><span id="lf0610_label_10116">11</span> And the smoke of their torment ascendeth up for ever and ever: and they have no rest day nor night, who worship the beast and his image, and whosoever receiveth the mark of his name.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7954"><span id="lf0610_label_10117">12</span> Here is the patience of the saints: here <span class="ital">are</span> they that keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7955"><span id="lf0610_label_10118">13</span> And I heard a voice from heaven saying unto me, Write, Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> the dead which die in the Lord <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2046" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2046_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>from henceforth: Yea, saith the Spirit, that they may rest from their labours; and their works do follow them.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7956"><span id="lf0610_label_10120">14</span> And I looked, and behold a white cloud, and upon the cloud <span class="ital">one</span> sat like unto the Son of man, having on his head a golden crown, and in his hand a sharp sickle.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7957"><span id="lf0610_label_10121">15</span> And another angel came out of the temple, crying with a loud voice to him that sat on the cloud, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2047" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2047_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Thrust in thy sickle, and reap: for the time is come for thee to reap; for the harvest of the earth is <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2048" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2048_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>ripe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7958"><span id="lf0610_label_10124">16</span> And he that sat on the cloud thrust in his sickle on the earth; and the earth was reaped.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7959"><span id="lf0610_label_10125">17</span> And another angel came out of the temple which is in heaven, he also having a sharp sickle.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7960"><span id="lf0610_label_10126">18</span> And another angel came out from the altar, which had power over fire; and cried with a loud cry to him that had the sharp sickle, saying, Thrust in thy sharp sickle, and gather the clusters of the vine of the earth; for her grapes are fully ripe.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7961"><span id="lf0610_label_10127">19</span> And the angel thrust in his sickle into the earth, and gathered the vine of the earth, and cast <span class="ital">it</span> into the great winepress of the wrath of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7962"><span id="lf0610_label_10128">20</span> And the winepress was trodden without the city, and blood came out of the winepress, even unto the horse bridles, by the space of a thousand <span class="ital">and</span> six hundred furlongs.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_294" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10129">15</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7963"><span id="lf0610_label_10130">1</span> And I saw another sign in heaven, great and marvellous, seven angels having the seven last plagues; for in them is filled up the wrath of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7964"><span id="lf0610_label_10131">2</span> And I saw as it were a sea of glass mingled with fire: and them that had gotten the victory over the beast, and over his image, and over his mark, <span class="ital">and</span> over the number of his name, stand on the sea of glass, having the harps of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7965"><span id="lf0610_label_10132">3</span> And they sing <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2049" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2049_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>296<span class="bracket">]</span></span> and marvellous <span class="ital">are</span> thy works, Lord God Almighty; <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2050" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2050_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>just and true <span class="ital">are</span> thy ways, thou King of saints.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7966"><span id="lf0610_label_10135">4</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2051" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2051_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Who shall not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for <span class="ital">thou</span> only <span class="ital">art</span> holy: for all nations shall come and worship before thee; for thy judgments are made manifest.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7967"><span id="lf0610_label_10137">5</span> And after that I looked, and, behold, the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7968"><span id="lf0610_label_10138">6</span> And the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7969"><span id="lf0610_label_10139">7</span> And one of the four beasts gave unto the seven angels seven golden vials full of the wrath of God, who liveth for ever and ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7970"><span id="lf0610_label_10140">8</span> And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no man was able to enter into the temple, till the seven plagues of the seven angels were fulfilled.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_295" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10141">16</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7971"><span id="lf0610_label_10142">1</span> And I heard a great voice out of the temple saying to the seven angels, Go your ways, and pour out the vials of the wrath of God upon the earth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7972"><span id="lf0610_label_10143">2</span> And the first went, and poured out his vial upon the earth; and there fell a noisome and grievous sore upon the men which had the mark of the beast, and <span class="ital">upon</span> them which worshipped his image.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7973"><span id="lf0610_label_10144">3</span> And the second angel poured out his vial upon the sea; and it became as the blood of a dead <span class="ital">man:</span> and every living soul died in the sea.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7974"><span id="lf0610_label_10145">4</span> And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters; and they became blood.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7975"><span id="lf0610_label_10146">5</span> And I heard the angel of the waters say, Thou art righteous, O Lord, which art, and wast, and shalt be, because thou hast judged thus.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7976"><span id="lf0610_label_10147">6</span> For they have shed the blood of saints and prophets, and thou hast given them blood to drink; for they are worthy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7977"><span id="lf0610_label_10148">7</span> And I heard another out of the altar say, Even so, Lord God Almighty, true and righteous <span class="ital">are</span> thy judgments.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7978"><span id="lf0610_label_10149">8</span> And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7979"><span id="lf0610_label_10150">9</span> And men were <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2052" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2052_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>scorched with great heat, and blasphemed the name of God, which hath power over these plagues: and they repented not to give him glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7980"><span id="lf0610_label_10152">10</span> And the fifth angel poured out his vial upon the seat of the beast; and his kingdom was full of darkness; and they gnawed their tongues for pain,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7981"><span id="lf0610_label_10153">11</span> And blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores, and repented not of their deeds.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7982"><span id="lf0610_label_10154">12</span> And the sixth angel poured out his vial upon the great river Euphrates; and the water thereof was dried up, that the way of the kings of the east might be prepared.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7983"><span id="lf0610_label_10155">13</span> And I saw three unclean spirits like frogs <span class="ital">come</span> out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7984"><span id="lf0610_label_10156">14</span> For they are the spirits of devils, working miracles, <span class="ital">which</span> go forth unto the kings of the earth and of the whole world, to gather them to the battle of that great day of God Almighty.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7985"><span id="lf0610_label_10157">15</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2053" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2053_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Behold, I come as a thief. Blessed <span class="ital">is</span> he that watcheth, and keepeth his garments, lest he walk naked, and they see his shame.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7986"><span id="lf0610_label_10159">16</span> And he gathered them together into a place called in the Hebrew tongue Armageddon.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7987"><span id="lf0610_label_10160">17</span> And the seventh angel poured out his vial into the air; and there came a great voice out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying, It is done.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7988"><span id="lf0610_label_10161">18</span> And there were voices, and thunders, and lightnings; and there was a great earthquake, <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>297<span class="bracket">]</span></span> such as was not since men were upon the earth, so mighty an earthquake, <span class="ital">and</span> so great.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7989"><span id="lf0610_label_10162">19</span> And the great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell: and great Babylon came in remembrance before God, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2054" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2054_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>to give unto her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7990"><span id="lf0610_label_10164">20</span> And every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7991"><span id="lf0610_label_10165">21</span> And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven, <span class="ital">every stone</span> about the weight of a talent: and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail; for the plague thereof was exceeding great.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_296" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10166">17</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7992"><span id="lf0610_label_10167">1</span> And there came one of the seven angels which had the seven vials, and talked with me, saying unto me, Come hither; I will shew unto thee the judgment of the great whore that sitteth upon many waters:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7993"><span id="lf0610_label_10168">2</span> With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2055" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2055_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7994"><span id="lf0610_label_10170">3</span> So he carried me away in the spirit into the wilderness: and I saw a woman sit upon a scarlet coloured beast, full of names of blasphemy, having seven heads and ten horns.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7995"><span id="lf0610_label_10171">4</span> And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2056" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2056_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2020;</a>decked with gold and precious <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2057" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2057_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2021;</a>stones and pearls, having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7996"><span id="lf0610_label_10174">5</span> And upon her forehead <span class="ital">was</span> a name written, MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2058" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2058_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7997"><span id="lf0610_label_10176">6</span> And I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus: and when I saw her, I wondered with great admiration.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7998"><span id="lf0610_label_10177">7</span> And the angel said unto me, Wherefore didst thou marvel? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carrieth her, which hath the seven heads and ten horns.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_7999"><span id="lf0610_label_10178">8</span> The beast that thou sawest was, and is not; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit, and go into perdition: and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, when they behold the beast that was, and is not, and yet is.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8000"><span id="lf0610_label_10179">9</span> And here <span class="ital">is</span> the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8001"><span id="lf0610_label_10180">10</span> And there are seven kings: five are fallen, and one is, <span class="ital">and</span> the other is not yet come; and when he cometh, he must continue a short space.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8002"><span id="lf0610_label_10181">11</span> And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goeth into perdition.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8003"><span id="lf0610_label_10182">12</span> And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings, which have received no kingdom as yet; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8004"><span id="lf0610_label_10183">13</span> These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8005"><span id="lf0610_label_10184">14</span> These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2059" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2059_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him <span class="ital">are</span> called, and chosen, and faithful.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8006"><span id="lf0610_label_10186">15</span> And he saith unto me, The waters which thou sawest, where the whore sitteth, are peoples, and multitudes, and nations, and tongues.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8007"><span id="lf0610_label_10187">16</span> And the ten horns which thou sawest upon the beast, these shall hate the whore, and shall make her desolate and naked, and shall eat her flesh, and burn her with fire.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8008"><span id="lf0610_label_10188">17</span> For God hath put in their hearts to fulfil his will, and to agree, and give their kingdom unto the beast, until the words of God shall be fulfilled.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8009"><span id="lf0610_label_10189">18</span> And the woman which thou sawest is that great city, which reigneth over the kings of the earth.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_297" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10190">18</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8010"><span id="lf0610_label_10191">1</span> And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great power; and the earth was lightened with his glory.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8011"><span id="lf0610_label_10192">2</span> And he cried mightily with a strong voice, saying, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2060" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2060_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Babylon the great is fallen, is fallen, and is become the habitation of devils, and the hold of every foul spirit, and a cage of every unclean and hateful bird.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8012"><span id="lf0610_label_10194">3</span> For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication, and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her, and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich through the <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2061" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2061_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>abundance of her delicacies.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8013"><span id="lf0610_label_10196">4</span> And I heard another voice from heaven, saying, Come out of her, my people, that ye be not partakers of her sins, and that ye receive not of her plagues.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8014"><span id="lf0610_label_10197">5</span> For her sins have reached unto heaven, and God hath remembered her iniquities.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8015"><span id="lf0610_label_10198">6</span> Reward her even as she rewarded you, and double unto her double according to her works: in the cup which she hath filled fill to her double.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8016"><span id="lf0610_label_10199">7</span> How much she hath glorified herself, and lived deliciously, so much torment and sorrow give her: for she saith in her heart, I sit a <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2062" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2062_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>queen, and am no widow, and shall see no sorrow.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8017"><span id="lf0610_label_10201">8</span> Therefore shall her plagues come in one day, death, and mourning, and famine; and she shall be utterly burned with fire: for strong <span class="ital">is</span> the Lord God who judgeth her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8018"><span id="lf0610_label_10202">9</span> And the kings of the earth, who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her, shall bewail her, and lament for her, when they shall see the smoke of her burning,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8019"><span id="lf0610_label_10203">10</span> Standing afar off for the fear of her torment, saying, Alas, alas that great city Babylon, that mighty city! for in one hour is thy judgment come.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8020"><span id="lf0610_label_10204">11</span> And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8021"><span id="lf0610_label_10205">12</span> The merchandise of gold, and silver, and precious stones, and of pearls, and fine linen, and purple, and silk, and scarlet, and all <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2063" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2063_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>thyine wood, and all manner vessels of ivory, and all manner vessels of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8022"><span id="lf0610_label_10207">13</span> And cinnamon, and odours, and ointments, and frankincense, and wine, and oil, and fine flour, and wheat, and beasts, and sheep, and horses, and chariots, and <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2064" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2064_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">&#x2225;</a>slaves, and souls of men.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8023"><span id="lf0610_label_10209">14</span> And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee, and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee, and thou shalt find them no more at all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8024"><span id="lf0610_label_10210">15</span> The merchants of these things, which were made rich by her, shall stand afar off for the fear of her torment, weeping and wailing,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8025"><span id="lf0610_label_10211">16</span> And saying, Alas, alas that great city, that was clothed in fine linen, and purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold, and precious stones, and pearls!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8026"><span id="lf0610_label_10212">17</span> For in one hour so great riches is come to nought. And every shipmaster, and all the company in ships, and sailors, and as many as trade by sea, stood afar off,</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8027"><span id="lf0610_label_10213">18</span> And cried when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What <span class="ital">city is</span> like unto this great city!</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8028"><span id="lf0610_label_10214">19</span> And they cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and wailing, saying, Alas, alas that great city, wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness! for in one hour is she made desolate.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8029"><span id="lf0610_label_10215">20</span> Rejoice over her, <span class="ital">thou</span> heaven, and <span class="ital">ye</span> holy apostles and prophets; for God hath avenged you on her.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8030"><span id="lf0610_label_10216">21</span> And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone, and cast <span class="ital">it</span> into the sea, saying, Thus with violence shall that great city Babylon be thrown down, and shall be found no more at all.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8031"><span id="lf0610_label_10217">22</span> And the voice of harpers, and musicians, and of pipers, and trumpeters, shall be heard no more <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>299<span class="bracket">]</span></span> at all in thee; and no craftsman, of whatsoever craft <span class="ital">he be,</span> shall be found any more in thee; and the sound of a millstone shall be heard no more at all in thee;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8032"><span id="lf0610_label_10218">23</span> And the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more at all in thee: for thy merchants were the great men of the earth; for by thy sorceries were all nations deceived.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8033"><span id="lf0610_label_10219">24</span> And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints, and of all that were slain upon the earth.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_298" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10220">19</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8034"><span id="lf0610_label_10221">1</span> And after these things I heard a great voice of much people in heaven, saying, Alleluia; Salvation, and glory, and honour, and power, unto the Lord our God:</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8035"><span id="lf0610_label_10222">2</span> For true and righteous <span class="ital">are</span> his judgments: for he hath judged the great whore, which did corrupt the earth with her fornication, and hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8036"><span id="lf0610_label_10223">3</span> And again they said, Alleluia. And her smoke rose up for ever and ever.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8037"><span id="lf0610_label_10224">4</span> And the four and twenty elders and the four beasts fell down and worshipped God that sat on the throne, saying, Amen; Alleluia.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8038"><span id="lf0610_label_10225">5</span> And a voice came out of the throne, saying, Praise our God, all ye his servants, and ye that fear him, both small and great.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8039"><span id="lf0610_label_10226">6</span> And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8040"><span id="lf0610_label_10227">7</span> Let us be glad and rejoice, and give honour to him: for the marriage of the Lamb is come, and his wife hath made herself ready.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8041"><span id="lf0610_label_10228">8</span> And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8042"><span id="lf0610_label_10229">9</span> And he saith unto me, Write, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2065" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2065_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>Blessed <span class="ital">are</span> they which are called unto the marriage supper of the Lamb. And he saith unto me, These are the true sayings of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8043"><span id="lf0610_label_10231">10</span> And I fell at his feet to worship him. And he said unto me, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2066" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2066_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>See <span class="ital">thou do it</span> not: I am thy fellowservant, and of thy brethren that have the testimony of Jesus: worship God: for the testimony of Jesus is the spirit of prophecy.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8044"><span id="lf0610_label_10233">11</span> And I saw heaven opened, and behold a white horse; and he that sat upon him <span class="ital">was</span> called Faithful and True, and in righteousness he doth judge and make war.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8045"><span id="lf0610_label_10234">12</span> His eyes <span class="ital">were</span> as a flame of fire, and on his head <span class="ital">were</span> many crowns; and he had a name written, that no man knew, but he himself.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8046"><span id="lf0610_label_10235">13</span> <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2067" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2067_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>And he <span class="ital">was</span> clothed with a vesture dipped in blood: and his name is called The Word of God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8047"><span id="lf0610_label_10237">14</span> And the armies <span class="ital">which were</span> in heaven followed him upon white horses, clothed in fine linen, white and clean.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8048"><span id="lf0610_label_10238">15</span> And out of his mouth goeth a sharp sword, that with it he should smite the nations: and he shall rule them with a rod of iron: and he treadeth the winepress of the fierceness and wrath of Almighty God.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8049"><span id="lf0610_label_10239">16</span> And he hath on <span class="ital">his</span> vesture and on his thigh a name written, <a href="#lf0610_footnote_nt2068" id="lf0610_footnote_nt2068_ref" class="footnote-link type-footnote">*</a>KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8050"><span id="lf0610_label_10241">17</span> And I saw an angel standing in the sun; and he cried with a loud voice, saying to all the fowls that fly in the midst of heaven, Come and gather yourselves together unto the supper of the great God;</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8051"><span id="lf0610_label_10242">18</span> That ye may eat the flesh of kings, and the flesh of captains, and the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses, and of them that sit on them, and the flesh of all <span class="ital">men, both</span> free and bond, both small and great.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8052"><span id="lf0610_label_10243">19</span> And I saw the beast, and the kings of the earth, and their armies, gathered together to <span class="pb"><span class="decoration">Edition: current; Page: </span><span class="bracket">[</span>300<span class="bracket">]</span></span> make war against him that sat on the horse, and against his army.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8053"><span id="lf0610_label_10244">20</span> And the beast was taken, and with him the false prophet that wrought miracles before him, with which he deceived them that had received the mark of the beast, and them that worshipped his image. These both were cast alive into a lake of fire burning with brimstone.</p>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8054"><span id="lf0610_label_10245">21</span> And the remnant were slain with the sword of him that sat upon the horse, which <span class="ital">sword</span> proceeded out of his mouth: and all the fowls were filled with their flesh.</p>
</div>
<div id="lf0610_div_299" class="type-chapter chapter_AV">
<h2 id="lf0610_label_10246">20</h2>
<p id="Bible_0610_NewAuth_8055"><span id="lf0610_label_10247">1</span> And I saw an angel come down from heaven, having the key of the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand.</p>
